anchor_claim: The application discloses a personnel perception quantity counting method and system based on millimeter wave radar, and relates to the technical field of millimeter wave radar signal processing. The method comprises the steps of receiving a detection echo signal by utilizing a millimeter wave radar, performing ADC (analog-to-digital converter) sampling on the detection echo signal to convert the detection echo signal into a digital signal, and then performing processing by utilizing fast Fourier transform to obtain a millimeter wave echo sampling point frequency domain distribution matrix. And then, analyzing the millimeter wave echo sampling point frequency domain distribution matrix by utilizing a data processing and analyzing algorithm based on artificial intelligence and deep learning, and carrying out cluster analysis based on the key signal frequency domain distribution characteristics so as to take the number of cluster centers in a cluster analysis result as the personnel statistics total number. The application utilizes the data processing algorithm of artificial intelligence and deep learning, can reduce the dependence on specific parameter setting, and improves the robustness and reliability of the system.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a neural network acceleration realization method and an accelerator for realizing neural network acceleration, which relate to the technical field of convolutional neural networks, wherein a plurality of target reconfigurable areas are arranged in an FPGA, and the corresponding preprocessing operators are packaged in the corresponding reconfigurable areas in the FPGA to obtain target reconfigurable modules, and preprocessing operation is carried out on the data to be processed according to the target reconfigurable modules to obtain preprocessed data serving as input data of the target convolutional neural network. Dynamic switching of various preprocessing operators is realized on the FPGA, so that the data preprocessing function is efficiently accelerated, and the performance of the convolutional neural network computing system is further improved.

anchor_claim: The invention provides a backdoor defense method of a convolutional neural network based on potential characterization similarity, which comprises the steps of obtaining a training sample set, carrying out iterative training on the convolutional neural network implanted with a backdoor, selecting a class sample set, determining a target class of backdoor attack based on the potential characterization similarity, and obtaining a backdoor defense result of the convolutional neural network. The method and the device have the advantages that potential characterization of the suspicious sample set and the benign sample set is extracted, the similarity between the suspicious sample set and the benign sample set is utilized to determine the target category of the back door attack, the defending effectiveness and the generality are improved, the safety of the convolutional neural network is guaranteed, meanwhile, the convolutional neural network for eliminating the back door is trained from the convolutional neural network implanted with the back door by designing a specific loss function, the calculation cost is reduced, the defending efficiency is improved, and particularly, higher efficiency and applicability are shown on a large-scale data set.
cited_claim: The invention provides a deep sea riser fatigue life prediction method based on physical information driving, which comprises the steps of 1) collecting original data of riser fatigue test, 2) calculating physical information parameters of a riser, 3) taking material performance, riser geometric parameters, crack geometric parameters, stress strain, load parameters and crack fatigue physical information parameters as model input, taking crack expansion rate as model output, carrying out normalization and dimensionless processing to form a deep sea riser characteristic data set, 4) carrying out data segmentation recombination based on time sequence characteristics of data, building a long and short memory deep learning model containing physical constraint based on characteristics of crack expansion, 5) obtaining an optimal physical information driving deep learning model, 6) carrying out fatigue life prediction through the optimal physical information driving model, and carrying out uncertainty assessment. The invention can realize the probability prediction and uncertainty quantification of the fatigue life of the stand pipe and can provide reference for the reliability evaluation of the in-service stand pipe structure.

  - 인용 특허의 경우, 물리 기반 모델링과 머신러닝을 결합한 하이브리드 접근법을 통해 피로 수명 예측의 정확성을 높일 수 있음.

anchor_claim: The invention belongs to the field of distributed training, and provides a model training task allocation method and system under heterogeneous computing power environment, wherein a layered deep reinforcement learning model is constructed and used for selecting optimal split points and allocating resources among a terminal layer, an edge layer and a cloud computing layer, so that efficient computing task allocation and model training are realized. The task of different computational power demands is handled by designing multiple sub-policy networks. A resource awareness module is incorporated to measure the state of computing resources, network bandwidth, and latency, etc., of each layer. The heuristic algorithm is used for preliminarily estimating the range of the splitting points, reduces exploration of irrelevant positions and optimizes search efficiency. The resources required for the neural network model computation are measured in terms of the number of floating point operations. In the selection of the splitting points, a method of deep reinforcement learning is mainly adopted to combine with a resource sensing module, and the optimal splitting points are searched through structural optimization so as to realize the effective splitting of the model and complete high-efficiency joint training at two end sides.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent control, and discloses an electric wheelchair rollover risk detection and prevention system which comprises a data acquisition module, a data preprocessing module, a risk detection module, a risk prevention module and an intelligent control module, wherein the risk detection module and the risk prevention module are arranged to be beneficial to constructing a risk identification model, acquiring a risk prediction value, dividing a risk level and acquiring a corresponding risk prevention scheme based on the prediction value of the risk detection module, acquiring an optimal risk prevention scheme based on an improved genetic algorithm, formulating the risk prevention scheme while detecting risks, acquiring corresponding schemes for different risk levels, effectively coping with various different risk environments and risk conditions, acquiring rollover risk conditions from various angles, evaluating the effect of the risk prevention scheme through a deep learning technology, and accordingly improving pertinence and effectiveness of rollover risk prevention of an electric wheelchair, and fully utilizing environmental data and functional data.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to a lithium battery SOC estimation method based on a multi-scale physical information neural network, and belongs to the technical field of battery state of charge estimation. The method comprises the steps of S1, describing dynamic characteristics of a battery by adopting a first-order RC equivalent circuit model, enabling internal electric parameters to serve as Mamba model output to serve as physical knowledge, S2, carrying out multi-scale fusion on voltage characteristics, current characteristics, time characteristics and edge characteristics to obtain new characteristics to serve as input of a Mamba model, S3, constructing a Mamba model which comprises an SSM, a convolution layer, a linear layer and element operators, enabling the SSM to represent a selective state space model and being formed by combining a structural state space sequence model with a selection mechanism and a scanning module, and S4, carrying out lithium battery SOC estimation by utilizing the Mamba model and adopting SPKF self-adaptive weights to improve model training efficiency. The invention improves the accuracy and reliability of SOC prediction.
cited_claim: The application relates to the technical field of LED modules and discloses a breakpoint detection and positioning method and device for an LED module, wherein the method comprises the steps of collecting voltage and current data of serial-parallel nodes of the LED module to obtain an electrical characteristic matrix and a node topological graph; the method comprises the steps of carrying out iterative computation on the electrical feature matrix, processing voltage difference values and current variation between adjacent nodes to obtain breakpoint feature vectors, inputting the breakpoint feature vectors and the node topological graph into a multi-task neural network to carry out multi-layer convolution operation to obtain an electrical fault distribution map, carrying out feature segmentation and depth feature extraction on the electrical fault distribution map to obtain fault region feature data, establishing an electric field distribution model for the fault region feature data, and calculating electric field singular points through a least square method to obtain breakpoint space coordinate data, thereby improving the accuracy of breakpoint detection of the LED module and realizing accurate positioning of breakpoints of the LED module.

###

- 설계 변경: **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:, **다른 신경망 구조 사용**: 원본 특허에서 사용된 Mamba 모델 대신 다른 신경망 구조(예: LSTM, GAN 등)를 활용하여 SOC 추정 방법을 개발할 수 있습니다., **전기적 특성의 다른 측정 방법**: SOC 추정에 필요한 전기적 특성을 다른 방식으로 측정하거나, 다른 물리적 모델을 적용하여 차별화된 방법을 설계할 수 있습니다.

  - **전기적 특성의 다른 측정 방법**: SOC 추정에 필요한 전기적 특성을 다른 방식으로 측정하거나, 다른 물리적 모델을 적용하여 차별화된 방법을 설계할 수 있습니다.

특허 CN-119935140-A의 청구항과 선행특허 CN-119721046-A의

anchor_claim: The invention discloses an indoor positioning method and device based on a Kalman filtering fusion depth learning algorithm, which comprises the steps of collecting triaxial gyroscope data, constructing a depth learning model, carrying out convolution processing on the preprocessed triaxial gyroscope data through a CNN network module, learning a nonlinear rule in the gyroscope data from data output by a convolution neural network through an LSTM network module according to time change conditions and space distribution conditions of the gyroscope data, weighting the output of the LSTM through an attention module, integrating a plurality of weak learners through an AdaBoost integration module, outputting final gyroscope data, calculating a rotation matrix by adopting a quaternion method to calculate the final gyroscope prediction data, judging whether the current heading angle is available or not according to deviation between the current heading angle and a preset dominant direction, introducing the current heading angle into the Kalman filter to carry out filtering processing to obtain the optimal estimation deviation of the heading angle, and correcting the current heading angle by utilizing the optimal estimation deviation to obtain the current position information.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a text semantic analysis system based on deep learning, which relates to the technical field of text semantic analysis and comprises a semantic extraction module, a feature extraction and evaluation module, a text complexity dividing module, a fixed fusion strategy module and a dynamic weighting fusion module, wherein the semantic extraction module firstly performs semantic information extraction on generated text data, mines semantic relation and structural information in a text and captures key subjects, emotion tendencies and intentions in the text. According to the invention, the texts are divided into two types of simple and complex and are combined with different fusion strategies, the system adopts fixed fusion when the information is consistent, the multi-mode information is efficiently integrated, dynamic weighted fusion is introduced into a conflict scene, the most relevant mode is accurately focused, and the influence of semantic conflict on the accuracy of emotion analysis is avoided. The dynamic weighting fusion module enables the model to adaptively adjust the modal weight, improves the robustness and adaptability of the system under complex multi-modal situations, and is suitable for applications such as emotion recognition and emotion analysis.
ground_truth_critique:
[유사도 평가]

  - **모듈화된 접근법**: 두 특허 모두 여러 모듈로 구성되어 있어, 각각의 모듈이 특정 기능을 수행합니다.
  - **데이터 융합 및 가중치 조정**: 원본 특허는 Kalman 필터링을 통해 최적의 추정치를 도출하고, 인용 특허는 동적 가중치 융합을 통해 정보를 통합합니다.

###

[침해 리스크]
- 리스크 수준: low
- 위험 요소: **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성**:, 원본 특허의 기술이 인용 특허의 기술과 유사한 점이 있지만, 적용 분야가 다릅니다. 원본 특허는 **실내 위치 추적**에 중점을 두고 있으며, 인용 특허는 **텍스트 의미 분석**에 초점을 맞추고 있습니다. 따라서 직접적인 침해 가능성은 낮지만, 기술적 요소의 유사성으로 인해 간접 침해 리스크가 존재할 수 있습니다., **위험 요소 식별**:
- **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성**:
  - 원본 특허의 기술이 인용 특허의 기술과 유사한 점이 있지만, 적용 분야가 다릅니다. 원본 특허는 **실내 위치 추적**에 중점을 두고 있으며, 인용 특허는 **텍스트 의미 분석**에 초점을 맞추고 있습니다. 따라서 직접적인 침해 가능성은 낮지만, 기술적 요소의 유사성으로 인해 간접 침해 리스크가 존재할 수 있습니다.
  
- **위험 요소 식별**:
  - 두 특허 모두 **딥러닝**과 **데이터 처리**를 다루고 있어, 이들 기술을 활용하는 새로운 응용 프로그램이 두 특허의 경계를 넘을 가능성이 있습니다.
  - 특히, **가중치 조정** 및 **데이터 융합** 관련 기술이 유사하므로, 이 부분에서의 침해 리스크가 존재합니다.

###

[회피 전략]
- 설계 변경: **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:, 원본 특허의 경우, Kalman 필터링 대신 다른 필터링 기법(예: Particle Filter)으로 변경하여 기술적 차별성을 높일 수 있습니다., 인용 특허의 경우, 텍스트 분석에서 사용하는 딥러닝 모델을 다른 형태의 신경망(예: Transformer 기반 모델)으로 변경하여 고유한 접근법을 개발할 수 있습니다.
- 대안적 접근: **대안적 기술 접근법**:
- **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:

  - 인용 특허의 경우, 텍스트 분석에서 사용하는 딥러닝 모델을 다른 형태의 신경망(예: Transformer 기반 모델)으로 변경하여 고유한 접근법을 개발할 수 있습니다.

- **대안적 기술 접근법**:
  - 원본 특허는 실내 위치 추적을 위해 **센서 융합** 기술을 활용할 수 있으며, GPS나 Wi-Fi 신호를 이용한 위치 추적 방법을 고려할 수 있습니다.
  - 인용 특허는 텍스트 분석에 있어 **전통적인 기계 학습 기법**(예: SVM, Decision Trees)을 활용하여 딥러닝에 의존하지 않는 접근법으로 대체할 수 있습니다.

이러한 분석을 통해 두 특허 간의 기술적 유사성과 침해 리스크를 이해하고, 이를 기반으로 한 회피 전략을 수립할 수 있습니다.

anchor_claim: The invention provides a power equipment fault detection method and system based on a deep learning network, wherein the method comprises the steps of obtaining state parameter data of power equipment in an observation period, forming a first multidimensional time sequence according to the state parameter data, and inputting the first multidimensional time sequence into the deep learning model to obtain a fault probability prediction value corresponding to each time node respectively; if the power equipment has faults, the fault probability prediction value corresponding to each time node is input into a fault classification model to obtain a fault class set corresponding to the observation period, and the fault class of the current time node is obtained according to the fault class set. The invention can avoid the condition of inaccurate diagnosis result caused by abnormal data due to fault judgment by single-dimension data, and improves the accuracy of fault diagnosis.
cited_claim: The invention discloses an emergency fire hazard investigation method based on a multi-mode AI large model recognition technology, which relates to the field of artificial intelligence, combines the characteristics of fire hazards of factories and the characteristics of multi-mode data, constructs a multi-mode hidden hazard knowledge base by collecting the multi-mode data such as images, texts, related laws and regulations and the like which are actually recorded in the hidden trouble investigation process, based on deep learning and multi-mode large model technology, the hidden danger information identifying and analyzing capability is improved, and complex hidden danger locating problems can be disassembled into a series of interpretable reasoning steps by utilizing multi-hop reasoning and thinking chain technology, so that a user is helped to understand hidden danger judging basis. According to the method, hidden dangers in the image are analyzed from multiple angles and layers, different assumptions or conditions can be verified step by step, so that the judging accuracy is improved, comprehensive evaluation is performed by comprehensively integrating information of each dimension, and the comprehensiveness and the accuracy of hidden trouble investigation are ensured.

anchor_claim: The invention belongs to the technical field of electric digital data processing, and particularly relates to a stress prediction method for an observation window of a manned submersible based on machine learning, which comprises the steps of collecting strain and pressure data and establishing a finite element model of the observation window; the method comprises the steps of constructing a training set based on strain and pressure data, correspondingly constructing a machine learning mixed model, training the machine learning mixed model through the training set, obtaining a stress prediction model, and predicting stress data of the observation windows of the downloaded human submersible in different environments through the stress prediction model. The stress prediction method based on data driving is independent of a complex physical modeling process, can predict stress distribution under complex working conditions more rapidly and accurately, can greatly reduce calculation time and resource consumption, can provide a robust stress prediction result in a complex load environment, reduces calculation time, improves prediction accuracy, and provides an efficient and reliable prediction result for structural safety evaluation.
cited_claim: The embodiment of the specification relates to the technical field of emotion analysis and provides a method, a system, equipment and a readable storage medium for extracting evaluation words and evaluation objects, wherein the method comprises the steps of performing word segmentation and word vector conversion pretreatment on a comment text at a word embedding layer through a natural language pretreatment technology by acquiring the comment text, and converting the comment text into a processable numerical vector; extracting features of the input word vectors through a parallel bidirectional IndGRU layer and a dynamic routing layer, using a CRF layer to carry out sequence labeling, and intercepting the original input text through the labeling sequence to obtain the evaluation words and the evaluation objects. According to the technical scheme, the feature is expressed by using the vector in the capsule feature aggregation model, the vector has the length and the direction, the feature information which can be expressed is richer, and the extraction accuracy of the evaluation word and the evaluation object is effectively improved.

anchor_claim: The invention particularly relates to a method for predicting lncRNA markers based on a hierarchical graph neural network, which comprises the steps of constructing an lncRNA similarity network, constructing a disease similarity network, learning the characteristics of lncRNA and diseases, constructing an lncRNA and disease association graph and extracting dimensional characteristics of a graph-based neural structure. cited_claim: The disclosure provides a question-answering method, a question-answering device, electronic equipment and a question-answering medium based on a large model, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and particularly relates to the technical fields of deep learning, intelligent searching, dialogue systems and the like. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a to-be-processed problem, disassembling the to-be-processed problem to obtain a plurality of sub-problems and logic sequences among the plurality of sub-problems, searching candidate results matched with the sub-problems from candidate results according to each sub-problem to serve as search results corresponding to the sub-problems, inputting the to-be-processed problem and a first preset prompt word into a first large language model to enable the first large language model to generate answers of the to-be-processed problem, wherein the first preset prompt word comprises the plurality of sub-problems, the search results corresponding to the plurality of sub-problems respectively and the logic sequences among the plurality of sub-problems. Therefore, by the scheme, the answer efficiency and the answer effect can be improved.

anchor_claim: The embodiment of the application provides an information recommendation method, device, equipment, storage medium and program product, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of obtaining attribute information of a user to be recommended and behavior data information in a preset time period, respectively inputting the behavior data information into a plurality of long-short-term memory models to obtain the interestingness of the user to be recommended to various product types, inputting the attribute information into a multi-head self-attention model to obtain feature representation, wherein the feature representation is used for representing the probability that the user to be recommended selects various product types depending on the attribute information, inputting the interestingness and the feature representation of the user to be recommended to various product types into a fully-connected neural network to obtain a product type recommendation result corresponding to the user to be recommended, and forming a discriminator in a semi-supervised generation countermeasure network model by the plurality of long-short-term memory models, the multi-head self-attention model and the fully-connected neural network. The method is used for achieving the effect of improving the accuracy of the product category recommendation result.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of partial discharge detection of transformers, in particular to a method and a system for identifying partial discharge of a transformer based on a mask self-coding technology, wherein the method comprises the steps of collecting discharge signals when the partial discharge of the transformer occurs through an ultrasonic detection method; drawing the collected data information into a PRPD map, preprocessing the PRPD map, adding masks to the features of the PRPD map and training to obtain an encoder capable of reducing the feature dimension, and training the PRPD map through a convolutional neural network to obtain an optimized model. The method has the beneficial effects that the PRPD map is subjected to mask self-encoder training, so that the encoder capable of being used for feature dimension reduction is constructed, the defect of the traditional convolution network in the aspect of global and remote context modeling energy is avoided, and the precision and generalization capability of the model are improved. By adding the mask on the training set, the recognition accuracy of the model is remarkably improved, and the generalization capability of the model is enhanced.

anchor_claim: The invention provides a method and a device for monitoring the state of a buried cable collecting line and alarming faults, which are suitable for the technical field of power systems and comprise the steps of acquiring a line information set, a target fault set and a monitoring equipment information set of the buried cable collecting line; the method comprises the steps of constructing a simulation model of the underground cable collecting circuit of a target area based on a circuit information set, simulating based on a target fault set and the simulation model to obtain a fault information set, training a deep learning model to obtain an initial fault recognition model, correcting the initial fault recognition model based on a monitoring equipment information set to obtain a fault recognition model of the underground cable collecting circuit, monitoring the state of the underground cable collecting circuit of the target area to obtain real-time operation data, acquiring fault information according to the fault recognition model, and performing fault alarm based on the fault information. According to the invention, the fault recognition model is corrected through the parameters of the current collecting circuit and the monitoring equipment, and the accuracy of fault recognition is improved.
cited_claim: The invention relates to an intelligent question number method based on a large model retrieval enhancement and prompt strategy, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence and natural language processing. anchor_claim: A method and system for performing analysis and calculation of multi-energy flow for integrated energy system (IES), comprising establishing electrical power flow model, hydraulic model and thermal model, to form preliminary model of IES; constructing DHL-LSTM neural network for nonlinear regression of electrical power flow model, construct SHL-LSTM neural network for nonlinear regression of hydraulic model, and finding optimal parameters of two neural networks; training the two models, and adding error compensations into the two models; simplifying the thermal model, to obtain mechanism-driven linear thermal mode; and embedding mechanism-driven linear thermal model into error-compensated hydraulic model and error-compensated electrical power flow model respectively, to form and use final model of the IES to perform analysis and calculation of multi-energy flow. The present invention fully considers the coupling property inside the system, and avoids the situation that the convergence speed is slowed down when solving high nonlinear problems.
cited_claim: The invention relates to a residential area charging pile load prediction method based on deep learning and load peak correction, which comprises the following steps of A) preprocessing residential area charging data, including abnormal value identification, missing value complementation, standardization and the like, B) screening features with strong load correlation by adopting MIC as input of a load peak and load trend prediction model, C) constructing an LSTM load peak prediction model, D) carrying out CEEMDAN primary decomposition on a load trend, carrying out aggregation reconstruction on each sequence by using K-Means, then carrying out secondary decomposition on high frequency by using VMD, E) transmitting the sequence obtained by the secondary reconstruction into a Informer prediction model, F) carrying out load peak replacement, finishing curve shape correction, and G) calculating an error index and evaluating model performance. The method has the advantages that aiming at the charge load characteristics of residential areas, the charge behavior, the historical load, the external characteristics and the like are selected as inputs, the rule in the load data is fully excavated by utilizing the secondary decomposition and reconstruction, the load peak value is corrected, the prediction precision is improved, and therefore the transformer capacity of the power distribution network is optimized.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a self-adaptive voltage control method for an electric automobile wireless power transmission system. The method comprises the steps of combining an RBF neural network to construct a self-adaptive model prediction controller, outputting a k moment control quantity by the self-adaptive model prediction controller and acting on an electric vehicle wireless power transmission system, outputting a next control quantity by the self-adaptive model prediction controller after self-adaptive adjustment of state deviation according to the state quantity at the moment k+1 of the electric vehicle wireless power transmission system and a fixed model reference system, acting on the electric vehicle wireless power transmission system, continuously collecting the state quantity of the system and adjusting the control quantity, and thus completing online self-adaptive control of the electric vehicle wireless power transmission system. The invention realizes the accurate control of the dynamic wireless power transmission system of the electric automobile, obviously improves the dynamic response performance and anti-interference performance of the system, particularly can dynamically adjust the model in face of various external interference of the system, and enhances the stability of the control system.
cited_claim: The invention relates to a particle swarm optimization-based convolutional neural network short-term power load prediction method which comprises the following steps of 1, collecting historical temperature and humidity data, load information per hour and load data per week of a city to be predicted to obtain an input matrix of a CNN model, 2, constructing a convolutional neural network CNN to obtain sparse feature mapping, 3, adopting an improved enhanced elite particle swarm optimization algorithm EEPSO to obtain optimal CNN parameters, 4, training the whole model based on the optimal CNN parameters obtained in the step 3 to obtain a CNN model with high accuracy, high robustness and complete optimization, and finally predicting according to the CNN model to obtain a short-term load predicted value corresponding to 24 hours. The invention can solve the problems of low model optimization efficiency and insufficient prediction precision in the prior art.
ground_truth_critique:
[유사도 평가]
- 기술적 유사성 점수: 30/100
- 핵심 공통 요소: **기술적 유사성 점수**: 30, **핵심 공통 기술 요소**:, 두 특허 모두 인공지능 기술을 활용하여 시스템의 성능을 개선하려는 목적을 가지고 있습니다. 
- **기술적 유사성 점수**: 30
- **핵심 공통 기술 요소**:
  - 두 특허 모두 인공지능 기술을 활용하여 시스템의 성능을 개선하려는 목적을 가지고 있습니다. 
  - 원본 특허는 RBF 신경망을 사용하여 전기 자동차의 무선 전력 전송 시스템을 제어하는 방법을 설명하고 있으며, 인용 특허는 CNN을 사용하여 전력 부하 예측을 수행합니다. 
  - 두 기술 모두 데이터 기반의 모델링 및 예측을 포함하고 있지만, 적용 분야와 방법론이 다릅니다.

###

[침해 리스크]
- 리스크 수준: low
- 위험 요소: **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성**: 낮음, 원본 특허는 전기 자동차의 무선 전력 전송 시스템에 특화된 기술로, 인용 특허는 전력 부하 예측에 중점을 두고 있습니다. 따라서, 두 기술의 적용 분야가 다르기 때문에 직접적인 침해 가능성은 낮습니다., **위험 요소 식별**:
- **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성**: 낮음
  - 원본 특허는 전기 자동차의 무선 전력 전송 시스템에 특화된 기술로, 인용 특허는 전력 부하 예측에 중점을 두고 있습니다. 따라서, 두 기술의 적용 분야가 다르기 때문에 직접적인 침해 가능성은 낮습니다.
- **위험 요소 식별**:
  - 두 특허 모두 인공지능 모델을 사용하지만, 기술적 구현 방식이 다르기 때문에 유사한 기술을 사용하는 다른 특허와의 충돌 가능성은 존재할 수 있습니다. 특히, AI 모델의 최적화 및 예측 정확도와 관련된 특허에서의 리스크가 있을 수 있습니다.

###

[회피 전략]
- 설계 변경: **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:, 원본 특허의 RBF 신경망 대신 다른 형태의 신경망(예: LSTM, GRU 등) 또는 비선형 제어 이론을 적용하여 전기 자동차의 무선 전력 전송 시스템을 제어할 수 있습니다., 인용 특허의 CNN 대신 다른 머신러닝 기법(예: 회귀 분석, 의사결정 나무 등)을 사용하여 부하 예측을 수행하는 방법으로 회피할 수 있습니다.
- 대안적 접근: **대안적 기술 접근법**:
- **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:
  - 원본 특허의 RBF 신경망 대신 다른 형태의 신경망(예: LSTM, GRU 등) 또는 비선형 제어 이론을 적용하여 전기 자동차의 무선 전력 전송 시스템을 제어할 수 있습니다.
  - 인용 특허의 CNN 대신 다른 머신러닝 기법(예: 회귀 분석, 의사결정 나무 등)을 사용하여 부하 예측을 수행하는 방법으로 회피할 수 있습니다.
  
- **대안적 기술 접근법**:
  - 원본 특허의 경우, 전력 전송 시스템의 제어를 위해 전통적인 제어 이론(예: PID 제어기)을 활용하는 방법을 고려할 수 있습니다.
  - 인용 특허의 경우, 데이터 수집 및 예측을 위한 통계적 방법론을 활용하여 CNN을 사용하지 않고도 부하 예측을 수행할 수 있습니다.

이러한 분석을 통해 두 특허 간의 기술적 유사성을 이해하고, 침해 리스크를 평가하며, 회피 전략을 수립하는 데 도움이 될 것입니다.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of short-term prediction of wind power and discloses a method for predicting wind power in the future, which comprises the steps of inducing space-time correlation characteristics of a wind power cluster into a long-distance convergence effect and a short-distance time sequence causal relation between wind power plants, obtaining a convergence effect adjacency matrix surface by using an improved set analysis method, a synchronous rate judgment method and a variance judgment method, obtaining a time sequence causal adjacency matrix by using a Person correlation coefficient and a Grignard causal test, providing an error evaluation characteristic coefficient formula for constructing an error adjacency matrix, improving a traditional graph convolutional neural network and providing a graph neural network structure based on a multichannel attention mechanism. The invention provides a graph convolution prediction method considering the fusion of a wind power cluster convergence effect and a multichannel attention mechanism, which has the advantages of strong prediction stability, high prediction performance, effective prediction result and strong practicability.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a vulnerability risk monitoring method and system based on a transmission and distribution network, wherein the method comprises the steps of obtaining power grid data, preprocessing the power grid data to obtain first power grid data; based on the first power grid data, predicting power grid load demands by utilizing a neural network model to obtain prediction data, performing multi-time scale vulnerability index calculation on the prediction data to obtain a calculation result, constructing a Bayesian attack graph according to the calculation result, identifying a high risk path, implementing the high risk path by formulating a protection strategy, storing data generated by risk monitoring, and improving accuracy of risk path identification.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of power quality control and discloses a power quality control method under distributed energy access, which comprises the following steps of S1, data acquisition and transmission. And high-performance sensors are deployed at key nodes, so that the sensitivity is high, the stability is strong, and the low-delay and low-packet-loss real-time data transmission to a management and control center is ensured. S2, analysis and diagnosis. The central control multi-core processor runs software integrating fast Fourier transform, wavelet transform and deep learning algorithm, judges the electric energy quality according to a high standard threshold value, and intelligently traces the abnormal source. And S3, cooperative control. When the electric energy quality does not reach the standard, the control center directs SVG millisecond-level output reactive current and APF to filter harmonic waves according to a strategy library, and the control center cooperatively recovers high-quality electric energy quality and balances energy and a power grid. The invention has the advantages of accurate and efficient data acquisition, stable and reliable communication link, intelligent agility of analysis and diagnosis and fine and flexible cooperative control.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a wind energy and solar energy power generation prediction model and application thereof. The invention combines the convolutional neural network CNN and ABiLSTM to obtain a CNN-ABiLSTM model and combines the CNN and the transducer-MLP to obtain a CNN-transducer-MLP model. The CNN may capture short-term correlations between renewable energy power generation data BiLSTM and the transducer-MLP may use the new information extracted by the CNN to identify inherent long-term correlations for prediction. The prediction results of the two mixed models are more accurate and efficient, have advantages in adaptability and generalization, and have more obvious advantages in long-term prediction.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a power distribution network collaborative power-preserving strategy online matching method of a micro-grid with a transformer area, which comprises the steps of 1, establishing a power distribution network offline historical scene library of the micro-grid with the transformer area, establishing a power distribution network basic model, establishing a historical typical scene library offline based on power distribution network historical operation data, laying a model foundation for subsequent strategy design, calculating power flow based on Newton-Raphson algorithm to conduct first scene classification, judging optimization targets of different scenes, and establishing a historical scene library, 2, generating a power-preserving strategy under corresponding historical typical scenes based on network reconstruction and improved PSO algorithm, thereby establishing an offline historical typical scene power-preserving strategy library, 3, carrying out online scene matching based on a deep neural network based on the historical scenes and the power-preserving strategy library, identifying the historical scene which is most similar to the online state through learning the operation characteristics and load distribution of the historical scene, and matching the optimal historical typical scene in real-time power-preserving strategy.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of energy management and distribution, and discloses an intelligent energy routing system with fault tolerance. The energy collection module comprises a photovoltaic panel, a fan and other units, a built-in sensor monitors parameters such as power generation power and the like, the energy storage module comprises a lithium battery, an excess capacity and the like, a distribution management and fault detection circuit, the intelligent control unit plans energy flow by deep learning according to multiple data, switches a fault tolerance mode during fault, distributes multiple ports of the module, is provided with a power regulation and isolation device, a communication module is in mixed architecture security domain, a man-machine interaction interface is visually presented by means of a screen, keys and APP, manual intervention, priority setting and abnormal automatic alarm are realized. The invention has the advantages of high energy utilization and self-supporting promotion, intelligent adaptation and stable operation, strong fault tolerance and supply continuity, convenient interaction and operation and maintenance synergy.

anchor_claim: The invention provides a photovoltaic grid-connected inverter control method based on behavior cloning, which comprises the steps of presetting an adaptive updating strategy of a controller parameter, initializing M strategy neural networks with the same structure, starting an inverter, dynamically selecting the controller parameter of a PI controller according to the adaptive updating strategy, extracting input data and output data of a plurality of groups of PI controllers in real time to form teaching data and storing the teaching data into a teaching database, updating the weight parameter of each strategy neural network through a gradient descent method, inputting the input data in each group of data of the teaching database into the updated strategy neural network to obtain a calculation result, comparing each calculation result with corresponding output data in the teaching database, and putting the group of data into an online training process if the difference value of the calculation result and the teaching data is smaller than a preset threshold value. The invention adopts a data driving method, performs clone pre-training firstly, and then uses a learning model to replace a PI controller in DDPG stage of deep reinforcement learning.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of micro power grids, in particular to a method for evaluating and modeling the adjustment potential of distributed resources in a micro power grid, which comprises the following steps of S1, collecting operation data of the distributed resources in the micro power grid in real time, constructing a long-term and short-term memory network model, S2, performing feature extraction and dimension reduction processing on the collected operation data by using an automatic encoder and a convolutional neural network, mining the mode and the feature of the operation data, and S3, constructing an adjustment potential evaluation model by combining a cloud model and a Bayesian network based on the mode and the feature of the operation data. According to the method, the long-term memory network model is built, the automatic encoder and the convolutional neural network are fused in the data processing stage to perform feature extraction and dimension reduction processing on the collected operation data, the cloud model and the Bayesian network are combined, a novel method is provided for processing uncertainty and ambiguity, and the evaluation efficiency of the internal distributed resource adjustment potential of the micro-grid is improved.

anchor_claim: The invention belongs to the technical field of electric power marketing, and particularly discloses an information processing method and system for an electric power marketing management system. The method comprises the steps of S1, collecting data, collecting power data through a sensor, S2, preprocessing the data, calculating an average value and a standard deviation, removing abnormal values and filling missing values, S3, extracting characteristics, calculating a power consumption characteristic value and a load fluctuation characteristic value, dynamically adjusting the collection frequency, S4, predicting the power load value by using a neural network model, S5, making marketing decisions, and making electricity price, resource allocation and promotion activity strategies according to the predicted values. The system comprises a data acquisition module, a preprocessing module, a feature extraction module, a load prediction module, a marketing decision module and a data storage and communication module. The method solves the problems that the traditional power load prediction method is low in precision, the existing marketing decision is lagged, and personalized requirements are difficult to meet. Experiments prove that the method has good application effect in different scenes, and improves the efficiency and accuracy of power marketing management.
cited_claim: The invention discloses an intelligent management and self-adaptive updating method of a power grid standard semantic knowledge base, which comprises the steps of modularizing the knowledge base, establishing an intelligent auditing and updating mechanism, setting a knowledge base import and export function and starting intelligent recommendation and early warning. The management efficiency of the knowledge base is improved, the accuracy and the instantaneity of the knowledge are ensured, and reliable data support is provided for intelligent operation of the power grid. Meanwhile, the flexibility and the expandability of the knowledge base are enhanced, and the diversified requirements of intelligent management of the power grid are met.

anchor_claim: The application provides an automatic focusing method, device, storage medium and electronic equipment of an image, wherein the method comprises the steps of cutting out a knife edge image from a target image, determining characteristic data of the target image according to the knife edge image, wherein the characteristic data at least comprise one of ESF radius, PSF radius and maximum radius of the target image, the knife edge image is an image comprising a clear knife edge, obtaining an over-focus under-focus classification neural network based on FocusNet network training by adopting a plurality of sets of training data, inputting the target image into the over-focus under-focus classification neural network to obtain a target defocusing direction of the target image, determining defocusing amount of the target image according to the characteristic data of the target image and the target defocusing direction, and automatically focusing the target image according to the defocusing amount. The method adopts three characteristic indexes which are in linear relation with the defocus amount, and the defocus amount is reversely deduced through a linear model or a high-order model to rapidly predict the quasi-focusing position of the chip.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a visual tracking and positioning method and system for a marine cage railing. The method comprises the steps of preprocessing an image acquired by a monocular RGB camera, identifying a marine cage railing in the preprocessed image, preliminarily detecting the position of the marine cage railing by adopting a target detection algorithm based on deep learning, further confirming the position of the marine cage railing by combining a feature matching method, continuously tracking the identified marine cage railing, predicting the motion state of the railing by adopting Kalman filtering, combining a meanshift target tracking technology, a time sequence information fusion technology and a motion compensation technology, realizing stable locking of the railing target, and estimating the distance between an unmanned ship and the marine cage according to the identified and tracked marine cage railing by utilizing monocular vision and scale information. The invention is based on an economical and practical monocular camera, and realizes accurate identification, stable tracking and distance estimation of the marine net cage railing.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a building material quality detection method and a system, which relate to the technical field of quality detection and comprise the steps of forming a distributed sensor array by deploying multifunctional intelligent nodes to collect monitoring data, and simultaneously collecting high-resolution images by combining an unmanned aerial vehicle; the method comprises the steps of carrying out fusion processing on multi-source data to generate comprehensive analysis basic data, utilizing a convolutional neural network and a long-term and short-term memory network to establish a time sequence prediction model to predict material performance change trend, adopting density clustering and a support vector machine algorithm to detect abnormal samples, constructing a three-dimensional digital twin model, visually displaying abnormal detection results and generating a detection report. The invention forms a complete technical system, realizes the intellectualization, the accuracy and the visualization of the quality detection of the building materials, and provides a powerful support for quality management decision-making.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a mineral resource potential evaluation method based on remote sensing and deep learning, which comprises the following steps of drawing a mineral distribution map layer, a lithology construction layer and a changed layer, determining weights of the layers by using a geological mineral formation theory, adjusting the weights of the layers by using a random forest, overlapping the layers to obtain a comprehensive map, and carrying out image classification by using a self-grinding deep learning model based on the comprehensive map to obtain a mining target area. The mineral resource potential evaluation method based on remote sensing and deep learning can successfully identify a plurality of areas with potential mineral resources and is consistent with the on-site investigation result, can effectively reduce the blindness of investigation, optimize the positioning of a prospecting target area and greatly improve the success rate of investigation work.

anchor_claim: The invention belongs to the technical field of material microstructure state test characterization, and particularly provides a material microstructure quantitative characterization method for coupling image enhancement and machine learning, which comprises the following steps of acquiring an observation sample microstructure image set through a microscopic observation method; the method comprises the steps of carrying out image enhancement, multiple noise reduction and binarization processing on a microstructure image set, extracting features of a binarized image to Gao Weiyin space by using a deep convolutional neural network algorithm, carrying out dimension reduction and quantitative characterization on high-dimensional features by using a consistent manifold algorithm, carrying out physical interpretability analysis on dimension reduction results of the microstructure features of the material, and evaluating the effect of dimension reduction quantitative indexes on the characterization of the microstructure features of the material. The invention realizes the unified description and quantitative characterization of various complex microstructure shapes, sizes and evolution of the material, greatly reduces the cost and error of the manual statistical method, and has stronger innovation and better engineering application prospect.
cited_claim: The ground penetrating radar underground pipeline identification method based on the improvement YOLOv comprises the steps of obtaining ground penetrating radar target image data, constructing a dataset, carrying out data enhancement on the obtained target image data, improving a YOLOv network model, adding CBAM attention mechanisms into a feature extraction network of the YOLOv network model, replacing a CIoU loss function of the YOLOv network model with a WIoU frame loss function, and inputting the dataset to be detected into the trained improved YOLOv network model to achieve underground pipeline position and category detection. According to the method, a CBAM attention mechanism is added to a YOLOv backbone neural network, an original CIoU loss function of YOLOv is replaced by a WIoU frame loss function, and a data set to be detected is input into a trained target detection network to realize detection of a common underground pipeline target.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a thin interbed lithology structure identification method based on deep learning, which comprises the steps of manually collecting and processing to obtain seismic data, carrying out well shock calibration and deep time conversion to obtain a thin interbed section lithology structure and seismic data at a well point, obtaining a time spectrum image in a local time window of a well side seismic channel through time frequency analysis and sliding, taking the time spectrum image as a deep learning network input sample, obtaining the thin interbed lithology structure in the local time window, taking the classification code as a sample label, completing thin interbed lithology structure identification network model training to obtain optimal network parameters, traversing all seismic channels by utilizing the optimal network parameters to obtain thin interbed lithology classification results in all time windows, and processing the results in the overlapped time windows to determine the final spatial spread of the thin interbed lithology structure. Compared with the existing method, the method combines the well logging and the seismic data, can break through the seismic resolution ratio, obtain the space continuous spread of the thin interbed lithology structure, does not need wavelet information, has high recognition precision and is convenient to popularize.
cited_claim: A method and a system for rapidly detecting and visualizing apparent damage of a road based on a thermal infrared imager belong to the technical field of road nondestructive detection. In order to solve the problem that the existing deep learning model is poor in interpretation in apparent damage of a road, the method comprises the steps of firstly obtaining an image of the apparent damage of the road, then replacing at least one C2f module in a backbone network of a YOLO model with a Swin transducer module, inputting the image into an improved YOLO model for damage detection, and adopting a smooth gradient type activation mapping algorithm considering loss for visualization in the processing process of the improved YOLO model.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a wind cluster recognition method, a wind cluster recognition system and a needling reading system, which are used for rapidly and accurately recognizing and analyzing wind clusters generated at a needling position, reducing manual measurement steps and accelerating skin needling test flow. The method comprises the following steps of identifying locating points, preprocessing a shot image, identifying locating points in the preprocessed image, capturing a skin prick image based on the locating points, identifying wind clusters, identifying and screening wind clusters to be measured and corresponding confidence coefficients thereof based on a deep learning method according to the captured skin prick image, calculating wind cluster measured values, measuring and calculating the identified and screened wind clusters to obtain the area, the maximum diameter and the vertical diameter of the wind clusters, performing secondary screening and supplementing of the wind clusters based on the obtained confidence coefficients and the obtained area, performing secondary screening of the wind clusters, performing secondary screening and supplementing of the wind clusters based on the obtained confidence coefficients and the obtained area, and performing wind cluster analysis.
cited_claim: The invention provides steel structure hoisting gesture abnormality detection equipment and method based on improved Unet semantic segmentation, wherein the hoisting equipment comprises a chassis and a boom, a camera of an image acquisition unit is arranged to acquire a real-time image of the chassis gesture and a real-time image of the boom gesture, an image processing unit comprises a memory and a comparator, the memory is arranged to store a set range image of the chassis gesture and a set range image of the boom gesture, the comparator is arranged to receive the real-time image of the chassis gesture and compare with the set range image to determine whether the chassis gesture exceeds the set range, receive the real-time image of the boom gesture and compare with the set range image to determine whether the boom gesture exceeds the set range, and an alarm unit is arranged to send an alarm signal when the chassis gesture or the boom gesture exceeds the set range. The detection method is deployed on the image processing unit and is divided into three steps, namely, a suspension arm framework and key points for framework connection are firstly divided by using a semantic segmentation method based on deep learning, then framework information of the suspension arm is extracted by using a traditional vision algorithm, the key points at two ends of the framework are used as vertexes, and included angles between different frameworks are calculated, so that the problem of overturning caused by the fact that the posture of hoisting equipment exceeds a reasonable range is avoided, and the hoisting construction level and the safety level are improved.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a wet land refined drawing method based on a remote sensing image and a deep learning super-resolution algorithm, which comprises the steps of firstly, obtaining a high-resolution remote sensing image and a low-resolution remote sensing image of a research area, preprocessing the remote sensing image, matching a high-resolution wet land sample with the low-resolution image to obtain a high-resolution wet land data set, secondly, obtaining land coverage data and extracting wet land information to obtain a low-resolution wet land data set, inputting the low-resolution wet land data set and the high-resolution wet land data set into a convolution transformation super-resolution network reconstruction feature based on a convolution block attention module, dividing the low-resolution wet land data set by utilizing a U-Net architecture based on Scharr convolution and fast Fourier convolution, then, designing weighted loss functions of three loss functions for a wet land drawing task, and improving the wet land drawing precision from image details, time sequences and image consistency, and finally, evaluating an optimal model for improving the wet land refined drawing precision, thereby providing a powerful support for wet land research in various fields.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a method and a system for annotating medical ultrasonic images, which comprise the steps of acquiring a medical ultrasonic image data set, preprocessing an image, carrying out image denoising and enhancing operations, adopting a text detection algorithm based on deep learning to automatically detect and locate a text region in the image for the preprocessed medical ultrasonic image, acquiring the position and size space information of a text, carrying out text recognition according to the detected text region by using an OCR technology, and accurately extracting text content in the image by using a character segmentation-based method and a sequence learning-based method to obtain a preliminary text recognition result.

anchor_claim: The present disclosure relates to the technical field of document recognition, and provides an intelligent document recognition method and apparatus, an electronic device and a storage medium. The method comprises: extracting text information and layout information from a document to be recognized; acquiring a template containing a specified field; on the basis of an industry knowledge base corresponding to the document, adding a label to the text information; and, on the basis of the layout information and the label, using a large language model to recognize text information matched with the specified field from the text information to which the label has been added, the large language model being a large language model that has been trained by using the industry knowledge base. In the embodiments of the present disclosure, document recognition results more conform to industry attributes, improving document recognition accuracy.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a marine ship positioning method based on semantic enhancement, which belongs to the technical field of machine learning algorithms and computer vision, and is characterized in that model training is performed after a data set is collected; the method comprises the steps of constructing a marine ship positioning model based on semantic enhancement, inputting sample data of a data set into the model, calculating total loss function values, carrying out counter propagation, optimizing connection weights through a selected optimizer and corresponding parameters, training for multiple rounds to obtain a final marine ship positioning model, inputting text image information to be positioned, and outputting a target prediction frame indicated by given expression. According to the invention, accurate characteristics are generated based on semantic perception visual coding, targets are effectively positioned based on a progressive two-stage decoding module, and understanding of a model on complex multi-modal relation is promoted by introducing an information sample learning module, so that the efficiency and accuracy of visual positioning are improved.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a photothermal therapy target temperature imaging method based on deep learning, which comprises the following steps of 1, hardware composition and configuration of a photoacoustic ultrasound dual-mode-based multi-bandwidth photoacoustic imaging system, 2, signal acquisition and preprocessing, 3, construction and training of a TEM-UNet deep learning network, 4, generating data image data of a plurality of independent modes by using a traditional reconstruction algorithm through the preprocessed signals of the step 2, and carrying out accurate target segmentation, temperature image reconstruction and multi-mode image information fusion on the data image data of the independent modes through the TEM-Unet deep learning network. According to the method, a deep learning TEM-UNet network architecture is introduced, so that a tumor target area is effectively segmented, selective temperature image reconstruction is realized, the temperature measurement precision in the photothermal treatment process is remarkably improved, the complexity of system hardware is reduced, and the method is suitable for clinical application of photothermal treatment of tumors.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a target detection method, a device and equipment based on an underwater blurred image, wherein the method comprises the steps of collecting an underwater blurred image data set, and carrying out bounding box and category labeling on a target object to obtain a labeled data set; training a built neural network model by using unlabeled and labeled data sets to obtain a target detection model, wherein the neural network model firstly uses EFFICIENTNET as a main network to extract characteristics of an image input without a boundary frame to obtain a plurality of middle layer characteristics, then uses a synthetic fusion pyramid network to perform characteristic fusion on the middle layer characteristics, finally uses Linformer to perform self-attention mechanism processing to output the image with the boundary frame and the target category in the boundary frame, and finally uses the target detection model obtained by training to perform target detection on an underwater blurred image to be detected. The invention realizes high-efficiency and high-precision detection of the target in the underwater blurred image.

cited_claim: The invention discloses an image classification method, system and terminal based on DCPI resin, which comprises the steps of constructing a photonic neural network based on DCPI resin, training the photonic neural network to obtain a target network, collecting a target image, inputting the target image into an input layer of the target network for preprocessing to obtain a preprocessed image, inputting the preprocessed image into an optical weight self-learning layer of the target network for reasoning to obtain a reasoning result, inputting the reasoning result into an output layer of the target network for classification, and outputting a classification result of the target image. anchor_claim: The present invention relates to a method for predicting whether to perform an important intervention on the basis of machine learning, the method including the steps of: receiving an input of vital sign data of one or more patients, demographic data, arrival path data, and data on whether to perform an important intervention after arriving at an emergency room as training data for training a prediction model; training the prediction model by using the training data so that the prediction model outputs whether to perform an important intervention in response to receiving the input of vital sign data, demographic data, and arrival path data; and inputting vital sign data, demographic data, and patient arrival data of an emergency patient to the trained prediction model to output the degree to which performing an important intervention is necessary, the necessity thereof, and the number of necessary important interventions.
cited_claim: The invention aims to develop a novel high-performance atrial fibrillation progress prediction model based on machine learning based on various machine learning methods. Aims to improve the early diagnosis and treatment of atrial fibrillation. The model was run by collecting and analyzing baseline data for the patient, including demographic data, drug use, serological indices, cardiac ultrasound, and electrocardiographic examination data, etc., for a total of 50 variables. 10 variables with stronger correlation with atrial fibrillation diagnosis are screened out by a spearman correlation analysis and a Least Absolute Shrinkage and Selection Operator (LASSO) regression and GradientBoost Recursion Feature Elimination (RFE) method. The results show that GradientBoost algorithm performs optimally in terms of AUC, sensitivity and specificity, providing a powerful predictive tool for diagnosis and treatment of atrial fibrillation.

cited_claim: The application discloses a tracing method, a tracing device, tracing equipment and tracing media for clinical auxiliary decision making, and relates to the technical field of data processing, wherein the method comprises the steps of acquiring clinical data, and judging whether the clinical data meets rule triggering conditions according to a constructed dynamic rule base; the dynamic rule base is associated with the static knowledge base, when rule triggering conditions are met, dynamic tracing information matched with the rule triggering conditions is obtained from the dynamic rule base, the dynamic tracing information comprises target rule item identification, target rule prompt content and target rule prompt basis content, static tracing information matched with the target rule item identification is obtained from the static knowledge base according to the target rule item identification, the static tracing information comprises target knowledge item identification and target associated knowledge content, and the target associated knowledge content is received and responded to an operation instruction to be marked. The scheme solves the problem of trust caused by opaque rules, and improves the accuracy of clinical decisions.

anchor_claim: The application relates to the technical field of repeated transcranial magnetic stimulation, and particularly discloses a repeated transcranial magnetic stimulation image navigation system which is used for capturing brain structure multi-dimensional joint perception characteristic information in structural magnetic resonance data of a patient by inputting the structural magnetic resonance data of an autism patient into an image processing and semantic understanding algorithm based on artificial intelligence and deep learning for processing, and determining amygdala region as a region of interest by carrying out semantic segmentation based on the brain structure multi-dimensional joint perception characteristic. Therefore, a more personalized apricot kernel region of interest determination scheme can be provided for different autistic patients, and the intelligent level of repeated transcranial magnetic stimulation image navigation can be improved, so that specific requirements of different patients can be better met, and a more reliable basis is provided for subsequent functional connection analysis and rTMS treatment.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a noninvasive blood potassium concentration estimation method, a noninvasive blood potassium concentration estimation device, computer equipment and a storage medium, and belongs to the technical field of blood potassium detection. The method comprises the steps of carrying out feature extraction on real electrocardiographic data and simulated electrocardiographic data to obtain key physiological features, mixing the real electrocardiographic data and the simulated electrocardiographic data to obtain a mixed data set, dividing the mixed data set into a training set, a verification set and a test set, constructing a deep learning model which comprises a convolution module, a feature compression module, a global feature aggregation module and a classification output module, training the deep learning model based on the training set, evaluating the deep learning model in the training process based on the verification set to obtain a trained deep learning model, and inputting the test set into the trained deep learning model to estimate blood potassium concentration to obtain an estimation result. Therefore, the noninvasive blood potassium concentration is estimated through the deep learning model training by combining the real data with the simulation data, the accuracy is high, the method is simple and convenient, and the application range is wide.

anchor_claim: The application provides a physiological parameter-based self-adaptive infusion control method and system. The method comprises the steps of monitoring vital signs and transfusion states of a patient in real time, analyzing variation trend of the parameters, judging whether transfusion speed is required to be regulated or transfusion is stopped, generating corresponding transfusion regulation instructions, dynamically regulating transfusion equipment according to the transfusion regulation instructions, evaluating risk level and giving an alarm to inform medical staff in abnormal conditions, and recording all relevant data to form a transfusion process log. After each infusion is finished, analyzing the relation between the multidimensional physiological parameters and the abnormal events, identifying potential influencing factors and interactions of the potential influencing factors, and performing predictive optimization on a decision algorithm and a control strategy in the future infusion process through a machine learning model so as to individually adjust the infusion control strategy of the patient. The application improves the safety and flexibility of transfusion and realizes personalized medical care.
cited_claim: Disclosed is an AI-based product surface inspecting apparatus. The AI-based apparatus includes: a sensor unit which photographs a product to generate image data and measures a color, a saturation, a brightness, a transparency, and/or a reflectance of the product; a detection unit which detects a defect on the product by inputting the image data to a convolutional neural network (CNN) trained to detect a defect on a product surface; and a preprocessor which converts the image data based on the color, the saturation, the brightness, the transparency, and/or the reflectance of the product to input the converted data to the detection unit. The number of convolution layers of the convolutional neural network is determined based on a defect detection difficulty determined according to at least one of the color, the saturation, the brightness, the transparency, and the reflectance of the product and a defect type.

anchor_claim: A document is analyzed to identify attributes of the document. A set of statistical measures are calculated for each of the formatting attributes. Data from the document is split into chunks using the hierarchical relationship. A representation of the document that includes the hierarchical structure is then generated. The representation is stored in a data store as a vector usable by a machine learning model to perform a query on the document according to the hierarchical structure.
cited_claim: The present disclosure relates to a data processing method, apparatus and computer program product. The method comprises the steps of sequentially searching at least two preset databases based on a first query object under the condition that the first query object is received, acquiring a reference query result of the second query object from the database where the second query object is located under the condition that the second query object with the similarity larger than a preset similarity threshold value is searched, and determining the reference query result of the second query object as a target query result. On one hand, compared with the prior art that related content fragments are recalled by taking a knowledge base of a given source as a retrieval range, and then the content fragments and the query objects are given to a large model for outputting answers, the time consumption of a question-answer process can be reduced, and on the other hand, as the query objects and the reference query results are prestored in the database, the accuracy and the usability are known, and the query results which accord with the expectations of users can be retrieved.

cited_claim: The invention discloses a method and a system for diagnosing faults of a charging robot based on deep learning, and relates to the related field of robots, wherein the method comprises the steps of acquiring application attribute information, extracting and classifying elements to obtain an application attribute element series parameter set; the method comprises the steps of obtaining a working fault data set, carrying out clustering integration to obtain a multi-system parameter working fault data set, carrying out fault feature extraction and feature cascade analysis to construct a robot working fault cascade feature forest, obtaining information of a scene to be applied to obtain a target robot working fault cascade feature tree, carrying out associated feature extraction and data mapping search to obtain a robot working fault feature data set, carrying out training verification and optimization by adopting a deep learning network structure to obtain a target robot fault diagnosis network, and carrying out working fault diagnosis. cited_claim: The invention discloses a consumption financial relation graph system, and belongs to the technical field of data processing and financial science and technology. The system builds a correlation network between people and key attributes based on a graph database technology, and solves the problems of insufficient relation mining, limited wind control capability and low data processing efficiency in the existing consumption financial data management. The system comprises a data source module, a data processing module, a data storage module, a feature processing module, a data analysis module, an application service module and a data visualization module. Through data cleaning, integration and feature extraction, the system can efficiently store and analyze consumption financial data, realize risk assessment, fraud detection and credit scoring by using a machine learning algorithm, and intuitively display analysis results through a visual map. The system supports real-time calculation of billions of nodes and edges, meets the requirements of complex business scenes, and remarkably improves the wind control capability, the accurate marketing level and the data processing efficiency in the consumption finance field.

anchor_claim: The application provides a modeling method, a system, equipment and a medium of an air compressor based on data fitting driving, belongs to the technical field of computers. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a MAP (MAP) diagram of an air compressor, recording a plurality of performance data sets corresponding to the air compressor under a plurality of rotating speed working conditions, integrating the flow prediction model and a preset temperature mechanism model to obtain an air compressor model, wherein the performance data sets corresponding to the air compressor under each rotating speed working condition comprise a plurality of groups of performance data, each group of performance data comprises rotating speed, flow and pressure ratio of the air compressor, carrying out data fitting according to the MAP diagram of the air compressor to obtain a flow constraint function of the air compressor and a plurality of flow-pressure ratio functions corresponding to the air compressor under the plurality of rotating speed working conditions, and training a preset neural network model to obtain the flow prediction model. The application can effectively reduce modeling difficulty.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of transformers, in particular to an intelligent excitation surge current identification method based on machine learning, which comprises the steps of firstly constructing a simulation model of a high-impedance transformer, and optimizing the model to enable the model to output a waveform diagram of the excitation surge current which accords with an experimental result according to specified input parameters; the simulation experiment is carried out based on the characteristic vector, the difficulty and time cost of the manual experiment are greatly reduced, the characteristic vector is obtained by adopting the data of the simulation experiment to process and analyze, the relation between the characteristic vectors of different parameters is found by deep learning the characteristic vector, finally, the multi-mode data set is subjected to decision-level fusion, each parameter is fused together after the decision result is obtained independently, the final waveform result is output according to the gain of positive and negative correlation, the prediction and identification of the exciting inrush current are realized, and the suppression of the exciting inrush current is used as the basis.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a vehicle-rail-bridge system driving safety evaluation method, a system, a terminal and a medium, wherein the method comprises the steps of constructing a train-rail-bridge system coupling random dynamics model, constructing different damage working condition combinations of a bridge, simulating driving processes under the different damage working condition combinations to obtain corresponding mechanical response sequences, evaluating and scoring based on the mechanical response sequences under the different damage working condition combinations by using a TOPSIS evaluation algorithm, taking scoring results as model input, taking the damage working condition combinations as labels, constructing a sample data set, training a prediction model based on machine learning by using the sample data set to obtain a bridge damage prediction model, acquiring a power response sequence when a train passes through a rail-bridge under actual working conditions, evaluating and scoring the power response sequence, and inputting the scoring results of the actual working conditions into the bridge damage prediction model to obtain the actual damage working condition combinations of the bridge. The invention can realize the running safety evaluation of the high-speed railway under long-term service.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a machine learning ammonia nitrogen inversion method, a device, a terminal and a storage medium, wherein the method comprises the steps of obtaining actually measured ammonia nitrogen data of a plurality of water quality samples and remote sensing image data for time matching, extracting actually measured wave band characteristic information of each point in a remote sensing image according to geographical coordinate information of the water quality samples, carrying out wave band combination on the obtained actually measured wave band characteristic information of each point, sequencing and filtering characteristic factors by using Pearson correlation coefficients, determining a plurality of candidate wave band characteristics, carrying out dimension reduction operation on the plurality of candidate wave band characteristics by using a principal component analysis method, and constructing a machine learning ammonia nitrogen remote sensing inversion model with optimized wave band characteristics by using the dimension reduced wave band characteristics as independent variables and using water quality parameter ammonia nitrogen as dependent variables.
