anchor_claim: Embodiments of the present application provide a model training method and apparatus, and a computing device cluster. The method is applicable to a training cluster, the training cluster comprising a first model training group and a second model training group among model training groups, and the first model training group and the second model training group being used to train a neural network model in parallel by parallel data means. The method comprises: generating check point data of a first node and a second node after one training run is finished; a first training node storing the check point data in a memory of the first training node, and a second training node storing the check point data in a memory of the second training node; if the first training node fails in a process of training the model, the first training node acquiring the checkpoint data from the memory of the second training node. The model training method provided by an embodiment of the present application saves communication resources, and lowers the performance and bandwidth requirements for remote storage devices, thereby significantly reducing overall system costs.
cited_claim: The invention discloses an intelligent diagnosis method for solenoid valve faults, which comprises the following steps of rapidly detecting circuit signals and judging whether the solenoid valve is in a normal working state, an open circuit fault or a short circuit fault. According to the invention, through the arrangement of the hardware fault detection step, a circuit signal can be rapidly detected, which working state the electromagnetic valve is in is a normal, open-circuit or short-circuit fault, through the arrangement of the signal processing fault detection step, the running state of the electromagnetic valve can be further known, the accuracy of fault detection is improved, through the arrangement of the model fault detection step, the running trend of the electromagnetic valve can be predicted, potential faults can be timely found, and through the arrangement of an intelligent algorithm and a machine learning step, a large amount of data can be processed, the fault mode can be rapidly identified, the diagnosis efficiency is improved, and thus the longer production period is solved.

anchor_claim: The application provides a data characteristic extraction method and a system based on artificial intelligence, wherein the method comprises the steps of acquiring heterogeneous data of a plurality of clients; the method comprises the steps of extracting features according to heterogeneous data to generate a standardized feature set, carrying out model aggregation according to the standardized feature set to determine important features, determining target data in the heterogeneous data according to the important features, carrying out data preprocessing according to the target data to generate standardized data, determining sensitive information in the standardized data according to the standardized data and a preset deep learning model, and determining target features according to the sensitive information and the standardized data. Reasonable data feature extraction can be carried out according to the importance degree of the data while protecting the privacy data, so that the processing time of the data feature extraction is greatly reduced, and the complexity of data processing and the calculation cost are reduced.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of natural language processing and discloses a target positioning named entity recognition and classification system based on multi-layer feature fusion. The high-level feature extraction module extracts multi-level semantic features from the text through local convolution operation, and fuses the features to obtain text information with different granularities. And then, the fusion module fuses the context features and the high-level features together to generate a comprehensive feature set, and powerful support is provided for the identification module. The recognition module locates the named entity based on the features and calculates the starting position and length of the named entity. And finally, the classification module classifies the named entities by using the positioning information, and feeds back final results such as the position information, the length, the category and the like to the user through the output module. And the position, the length and the category of each named entity in the target can be accurately determined.

anchor_claim: The application discloses a document question-answering method, a system and a storage medium, wherein the method comprises the steps of partitioning a document to obtain a plurality of language blocks, and constructing tree indexes among the language blocks; the method comprises the steps of carrying out relevance judgment on language blocks and questions, obtaining relevance sorting positions of the language blocks, defining a preset number of language blocks positioned at a relevance sorting head as first language blocks, positioning the first language blocks according to the questions, determining the belonging hierarchy of the first language blocks according to tree indexes, determining optional recall content extension types of the questions according to the belonging hierarchy of the first language blocks, determining a search range of second language blocks according to the optional recall content extension types, matching the questions with the language blocks in the search range to obtain second language blocks, summarizing the first language blocks and the second language blocks to obtain a recall enhancement knowledge base related to the questions, and replying the questions according to the recall enhancement knowledge base. The method and the device can improve the comprehensiveness and accuracy of the answer reply based on the document content.
cited_claim: The application discloses an operating system-oriented ethnic language large model construction method and device based on a general large model, which are suitable for being deployed to an operating system and belong to the technical field of information. Firstly, converting words in an input low-resource national language into word embedding representation by using a pre-training language model to obtain word embedding vectors, sending the word embedding vectors into a projection layer to form alignable embedding representation vectors, obtaining word embedding vectors suitable for the embedding representation vectors in a word list of a training corpus, mapping the word embedding vectors to a large model semantic space to finish mapping from the low-resource national language to a high-resource national language, and secondly, inputting the training corpus corresponding to the high-resource national language and the low-resource national language which finish mapping into a general large model, and outputting the training corpus as corresponding word embedding representation. In order to improve the output capability of the model national language, the corresponding word embedding representation is input into a multi-language generation layer to obtain a final embedding representation, and the final embedding representation is iteratively updated through a pre-training language model to realize the mapping from the high-resource national language to the low-resource national language. In addition, instruction fine adjustment is performed on the whole model, so that the instruction of a user is realized, and the capability and controllability of the large model are enhanced.

cited_claim: The invention belongs to the technical field of natural language processing, and discloses a Chinese text readability evaluation method based on information gain and hierarchical classification, wherein a readability evaluation model of the method comprises a language characteristic representation module, an information gain guided depth representation module and a hierarchical classification module; the language feature representation module is used for extracting language features and mapping the features to a depth semantic space in a natural language description mode to obtain corresponding language feature representation, the information gain guided depth representation module fuses representations of a plurality of coding layers to fully mine depth representation of texts according to information differences of different coding layers by utilizing an information gain principle, and the hierarchical classification module models a hierarchical tree structure and learns correlations among different readability difficulty categories by capturing hierarchical structure information. The invention fuses the representations of a plurality of coding layers to fully mine the depth representation of the text and can learn the interrelationship between different readability difficulty categories.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of operation state scheduling, and discloses an emergency command and on-site scheduling system and method based on a heat supply network model. The heat supply pipeline prediction method comprises the steps of firstly calculating the flow of a heat supply pipeline, the pressure of the heat supply pipeline and the temperature of the heat supply pipeline, establishing a heat supply network model, commanding and controlling the pressure, the temperature and the flow of the heat supply pipeline in real time according to abnormal data, then using a BP neural network to predict the pressure, the temperature and the flow of the heat supply pipeline to obtain heat supply pipeline prediction data, identifying and verifying the leakage point of the heat supply pipeline according to the heat supply pipeline prediction data of the heat supply network model, simultaneously using a badger optimization algorithm to optimize an electric power emergency material conveying path, ensuring the material dispatching efficiency, and finally establishing a heat distribution command platform and a heat distribution database, so that the temperature, the pressure, the flow and the leakage point data of the heat supply pipeline can be conveniently regulated and stored, and the later inquiry is convenient.
cited_claim: The invention relates to a subway station large passenger flow emergency command linkage method, equipment and a storage medium, which comprise the steps of receiving station passenger flow information in real time, preprocessing and analyzing the station passenger flow information, extracting real-time passenger flow data, predicting future passenger flow conditions and the number of passengers getting off a train to be arrived through a machine learning algorithm by utilizing historical passenger flow data and real-time passenger flow data, judging abnormal passenger flow conditions if the future passenger flow exceeds a station bearing capacity threshold value, generating large passenger flow alarm if the abnormal passenger flow is judged to be generated, automatically generating alarm information according to the large passenger flow alarm, pushing the alarm information to an operation control center for confirmation, and starting an emergency plan for station management and control after the alarm information is confirmed. Compared with the prior art, the invention realizes real-time monitoring, early warning, evaluation and emergency command of large passenger flow of the subway station, and improves the emergency response speed and the disposal efficiency.

anchor_claim: The invention provides a chip production logistics optimization method and system based on a multi-objective genetic algorithm, which relate to the technical field of chip production scheduling and comprise the steps of collecting real-time operation data of a production line, extracting task execution characteristics and equipment layout characteristics by using a double-channel deep neural network, and generating a production state vector containing a multidimensional scheduling index predicted value by carrying out characteristic fusion by using a cyclic neural network; the method comprises the steps of constructing a multidimensional optimization target set based on production state vectors, generating an initial population by adopting a double-layer gene coding structure, executing non-dominant sorting and crowding distance calculation based on fitness values, selecting high-quality individuals to form a parent population, executing self-adaptive crossover, tabu search optimization and self-adaptive mutation operation on the parent population, iteratively selecting a new generation population until convergence, and outputting an optimal scheduling scheme.
cited_claim: The invention provides an enterprise carbon emission intelligent analysis method based on a large language model, which relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence and natural language processing and comprises the steps of analyzing target query data to obtain a first classification result; and carrying out vector retrieval, carbon emission analysis and report assessment operation on the obtained enterprise carbon emission report based on the large language model. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a first classification result by analyzing and processing the obtained target query data, carrying out data retrieval and intelligent answer based on the first query data by utilizing an intelligent answer mechanism which is matched with the first classification result and is established based on a large language model, and carrying out vector retrieval, carbon emission analysis and report evaluation operation on the obtained enterprise carbon emission report based on the large language model, so that more efficient data analysis and professional question answering can be realized, and the defects of a traditional question answering system are overcome.

anchor_claim: The application discloses a monitoring system and a monitoring method for state evaluation of a coal-fired power plant coal pulverizing system, wherein the system comprises a coal-fired power plant coal pulverizing system data acquisition layer for acquiring running state parameter data of coal pulverizing equipment; the coal-fired power plant pulverizing system characteristic extraction layer is used for extracting characteristics of operation state parameter data of the pulverizing equipment, the transform neural network prediction layer is used for carrying out state prediction on parameters of the coal-fired power plant pulverizing system based on the extracted operation state parameter data characteristics through a transform neural network-based operation state prediction model, so that dynamic evaluation on the operation state of the coal-fired power plant pulverizing system is realized, and the coal-fired power plant pulverizing system monitoring state evaluation layer is used for summarizing the prediction results of the transform neural network prediction layer. The system can locate faults in time.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a bus commuter passenger travel demand analysis method based on space-time characteristics, which comprises the steps of obtaining historical travel data of bus passengers and constructing a personal travel behavior data set, screening a gate commuter passenger group based on travel frequency, analyzing travel space-time rules according to the travel time of the passengers, entropy values of travel stations and travel chain similarity, extracting travel chain dimension characteristics, time dimension characteristics and space dimension characteristics related to a prediction target according to the travel space-time rules, constructing a characteristic matrix based on the extracted characteristics, training the characteristics in the characteristic matrix by using a distributed gradient enhancement model, and predicting and outputting travel demands of the commuter passengers based on the trained travel demand prediction model. The invention realizes the efficient and accurate prediction of the travel demands of the commuter passengers by integrating the multidimensional travel characteristics of the commuter passengers and the machine learning algorithm.

anchor_claim: The invention provides a marketing strategy optimization method based on large language model analysis and evaluation driving, which comprises the steps of obtaining historical data comprising user behavior data, label data and statistical data, analyzing and constructing a basic marketing strategy, collecting user content data in real time through Kafka, carrying out deep analysis on the user content by utilizing a large language model, matching personalized marketing schemes from a knowledge base based on the deep analysis result and basic rule matching of the large language model, collecting feedback of a user on the marketing activity through a feedback circulation mechanism, storing the feedback result into the knowledge base and being used for optimizing the marketing strategy and the large language model, logging, textualizing and vectorizing decision processes into a vector library, and optimizing a decision flow and a marketing scheme by combining the continuously optimized large language model. The invention improves the accuracy and effect of the marketing strategy by using the large language model.
cited_claim: The invention provides a machine learning-based water quality prediction and intelligent regulation system, which comprises a real-time acquisition module, a water quality prediction module and an intelligent regulation module, wherein the real-time acquisition module is used for acquiring current water quality data of a culture pond in real time, the water quality prediction module is used for determining a water quality prediction result according to the current water quality data based on a pre-trained water quality prediction model, and the intelligent regulation module is used for adaptively regulating and controlling a future water quality regulation plan and a bait feeding plan of the culture pond based on the water quality prediction result. According to the invention, the water quality prediction model is trained based on a machine learning algorithm, the water quality prediction result is determined according to the current water quality data based on the water quality prediction model, and the future water quality regulation plan and the bait feeding plan of the culture pond are adaptively regulated and controlled based on the water quality prediction result, so that the precise water quality management and bait feeding management of the culture pond are automatically realized, the labor cost is reduced, the real-time precise regulation and control are realized, and the aquaculture efficiency and the aquaculture quality are prompted.

anchor_claim: The application provides an animal feeding plan generation method and system based on ingestion monitoring data, wherein the method comprises the steps of obtaining ingestion time sequence data of each animal in a feeding space aiming at a feed storage box; the method comprises the steps of obtaining health index sampling data of each animal, obtaining nutrition components corresponding to feed types of each feed storage box to construct a feed nutrition relation diagram, processing the feed nutrition relation diagram based on a graphic neural network on the feed nutrition relation diagram to obtain updated node characteristics of nodes of each feed type diagram, and defining input states of a feeding plan generation model by utilizing each obtained data to determine the animal feeding plan corresponding to a target action through reinforcement learning. Therefore, the feeding amount and the feeding time of the feed can be accurately calculated by data driving and combining with an advanced graphic neural network and reinforcement learning technology, and the intelligent management of the animal feeding process is realized.
cited_claim: The application relates to a vehicle abnormality processing method, a vehicle abnormality processing device, a new energy automobile and a readable storage medium. The method comprises the steps of receiving user questioning information containing description of abnormal performance of a vehicle, searching to obtain reference processing information based on a pre-constructed knowledge base, acquiring health state information of the vehicle from a target platform associated with the vehicle, generating corresponding prompt words based on the information, inputting the prompt words into a pre-trained generated questioning and answering model, and obtaining a judging result of the abnormal performance of the vehicle and corresponding processing scheme suggestions based on reasoning capacity of the generated questioning and answering model. By introducing the health state information of the vehicle and combining the reference processing information searched in the knowledge base, corresponding prompt words are generated, richer context information and more accurate guidance are provided for the generated question-answering model, effective reasoning of the generated question-answering model is facilitated, and the obtained judging result and the corresponding processing scheme are more efficient and accurate.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses an intelligent recognition system and method for relay protection configuration information based on natural language technology, wherein the system comprises a data acquisition module, a processing unit, a feature extraction module, a configuration information matching unit and a result output module, wherein the data acquisition module is used for receiving and analyzing text information sent by a relay protection device of an electric power system, the processing unit is used for cleaning, standardizing and formatting the received text information so as to improve the accuracy of subsequent analysis, the feature extraction module is used for extracting key features from a preprocessed text by using the natural language processing technology, the configuration information matching unit is used for comparing the extracted features with a predefined relay protection configuration information base so as to identify specific configuration information corresponding to the text information, and the result output module is used for realizing rapid and accurate analysis and processing of the text information sent by the relay protection device according to a configuration information matching result, so that the working efficiency and accuracy of operation and maintenance personnel are improved, and safe and stable operation of the electric power system is ensured.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a credit risk assessment model generation method, a credit risk assessment model generation device, credit risk assessment model generation equipment and a credit risk assessment model generation medium. The method comprises the steps of constructing evaluation indexes according to government data, urban subject data and public opinion data of all levels, wherein the evaluation indexes comprise quantitative indexes and qualitative indexes, the qualitative indexes at least comprise public opinion risk labels, the public opinion risk labels are obtained through natural language processing on the public opinion data, determining a data conversion model based on the average value and standard deviation of the quantitative indexes in sample data, performing risk factor conversion on the quantitative indexes based on the data conversion model to obtain first characteristics, screening target characteristics from the first characteristics and the qualitative indexes according to correlation analysis results of the first characteristics and correlation analysis results of the qualitative indexes, constructing a target credit risk evaluation model according to the target characteristics, and determining parameters of the target credit risk evaluation model based on the sample data. The embodiment of the invention can accurately evaluate the credit risk level of the urban throwing subject.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of photovoltaic equipment fault diagnosis and discloses a photovoltaic equipment fault diagnosis method based on big data and deep learning, which comprises the steps of obtaining operation log data, sensor data and maintenance record data of photovoltaic equipment; the method comprises the steps of carrying out feature extraction on acquired data by adopting a fully-connected neural network based on depth pseudo feedback to obtain first features, carrying out feature dimension reduction on the first features by adopting a self-coding neural network based on photovoltaic equipment condition vectors to obtain second features, constructing a classifier model by adopting a support vector machine algorithm based on error correction learning, carrying out classifier model training by utilizing the second features, and carrying out photovoltaic equipment fault diagnosis by utilizing the trained classifier model. The invention realizes accurate and rapid diagnosis of the faults of the photovoltaic equipment.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a annunciator fault monitoring method based on Weibull distribution, which comprises the steps of S1, respectively collecting historical fault data of a plurality of annunciator subsystems, determining fault distribution types and distribution parameters of the annunciator subsystems to obtain safe operation days of the annunciator subsystems, S2, optimizing a neural network model by using a PSO algorithm, respectively predicting the fault rate of the annunciator subsystems by using the neural network model, and S3, constructing a risk model of the annunciator subsystems by taking the safe operation days and the fault rate of the annunciator subsystems as accompanying variables to predict faults possibly occurring in the annunciator subsystems. The invention can solve the problem that the traditional signal machine fault monitoring method is generally based on the historical data and experience of the signal machine, and cannot realize accurate monitoring and prevention of the signal machine fault.

anchor_claim: The invention provides a building structure identification method and a model based on machine learning, which relate to the technical field of machine learning and comprise the steps of obtaining geometric outline data of a building through GIS and obtaining POI data of interest points of the building from a network map; the method comprises the steps of processing GIS data, manually labeling a building to obtain a training data set, matching POI data with the building to generate a complete shp format data set, extracting feature values of the building, including geometric features, shape features and POI features, from the training data set, classifying and training the training data set by adopting a pre-clustering active learning method to obtain a building structure prediction model, and constructing a building structure information resource database of an urban scale based on the prediction model. The invention realizes the automatic identification of the building structure through the multi-source data fusion and the machine learning technology, obviously improves the classification accuracy, reduces the identification cost, and is particularly suitable for urban environments containing a large number of old buildings.
cited_claim: The invention relates to a photovoltaic power generation amount prediction method and device based on an intelligent learning model, wherein the method comprises the steps of obtaining meteorological data and radiation power data of a target area, and taking the meteorological data and the radiation power data as characteristic values and target values respectively; the method comprises the steps of carrying out trend analysis and distribution analysis on the characteristic values and the target values, preprocessing the characteristic values based on analysis results, constructing a training data set based on the preprocessed characteristic values and the preprocessed target values, training a long-period memory neural network based on the training data set, and inputting real-time meteorological data of a target area into the trained long-period memory neural network to obtain a predicted value of photovoltaic power generation. According to the invention, the internal rules of meteorological data and photovoltaic power generation are learned through the long-term and short-term memory neural network, so that the data requirement is reduced, and the photovoltaic power generation prediction accuracy is improved.

cited_claim: The invention provides an industrial park risk source grade assessment method, device and electronic equipment, which comprise the steps of obtaining risk source data to be assessed in an industrial park and classifying the risk source data into an invariant, a continuous variable and a mutation quantity, constructing and training a neural network model taking the risk source data as input and the alarm results of various types of risk sources as output, wherein the neural network model comprises an input layer, a feature extraction unit, a third feature extraction unit and an output layer, the input layer is used for inputting the risk source data, the feature extraction unit comprises a first feature extraction unit and a second feature extraction unit, the first feature extraction unit is used for extracting the invariant feature according to the invariant, the second feature extraction unit is used for extracting the continuous feature according to the continuous variable, the third feature extraction unit is used for extracting the mutation feature according to the mutation quantity, the output layer is used for obtaining the alarm results of various types of risk sources according to the invariant feature, the continuous feature and the mutation feature, and S3 is used for obtaining the current risk source data to be assessed in the industrial park, inputting the trained neural network model and assessing the alarm results of various risk sources. The invention can effectively identify, evaluate and control potential risks, ensure the safety of production operation, and facilitate the establishment of an effective risk management strategy to realize sustainable development.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a plastic product detection system based on image recognition, which relates to the technical field of plastic product detection and comprises an image acquisition module, a data storage and feature extraction module, a feature analysis and model input module, an intelligent evaluation and classification module, a homogeneous coating acquisition module and a heterogeneous coating adjustment module, wherein the image acquisition module firstly irradiates the surface of a plastic product with a preset beam width and focal length by using a scanner to capture high-quality surface images. By introducing deep learning and image analysis technology, the scheme remarkably improves the detection precision of the coating unevenness of the plastic product. The system dynamically analyzes the surface texture and reflection heterogeneity, intelligently evaluates the consistency of the coating, adjusts the width and focal length of the light beam according to the state of the coating, and ensures high-quality images. The intelligent detection and adjustment strategy effectively improves the detection efficiency and accuracy, reduces the quality risk and the production cost, and breaks through the limitation of the traditional method.
cited_claim: The invention provides a private live broadcast bandwidth resource allocation and routing method and system based on reinforcement learning, which relate to the technical field of computer networks and comprise the steps of collecting real-time data such as the number of users in a live broadcast room, geographic distribution, terminal types, content types, network delay, packet loss rate, bandwidth utilization rate and the like, inputting a pre-trained reinforcement learning model, generating bandwidth allocation and routing strategies by utilizing deep neural network extraction characteristics and combining bandwidth resource constraint through the model based on a state space and adopting a strategy gradient algorithm, and realizing differentiated bandwidth allocation and path optimization by regulating bandwidth allocation parameters and routing table configuration in real time by a software defined network controller according to the strategies, and establishing nearby access edge nodes based on the geographic distribution of the users and dynamically regulating paths in congestion.

anchor_claim: The present disclosure relates to picture encoding and decoding of image regions on tile-basis. In particular, multiple components of an input tensor including a first and second component in spatial dimensions is processed within multiple pipelines. The processing of the first component includes dividing the first component in the spatial dimensions into a first plurality of tiles. Likewise, the processing of the second component includes dividing the second component in the spatial dimensions into a second plurality of tiles. The respective first and second plurality of tiles are then processed each separately. Among the first and second plurality of tiles there are at least two respective collocated tiles differing in size. In case of compression, the processing of the first and/or second component includes picture encoding, rate distortion optimization quantization, and picture filtering. In case of decompression, the processing includes picture decoding and picture filtering.
cited_claim: In an embodiment, an electronic device may comprise at least one processor, and a memory for storing one or more instructions. The memory may further store a first sub-neural network model and a second sub-neural network model. The one or more instructions may be executed by the at least one processor so as to cause the electronic device to: acquire N image frames; acquire feature information for each of the image frames by inputting the image frames one by one to the first sub-neural network model; and acquire an enhanced image by inputting, to the second sub-neural network model, integrated feature information obtained by merging the feature information for each of the image frames. The first sub-neural network model may be configured to receive one image frame and output feature information. The second sub-neural network model may be configured to output an enhanced image on the basis of input feature information.

anchor_claim: Neural-network-based picture encoding and decoding of image regions may be performed on a tile-basis. An input tensor representing picture data is processed by the neural network, which includes at least a first and second subnetwork. The first subnetwork is applied to a first tensor where the first tensor is divided in a spatial dimensions into a first plurality of tiles. The first tiles are then further processed by the first subnetwork. After application of the first subnetwork, the second subnetwork is applied to a second tensor where the second tensor is divided in the spatial dimensions into a second plurality of tiles. The second tiles are then further processed by the second subnetwork. Among the first and second plurality of tiles there are at least two respective collocated tiles differing in size.

anchor_claim: The application discloses continuous thermoprinting automation equipment and a method thereof, which are characterized in that a time queue of compression roller rolling pressure data of a transmission compression roller mechanism and a time queue of temperature data of a silica gel heating sheet are obtained, the compression roller rolling pressure data are subjected to local time sequence coding by adopting a data analysis and coding mode based on deep learning, and then the coded local time sequence characteristics of the compression roller rolling pressure are subjected to characteristic prompt dynamic propagation and ideal temperature time sequence prediction, and simultaneously the temperature data are subjected to time sequence coding, so that a transmission speed recommended value of the transmission compression roller mechanism is intelligently obtained based on time sequence offset characterization between the ideal silica gel heating sheet temperature time sequence characteristics and the actual silica gel heating sheet temperature time sequence characteristics. Therefore, the time sequence change of various parameters in the thermoprinting process can be dynamically monitored, so that the transmission speed of the transmission compression roller mechanism can be accurately and timely adjusted, the consistency and stability of the thermoprinting effect are ensured, and the thermoprinting control with higher precision and more intellectualization is realized.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a dynamic loading self-adaptive control method and system for a solid engine shell, which comprise the steps of establishing an element level model and a mathematical analysis model of the dynamic loading device aiming at a multi-cylinder combined hydraulic loading device and a shell test piece combination, introducing uncertain factors including friction, leakage, pressure fluctuation and the like into the element level model to simulate a real loading device, taking the real loading device as a test platform, establishing a combined simulation interface of signal interaction between the test platform and a controller, generating a reference input signal by using a nonlinear sliding mode surface and an exponential approach rate of an introduced error integral power function based on the mathematical analysis model to limit error convergence time, establishing a reference model, and generating a compensation signal by using a neural network sliding mode controller to the uncertain factors existing in the test platform so as to eliminate force output errors between the reference model and the test platform. The invention can rapidly track the preset output force track, effectively reduce the test cost and improve the overall control performance.
cited_claim: The invention discloses an electric room environment regulation and control method and device based on an edge gateway. The intelligent sensing network is built by deploying at least one kind of environment sensor in the electric room, the edge intelligent fusion platform is built by customizing edge gateway hardware design and building a software platform, an environment parameter intelligent regulation strategy and a self-adaptive regulation strategy are set, a cloud edge cooperative architecture and an augmented reality remote operation and maintenance system are built, and the electric room environment regulation is carried out by combining the intelligent sensing network and the edge intelligent fusion platform. According to the technical scheme, the intelligent, accurate and prospective electric room environment regulation is realized through the highly refined design. By integrating the latest edge calculation, big data analysis, machine learning and the Internet of things technology, an electric room environment management mode which can be perceived in real time, analyzed intelligently, regulated and controlled independently and optimized continuously is constructed.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of numerical control machining, in particular to a cutter acceleration control method and system based on machining resistance analysis. The method comprises the steps of carrying out detailed analysis on collected data through a machine learning algorithm, identifying a specific mode and an abnormal state in a machining process, automatically adjusting the feeding rate of a cutter according to an analysis result to adapt to the change of material characteristics, adjusting the cutting speed in real time according to the abrasion degree of the cutter and the load of a main shaft, maximizing the service life and the machining quality of the cutter, setting an emergency response mechanism, immediately adjusting operation or stopping the machine when overload or potential cutter breakage risk is detected to protect the cutter and a workpiece from damage, comparing final machining effect data collected by a system with a preset target after machining is completed, carrying out iterative optimization on a control strategy through a feedback loop, and carrying out rapid working process segmentation of the cutter to realize risk management and efficiency improvement on the cutting process of the cutter.
cited_claim: The invention provides a dynamic trust level calculation method of a data-driven programmable logic controller, which solves the problem that the programmable logic controller is difficult to realize accurate trust level assessment in a complex operating environment and realizes the real-time and accurate trust level dynamic assessment of the programmable logic controller. The method mainly comprises the steps of firstly, constructing a dynamic trusted computing model by using a radial basis function neural network as a carrier of a data driving model, realizing dynamic computing of the trusted level of a programmable logic controller by on-line adjusting the structure and parameters of the model according to variable data such as system access time, access failure time, task execution time and the like, secondly, designing a dynamic threshold adjusting mechanism, adaptively determining a trust level dividing threshold according to historical data and real-time data, ensuring the accuracy of trust level evaluation, and finally, combining the model and the threshold adjusting mechanism to realize accurate dividing and evaluation of the dynamic trusted level of the programmable logic controller.

cited_claim: The invention provides a disturbance estimation compensation method for a Mars power descent phase based on a depth operator neural network, which comprises the steps of obtaining historical track data of a target detector in the Mars power descent phase, and analyzing the historical track data through a disturbance prediction model to obtain a disturbance prediction result of the target detector at the current moment; according to the disturbance prediction result and the position information at the current moment, determining disturbance compensation of the target detector through a dynamic equation, performing landing control on the target detector according to the disturbance compensation, and performing disturbance prediction training on a disturbance prediction model through a depth operator neural network according to historical control input. The method has the advantages of reducing the system resource consumption during guidance and improving the real-time compensation precision of guidance.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a dynamic loading self-adaptive control method and system for a solid engine shell, which comprise the steps of establishing an element level model and a mathematical analysis model of the dynamic loading device aiming at a multi-cylinder combined hydraulic loading device and a shell test piece combination, introducing uncertain factors including friction, leakage, pressure fluctuation and the like into the element level model to simulate a real loading device, taking the real loading device as a test platform, establishing a combined simulation interface of signal interaction between the test platform and a controller, generating a reference input signal by using a nonlinear sliding mode surface and an exponential approach rate of an introduced error integral power function based on the mathematical analysis model to limit error convergence time, establishing a reference model, and generating a compensation signal by using a neural network sliding mode controller to the uncertain factors existing in the test platform so as to eliminate force output errors between the reference model and the test platform. anchor_claim: The invention provides an intelligent energy-saving control method and system for a large building based on a large model. The intelligent energy-saving control method for the large building based on the large model comprises the steps of controlling a sensor group to collect environment information data and energy consumption parameters of the large building in real time, obtaining a predicted value of building energy consumption load according to the environment information data and the energy consumption parameters of the large building, obtaining operation parameters of current energy consumption equipment according to the predicted value of the building energy consumption load and expected target parameters input by a user, adjusting actual parameters of the energy consumption equipment according to the operation parameters of the current energy consumption equipment to obtain adjusted real-time operation parameters of the energy consumption equipment, and converting control requirements contained in natural language input by the user into data information which accords with the input of a deep neural network module and an intelligent optimization module. The system comprises modules corresponding to the method steps.
cited_claim: An uncertainty self-adaptive continuum robot optimal control method and system belong to the field of robots. The method comprises the steps of constructing a robust problem model of the continuum robot, which takes uncertainty items and external disturbance into account, matching an auxiliary model, constructing a performance index function to obtain an auxiliary optimal control model, constructing an HJB estimation equation, constructing an estimation model of an optimal control signal based on an evaluation neural network, constructing an evaluation neural network weight updating model, inputting the HJB estimation equation of the actual continuum robot into the constructed evaluation neural network weight updating model to solve the evaluation neural network weight, and then taking the evaluation neural network weight as the input of the estimation model of the optimal control signal based on the evaluation neural network to solve to obtain the estimation of the optimal control signal, thereby realizing the optimal control of the continuum robot, which takes uncertainty self-adaption into account. The invention considers uncertainty and disturbance scene, simplifies the control strategy process, adaptively updates the weight and realizes the optimal control strategy.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a base station load prediction method and device combining a deep learning and statistics method and electronic equipment, and belongs to the field of mobile communication. The method comprises the steps of defining load as the number of users entering the coverage area of the base station, decomposing base station load history data Y (t) into two parts, namely, following a long-term trend, changing the part Y  1  (t) according to a specific rule, changing the load Y  2  (t) caused by short-term random fluctuation, accurately predicting according to the internal rule of the change of Y  1  (t) along with time, training an LSTM network to complete prediction, predicting according to the Y  2  (t) with strong burstiness and instantaneity by using a statistical method, and finally predicting loads at a plurality of moments in the future and controlling the dormancy of the base station according to the loads. The invention solves the problem of how to minimize the error of load prediction under the high mobility scene, predicts the loads of a plurality of moments in the future through the loads of the base station in the past period and the current moment, and establishes the base station dormancy control strategy.
cited_claim: The application discloses an intelligent railway operation and maintenance system, an intelligent railway operation and maintenance method, intelligent railway operation and maintenance equipment, intelligent railway operation and maintenance media and intelligent railway products, and relates to the field of railway operation and maintenance, wherein the intelligent railway operation and maintenance system comprises an air-ground-vehicle integrated transmission module for acquiring and transmitting sensor data of key parts of a train; the system comprises an unmanned aerial vehicle cluster module, a digital twin big model training module, a digital twin big model prediction module and an emergency guidance module, wherein the unmanned aerial vehicle cluster module is used for acquiring and transmitting environment image data within a set range of a railway line, the digital twin big model training module is used for constructing a digital twin big model according to sensor data and the environment image data, determining an integrated big model, predicting a train fault type and a natural disaster by using the integrated big model, and generating an emergency guidance scheme, and the integrated big model is a neural network model.

cited_claim: The invention discloses a dual-mode carrier communication system and a method based on a secure encryption ad hoc network, which provide a solution capable of automatically constructing and maintaining network connection by combining an ad hoc network technology, a carrier communication technology, a secure encryption technology and a standardized protocol. The system not only supports plug and play of equipment and simplifies network deployment and management, but also improves data transmission efficiency and capability of supporting large-scale terminal equipment by adopting an orthogonal frequency division multiplexing modulation technology and an IPv6 protocol, a built-in security chip and a domestic cryptographic algorithm are used for realizing strong and effective bidirectional identity authentication and data encryption, thereby ensuring safety and reliability of communication, and the application of deep learning routing further optimizes network performance, dynamically adjusts an optimal path according to real-time network conditions, and enhances flexibility and robustness of the system. In general, the system remarkably improves the stability and safety of broadband power line carrier communication, and provides solid technical support for smart grid application scenes.

The method may also include determining, based on the evaluated performance of the machine learning model, validity of the machine learning model for the at least one network device, and transmitting, to a user device, information on the validity of the machine learning model.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a security management system based on low-orbit satellite centimeter-level positioning equipment, which relates to the technical field of satellite positioning equipment management and comprises a low-orbit satellite positioning module, a data transmission module, a security monitoring module, an intelligent analysis module, a machine learning algorithm analysis data report, a monitoring center, a large screen display multi-information and hierarchical processing alarm, a user interaction module, an interactive friendly and biological identification security protection for rights management, wherein the low-orbit satellite positioning module uses phased array antennas and the like for centimeter-level positioning and has strong interference resistance, the data transmission module is in a dual mode of 5G and satellite links, the transmission is stable and the packet loss rate is low, the security monitoring module monitors various high-precision sensors in real time and transmits the alarm rapidly. The invention has the advantages of high positioning precision, stable data transmission, sensitive safety monitoring, accurate intelligent analysis, full functions of the monitoring center, convenient user interaction and safe authority, effectively improves the safety management efficiency of multiple scenes and has wide application prospect.

###

[침해 리스크]

- 위험 요소: **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성:**, 원본 특허의 청구항은 머신러닝 모델의 성능 평가와 유효성 검증에 대한 것이며, 인용 특허는 위성 기반 보안 시스템에 대한 것입니다. 두 기술의 적용 분야가 다르기 때문에 직접적인 침해 가능성은 낮습니다., **위험 요소 식별:**

[회피 전략]

anchor_claim: The application provides a digital key positioning method, a digital key positioning system and a storage medium. The multi-task neural network can calculate distance, area probability and direction probability simultaneously, input Bluetooth RSSI values of a plurality of modules in a first device and a second device into the multi-task neural network to obtain the distance, the area probability and the direction probability, judge the area where the second device is located according to the area probability, judge the direction according to the direction probability when the second device is located in an unlocking area to obtain the direction where the second device is located, and finally output the area and the direction of the second device. The application can utilize a neural network model to predict the distance, the area and the direction simultaneously, improve the positioning efficiency and the accuracy, judge the area and the direction of the user relative to the automobile, and rapidly and accurately output the area and the direction of the user.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of mobile data communication service and provides a power dual-mode carrier network communication quality improving system and method based on an optimization algorithm, wherein a network state monitoring module monitors the conditions in a power dual-mode carrier network in real time and transmits monitoring data to a channel quality evaluating and predicting module; the channel quality evaluation and prediction module evaluates the current channel quality and predicts the future channel quality change by adopting a machine learning model based on the data provided by the network state monitoring module, the resource allocation optimization module dynamically allocates the carrier resources of the reverse link by adopting an optimization algorithm based on the channel quality prediction result and the real-time network load information, and the cross-modal carrier fusion module is according to the allocation scheme provided by the resource allocation optimization module. The invention can obviously improve the resource utilization efficiency, the communication stability and the overall performance of the power dual-mode carrier network, and solves the main problems in the prior art.

  - 원본 특허는 위치 추적과 관련된 다중 작업 신경망을 사용하고, 인용 특허는 통신 품질 예측을 위한 머신러닝 모델을 사용합니다.
  - 두 특허 모두 실시간 데이터 모니터링 및 예측 기능을 갖추고 있습니다.

###

[침해 리스크]
- 리스크 수준: low
- 위험 요소: **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성**: 낮음, 원본 특허는 위치 추적과 관련된 기술에 중점을 두고 있으며, 인용 특허는 통신 품질 개선에 초점을 맞추고 있습니다. 두 기술의 응용 분야가 다르기 때문에 직접적인 침해 가능성은 낮습니다., **위험 요소 식별**:
- **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성**: 낮음
  - 원본 특허는 위치 추적과 관련된 기술에 중점을 두고 있으며, 인용 특허는 통신 품질 개선에 초점을 맞추고 있습니다. 두 기술의 응용 분야가 다르기 때문에 직접적인 침해 가능성은 낮습니다.
- **위험 요소 식별**:
  - 원본 특허의 다중 작업 신경망이 인용 특허의 머신러닝 모델과 유사한 방식으로 작동할 수 있지만, 그 응용 분야가 다르므로 침해 리스크는 제한적입니다.
  - 그러나, 두 특허 모두 머신러닝을 사용하므로, 특정 알고리즘이나 모델의 유사성이 발견될 경우 리스크가 증가할 수 있습니다.

###

[회피 전략]
- 설계 변경: **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:, 원본 특허의 다중 작업 신경망 대신 단일 작업 신경망을 사용하여 특정 기능을 분리할 수 있습니다. 예를 들어, 거리 계산과 방향 예측을 별도의 모델로 처리하여 기술적 유사성을 줄일 수 있습니다., 데이터 입력 방식이나 알고리즘을 변경하여 인용 특허와의 유사성을 최소화할 수 있습니다.
- 대안적 접근: **대안적 기술 접근법**:
- **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:
  - 원본 특허의 다중 작업 신경망 대신 단일 작업 신경망을 사용하여 특정 기능을 분리할 수 있습니다. 예를 들어, 거리 계산과 방향 예측을 별도의 모델로 처리하여 기술적 유사성을 줄일 수 있습니다.
  - 데이터 입력 방식이나 알고리즘을 변경하여 인용 특허와의 유사성을 최소화할 수 있습니다.
  
- **대안적 기술 접근법**:
  - 위치 추적을 위해 다른 센서 기술(예: GPS, Wi-Fi 위치 추적 등)을 활용하여 머신러닝 모델의 필요성을 줄일 수 있습니다.
  - 통신 품질 개선을 위해 비선형 최적화 기법이나 다른 예측 모델(예: 시계열 분석)을 도입하여 인용 특허와의 유사성을 피할 수 있습니다.

이와 같은 분석을 통해 두 특허 간의 기술적 유사성을 평가하고, 침해 리스크를 최소화하며, 회피 전략을 제시할 수 있습니다.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of agricultural intelligent monitoring, in particular to a phenotype acquisition system for cooperation of an unmanned aerial vehicle and a ground robot. The phenotype acquisition system comprises an unmanned aerial vehicle, a crawler-type ground robot and a portable edge computing device. The unmanned aerial vehicle carries on high definition acquisition camera and carries out aerial data acquisition, and crawler-type ground robot is equipped with anti-shake fisheye camera and carries out ground data acquisition, and portable edge computing equipment is as the center, communicates with unmanned aerial vehicle and ground robot real time through wireless communication module, coordinates both synchronous operations to receive, handle, analysis data. The system adopts a high-performance embedded processor as a main control unit, and utilizes an image processing algorithm and a machine learning algorithm to construct a farmland monitoring model. The invention is applied to the field of agricultural monitoring, can improve the efficiency and accuracy of data acquisition, and provides richer and comprehensive information support for agricultural monitoring.
cited_claim: There is provided a method, computer program, and apparatus for performing: determining, based on at least one condition of a reporting apparatus, a first measurement reporting configuration wherein the first measurement reporting configuration comprises at least one of: a list of at least one allowable window size for reporting valid taps, a maximum number of windows for reporting valid taps, or a maximum frequency of reporting measurement information comprising valid taps; signalling, to the reporting apparatus, the first measurement reporting configuration and a request for the reporting apparatus to select a second measurement reporting configuration to be used by the reporting apparatus based on the first measurement reporting configuration; receiving, from the reporting apparatus, a measurement report according to the second measurement reporting configuration; and using at least one value comprised in the measurement report as an input to an artificial intelligence and/or machine learning model.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of the Internet of things, in particular to a personnel dynamic positioning and monitoring method based on an Internet of things laboratory, which comprises the following steps of adopting a high-precision positioning technology, combining a laboratory layout diagram, and carrying out high-precision real-time tracking and positioning on laboratory personnel; the method comprises the steps of processing video data monitored in a laboratory by using a deep learning algorithm, identifying actions of laboratory personnel, analyzing a behavior mode based on a time sequence, monitoring environmental parameters in the laboratory in real time, uniformly collecting receipts through an Internet of things gateway, performing preliminary processing through edge calculation, and uploading to a cloud server. By integrating a high-precision positioning technology and a deep learning algorithm, the scheme realizes real-time tracking positioning and behavior recognition of laboratory personnel. This not only improves the accuracy and efficiency of laboratory personnel management, but also helps to discover and address potential safety hazards in time. The high-precision positioning technology ensures the accuracy and real-time performance of the personnel position.
cited_claim: The application provides a method, a device, equipment and a storage medium for determining an abnormal Internet of things number card. The method comprises the steps of firstly carrying out feature extraction on a pre-acquired usage behavior acquisition graph of at least one Internet of things number card based on a graph convolution neural network of a relation to obtain graph feature information, wherein the usage behavior acquisition graph is a graph structure of usage behavior records of the at least one Internet of things number card, then inputting the graph feature information of each Internet of things number card into a pre-trained transducer sequence model to extract hidden layer features corresponding to each Internet of things number card, wherein the hidden layer features are hidden behavior patterns and rules in the corresponding graph feature information, and finally determining abnormal Internet of things number cards according to hidden layer features corresponding to each Internet of things number card. The method of the application realizes the determination of the abnormal Internet of things number card and improves the accuracy of determining the abnormal Internet of things number card.

anchor_claim: An electronic system for controlling vibrations and/or inertial forces occurring at a plurality of areas of interest within an operating vehicle. The electronic device comprises circuitry configured to receive input data comprising sensor data from one or more environment sensors and/or one or more internal sensors; convert, by means of a machine learning system, the input data into actuator settings; and transmit the actuator settings to one or more actuators to control vibrations and/or inertial forces occurring at each of the plurality of areas of interest within the vehicle.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a low-orbit satellite communication link switching method based on deep learning, relates to the technical field of satellite communication link switching, and aims to solve the problem of poor switching effect when a low-orbit satellite communication link is switched. The invention can automatically adapt to different link environments by utilizing the strong calculation and learning capabilities of the neural network model to carry out switching strategy reasoning, improves the accuracy and flexibility of switching decisions, and the switching strategy comprises link selection, switching time and switching conditions, can provide a plurality of possible switching schemes by expressing probability values, classification labels or numerical values, and can carry out the link switching again according to the switching strategy if the running process or performance of the link switching does not reach the expected standard, so that the continuous optimization and adjustment process can ensure that the link switching is always in the optimal state, and improves the overall performance and stability of the communication system.

###

###

[회피 전략]

  - 원본 특허의 경우, 진동 제어 시스템을 차량에서 다른 분야(예: 항공기, 선박 등)로 확장하거나, 다른 센서 데이터(예: 온도, 압력 등)를 활용하여 시스템을 재설계할 수 있습니다.
  - 인용 특허의 경우, 링크 스위칭 기술을 다른 통신 방식(예: 광통신)으로 전환하거나, 딥러닝 모델의 구조를 변경하여 특정한 링크 스위칭 문제를 해결하는 방법을 모색할 수 있습니다.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of mobile data communication service and provides a power dual-mode carrier network communication quality improving system and method based on an optimization algorithm, wherein a network state monitoring module monitors the conditions in a power dual-mode carrier network in real time and transmits monitoring data to a channel quality evaluating and predicting module; the channel quality evaluation and prediction module evaluates the current channel quality and predicts the future channel quality change by adopting a machine learning model based on the data provided by the network state monitoring module, the resource allocation optimization module dynamically allocates the carrier resources of the reverse link by adopting an optimization algorithm based on the channel quality prediction result and the real-time network load information, and the cross-modal carrier fusion module is according to the allocation scheme provided by the resource allocation optimization module. The invention can obviously improve the resource utilization efficiency, the communication stability and the overall performance of the power dual-mode carrier network, and solves the main problems in the prior art.
cited_claim: The embodiment of the invention provides a 5G signal processing method, a device, electronic equipment and a readable medium. The method comprises the steps of receiving a 5G signal state message under the condition that equipment is connected to a 5G network, inputting the 5G signal state message into a preset neural network model, determining beam splitting parameters output by the neural network model, dividing the 5G signal into sub-signal streams of at least one frequency band based on the beam splitting parameters, distributing weights to the at least one frequency band based on the beam splitting parameters, and integrating the sub-signal streams of the at least one frequency band into complete signal streams based on the weights of the frequency bands to be sent to downstream equipment. Therefore, the 5G signal can be more accurately subjected to beam splitting processing, and the efficiency of 5G signal transmission is improved.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a real-time dynamic monitoring and early warning system for a deep foundation pit, which comprises a multi-element sensor network, an intelligent data acquisition and processing unit, a cloud computing and big data analysis platform, a visual early warning system and a remote monitoring and emergency response center. Meanwhile, the invention analyzes the monitoring data in real time through a machine learning algorithm to realize early warning, and compared with the traditional method, the invention greatly advances the time window for risk discovery. According to the method, the deep foundation pit stability evaluation model based on the multidimensional parameters is constructed, and the accuracy and pertinence of early warning are improved. In addition, the invention establishes a rapid channel from early warning to emergency response, ensures that measures can be rapidly taken in the case of emergency, and effectively prevents accidents.
cited_claim: A method for training a machine learning model to generate a quality of experience (QOE) score that may include providing a machine learning module with a data set comprising QOE data, wherein the QOE data comprises a set of pairings or a communication timing statistic and an associated human user feedback QOE score for the communication timing statistic. The machine learning module may be trained on the QOE data to generate QOE scores for each of the pairings of communication timing statistics and human user feedback QOE scores to minimize error, where error may be the aggregated difference of generated QOE scores and the human user feedback QOE scores. Also, a method for calculating a QOE score from a communication timing statistic may include generating a QOE score considering a DNS component, a TCP component, a TLS component, a latency component, and a data rate component.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a method and a device for improving the transmission reliability of small data packet service, and relates to the technical field of data communication. The method comprises the steps of obtaining parameters of a user node, initializing algorithm parameters of a KP-DQN model, calculating the arrival rate of service data according to the parameters of the user node, analyzing the statistical characteristics of channels where the user node is located, calculating the business delay violation probability according to the parameters of the user node, the arrival rate of the service data and the statistical characteristics of the channels, storing the business delay violation probability into a knowledge base, pre-training an initial KP-DQN model according to idle resources and the knowledge base of the user node, selecting a transmission mode of the user node, the frame duration size and the number of times of packet replication according to the pre-trained KP-DQN model and the state of the user node, further deciding the reliability improvement problem to obtain a decision result, and completing packet transmission of the user node according to the decision result. By adopting the invention, the reliability of service transmission can be improved.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a multi-cell wireless network distributed resource optimization method based on a graph neural network, which comprises the steps of establishing total speed and optimization problems of all user terminal equipment according to a communication model of the multi-cell wireless network, designing a message transmission graph neural network model containing embedded edge characteristics, mapping various channel information to nodes and edges of a graph, intensively training the graph neural network model, utilizing a parameterization scheme of the graph neural network to maximize the optimization problems, and distributing the trained graph neural network on each cell to realize the multi-cell wireless network distributed resource optimization based on the graph neural network.

anchor_claim: The invention develops a prediction method and model of mRNA translation protein product based on deep learning. Specifically, the invention designs a method for accurately predicting a transcriptome level translation product based on a deep learning method, which is used for predicting a translation site and the translation product of a transcript sequence to form a TRANSAID model. The TRANSAID model adopts a unique sequence coding strategy and a deep learning architecture, can capture local sequence characteristics and long-distance dependence simultaneously, greatly improves prediction accuracy, can predict transcript sequences of different species, has the capability of predicting species for the first time in the field, and can also identify different influences of 5'UTR and 3' UTR regions on translation regulation.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of protein redox, and in particular discloses a protein Cysteine residue redox modification prediction method based on a MusiteDeep framework, which comprises the following steps of: the invention is based on a deep learning model of MusiteDeep framework, is used for predicting the redox reaction of Cysteine residue (C) in protein, the accuracy of the expanded model in the aspect of predicting the redox reaction of the Cysteine residue is obviously improved, the redox reaction can be learned and predicted from the original protein sequence data, the predefined characteristic engineering is not needed, the manual intervention and subjective judgment are greatly reduced, and the objectivity and efficiency of the prediction are improved.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a method, a model and application for predicting cytosine deaminase function based on a machine learning model, and belongs to the technical field of molecular biology. By constructing a high-quality dataset containing experimental data of 1,100 cytosine deaminase and combining a multidimensional feature training AlphaCD model, high-precision and high-throughput functional prediction of uncharacterized cytosine deaminase is realized. The method successfully predicts the catalytic characteristics of 21,345 CDs in the Uniprot database, and verifies the accuracy of prediction through experiments. In addition, the invention optimizes the off-target effect of the candidate CD by utilizing an alanine scanning technology, and develops a cytosine base editor with high efficiency and low off-target. The method not only improves the efficiency of protein function characterization, but also provides powerful support for the biotechnology fields such as gene editing and the like, and has wide application prospect.
cited_claim: The invention provides a gene regulation network inference method and system based on ensemble learning, wherein the method comprises the steps of acquiring a gene data set and preprocessing; constructing a gene regulation network inference model; the method comprises the steps of obtaining a gene expression data set, training a gene regulation network inference model by utilizing the preprocessed gene data set, establishing a user interaction interface, obtaining gene expression data to be inferred, inputting the trained gene regulation network inference model, obtaining an inferred gene regulation network, integrating a plurality of deep learning methods for gene regulation network inference, integrating the methods by adopting a Stacking integrated learning strategy, reducing possible deviation caused by a single model, improving accuracy and robustness of gene regulation network inference, and matching with a intuitively friendly user interaction interface, simplifying complex data processing and model training configuration processes, and greatly reducing use thresholds.

cited_claim: The application discloses a construction method of a hyperbolic discrete diffusion model for reverse folding of a three-dimensional RNA structure, which is characterized in that geometrical characteristics and other topological properties of the RNA three-dimensional structure are embedded into a hyperbolic space, a forward diffusion process is utilized to add gradual noise to a real one-dimensional sequence of the RNA three-dimensional structure, and gradual noise removal is carried out on a hyperbolic isovariogram neural network denoising model, so that the nucleotide distribution of the target RNA three-dimensional structure, namely the one-dimensional sequence, is effectively recovered on the basis of a limited training sample. The application provides a powerful artificial intelligence method for the design of the generation formula of the functional RNA structure, which is helpful for the design of RNA drugs and RNA biomolecules and the application thereof in biological medicine.

anchor_claim: A non-transitory processor-readable medium stores code to be executed by a processor of a first computer device. The code causes the processor to receive, from a second computer device remote from the first computer device, a trained machine learning model. The code causes the processor to receive biomarker data and HSD of a diabetic human subject. The biomarker data indicates a level of at least one of the following biomarkers: sTNFR-1, sTNFR-2, KIM-1, and/or ratios to one another of any of the preceding. The HSD includes a metabolic factor, a health-related factor, or a demographic-related factor. The code causes the processor to execute the trained machine learning model to generate an indication of whether the diabetic human subject will experience a progressive decline in kidney function over a period of time.

anchor_claim: The invention provides a method for predicting cell line specific functional non-coding variation, belonging to the technical field of bioinformatics. The method comprises the steps of constructing a MPRA dataset based on REVA databases, constructing a MPRA dataset with seven cell lines, wherein each cell line in the MPRA dataset has positive and negative samples with the proportion not lower than 1:N1, each sample has an experimentally verified expression regulation variation site, annotating and screening common features required by a generation model based on different specific cell lines to obtain a common feature dataset, constructing a multi-task residual convolution neural network model, training the multi-task residual convolution neural network model by using the common feature dataset, and predicting variation functionality and variation belonging cell lines of unknown variation items by using the multi-task residual convolution neural network model. The method is used for solving the problem that specificity of the multicellular line cannot be considered in prediction of functional non-coding variation.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of breeding phenotype prediction, and discloses a breeding phenotype prediction method and a system for gene sequence data, wherein the method comprises the steps of obtaining genotype data and phenotype data to construct a data set; dividing a data set into a training set and a test set, constructing a convolution operator space, a pooling operator space and a neural network node, distributing the convolution operator and the pooling operator to the neural network node to generate a neural network structure, converting the neural network structure into a tree-shaped data structure and optimizing by utilizing a depth-first search algorithm to generate an executable neural network model, training the executable neural network model by utilizing the training set and optimizing the trained neural network model by utilizing a model factor algorithm to obtain an optimal breeding phenotype prediction model, and inputting the data of the test set into the optimal breeding phenotype prediction model to process to obtain a breeding phenotype prediction result. The invention obviously improves the prediction precision in the prediction of the breeding phenotype of the complex character.
cited_claim: The application discloses a beef variety molecular identity card construction application method, equipment and a medium, and relates to the field of data processing, wherein the method comprises the steps of training a machine learning model by adopting a training set, testing the trained machine learning model by adopting a testing set, and taking the trained machine learning model as a verification model when the prediction precision of the trained machine learning model reaches a set value; and (3) screening in a training set by means of a feature filtering strategy to obtain a specific SNP locus set, taking loci in the specific SNP locus set verified by a verification model as variety feature information loci, searching the minimum SNPs set for the variety feature information loci by using a forward search method, and obtaining a molecular identity card of the beef variety after verification by the verification model. The application can obtain the variety molecular identity card capable of comprehensively reflecting the genetic diversity of beef cattle varieties and improve the efficiency and accuracy of beef cattle variety detection.
