anchor_claim: A multi-modal protein sequence generation method based on deep learning is characterized in that an initial data set is constructed by fusing multi-modal information of protein sequences and text descriptions and is used for training a protein sequence generation model based on a multi-modal interaction attention mechanism, and protein sequences conforming to expected functions and structures are generated through an autoregressive generation method according to the text descriptions and corresponding sequence data input in real time in an online stage through the trained model. According to the invention, the protein sequence and the text data can be effectively fused by integrating the multi-mode information such as protein sequence and text description and the like as input and adopting the protein generation model based on the multi-mode interaction attention mechanism, so that the high-quality protein sequence can be generated.
cited_claim: The invention belongs to the technical field of biological breeding, and provides a genome selective breeding method based on lasso regression, a method and a storage medium, wherein the genome selective breeding method based on lasso regression comprises the steps of dividing a group data set for a plurality of samples based on species; the method comprises the steps of cleaning a group data set to obtain preferred data, converting the preferred data into a machine learning identification format to obtain conversion format data, constructing a plurality of machine learning regression algorithm models based on the conversion format data, fusing the plurality of machine learning regression algorithm models by adopting a lasso regression algorithm to construct a fusion model, and predicting breeding values of breeding groups based on the fusion model. The invention improves the breeding accuracy.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a salt-tolerant soybean whole genome selection method based on machine learning, which comprises the following steps of 1) obtaining genotypes and salt-treated phenotypes of a data set for modeling, and processing the genotypes and the salt-treated phenotypes, 2) strictly controlling quality of SNP loci and deletion samples, 3) carrying out whole genome association analysis on effective mutation loci to obtain high-quality mutation loci, 4) introducing high-quality mutation locus data in training set into a CA attention mechanism and a convolutional neural network building model of a multiple residual error module, 5) determining an optimal model, 6) obtaining resequencing data of soybean groups with salt stress phenotypes to be detected, extracting the high-quality mutation loci, and carrying out salt stress phenotype prediction by using the optimal model. The method can effectively predict the salt stress phenotype of the soybean, reduce the field breeding cost and obviously improve the breeding efficiency of salt-tolerant soybean.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of bioinformatics gene assembly analysis, in particular to an artificial intelligence technology-based chromosome T2T genome assembly method, which comprises the steps of carrying out a series of analysis and comparison on gene sequencing data, based on two constructed deep learning models and a support vector machine model, the gene data and telomere data of the unknown bases are complemented in the gene data with the determined position relation, the chromosome T2T gene data is obtained through data analysis and processing, and finally the chromosome T2T genome is obtained through format arrangement. The invention is not limited by research species, and sequence segment series connection, hole filling, telomere prediction and addition are automatically completed in the analysis process, so that the chromosome T2T genome is finally obtained.

cited_claim: The invention discloses a biomarker for predicting the benefit of hepatocellular carcinoma immunotherapy, an RNA model and application thereof. The invention screens out 49 markers related to the curative effect of the immune therapy of the hepatocellular carcinoma and establishes an RNA model-HIRE scoring model based on the tumor microenvironment immune therapy curative effect prediction by using a machine learning algorithm. According to the invention, the HIRE scoring model is constructed according to the characteristic genes related to the prognosis of the immunotherapy of the hepatocellular carcinoma patient, the activation condition of the tumor microenvironment is reflected to a certain extent, and the tumor and tumor microenvironment can be more comprehensively evaluated by combining the tumor cell characteristics and the immune checkpoint gene expression level, so that potential population benefiting from the immunotherapy can be more accurately screened out, more personalized immune benefit evaluation is provided for the hepatocellular carcinoma patient, and the accurate progress of the immunotherapy of the hepatocellular carcinoma is greatly promoted.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a method for modifying any polypeptide sequence into antibacterial peptide, belonging to the technical field of biological information. The invention develops a hypergraph neural network predictor for predicting the antibacterial activity score of polypeptide, which performs fine tuning training for favoring capture of the characteristic of an antibacterial peptide sequence on a pre-trained protein language model and trains a strategy network for selecting amino acid sites to be mutated in the polypeptide sequence, and for any initial polypeptide sequence, firstly selects the amino acid sites to be mutated through the strategy network, then gives out the type of amino acid after mutation of the sites through the fine tuning protein language model, then predicts the antibacterial activity score of the mutated sequence through the hypergraph neural network predictor, and iteratively executes the process until the ideal antibacterial peptide sequence output is obtained. The method has the capability of transforming any polypeptide sequence into the antibacterial peptide, and the antibacterial activity score of the transformed polypeptide is greatly improved, so that the method can be applied to the actual development of antibacterial medicines and lays a foundation for solving drug-resistant bacterial infection.
cited_claim: The invention develops a prediction method and model of mRNA translation protein product based on deep learning. Specifically, the invention designs a method for accurately predicting a transcriptome level translation product based on a deep learning method, which is used for predicting a translation site and the translation product of a transcript sequence to form a TRANSAID model. The TRANSAID model adopts a unique sequence coding strategy and a deep learning architecture, can capture local sequence characteristics and long-distance dependence simultaneously, greatly improves prediction accuracy, can predict transcript sequences of different species, has the capability of predicting species for the first time in the field, and can also identify different influences of 5'UTR and 3' UTR regions on translation regulation.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a fault detection device and method of a laser, wherein the fault detection device comprises a controller, N-level fault detection modules and a power supply detection module, each level of fault detection module corresponds to a level of device to be detected, each level of fault detection module comprises a light source detection module used for acquiring actual beam information of a laser beam passing through the device to be detected, a reflecting mirror assembly, a rotating platform, the reflecting mirror assembly synchronously rotates along with the rotating platform, an output mirror assembly used for leading out the laser beam, the controller comprises an FPGA (field programmable gate array), an MCU (micro controller unit) and a storage, the FPGA is internally provided with a neural network model, the neural network model comprises standard beam information of the laser beam corresponding to the N-level device to be detected, and the MCU controls the rotating platform to rotate. According to the invention, the device to be detected is detected step by step, so that rapid fault detection is realized, the specific position of the fault of the laser is positioned, and the fault detection efficiency of the laser is improved.
cited_claim: The invention provides a method, a device, equipment and a storage medium for measuring energy density distribution of an LED light source. According to the data, a CMOS image sensor array is arranged, and spherical scanning measurement is carried out on the LED light source through the array, so that space light field data are obtained. And carrying out luminous area effect compensation on the light field data by utilizing a pre-trained deep learning light field reconstruction model to obtain corrected spatial light field distribution data. And finally, carrying out energy density interpolation calculation according to the corrected data to generate a three-dimensional energy density distribution map. According to the method, through combining an image sensor array, a deep learning reconstruction technology and a three-dimensional space measurement model, accurate measurement of the energy density distribution of the LED light source is achieved, the limitation in the existing method is overcome, the measurement accuracy is improved, and the three-dimensional energy density distribution of the LED light source can be comprehensively reflected.

anchor_claim: A method, a device and a system for diagnosing faults of a rotary mechanical bearing in real time based on a deep learning algorithm comprise the steps of designing a data acquisition board card, acquiring vibration data and sound data of the bearing in different fault states on an electromechanical fault simulation platform, carrying out normalization processing on acquired signals, constructing a data set by adopting a sliding window method, carrying out multi-scale decomposition on the acquired vibration signals and sound signals of the bearing by using a signal time-frequency analysis method to obtain time-frequency signals with multi-scale fault characteristics, training a lightweight deep neural network model by taking the decomposed signals as input and storing optimal model parameters, deploying the trained lightweight deep neural network model based on time-frequency analysis to an edge computing embedded board card, outputting bearing fault diagnosis results in real time by using a display screen of the edge computing embedded board card, and carrying out emergency alarm by using the sound-light signals when faults are detected. The invention fully combines the advantages of signal time-frequency analysis when processing non-stationary signals with the strong capability of the deep neural network in the aspect of feature extraction, can accurately diagnose the bearing faults in real time in a complex industrial environment, and solves the problems of poor real-time performance, high calculation complexity and the like in the bearing fault diagnosis in the prior art.

anchor_claim: The invention provides a method, a device, equipment and a storage medium for measuring energy density distribution of an LED light source. According to the data, a CMOS image sensor array is arranged, and spherical scanning measurement is carried out on the LED light source through the array, so that space light field data are obtained. And carrying out luminous area effect compensation on the light field data by utilizing a pre-trained deep learning light field reconstruction model to obtain corrected spatial light field distribution data. And finally, carrying out energy density interpolation calculation according to the corrected data to generate a three-dimensional energy density distribution map. According to the method, through combining an image sensor array, a deep learning reconstruction technology and a three-dimensional space measurement model, accurate measurement of the energy density distribution of the LED light source is achieved, the limitation in the existing method is overcome, the measurement accuracy is improved, and the three-dimensional energy density distribution of the LED light source can be comprehensively reflected.

- **핵심 공통 기술 요소:**
  - 두 특허 모두 머신러닝 또는 딥러닝 알고리즘을 활용하여 데이터를 처리하고 분석하는 방법을 제시하고 있습니다.
  - 신호 처리 및 데이터 분석을 통해 특정 결과(광섬유 특성 또는 베어링 결함 진단)를 도출하는 점에서 유사성이 존재합니다.
  - 두 특허 모두 비정상적인 신호(노이즈가 포함된 신호 또는 진동 및 소리 데이터)를 처리하여 유용한 정보를 추출하는 데 중점을 두고 있습니다.

###

[침해 리스크]
- 리스크 수준: low
- 위험 요소: **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성:**, 두 특허의 기술적 요소가 유사하긴 하지만, 적용 분야가 다르기 때문에 직접적인 침해 가능성은 낮습니다. 원본 특허는 광섬유 테스트에 초점을 맞추고 있는 반면, 인용 특허는 회전 기계 베어링의 결함 진단에 중점을 두고 있습니다., **위험 요소 식별:**
- **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성:**
  - 두 특허의 기술적 요소가 유사하긴 하지만, 적용 분야가 다르기 때문에 직접적인 침해 가능성은 낮습니다. 원본 특허는 광섬유 테스트에 초점을 맞추고 있는 반면, 인용 특허는 회전 기계 베어링의 결함 진단에 중점을 두고 있습니다.
- **위험 요소 식별:**
  - 만약 원본 특허의 기술이 베어링 진단에 적용될 경우, 두 기술의 유사성으로 인해 침해 리스크가 발생할 수 있습니다.
  - 또한, 머신러닝 모델의 설계 및 데이터 처리 방법에서 유사한 접근 방식을 사용할 경우, 특허 침해의 소지가 있을 수 있습니다.

  - 원본 특허의 OTDR 기술을 적용할 때, 데이터 처리 방법이나 신호 처리 알고리즘을 변경하여 인용 특허와의 유사성을 줄일 수 있습니다. 예를 들어, 다른 형태의 신호 필터링 기법이나 머신러닝 모델을 사용할 수 있습니다.
  - 데이터 수집 및 분석 과정에서 사용하는 센서의 종류나 데이터 수집 방식을 변경하여 기술적 차별성을 확보할 수 있습니다.
  
- **대안적 기술 접근법:**
  - 딥러닝 대신 다른 머신러닝 기법(예: 서포트 벡터 머신, 결정 트리 등)을 활용하여 데이터 분석을 수행할 수 있습니다.
  - 신호 처리에 있어 전통적인 신호 처리 기법(예: FFT, 웨이브렛 변환 등)을 사용하여 특허의 범위를 회피할 수 있습니다.
  - 데이터 전처리 및 후처리 과정에서 새로운 알고리즘이나 방법론을 도입하여 기존의 접근 방식과 차별화된 결과를 도출할 수 있습니다.

According to the invention, the device to be detected is detected step by step, so that rapid fault detection is realized, the specific position of the fault of the laser is positioned, and the fault detection efficiency of the laser is improved.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a method applied to rapid measurement of parameters of an analog to digital converter (ADC) product INL and DNL, which relates to the field of parameter measurement, acquires ADC product data and environmental parameters and preprocesses, configures a three-layer neural network model based on data obtained in S100, carries out error prediction and optimizes the three-layer neural network model based on the three-layer neural network model operation result in S200, complements ADC product data and adjusts based on error prediction values obtained in S300, obtains the complemented ADC product data based on the complemented ADC product data, carries out feedback processing based on the complemented data parameters obtained in S500, carries out error prediction and complementation by using a small amount of acquired data through the neural network model, remarkably reduces the acquisition amount of the test data, greatly reduces the test time and cost, and simultaneously ensures the accuracy of the test result by carrying out complementation and correction on the data of an unaacquired part, thereby being applicable to ADC products with high integration and high frequency and effectively improving the consistency of test efficiency and product performance.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a method and a system for optimizing technological parameters of an AI-driven bond alloy wire, which relate to the technical field of semiconductor packaging and comprise the steps of establishing a two-channel deep learning network of a bonding process; the dual-channel deep learning network comprises a dynamic parameter optimizing channel and a static parameter optimizing channel, wherein bonding process dynamic data acquired in real time and preset bonding process static data are input into the dynamic parameter optimizing channel to obtain dynamic process evaluation indexes, preset bonding process static data are input into the static parameter optimizing channel to obtain static process evaluation indexes, and the dynamic process evaluation indexes and the static process evaluation indexes are fused through a self-adaptive weight fusion algorithm to obtain comprehensive evaluation indexes and optimize bonding process parameters. The invention integrates dynamic and static data through the double-channel deep learning network architecture, and combines the self-adaptive weight fusion algorithm to realize intelligent and accurate optimization of bonding process parameters, thereby remarkably improving bonding quality and process stability.

anchor_claim: Methods and systems for using pre-process measurement data to train post-process, machine learning (ML) based measurement models are described herein. In one aspect, a post-process, ML based measurement model is trained using reference data derived from actual reference measurements and estimated reference data generated by a trained mapping model. The trained mapping model maps measured values of parameters of interest at a pre-process state to estimated reference values at the post-process state. In this manner, the reference data employed to train a ML based measurement model is augmented based on pre-process measurement data. In another aspect, measurements of complex semiconductor structures are based on a combined measurement model including trained pre-process and post-process measurement models. Pre-process measurement data is employed directly as part of a combined ML based measurement and indirectly as part of the training data set for the combined ML based measurement model.
cited_claim: PURPOSE: To provide an image inspection device and an image inspection method aim to measure patterns with complex shapes with high accuracy, quickly, and with minimal damage by pairing images generated from design data with SEM images and using deep learning of geometric features.CONSTITUTION: An image inspection device is equipped with means for deep learning of ideal geometric features by pairing an image generated from design data for a pattern to be formed on a sample with an SEM image generated by scanning a pattern formed on the sample on the basis of the design data with a finely focused electron beam and detecting the emitted secondary electrons or reflected electrons.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

anchor_claim: 반도체 웨이퍼 결함을 결정하기 위한 제2 머신 러닝(machine learning, ML) 시스템을 훈련하는 방법은, 제1 ML 시스템에서 결함 검출에 실패한 제1 반도체 웨이퍼 이미지 세트를 수신하는 단계, 수신한 상기 제1 이미지 세트 및 상기 제1 ML 시스템의 대응하는 예측 결과에 기초하여 제1 데이터 세트를 생성하는 단계, 미리 정의된 이미지 조정 파라미터를 사용하여 상기 제1 데이터 세트의 이미지를 수정하여 제2 이미지 세트를 생성하는 단계, 상기 제1 ML 시스템을 사용하여 상기 제2 이미지 세트의 결함을 식별하는 단계, 식별한 상기 결함에 기초하여 상기 제2 이미지 세트에 실제 값(ground truths)을 할당하는 단계, 상기 제1 데이터 세트, 상기 제2 이미지 세트 및 이와 관련된 상기 실제 값에 기초하여 제2 데이터 세트를 생성하는 단계, 그리고 생성한 상기 제2 데이터 세트에 기초하여 반도체 웨이퍼 결함을 결정하기 위한 상기 제2 ML 시스템을 훈련하는 단계를 포함한다.
cited_claim: The application provides a correction method of wafer pattern offset, a storage medium and intelligent equipment. The correction method comprises the steps of determining a plurality of sampling points in a wafer, obtaining offset of sampling patterns of a target layer and a previous layer at each sampling point, obtaining preset feature vectors of the sampling patterns in the target layer, taking the preset feature vectors as input layers and the offset of the sampling patterns as output layers, building a neural network model, wherein the neural network model comprises a plurality of hidden layers, calculating weight and offset parameters of each hidden layer when the loss is minimum by adopting a preset loss function, calculating simulated offset of all patterns in the target layer through simulation of the neural network model, and moving the offset of all patterns in the opposite direction to the simulated offset to finish correction. The method does not need to carry out a large amount of sampling, has lower requirements on the number and the position of the sampling points, can still realize prediction even if the wafer layout changes, and has high prediction precision on the graph offset.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to a wafer grabbing foolproof method and device based on a 3D vision technology, wherein the method comprises the steps of obtaining a 2D image and 3D point cloud data of a wafer to be identified, judging whether the 2D image is complete in a blocking angle model matching mode, obtaining blocking angle coordinates and carrying out inverse radiation transformation on the 2D image to obtain a corrected blocking image, identifying a two-dimensional code position on each layer of wafer according to the corrected blocking image by adopting a pre-trained deep learning model, obtaining position information of each layer of wafer according to the two-dimensional code position of each layer of wafer, obtaining point cloud data after filtering of each layer and clustering results of the point cloud data according to the 3D point cloud data and the position information of each layer of wafer, and carrying out multi-mode fusion judgment according to the two-dimensional code position and the clustering results of each layer of wafer to obtain fusion judgment results. The method enables foolproof identification to be more stable and ensures the stability of a semiconductor automatic production line.

cited_claim: A method includes providing, to a trained machine learning model, first OES time trace data from a substrate processing operation. The method further includes obtaining, from the trained machine learning model, synthetic OES time trace data of the substrate processing operation, the synthetic OES time trace data being of a second set of wavelengths, different than the first. The method further includes obtaining second OES time trace data from the substrate processing operation of the second set of wavelengths. The method further includes determining, based on the synthetic OES time trace data and the second OES time trace data, a process endpoint for the substrate processing operation. The method further includes performing an action in view of the process endpoint.

anchor_claim: A method includes providing, to a trained machine learning model, first OES time trace data from a substrate processing operation. The first OES time trace data is of a first set of wavelengths. The method further includes obtaining, from the trained machine learning model, synthetic OES time trace data of the substrate processing operation, the synthetic OES time trace data being of a second set of wavelengths, different than the first. The method further includes obtaining second OES time trace data from the substrate processing operation of the second set of wavelengths. The method further includes determining, based on the synthetic OES time trace data and the second OES time trace data, a process endpoint for the substrate processing operation. The method further includes performing an action in view of the process endpoint.
cited_claim: 반도체 웨이퍼 결함을 결정하기 위한 제2 머신 러닝(machine learning, ML) 시스템을 훈련하는 방법은, 제1 ML 시스템에서 결함 검출에 실패한 제1 반도체 웨이퍼 이미지 세트를 수신하는 단계, 수신한 상기 제1 이미지 세트 및 상기 제1 ML 시스템의 대응하는 예측 결과에 기초하여 제1 데이터 세트를 생성하는 단계, 미리 정의된 이미지 조정 파라미터를 사용하여 상기 제1 데이터 세트의 이미지를 수정하여 제2 이미지 세트를 생성하는 단계, 상기 제1 ML 시스템을 사용하여 상기 제2 이미지 세트의 결함을 식별하는 단계, 식별한 상기 결함에 기초하여 상기 제2 이미지 세트에 실제 값(ground truths)을 할당하는 단계, 상기 제1 데이터 세트, 상기 제2 이미지 세트 및 이와 관련된 상기 실제 값에 기초하여 제2 데이터 세트를 생성하는 단계, 그리고 생성한 상기 제2 데이터 세트에 기초하여 반도체 웨이퍼 결함을 결정하기 위한 상기 제2 ML 시스템을 훈련하는 단계를 포함한다.

- **위험 요소 식별**:
  1. **기술적 유사성**: 머신 러닝을 통한 데이터 분석이라는 공통점으로 인해, 유사한 접근 방식을 사용하는 경우 침해 리스크가 존재할 수 있습니다.

  2. **알고리즘 변경**: 기존의 머신 러닝 알고리즘 대신 다른 알고리즘(예: 딥러닝, 강화학습 등)을 활용하여 데이터 분석 방식을 변경.

- **대안적 기술 접근법**:
  1. **비지도 학습**: 데이터에 대한 레이블이 없는 경우 비지도 학습 기법을 활용하여 결함을 탐지하는 방법.
  2. **전통적인 데이터 분석 기법**: 머신 러닝 대신 통계적 방법이나 규칙 기반 시스템을 사용하여 결함을 분석하는 접근법.

anchor_claim: The application provides a temperature drift correction method, device, equipment and medium for substrate warpage measurement, wherein the method comprises the steps of determining a plurality of coefficients to be calibrated according to a calibration coefficient model for substrate height measurement, obtaining a plurality of calibration coefficients based on a set temperature calibration point and the calibration times under each temperature calibration point, obtaining an average value based on the result of the calibration operation of the substrate warpage measurement system for carrying out the corresponding calibration times under each temperature calibration point, obtaining a calibration coefficient correction table, determining each calibration coefficient corrected under the temperature to be detected through a polynomial difference method or a machine learning method based on the calibration coefficient correction table, and determining the corrected substrate height according to the calibration coefficient model, thereby realizing temperature drift correction of the substrate height under the detection temperature. The application corrects the calibration coefficient of the substrate warp measurement system on line and compensates the error caused by the change of the calibration coefficient along with the temperature, thereby improving the measurement precision of the substrate warp measurement system.
cited_claim: Methods and systems for using pre-process measurement data to train post-process, machine learning (ML) based measurement models are described herein. In one aspect, a post-process, ML based measurement model is trained using reference data derived from actual reference measurements and estimated reference data generated by a trained mapping model. The trained mapping model maps measured values of parameters of interest at a pre-process state to estimated reference values at the post-process state. In this manner, the reference data employed to train a ML based measurement model is augmented based on pre-process measurement data. In another aspect, measurements of complex semiconductor structures are based on a combined measurement model including trained pre-process and post-process measurement models. Pre-process measurement data is employed directly as part of a combined ML based measurement and indirectly as part of the training data set for the combined ML based measurement model.

anchor_claim: The application provides an overlay mark asymmetry compensation method and device for a multi-mode deep learning network, wherein after manufacturing data of different modes are acquired, the manufacturing data are input into the multi-mode deep learning network for processing to obtain an overlay mark asymmetry prediction error, wherein the multi-mode deep learning network performs feature extraction on the manufacturing data of different modes and performs feature fusion on vector features corresponding to different modes, and physical parameters actually produced in the manufacturing process and parameters observed by equipment are associated and combined to obtain the overlay mark asymmetry prediction error, so that the actual overlay mark is compensated in the actual production. By introducing a multi-mode learning network, various data features are fully mined and utilized, the generalization capability of the model is enhanced, meanwhile, the intellectualization of equipment is realized by means of a machine learning technology, and an effective tracing and positioning solution is provided for the process problems in wafer production.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a method and a system for optimizing technological parameters of an AI-driven bond alloy wire, which relate to the technical field of semiconductor packaging and comprise the steps of establishing a two-channel deep learning network of a bonding process; the dual-channel deep learning network comprises a dynamic parameter optimizing channel and a static parameter optimizing channel, wherein bonding process dynamic data acquired in real time and preset bonding process static data are input into the dynamic parameter optimizing channel to obtain dynamic process evaluation indexes, preset bonding process static data are input into the static parameter optimizing channel to obtain static process evaluation indexes, and the dynamic process evaluation indexes and the static process evaluation indexes are fused through a self-adaptive weight fusion algorithm to obtain comprehensive evaluation indexes and optimize bonding process parameters. The invention integrates dynamic and static data through the double-channel deep learning network architecture, and combines the self-adaptive weight fusion algorithm to realize intelligent and accurate optimization of bonding process parameters, thereby remarkably improving bonding quality and process stability.

anchor_claim: Methods and systems for measurements of complex semiconductor structures employing component measurement signals derived from optical, x-ray, or electron based measurements of the structure of interest are described herein. Component measurement signals capture the measurement response of a subset of a number of structural features of the semiconductor structure under measurement. In some embodiments, component measurement signals are employed in the context of a model based regression analysis to estimate values of one or more parameters of interest. In some embodiments, component measurement signals are employed to train machine learning based or library based measurement models. A training set of component measurement signals includes any combination of real signals and synthetically generated signals at present and prior process states from current and historical measurement targets and component targets. In a further aspect, loss functions and exit criteria for different component measurement models of a structure under measurement are defined differently.

anchor_claim: There is provided a system and method of defect detection on a semiconductor specimen based on template matching or machine learning (ML). Template matching is performed between a set of template patches and a set of runtime images, by selectively performing at least two of the following: matching a defect template patch in an inspection image, matching a reference template patch in a reference image, or matching a difference template patch in a difference image, so as to provide likelihood of target of interest (TOI) presence in the inspection image. The ML-based approach includes feeding an inspection patch and a reference patch together to a trained ML model, to generate a feature vector representative of a given TOI candidate, and evaluating the feature vector of the given TOI candidate to provide a likelihood of the given TOI candidate being a TOI or non-TOI.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a method applied to rapid measurement of parameters of an analog to digital converter (ADC) product INL and DNL, which relates to the field of parameter measurement, acquires ADC product data and environmental parameters and preprocesses, configures a three-layer neural network model based on data obtained in S100, carries out error prediction and optimizes the three-layer neural network model based on the three-layer neural network model operation result in S200, complements ADC product data and adjusts based on error prediction values obtained in S300, obtains the complemented ADC product data based on the complemented ADC product data, carries out feedback processing based on the complemented data parameters obtained in S500, carries out error prediction and complementation by using a small amount of acquired data through the neural network model, remarkably reduces the acquisition amount of the test data, greatly reduces the test time and cost, and simultaneously ensures the accuracy of the test result by carrying out complementation and correction on the data of an unaacquired part, thereby being applicable to ADC products with high integration and high frequency and effectively improving the consistency of test efficiency and product performance.

anchor_claim: The application relates to the technical field of millimeter wave radar detection, in particular to a high-precision biological sensing method and system based on millimeter wave radar. The method comprises the steps of collecting millimeter wave detection emission signals and millimeter wave detection echo signals, introducing signal processing and analysis algorithms based on artificial intelligence and deep learning at the rear end to decompose and analyze signal eigenmodes of the millimeter wave detection emission signals and the millimeter wave detection echo signals, capturing signal component frequency domain difference key semantic aggregation characteristics between the millimeter wave detection emission signals and the millimeter wave detection echo signals, expressing a perception result based on aggregation representation of the signal component frequency domain difference characteristics, taking the perception result as a biological perception recognition result, and further improving accuracy of detecting biological perception by utilizing a millimeter wave radar.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of millimeter wave human body security inspection, in particular to a diffusion model-based generation type single-frequency millimeter wave self-focusing near-field imaging method, which comprises the steps of obtaining single-frequency original echo data by radar equipment; imaging single-frequency original echo data to obtain a single-frequency imaging defocus result, inputting the single-frequency imaging defocus result into a pre-built space convolution neural network to obtain a network coding result, embedding the network coding result into a pre-trained noise reduction diffusion model to obtain a conditional diffusion model, gradually reconstructing residual values between the network coding result and an ideal broadband imaging result by using the conditional diffusion model to obtain a diffusion model prediction result, and adding the diffusion model prediction result and the network coding result to obtain a final single-frequency self-focusing imaging result. Therefore, the problems that a traditional single-frequency millimeter wave imaging method cannot generate a high-quality focusing image, and the imaging capability of the self-focusing-based single-frequency imaging method in a complex object scene is insufficient are solved.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a machine learning target detection method of a ground penetrating radar, which comprises the following steps of 1) collecting underground scene data by the aid of the ground penetrating radar, preprocessing the underground scene data to obtain first processing data, 2) constructing a corresponding background and target dielectric characteristic dataset, 3) simulating propagation of electromagnetic waves in an underground medium by means of a finite difference time domain method, decoupling a Maxwell equation, dispersing a calculation area by means of CPML absorbing reflected waves at a boundary condition processing boundary to obtain forward hyperbola characteristics, 4) labeling the generated forward hyperbola characteristics by means of Labelimg to construct training data, 5) training a DS-YOLOv network by means of the training data to obtain a target detection model, and 6) inputting the relevant dataset into the target detection model to obtain a target hyperbola identification result. The invention can process various abnormal bodies in complex scenes, and can better identify the rock bodies whether sparse or dense.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a farmland plough layer soil volume weight detection method and system based on a multichannel ground penetrating radar, which relates to the field of soil volume weight detection, the invention can directly measure large-area soil through the multichannel ground penetrating radar, acquire corresponding antennas with different intervals to acquire average amplitude envelope reciprocal of plough layer electromagnetic wave signals, predict volume water content through a model based on the average amplitude envelope reciprocal, and the volume moisture content and the average amplitude envelope reciprocal are used as the input of a trained volume-weight inversion machine learning model, so that the measurement of the soil volume weight with high resolution can be realized, the measurement is compatible with loose plough layer soil, the measurement accuracy and efficiency are effectively improved, and the problems that the conventional single-channel ground penetrating radar system is insufficient in plough layer electromagnetic wave information, the conventional soil volume weight detection method is difficult to realize large-area rapid continuous detection and is not suitable for detecting loose plough layer soil are solved.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses an ionosphere irregularity recognition method and system based on machine learning. The method comprises the steps of receiving GNSS observation files and ephemeris files, preprocessing the GNSS observation files and the ephemeris files, extracting electronic total content change rate index features, time integration, total electronic content index features and Doppler coefficient features according to the preprocessed GNSS observation files and the preprocessed ephemeris files, carrying out ionosphere irregularity recognition according to the extracted electronic total content change rate index features, the extracted time integration, the extracted total electronic content index features and the extracted Doppler coefficient features, and outputting recognition results. The method can avoid setting a single threshold value to judge whether the ionosphere irregular body event occurs or not in the process of ionosphere irregular body identification, and effectively avoid data loss caused by cycle slip detection, thereby effectively identifying the EPB event and the TID event.
cited_claim: The invention provides a laser radar environment interference resistance identification method and system based on machine learning. And respectively acquiring the environment interference and the echo of the target, extracting the characteristic value and marking the data of the acquired one-dimensional high-resolution range profile, reducing the dimension of the manually extracted characteristic value, and performing model training by using a support vector machine algorithm based on the classified data characteristic value on the basis to obtain an optimal classifier model. And the model is applied to a laser radar real-time detection algorithm to realize real-time resolution of targets and interference. The method can realize effective resolution of natural environment interference by software upgrading on the basis of low-cost one-dimensional laser radar, and upgrade iteration can be continuously optimized by expanding a data set. The data training process is carried out in the background, and the method has the advantages of high speed and high real-time performance in practical application.

cited_claim: A ground speed computation system for a vehicle includes ground-oriented RADAR devices, an Inertial Measurement Unit (IMU) device, a communication device, an electronic processing device in communication with the RADAR devices, the IMU device, and the communication device, and a non-transitory memory storing (i) a machine learning (ML) ground speed calculation model and (ii) instructions that when executed by the electronic processing device result in receiving, from the RADAR devices, data descriptive of a ground surface in proximity to the vehicle, receiving, from the IMU device, data descriptive of a movement of the vehicle, computing, by the ML ground speed calculation model and utilizing (i) the data descriptive of the ground surface and (ii) the data descriptive of the movement of the vehicle, to determine an estimated ground speed of the vehicle and outputting, by the communication device, an indication of the estimated ground speed of the vehicle.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a cloud radar clear sky echo identification method based on deep learning and vision fusion, which belongs to the field of meteorological radar detection and comprises the steps of obtaining a millimeter wave Yun Lei reaching an observation data set, preprocessing the millimeter wave cloud radar observation data set to obtain a preprocessed data set, constructing an identification network based on a one-dimensional convolutional neural network and the preprocessed data set, optimizing the identification network through an isolated clutter noise point removal method based on communication area analysis to obtain a one-dimensional U-Net clear sky and meteorological echo intelligent classification model, and processing real-time data based on the one-dimensional U-Net clear sky and meteorological echo intelligent classification model to obtain an identification result. The invention provides an effective data post-processing method to filter out clear sky clutter and continuous suspension clutter near stratum, and simultaneously retain weather echoes related to cloud and precipitation, thereby improving the quality of radar data.
cited_claim: The application relates to an extinction coefficient inversion method, an extinction coefficient inversion system, extinction coefficient inversion equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the field of software design. The extinction coefficient inversion method based on the RBF neural network comprises the steps of synchronously observing and collecting training data by the aid of the micro-pulse laser radar and the high-energy Raman laser radar, preprocessing the micro-pulse laser radar data to obtain preprocessed echo signals, preprocessing the Raman laser radar data and utilizing a Raman laser radar inversion algorithm to obtain extinction coefficient data, training the RBF neural network by utilizing the preprocessed echo signals and the extinction coefficient data to obtain an RBF neural network model, preprocessing the RBF neural network to obtain target echo signals when actual echo signals collected by the micro-pulse laser radar are received, and conducting prediction inversion on the target echo signals by utilizing the trained RBF neural network model to obtain extinction coefficients. The application has the technical effect of providing a more accurate extinction coefficient inversion result.

anchor_claim: The invention provides a target perception method, a target perception device, a target perception program product and a target perception medium, and relates to the technical field of collaborative perception. The method comprises the steps of sending a sensing signal, receiving an echo signal of the sensing signal reflected by a target object, determining a regularization parameter value of a random average RALS algorithm based on machine learning, separating the echo signal based on the RALS algorithm adopting the regularization parameter value to obtain at least one factor array, wherein the factor array comprises at least one of an angle factor matrix, a time delay factor matrix and a Doppler factor matrix, and obtaining sensing result information corresponding to the target object according to the at least one factor array. The scheme of the invention solves the problems of over fitting or slow convergence speed in the existing target perception method.
cited_claim: A method of phase-based ranging between a first device and a second device, comprises receiving a plurality two-way phase-measurements between the first device and the second device performed at a plurality of frequencies; identifying a first measurement and a second measurement of said plurality of two-way phase measurements, said first measurement and said second measurement having been performed at a same frequency; calculating a relative speed between said first device and said second device based at least on said first measurement and said second measurement; doppler compensating a plurality of measurements of said plurality of two-way phase measurements based on the calculated relative speed; and calculating a distance between said first device and said second device based on the doppler compensated measurements, wherein said calculating comprises inputting the doppler compensated measurements to a neural network.

  - 두 특허 모두 머신러닝 또는 신경망을 활용하여 데이터를 처리하고 결과를 도출하는 점에서 유사합니다.
  - 공통적으로, 신호의 반사 및 처리 과정을 통해 목표 객체에 대한 정보를 추출하는 방법론을 사용합니다.

###

[침해 리스크]
- 리스크 수준: medium
- 위험 요소: **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성**: 중간, 원본 특허는 RALS 알고리즘을 사용하여 신호를 처리하고, 인용 특허는 신경망을 활용하여 Doppler 보정된 측정을 계산합니다. 두 기술이 서로 다른 알고리즘을 사용하지만, 기본적인 감지 및 측정 원리는 유사하므로 침해 가능성이 존재합니다., **위험 요소 식별**:
- **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성**: 중간
  - 원본 특허는 RALS 알고리즘을 사용하여 신호를 처리하고, 인용 특허는 신경망을 활용하여 Doppler 보정된 측정을 계산합니다. 두 기술이 서로 다른 알고리즘을 사용하지만, 기본적인 감지 및 측정 원리는 유사하므로 침해 가능성이 존재합니다.
- **위험 요소 식별**:
  - 두 특허 모두 Doppler 효과를 다루고 있으며, 신호 처리 및 머신러닝을 포함하고 있어, 특정 구현 방식에 따라 침해 리스크가 발생할 수 있습니다.
  - 특히, 인용 특허의 신경망을 통한 거리 계산 방식이 원본 특허의 방법론과 겹칠 경우 법적 문제가 발생할 수 있습니다.

###

[회피 전략]
- 설계 변경: **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:, RALS 알고리즘 대신 다른 머신러닝 알고리즘(예: SVM, Decision Trees 등)을 사용하여 신호를 처리하는 방법으로 변경할 수 있습니다., Doppler 보정 대신 다른 방식의 속도 측정 기술(예: 시간 지연 기반 측정)을 도입하여 두 특허의 기술적 요소를 회피할 수 있습니다.

- **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:

  - Doppler 보정 대신 다른 방식의 속도 측정 기술(예: 시간 지연 기반 측정)을 도입하여 두 특허의 기술적 요소를 회피할 수 있습니다.
  
- **대안적 기술 접근법**:
  - 감지 및 측정 기술을 개선하기 위해 새로운 센서 기술(예: LiDAR, 초음파 센서 등)을 활용하여 기존의 신호 처리 방법과는 다른 접근법을 사용할 수 있습니다.
  - 데이터 처리 방식에서 신경망 대신 전통적인 통계적 방법이나 다른 형태의 머신러닝 기법을 적용하여 특허의 범위를 벗어날 수 있습니다.

이러한 분석을 통해 특허 간의 유사성과 침해 리스크를 평가하고, 회피 전략을 수립할 수 있습니다.

anchor_claim: The invention provides a laser radar environment interference resistance identification method and system based on machine learning. And respectively acquiring the environment interference and the echo of the target, extracting the characteristic value and marking the data of the acquired one-dimensional high-resolution range profile, reducing the dimension of the manually extracted characteristic value, and performing model training by using a support vector machine algorithm based on the classified data characteristic value on the basis to obtain an optimal classifier model. And the model is applied to a laser radar real-time detection algorithm to realize real-time resolution of targets and interference. The method can realize effective resolution of natural environment interference by software upgrading on the basis of low-cost one-dimensional laser radar, and upgrade iteration can be continuously optimized by expanding a data set. The data training process is carried out in the background, and the method has the advantages of high speed and high real-time performance in practical application.
cited_claim: The application relates to the technical field of radar imaging and discloses a Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) imaging low signal-to-noise ratio phase compensation algorithm for a sea target, which comprises the steps of obtaining a signal to be processed by transmitting radar signals to the sea target through a SAR system, determining a signal-to-noise ratio and determining a compensation scheme of the signal to be processed, extracting a characteristic index and determining a constant index group and a variable index group when the signal-to-noise ratio is lower than a signal-to-noise ratio threshold, comparing the characteristic vector of the signal to be processed with a historical data group to determine a compensation value, determining a first compensation value based on a maximum likelihood phase error when the similarity is smaller than or equal to a similarity threshold, determining a second compensation value based on a convolutional neural network model, and determining the compensation value according to the first compensation value and the second compensation value. The application improves the phase compensation precision under the condition of low signal to noise ratio by a multi-level and dynamic self-adaptive phase compensation mechanism.

anchor_claim: The specification provides a radar anti-interference method and system based on self-cognition, and relates to the technical field of radar echo signal processing. The method comprises the steps of constructing a depth neural network according to an acquired historical radar echo signal by using a one-dimensional convolutional neural network, a long-short-term memory network and a fully-connected neural network, acquiring a current radar echo signal, sequentially carrying out matched filtering, threshold detection, pulse interception and pulse normalization on the current radar echo signal to obtain a normalized pulse signal, and carrying out self-cognition recognition on the normalized pulse signal through the depth neural network to obtain an interference-free pulse pressure signal. The method can be used for accurately identifying and classifying real radar echo signals and forwarding interference signals by learning fingerprint features of radar echo signals through the constructed deep neural network, so that the anti-interference capability of a radar system can be effectively enhanced, and the accuracy and reliability of echo information can be ensured particularly in a forwarding interference scene.
cited_claim: The present disclosure provides a system and a method for detecting and tracking one or more objects in a scene. The method includes collecting features of each radar image in a sequence of radar images to form a spatiotemporal pool of features. The method further includes processing, using a neural network employing an attention mechanism, the spatiotemporal pool of features to generate a spatiotemporal pool of selected features. The method further includes processing, using the neural network employing a window shifting mechanism, the spatiotemporal pool of selected features to generate discrete spatiotemporal patches. The method further includes processing, using the neural network employing the attention mechanism, the discrete spatiotemporal patches to generate an enhanced spatiotemporal pool of features. The method further includes determining at least one property of the one or more objects in the scene based on the enhanced spatiotemporal pool of features.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a fused low-layer water vapor combined flux radar echo extrapolation prediction method based on a improved Swin UNet, which comprises the following steps of (1) collecting radar echo reflectivity data, reflecting water vapor combined flux data and GNSS satellite navigation system wind field data and preprocessing, constructing a fused low-layer water vapor combined flux data extrapolation prediction data set (2) to generate model input sample data, screening strong radar echo sample data, constructing a strong radar echo convection system prediction training set, (3) constructing a deep learning model based on the improved Swin UNet model, constructing a weighted loss function, respectively giving different weights to strong and weak echo areas, (4) training based on the training set and the model, and (5) generating a prediction product based on radar echo reflectivity data, reflecting water vapor combined flux data and satellite navigation system wind field data.
cited_claim: A method of phase-based ranging between a first device and a second device, comprises receiving a plurality two-way phase-measurements between the first device and the second device performed at a plurality of frequencies; identifying a first measurement and a second measurement of said plurality of two-way phase measurements, said first measurement and said second measurement having been performed at a same frequency; calculating a relative speed between said first device and said second device based at least on said first measurement and said second measurement; doppler compensating a plurality of measurements of said plurality of two-way phase measurements based on the calculated relative speed; and calculating a distance between said first device and said second device based on the doppler compensated measurements, wherein said calculating comprises inputting the doppler compensated measurements to a neural network.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a high-rise fire intelligent positioning voice alarm method and a system, which particularly relate to the technical field of voice alarm, and comprise the steps of taking the concentration of different types of smoke generated by burning different materials, the brightness value of flame and the spreading speed information of flame as the input of a fuzzy Bayesian neural network model, taking fire hazard level probability distribution as the output of the fuzzy Bayesian neural network model, determining fire hazard scores of fire areas according to the fire hazard level probability distribution, collecting crowd flow information and area geographic position information in a monitoring area, comprehensively analyzing the crowd flow information and the geographic position information in the monitoring area, quantifying the adjustment requirements of alarms in each monitoring area in a building, and generating the adjustment signals of the alarms in real time.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of electric operation safety management, in particular to an electric operation site safety monitoring and intervention system based on machine vision, which comprises a multi-modal data acquisition module, a behavior feature extraction module, a risk identification module, an automatic intervention module and a data storage and visualization module, wherein the multi-modal data acquisition module acquires multi-modal data in real time, the behavior feature extraction module extracts features through a deep learning technology, the risk identification module comprehensively analyzes behaviors, environments and equipment states by utilizing a machine learning model, identifies high-risk behaviors, environment abnormality and equipment faults, the automatic intervention module generates intervention instructions according to risk analysis results, and the data storage and visualization module realizes layered storage and dynamic display of the multi-modal data and the risk results; the invention can realize real-time monitoring, accurate risk identification and intelligent intervention of the electric operation site, and improves the efficiency and reliability of operation safety management.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a typhoon and storm type geological disaster early warning and forecasting method, which belongs to the technical field of geological monitoring and comprises the steps of combining geological disaster prevention and control data, establishing a point cloud-based hidden danger point full-attribute three-dimensional real-scene situation map through an unmanned aerial vehicle oblique photographing technology, arranging a panoramic intelligent probe at the hidden danger point to form a personnel accidental entering an early warning electronic fence, constructing an early warning model, dynamically analyzing a hidden danger point multi-angle time sequence picture captured by the panoramic intelligent probe through a neural network algorithm, carrying out intelligent monitoring and interpretation on dangerous factors of the hidden danger point, carrying out real-time early warning, comprehensively reflecting the dangerous factors into the full-attribute three-dimensional real-scene situation map, constructing a geological disaster eagle eye system, releasing early warning information, feeding back the early warning model according to disaster danger situations, and updating the early warning model. By adopting the typhoon and storm type geological disaster early warning and forecasting method, the manpower and material resource investment of management and control is reduced to the maximum extent, and the accuracy of early warning and forecasting is improved to the maximum degree.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of thermal power generation, in particular to a boiler four-pipe leakage early warning method and system, wherein the method comprises the following steps of S1, obtaining power station operation parameters and dissolved hydrogen data of boiler four-pipes, S2, storing the power station operation parameters and the dissolved hydrogen data in a time sequence database through a data middleware, S3, selecting fault characteristic parameters related to boiler four-pipe leakage in the power station operation parameters and carrying out data preprocessing, S4, determining an optimal neural network prediction model based on the fault characteristic parameters, S5, obtaining the boiler parameters and establishing a pipe wall temperature prediction model of the boiler four-pipes, S6, establishing an oxide film thickness calculation model, establishing a corrosion monitoring model based on the oxide film thickness calculation model, the pipe wall temperature prediction model and the dissolved hydrogen data, S7, establishing a fusion model based on the optimal neural network prediction model and the corrosion monitoring model, and carrying out boiler four-pipe leakage early warning based on the fusion values.

cited_claim: A computerized system and method for securing a cryptocurrency wallet is provided. A transaction proposed by a user of a cryptocurrency wallet is intercepted and an address of counterparty is extracted from the transaction. If the address of the counterparty matches with an address in an allow list, a risk score is displayed for the proposed transaction. In response to displaying the risk score, an indication whether to submit or abort the proposed transaction may be received. If the indication is to submit the proposed transaction, the transaction is submitted. If the indication is to abort the proposed transaction, the transaction is aborted. In some examples, the indication to submit or abort the proposed transaction may be automatically generated based on machine learning from user behavior with earlier transactions with similar risk scores.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to a dynamic underground water early warning method which comprises monitoring early warning and forecasting early warning, wherein the monitoring early warning comprises water level falling type early warning and water level rising type early warning, the water level falling type early warning comprises underground water level early warning and water level and water quantity double-control early warning of an ultra-mining area, the underground water level early warning of the ultra-mining area adopts a five-stage early warning system, the water level and water quantity double-control early warning adopts a water-level annual index, the water level rising type early warning comprises water level rising type early warning of an urban area and water level rising type early warning of an agricultural irrigation area, and the forecasting early warning adopts a time sequence model, a multiple linear regression model and a neural network model to determine an optimal forecasting model of each city. cited_claim: The invention discloses an all-weather well site fire disaster early warning method based on image processing, which belongs to the technical field of well site fire fighting and comprises the following steps of S1, building an all-weather well site fire disaster early warning system, S2, collecting images of fire disasters in well sites, preprocessing and marking the images, building a fire disaster large sample database, S3, preprocessing the collected images, extracting features and identifying the features to obtain sample images, S4, comparing the sample images obtained in S3 with the fire disaster large sample database, judging whether fire disasters occur or not, and sending fire disaster information to an intelligent cloud platform through a network base station for processing. anchor_claim: The invention discloses a health condition detection system for hydrogen storage equipment of a hydrogen station, which comprises a sensor module, a data acquisition and transmission module, a data processing and analysis module and an alarm and display module, wherein the sensor module is used for detecting the hydrogen storage equipment in real time, the data acquisition and transmission module is used for transmitting signal data sent by the sensor module to the data processing and analysis module, the data processing and analysis module is used for processing digital signal data and inputting the digital signal data into a health assessment model, the health assessment model classifies and assesses the hydrogen storage equipment by using a machine learning algorithm and outputs health assessment results to the alarm and display module, and the alarm and display module is used for displaying the real-time condition of the hydrogen storage equipment and triggering an alarm when the health assessment results output by the health assessment model reach a preset alarm threshold. And then, when the real-time detection is carried out, the health assessment model evaluates the real-time health condition of the hydrogen storage equipment according to the real-time data and the reference data.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a method for predicting a lining displacement curve of a cross-overlapped tunnel excavation, which comprises the steps of obtaining a plurality of tunnel variables between an existing tunnel and a newly-built tunnel under a target working condition, inputting the tunnel variables into a trained generalized regression neural network, outputting a plurality of specific parameters, wherein training data are generated based on a two-dimensional finite element model, the generalized regression neural network model is trained according to the training data, substituting all the specific parameters into a pre-constructed displacement equation to obtain the displacement equation of the existing tunnel, and generating a lining displacement curve according to the displacement equation. The invention can quickly generate an accurate displacement curve.
cited_claim: A physical intelligent magnetic resonance diffusion weighted image denoising and quantifying method relates to diffusion magnetic resonance weighted imaging. The method comprises the steps of 1) obtaining diffusion weighted magnetic resonance data acquired by using a plane echo imaging sequence with multiple diffusion directions, 2) designing a physical intelligent magnetic resonance diffusion weighted image denoising and quantifying deep learning network model and a loss function, 3) training the physical intelligent magnetic resonance diffusion weighted image denoising and quantifying deep learning network model by using the training data set obtained in the step 1), and 4) inputting diffusion weighted data to be denoised into a trained network to generate a final denoising and quantifying result. Through the combined application of physical regularization loss and low b value data, the problem of low signal to noise ratio in magnetic resonance diffusion weighted imaging is effectively solved, image denoising is realized, and an accurate quantitative result is further provided. The image quality and the ADC quantitative accuracy can be maintained or even improved while the acquisition times are reduced.

anchor_claim: The application discloses a liver and gall part segmentation method, device, equipment and medium based on deep learning, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. In the embodiment of the application, three deep learning models are used for carrying out three-stage image segmentation on an original image containing a liver and gall part, the positions of all human tissue structures of the liver and gall part in a medical image are fully automatically identified and segmented, an operation navigation is provided for a clinician when the liver and gall part diseases and operation planning are carried out, and the deep learning technology is applied, so that the method is more accurate and rapid, can be suitable for disease diagnosis, operation making and radiotherapy planning of more clinicians in departments, improves the applicability of the method, has general clinical value, can realize more accurate segmentation by the three-stage segmentation modules, can give consideration to global information and local information, is more in line with the reading habit of the clinician, and improves the segmentation precision and accuracy.
cited_claim: The invention relates to a tensioning integral shape finding method based on a two-stage optimization depth neural network, which comprises the following steps of constructing a constraint equation of a tensioning integral structure according to node residual force, rod piece length and node distance of a cable rod unit, taking the constraint equation as a loss function of the depth neural network, taking a randomly generated node coordinate vector of the cable rod unit as input of the depth neural network, obtaining a cable rod unit node coordinate vector output value which minimizes a loss function value in a two-stage optimization mode, determining a steady-state configuration based on the cable rod unit node coordinate vector output value, circularly obtaining a plurality of steady-state configurations, judging stability of each steady-state configuration, obtaining a stable configuration meeting geometric stability, and finishing tensioning integral shape finding. Compared with the prior art, the method can perform shape finding of complex tensegrity structures such as multistable and the like, the result is reliable, the shape finding process does not involve complex structure finite element calculation, and the shape finding efficiency is high.

cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of aerodynamic simulation, in particular to an aircraft unsteady aerodynamic modeling method and system based on a neural network. The method comprises the steps of establishing sample data about unsteady aerodynamic characteristics of an aircraft, selecting characteristic parameters from the sample data to form a data set, normalizing the characteristic parameters, constructing a long-short-time memory neural network model to describe the relation between flight conditions and aerodynamic characteristics of different aeroplanes, optimizing and adjusting super parameters of the long-short-time memory neural network model by adopting a quantum particle swarm optimization algorithm, and training the long-short-time memory neural network model based on the optimized super parameters to obtain an optimized unsteady aerodynamic model of the aircraft. The invention avoids the complex aerodynamic effect decomposition and the traditional mathematical modeling process, reserves the complete characteristics of the unsteady aerodynamic effect, improves the fidelity of the model, and enhances the simulation capability of the aerodynamic model to aerodynamic characteristics.

cited_claim: A core rod penetrating detection method, system and medium comprises the following steps of collecting images of penetrating operation in real time and extracting image data in each frame of image, carrying out mean value removal normalization processing on the image data, establishing a segmentation model based on a convolutional neural network, inputting the processed image data into the segmentation model to obtain a detection target mask image, fitting the detection target mask image with a minimum circumscribed rectangle to obtain a central line of a detection target, calculating a distance value between the central line of the detection target and a track, and comparing the distance value with a preset value to obtain a penetrating detection result.

cited_claim: One or more embodiments of the present application provide a method and apparatus for verifying the trustworthiness of a machine learning model, applied to a proving party, the method comprising obtaining a first verification data set; the method comprises the steps of inputting a first verification data set into a machine learning model, carrying out reasoning calculation on the first verification data set by the machine learning model to obtain a first calculation result, generating first verification data for verifying that the first calculation result is the calculation result of the machine learning model on the basis of a verification generation algorithm in a zero knowledge verification scheme, sending the first verification data to a verifier, so that the verifier carries out zero knowledge verification on the first verification data on the basis of a verification algorithm in the zero knowledge verification scheme, determining that the first calculation result is the calculation result of the machine learning model on the first verification data set when the zero knowledge verification passes, and obtaining a data index for indicating the credibility of the machine learning model, wherein the data index is obtained by carrying out data analysis on the first calculation result.

- **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:

  - 인용 특허의 검증 방법을 변경하여, 다른 형태의 데이터 검증 알고리즘을 사용할 수 있습니다. 예를 들어, 블록체인 기술을 활용한 데이터 검증 방안을 고려할 수 있습니다.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to an optimization method based on a distributed solar photovoltaic power generation control system. The method comprises the steps of collecting generating capacity data, voltage data, current data and solar radiation data, inputting a photovoltaic multi-mode deep learning prediction model for processing to generate an active power adjustment strategy and a reactive power adjustment strategy, generating a control instruction, carrying out hierarchical safety constraint check on the control instruction to generate a remote control instruction and an on-site control instruction, carrying out hierarchical reinforcement learning control and power optimization adjustment on inverters in a plurality of control groups to obtain a group total output value, carrying out real-time monitoring to generate operation parameter data, calculating an active power qualification rate, control response time, control precision and system fluctuation rate, and carrying out multi-objective optimization on an adjustment dead zone range, control gain and response time constant to obtain a target power distribution scheme. The invention ensures reasonable load distribution of each inverter and improves the running stability and reliability of the system.
cited_claim: The invention relates to a communication equipment optimization method and device based on power management. The method comprises the steps of performing delay power domain transformation and minimum mean square error power equalization processing on power consumption data of communication equipment to obtain power consumption characteristic data, inputting a heterogeneous equipment management neural network to conduct power management prediction to obtain equipment power consumption prediction parameters, deploying a virtual power manager, performing power supply response control on a communication base station and a standby power supply to obtain power supply adjustment parameters, constructing an equipment power consumption scheduling matrix, performing equalization optimization on the equipment power consumption scheduling matrix in a blocking iteration mode to obtain a multi-equipment power consumption scheduling scheme, performing power distribution control according to the multi-equipment power consumption scheduling scheme to generate an initial power distribution strategy, and dynamically adjusting the initial power distribution strategy through a three-layer Bayesian network model to obtain a target power distribution strategy. The invention improves the accuracy and the self-adaptive capacity of the power distribution.

anchor_claim: Provided in the present disclosure are a model information transmission method and apparatus, which aim to solve the problem of how to ensure that a UE can use an AI/ML model transferred by a network. The method in the embodiments of the present disclosure comprises: sending model indication information, wherein the model indication information is used for indicating the structure of an artificial intelligence/machine learning (AI/ML) model that is supported by a terminal. By means of model indication information, a network-side device can learn the structure of an AI/ML model that is supported by a terminal, such that the network-side device can subsequently transfer to the terminal a model having the structure of the AI/ML model that is supported by the terminal, thereby enabling the terminal to use the AI/ML model transferred by the network-side device.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a security monitoring system based on a knowledge graph and multi-mode information, and particularly relates to the technical field of network node management, comprising the steps of constructing a deep learning model based on a convolutional neural network, predicting all network node state value sets at the next moment by using the trained deep learning model, and outputting a node state risk index by analyzing a fused fault state category matrix of a network node at the next moment; the method comprises the steps of building a fault processing knowledge graph, inputting fault information into the fault processing knowledge graph, outputting a fault theoretical processing operation, outputting a fault processing performance index by analyzing the fault theoretical processing operation and actual fault processing information, jointly analyzing a node state risk index, the fault processing performance index and a prediction accuracy, outputting a node risk control coefficient, and taking measures based on the relation between the node risk control coefficient and a threshold value to solve the problem that the prior art lacks in predicting node faults in a computer network.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a self-interference suppression method and device for full-duplex communication in the technical field of full-duplex communication. S1, acquiring an input signal and preprocessing the input signal; S2, performing CZT frequency domain conversion on the input signal and outputting a complex spectrum signal c  m  (n), S3, inputting the complex spectrum signal c  m  (n) into an ML-CVNN multi-layer complex-valued neural network, and extracting channel characteristics S4, channel characteristics The input CLDNN network performs channel prediction to obtain a predicted self-interference signal, and S5 subtracts the predicted self-interference signal from the received signal and outputs a received signal r  out  (n). The self-interference suppression method accurately models complex nonlinear characteristics through a complex-valued neural network, captures amplitude and phase characteristics of signals more effectively, improves dynamic channel prediction accuracy and spectrum resolution through a CZT-ML-CVNN architecture, and reduces power spectrum leakage.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent equipment maintenance and discloses a safety control method for intelligent mobile phone maintenance based on big data, which comprises the following steps of 1, data acquisition and preliminary processing, wherein hardware state information and software operation information of equipment are acquired through a diagnosis interface of an intelligent mobile phone, the hardware state information comprises battery health conditions, CPU (Central processing Unit) temperature and sensor performance, the software operation information comprises a system version, an application crash log and an abnormal alarm record, and meanwhile, time stamps of all acquired information are recorded to form a data set. anchor_claim: The invention discloses an extensible communication method based on RIS auxiliary rate division multiple access, which comprises the following steps of establishing an RIS auxiliary multi-device downlink communication system model based on rate division multiple access, transmitting data to a user through the rate division multiple access by a base station, constructing a public data stream and a private data stream, transmitting signals by using a precoding matrix by the base station, receiving the signals by the user after RIS reflection, training a neural network RISnet to learn the mapping from available CSI to a reflective phase shift matrix of the RIS, constructing an objective function to maximize the weighted sum rate of the model, decoding the public data stream and the private data stream independently at a receiving end, and merging information symbols of the public data stream and the private data stream after decoding to reconstruct an original message. The invention expands the transmission range of signals while guaranteeing the communication quality, and solves the problem of high-dimensional expandability caused by a large number of RIS reflecting units.
cited_claim: The invention relates to an analysis method of a high-flow user identification and service upgrading solution, which comprises the steps of collecting a user network activity data sample of a time sequence from a network log and network monitoring equipment, adopting a statistical analysis method to extract main characteristics of user network activity data, judging whether a monitored user is a high-flow user or not from the main characteristics, inputting the main characteristics of the user network activity data into a preset first deep learning model when the monitored user is determined to be the high-flow user, outputting a predicted user behavior mode, inputting the predicted user behavior mode into a preset second deep learning model, predicting future bandwidth requirements and flow peaks, and determining a corresponding network resource configuration scheme according to the future bandwidth requirements and the flow peaks. The invention solves the problem that the network resource allocation is inaccurate because the prior art is difficult to simultaneously meet the requirements of fast and accurately predicting the flow users and the behavior models thereof.
