anchor_claim: The invention relates to an optimization method based on a distributed solar photovoltaic power generation control system. The method comprises the steps of collecting generating capacity data, voltage data, current data and solar radiation data, inputting a photovoltaic multi-mode deep learning prediction model for processing to generate an active power adjustment strategy and a reactive power adjustment strategy, generating a control instruction, carrying out hierarchical safety constraint check on the control instruction to generate a remote control instruction and an on-site control instruction, carrying out hierarchical reinforcement learning control and power optimization adjustment on inverters in a plurality of control groups to obtain a group total output value, carrying out real-time monitoring to generate operation parameter data, calculating an active power qualification rate, control response time, control precision and system fluctuation rate, and carrying out multi-objective optimization on an adjustment dead zone range, control gain and response time constant to obtain a target power distribution scheme. The invention ensures reasonable load distribution of each inverter and improves the running stability and reliability of the system.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a deep learning bandwidth estimation method integrating frequency spectrum priori knowledge, which belongs to the field of wireless communication signal parameter estimation, and specifically comprises the steps of firstly collecting simulation signals of a transmitting end and a receiving end as a group, carrying out frequency bandwidth estimation on each group of simulation signals by using MATLAB, obtaining two-dimensional real number arrays of all signals through IQ two paths, writing an h5 file in combination with the estimated frequency bandwidth to form a simulation radio frequency signal dataset, carrying out frequency spectrum feature extraction on each receiving end simulation signal in the dataset to obtain respective frequency domain amplitude and corresponding frequency, inputting the frequency domain amplitude and the corresponding frequency as a training set to a Roinformer neural network for regression task learning, and finally transmitting the signals by the transmitting end in real time, directly inputting the signals into the learned Roinformer neural network, and directly outputting a corresponding bandwidth estimation value. The invention has obviously reduced error rate in the task of bandwidth estimation, is suitable for the fields of communication signal processing and spectrum analysis, and has wide application value.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the field of network intrusion, in particular to an intelligent network intrusion detection system based on deep learning. The current intelligent network intrusion system lacks of time continuity, is easy to generate false alarm for normal flow, and is too dead for recognition of network intrusion behavior, and lacks of active defense capability. The system comprises a marking module, a monitoring module, a judging module, an analyzing module and a feedback module. When the data exchanged between the host and the network is identified to contain the mark, the data exchange is prevented, key information is effectively prevented from leaking to the network, further invasion is effectively prevented, the network invasion is simplified into a series of specific operations on the data, the network invasion is two-dimensionally performed on a time scale, and the identification effect of the network invasion is improved.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a diffusion source positioning method, and particularly relates to a diffusion source positioning method, a diffusion source positioning device and electronic equipment based on a graph convolution neural network. The method comprises the steps of simulating information diffusion on a network to obtain a plurality of infection chart samples, wherein the network comprises a plurality of nodes, at least part of the nodes are monitor nodes provided with monitors, node characteristic information of all the nodes in the infection chart samples is obtained and used for representing the receiving condition of the nodes on the diffusion information, a diffusion source positioning model to be trained is trained by using the plurality of infection chart samples to obtain the diffusion source positioning model, the diffusion source positioning model comprises a graph roll layer, the input of the diffusion source positioning model is node characteristic information, the output of the diffusion source positioning model is the probability that each node is a source node, and the diffusion source positioning model is used for carrying out diffusion source positioning on the network to be analyzed. The method can improve the accuracy and efficiency of diffusion source positioning.

cited_claim: The invention discloses a household medical equipment information pushing method based on user positioning, which relates to the technical field of household medical equipment information pushing and comprises the following steps of classifying a plurality of pieces of pushing information generated by a household medical equipment information pushing system and establishing an analysis set; and after the comparison set is established, extracting the characteristics of the information in each comparison set. anchor_claim: The invention discloses an intelligent sludge reflux control system of integrated sewage treatment equipment. The invention comprises a human-computer interaction interface, a sludge detection module, a filtering control module, a backflow control module, a sludge parameter prediction module and a data storage module, wherein the sludge detection module comprises pre-filtering and post-filtering detection. The filtering control device adopted by the invention can control the switch of the pump, thereby ensuring that the water quality after filtering meets the required requirement. The sludge parameter prediction module used in the invention adopts a long-short-term memory network algorithm, and the sludge parameter information acquired by the sensor is input into the neural network to predict the sludge parameter obtained after the sewage is repeatedly filtered by the anaerobic tank, thereby achieving the accurate regulation and control of the filtering control device. The invention solves the problems that the existing integrated sewage treatment equipment cannot accurately control the parameters of the sludge content and the process parameters in the using process, so that the efficiency of the treatment process of the integrated sewage treatment equipment is low due to inaccurate parameters in the sludge.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of sewage treatment, in particular to a sewage treatment aeration control method and system, which are used for obtaining an accurate sample data set through intelligent calculation and optimization and correction and eliminating abnormal values according to collected historical data, classifying the accurate sample data set through a clustering model, obtaining a trained BP neural network model through training and verification test of each classification, outputting accurate aeration quantity to control each aeration device according to latest data by a follow-up controller through the BP neural network model, and automatically adjusting the increment/decrement of the air quantity of a biochemical pool.

cited_claim: The invention discloses an intelligent sludge reflux control system of integrated sewage treatment equipment. The invention comprises a human-computer interaction interface, a sludge detection module, a filtering control module, a backflow control module, a sludge parameter prediction module and a data storage module, wherein the sludge detection module comprises pre-filtering and post-filtering detection. The filtering control device adopted by the invention can control the switch of the pump, thereby ensuring that the water quality after filtering meets the required requirement. The sludge parameter prediction module used in the invention adopts a long-short-term memory network algorithm, and the sludge parameter information acquired by the sensor is input into the neural network to predict the sludge parameter obtained after the sewage is repeatedly filtered by the anaerobic tank, thereby achieving the accurate regulation and control of the filtering control device. The invention solves the problems that the existing integrated sewage treatment equipment cannot accurately control the parameters of the sludge content and the process parameters in the using process, so that the efficiency of the treatment process of the integrated sewage treatment equipment is low due to inaccurate parameters in the sludge.

anchor_claim: The application provides a cervical spine canal stenosis diagnosis method, a cervical spine canal stenosis diagnosis system, a cervical spine canal stenosis diagnosis device and a cervical spine canal stenosis diagnosis device based on deep learning. The cervical spine canal stenosis diagnosis method based on deep learning comprises the steps of obtaining cervical spine X-ray images of a patient, inputting the cervical spine X-ray images into a preset cervical spine canal stenosis diagnosis model, and outputting cervical spine stenosis diagnosis results, wherein labels of the cervical spine X-ray images in training data sets of the cervical spine canal stenosis diagnosis model are determined according to cervical spine stenosis diagnosis results of corresponding cervical spine MR images. According to the embodiment of the application, the cervical spine stenosis can be more accurately diagnosed based on the X-ray image.
cited_claim: A wearable device for real-time monitoring and predicting epileptic seizures. The wearable device comprises a plurality of dry Electroencephalogram (EEG) electrodes to capture EEG signals of a subject. The wearable device further comprises a neuromorphic computing unit configured to analyse the captured EEG signals in real-time using neural network models trained on epileptic seizure data to detect abnormalities in brain activity of the subject. These abnormalities indicate preictal phase of epileptic seizure. The wearable device further comprises an alert mechanism to notify the subject upon detection of abnormalities in brain activity.

anchor_claim: The application provides a cervical vertebra degeneration intelligent diagnosis method, a system, equipment and a computer readable storage medium based on deep learning. The intelligent diagnosis method for cervical vertebra degeneration based on deep learning comprises the steps of obtaining cervical vertebra side X-ray images, inputting the cervical vertebra side X-ray images into a preset intelligent diagnosis model for cervical vertebra degeneration, and outputting diagnosis results for cervical vertebra degeneration, wherein the diagnosis results for cervical vertebra degeneration comprise normal, narrow intervertebral space, physiological curvature change and osteophytes, and the physiological curvature change comprises normal physiological radian, physiological radian straightening and physiological radian reverse bow. According to the embodiment of the application, cervical vertebra degeneration diagnosis can be more accurately performed.
cited_claim: The application discloses an electroencephalogram signal processing method and device based on artificial intelligence, edge computing equipment and medium, and belongs to the technical field of signal processing. The method comprises the steps of collecting an electroencephalogram signal of a target object, decomposing the electroencephalogram signal into a plurality of statistically independent signal components through blind source separation, inputting the plurality of signal components into a preset neural network model to obtain categories of the signal components output by the neural network model, and combining the signal components with the categories of effective electroencephalogram signals to obtain the electroencephalogram signal after noise reduction. The embodiment of the application fully utilizes the blind source separation and machine learning algorithm, and greatly improves the accuracy and efficiency of electroencephalogram signal processing.

anchor_claim: The application discloses a sleep quality analysis method, a device, equipment and a storage medium, wherein the method comprises the steps of collecting brain wave data, body movement data and snore data when a user is in a sleep state; extracting the brain wave data, the body movement data and the characteristic data of the snore data to generate a characteristic data set, inputting the characteristic data set into a pre-trained sleep analysis model to predict, generating a sleep analysis result of the user, and generating a sleep quality report of the user based on the sleep analysis result. The application extracts key characteristics by collecting various physiological data and predicts and analyzes by using a machine learning algorithm so as to improve the accuracy of sleep quality analysis of a user.
cited_claim: The invention provides a neural network-based heart function auxiliary analysis system, which belongs to the technical field of heart assistance and comprises a preprocessing module, a waveform identification module, a three-dimensional reconstruction module, a calculation module and an auxiliary reminding module, wherein the preprocessing module is used for preprocessing a heart ultrasonic image, the waveform identification module is used for carrying out waveform detection and multi-scale feature identification on a waveform curve in the preprocessed ultrasonic image, locating peaks and valleys of the waveform, identifying a diastolic frame and a systolic frame in a heart ultrasonic period, the three-dimensional reconstruction module is used for carrying out three-dimensional reconstruction on a heart region by using a deep learning technology, the calculation module is used for calculating the volume and ejection fraction of a left ventricle according to the reconstructed heart region, and the auxiliary reminding module is used for carrying out outlier verification and removal on ejection fraction obtained in a plurality of periods by an outlier removal algorithm to obtain accurate values and outputting heart function information of a patient to carry out auxiliary reminding. The heart function condition of the patient can be accurately reflected, a precise basis is provided for auxiliary reminding, and effective support is provided for clinical diagnosis.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to a child sleep stage method for acquiring brain electrical signals based on a head band electrode, which belongs to the technical field of sleep stage and solves the problems of poor comfort and coordination degree when a traditional polysomnography monitoring device is applied to a child, and comprises the steps of constructing a Web client and a server; the method comprises the steps of collecting electroencephalogram signals of a plurality of children to be tested by the head electrode equipment, carrying out denoising pretreatment on the electroencephalogram signals by adopting a novel wavelet threshold denoising strategy based on EMD at a server end to obtain sleep electroencephalogram data, carrying out data segmentation and rejection on the data, constructing a time-frequency characteristic diagram, training and testing a multi-view hybrid neural network model to obtain a children sleep stage model, carrying out children sleep stage by utilizing the model, and displaying the children sleep stage result by a Web client. The invention can improve the comfort and the coordination degree of children in the data acquisition process, improve the signal quality, and effectively improve the classification accuracy and the model performance of the sleep stage model of the children.
cited_claim: The application provides a cervical vertebra degeneration intelligent diagnosis method, a system, equipment and a computer readable storage medium based on deep learning. The intelligent diagnosis method for cervical vertebra degeneration based on deep learning comprises the steps of obtaining cervical vertebra side X-ray images, inputting the cervical vertebra side X-ray images into a preset intelligent diagnosis model for cervical vertebra degeneration, and outputting diagnosis results for cervical vertebra degeneration, wherein the diagnosis results for cervical vertebra degeneration comprise normal, narrow intervertebral space, physiological curvature change and osteophytes, and the physiological curvature change comprises normal physiological radian, physiological radian straightening and physiological radian reverse bow. According to the embodiment of the application, cervical vertebra degeneration diagnosis can be more accurately performed.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to a child sleep stage method for acquiring brain electrical signals based on a head band electrode, which belongs to the technical field of sleep stage and solves the problems of poor comfort and coordination degree when a traditional polysomnography monitoring device is applied to a child, and comprises the steps of constructing a Web client and a server; the method comprises the steps of collecting electroencephalogram signals of a plurality of children to be tested by the head electrode equipment, carrying out denoising pretreatment on the electroencephalogram signals by adopting a novel wavelet threshold denoising strategy based on EMD at a server end to obtain sleep electroencephalogram data, carrying out data segmentation and rejection on the data, constructing a time-frequency characteristic diagram, training and testing a multi-view hybrid neural network model to obtain a children sleep stage model, carrying out children sleep stage by utilizing the model, and displaying the children sleep stage result by a Web client. The invention can improve the comfort and the coordination degree of children in the data acquisition process, improve the signal quality, and effectively improve the classification accuracy and the model performance of the sleep stage model of the children.
cited_claim: An information processing unit includes a Doppler measurement section that generates Doppler measurement information based on a reception Doppler signal output from a wall filter, and a machine learning model constructed based on training information and target information. The training information is information obtained from K reception Doppler signals. The target information is information obtained from J reception Doppler signals for the same measurement target object as that obtained from the K reception Doppler signals. Here, J and K are integers of 2 or more, and J is greater than K. The machine learning model generates the Doppler measurement information based on input information. The input information is information generated from the K reception Doppler signals for a measurement target object in a subject.

anchor_claim: The present disclosure provides an operating method of an identification and prognosis system, which includes steps as follows. The pre-process is performed on the EEG to obtain the pre-processed EEG; the pre-processed EEG is split into a plurality of different frequency band EEGs; a variety of brain functional connectivity features and a variety of power features are extracted from the different frequency band EEGs; the variety of brain functional connectivity features and the variety of power features are used for a machine learning to obtain an identification and prognosis model.
cited_claim: The invention relates to a method for generating an ECG signal from a PPG signal and a trained machine learning model comprising: ■ a first acquisition (ACQ 1 ) of a first signal (S 1 ), referred to as PPG signal, by means of a sensor arranged on a device for acquiring the signal which is in contact with the skin of an individual in order to measure the variations in the pulsatile blood volume; ■ segmenting (SEG 1 ) the first signal (S 1 ); ■ using a trained machine learning model to produce a second segmented signal of an ECG from an input vector comprising the data from one cycle of a first PPG signal; ■ recombining the segments produced in order to reconstruct a continuous ECG signal based on: o detecting two consecutive ECG markers of the second signal present in each cycle of the second signal; o reconstructing the ECG signal by concatenating the segments from the time markers.

anchor_claim: In an embodiment, a computer-implemented method for decoding neural activity is provided. In the method, at least one machine learning model is trained using a training data set of EEG data and concurrently collected environmental data collected from data collection participants. Once the at least one machine learning model is trained, EEG data measured from sensors attached to or near a user's head is received. Environmental data describing stimulus the user is exposed to concurrently with the measurement of the EEG data is also received. The EEG data and the environmental data is input into the at least one machine learning model to determine an inference related to the neural activity. Based on the inference, an operation of a computer program is altered.
cited_claim: The application discloses an electroencephalogram signal processing method and device based on artificial intelligence, edge computing equipment and medium, and belongs to the technical field of signal processing. The method comprises the steps of collecting an electroencephalogram signal of a target object, decomposing the electroencephalogram signal into a plurality of statistically independent signal components through blind source separation, inputting the plurality of signal components into a preset neural network model to obtain categories of the signal components output by the neural network model, and combining the signal components with the categories of effective electroencephalogram signals to obtain the electroencephalogram signal after noise reduction. The embodiment of the application fully utilizes the blind source separation and machine learning algorithm, and greatly improves the accuracy and efficiency of electroencephalogram signal processing.

  2. **신호 처리 방식 변경:** 인용 특허의 블라인드 소스 분리 방법 대신 다른 신호 처리 기법(예: 주파수 분석, 웨이브렛 변환 등)을 사용할 수 있습니다.

- **대안적 기술 접근법:**
  1. **다른 생체 신호 활용:** EEG 데이터 대신 다른 생체 신호(예: 심박수, 피부 전도도 등)를 활용하여 신경 활동을 추정하는 방법을 개발할 수 있습니다.
  2. **비지도 학습 기법 적용:** 지도 학습 대신 비지도 학습 기법을 활용하여 EEG 데이터를 처리하고 분석하는 방법을 모색할 수 있습니다.

이러한 분석을 통해 원본 특허와 인용 특허 간의 유사성을 평가하고, 침해 리스크를 최소화하기 위한 전략을 수립할 수 있습니다.

anchor_claim: The application discloses an electroencephalogram signal processing method and device based on artificial intelligence, edge computing equipment and medium, and belongs to the technical field of signal processing. The method comprises the steps of collecting an electroencephalogram signal of a target object, decomposing the electroencephalogram signal into a plurality of statistically independent signal components through blind source separation, inputting the plurality of signal components into a preset neural network model to obtain categories of the signal components output by the neural network model, and combining the signal components with the categories of effective electroencephalogram signals to obtain the electroencephalogram signal after noise reduction. The embodiment of the application fully utilizes the blind source separation and machine learning algorithm, and greatly improves the accuracy and efficiency of electroencephalogram signal processing.
cited_claim: A wearable device for real-time monitoring and predicting epileptic seizures. The wearable device comprises a plurality of dry Electroencephalogram (EEG) electrodes to capture EEG signals of a subject. The wearable device further comprises a neuromorphic computing unit configured to analyse the captured EEG signals in real-time using neural network models trained on epileptic seizure data to detect abnormalities in brain activity of the subject. These abnormalities indicate preictal phase of epileptic seizure. The wearable device further comprises an alert mechanism to notify the subject upon detection of abnormalities in brain activity.

query:

청구항을 비교 분석하세요. 유사도, 침해 리스크, 회피 전략을 포함해서 답변해주세요.
anchor_claim: The application discloses a deep learning-based high-precision MEMS clock taming method and circuit, which are characterized in that a satellite second pulse signal and a 1Hz clock signal are acquired, a phase difference digital signal is obtained based on the satellite second pulse signal and the 1Hz clock signal, a predicted time-frequency signal is obtained by inputting the phase difference digital signal into a preset clock taming deep learning network, the time-frequency signal is used for controlling an MEMS resonator to generate the 1Hz clock signal if the fluctuation value of the satellite second pulse signal is larger than a preset threshold value, otherwise, the MEMS resonator is controlled to generate the 1Hz clock signal based on the phase difference digital signal.
cited_claim: The application discloses a time synchronization method of a main and standby channel of a time-frequency system, which comprises the steps of measuring main and standby clock differences, carrying out primary synchronization on the frequency and the phase of the main and standby channel, predicting a main and standby clock difference sequence of a next adjustment period by using a BP neural network optimized by a genetic algorithm, calculating a frequency compensation quantity, dividing the main and standby clock differences at the last moment of the current adjustment period by the current adjustment period to be used as a phase compensation quantity, and compensating the frequency compensation quantity and the phase compensation quantity to a standby channel signal. An apparatus is also disclosed. The data predicted by the BP neural network optimized by the genetic algorithm is applied to the clock frequency control of a time-frequency system, the problem that a prediction model structure needs to be determined in advance and the self-adaptability is poor in the traditional clock error prediction method is solved, and the frequency and phase dynamic and high-precision compensation of the standby signal is realized.

- **핵심 공통 기술 요소**:

  - MEMS(미세 전자 기계 시스템) 및 시계 신호의 정확한 조정과 관련된 기술을 다루고 있습니다.
  - 두 특허 모두 신호의 주파수 및 위상 조정에 중점을 두고 있으며, 예측 모델을 사용하여 동기화를 개선하는 방법을 제시하고 있습니다.

###

[침해 리스크]
- 리스크 수준: high
- 위험 요소: **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성**: 중간, 원본 특허는 MEMS 시계 조정에 대한 특정한 방법론을 제시하고 있으며, 인용 특허는 주 및 보조 채널 간의 동기화 방법을 다루고 있습니다. 두 특허의 기술적 요소가 유사하지만, 적용되는 시스템과 방법론에서 차이가 있습니다., **위험 요소 식별**:
- **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성**: 중간
  - 원본 특허는 MEMS 시계 조정에 대한 특정한 방법론을 제시하고 있으며, 인용 특허는 주 및 보조 채널 간의 동기화 방법을 다루고 있습니다. 두 특허의 기술적 요소가 유사하지만, 적용되는 시스템과 방법론에서 차이가 있습니다.
- **위험 요소 식별**:
  - 두 특허 모두 딥러닝 및 신호 예측을 사용하지만, 원본 특허는 MEMS에 특화된 반면, 인용 특허는 일반적인 시계 동기화에 중점을 두고 있습니다. 이로 인해 특정 구현 방식에서의 침해 가능성이 존재할 수 있습니다.
  - 특히, 예측 모델의 구조와 방법론이 유사할 경우, 법적 분쟁의 가능성이 높아질 수 있습니다.

- 대안적 접근: **대안적 기술 접근법**:
- **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:
  - MEMS 대신 다른 기술(예: Quartz Oscillator 또는 다른 유형의 시계 시스템)을 사용하여 원본 특허의 특정 구현을 회피할 수 있습니다.
  - 딥러닝 모델의 구조를 변경하거나, 다른 예측 알고리즘(예: SVM, Random Forest 등)을 사용하여 기술적 차별성을 확보할 수 있습니다.
- **대안적 기술 접근법**:
  - 기존의 딥러닝 기반 접근법 대신, 전통적인 제어 이론(예: PID 제어기)을 활용하여 시계 동기화 문제를 해결할 수 있습니다.
  - 또한, 다른 신호 처리 기법(예: Kalman 필터링)을 도입하여 예측 및 보상 과정을 개선할 수 있습니다.

이 분석을 통해, 두 특허 간의 기술적 유사성과 침해 리스크를 평가하고, 회피 전략을 제시함으로써 향후 개발 및 연구 방향을 설정하는 데 도움이 될 것입니다.

anchor_claim: The application discloses a time synchronization method of a main and standby channel of a time-frequency system, which comprises the steps of measuring main and standby clock differences, carrying out primary synchronization on the frequency and the phase of the main and standby channel, predicting a main and standby clock difference sequence of a next adjustment period by using a BP neural network optimized by a genetic algorithm, calculating a frequency compensation quantity, dividing the main and standby clock differences at the last moment of the current adjustment period by the current adjustment period to be used as a phase compensation quantity, and compensating the frequency compensation quantity and the phase compensation quantity to a standby channel signal. An apparatus is also disclosed. The data predicted by the BP neural network optimized by the genetic algorithm is applied to the clock frequency control of a time-frequency system, the problem that a prediction model structure needs to be determined in advance and the self-adaptability is poor in the traditional clock error prediction method is solved, and the frequency and phase dynamic and high-precision compensation of the standby signal is realized.
cited_claim: The invention provides a link power control method and a link power control system of a coherent optical wavelength division multiplexing transmission system, which comprise the steps of building the coherent optical wavelength division multiplexing transmission simulation system, configuring the transmitting power of each channel in the wavelength division multiplexing system, taking the initial state of the transmitting power as the input of an executive neural network, obtaining the adjusting values of the transmitting power of different channels, calculating the transmitting power of the channels through the initial state and the transmitting power adjusting values, configuring the attenuation of each channel of a wavelength selective switch in the wavelength division multiplexing system, taking the initial state of the wavelength selective switch as the input of the executive neural network, obtaining the adjusting values of the attenuation of the wavelength selective switch, and calculating the transmitting power of the channels through the initial state and the attenuation adjusting values. The invention is based on a deep reinforcement learning algorithm, and realizes the optimal configuration of power in a link by adjusting the transmitting power of different channels in a coherent optical wavelength division multiplexing system and the attenuation of different channels in a wavelength selective switch, thereby optimizing the communication quality of each channel at a receiving end after transmission.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of machine learning, in particular to a multi-module-based inflatable cabinet combination method and system, comprising the following steps: the method comprises the steps of establishing an inflatable cabinet combination unit, carrying out load detection to obtain a load data set, detecting the ambient temperature and the ambient humidity to obtain an ambient temperature set and an ambient humidity set, carrying out electricity price acquisition to obtain an electricity price data set, constructing a load mapping function, calculating a load predicted value, constructing a distance matrix, a function matrix and an offset matrix, calculating space matching degree based on the distance matrix, the function matrix and the offset matrix, calculating a maintenance expected value, constructing a comprehensive objective function, calculating a comprehensive fitness set based on the comprehensive objective function and a combination scheme, extracting maximum fitness based on the comprehensive fitness set, carrying out matching based on the maximum fitness, and obtaining an optimal combination scheme to complete the inflatable cabinet combination. The invention can improve the stability and the operation efficiency of the multi-module lower air charging cabinet.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a highway service area heating and ventilation control method based on the Internet of things and a neural network, which comprises the steps of dividing an area in a building of a target service area according to functions, deploying sensors of the Internet of things in each functional area for acquiring environment data, heating and ventilation equipment parameters and people flow distribution data, acquiring in-out vehicle information at an entrance of the target service area, acquiring the number of in-out people at an entrance of each functional area, taking the people flow distribution data, the vehicle information and the number of in-out people in the current service area and the previous service area as a first data set, inputting the people flow prediction neural network to generate corresponding people flow prediction data, taking the environment data, the heating and ventilation equipment parameters, the people flow distribution data and the people flow prediction data of the current service area as a second data set, inputting a control strategy, outputting a control strategy of each group heating and ventilation equipment of the current service area in a future preset time period by the neural network, and controlling each group heating and ventilation equipment in the future preset time period according to the control strategy.
cited_claim: The invention provides a secondary water supply intelligent regulation and control method and system, wherein a corresponding twin model is built based on connection relations of all devices in a secondary water supply system, the twin model at least comprises a water tank twin module, a pipeline twin module and an auxiliary device twin module, a plurality of water supply twin paths are obtained by dividing the twin model based on the water tank twin module, first state information is obtained by obtaining the working state of each twin module in the twin model, water quality information and water flow information are detected and processed based on corresponding multi-mode Internet of things acquisition equipment in each water tank twin module, multi-mode detection information is obtained, the multi-mode detection information is input into a preconfigured regulation and control neural network, the analysis processing is sequentially calculated and processed based on neurons in the regulation and control neural network, an intelligent regulation and control strategy of the secondary water supply system is obtained, regulation and control information of each module in the twin model is generated based on the intelligent regulation and control strategy, and control processing is carried out on corresponding entity equipment, and water supply efficiency of users is improved.

cited_claim: The invention discloses an intelligent grain supply and demand management method and system based on big data, and relates to the technical field of grain supply and demand management. anchor_claim: The invention provides a self-adaptive regulation lamp system, which relates to the technical field of lamp systems and comprises an integrated control module, a photoelectric energy acquisition module, a dynamic light management module, a multi-area light source module and a wireless communication module, wherein a self-adaptive illumination optimization algorithm based on deep learning in the integrated control module is adopted to analyze environmental light change, a user behavior mode and historical use data in real time, and automatically adjust the brightness and color temperature of the lamp, so that the lamp can be intelligently adapted to different environments and user requirements, more personalized and comfortable illumination experience is provided, the dynamic light management module comprises a high-precision spectrum analysis unit, spectral components with different wavelengths can be detected and analyzed, and the best illumination effect under a specific scene is realized by combining a fuzzy logic and a light distribution model.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of semiconductor light emitting diodes, and provides a method, a device and equipment for monitoring the temperature of a high-brightness light source in real time, wherein the method comprises the steps of collecting the spectrum of the output light of the high-brightness light source to obtain real-time spectrum data and a corresponding time mark, and predicting the temperature of the real-time spectrum data to obtain a current temperature value and prediction confidence; comparing the current temperature value with a preset threshold value to obtain a temperature deviation value, adjusting and monitoring the driving current of the high-brightness light source according to the temperature deviation value and the prediction confidence coefficient to obtain real-time working state data and a temperature change trend, and performing parameter adjustment on the deep learning model to obtain an updated deep learning model. Based on the updated deep learning model, the temperature prediction is carried out on the subsequent real-time spectrum data, so that the high-efficiency and accurate temperature monitoring is realized, and the problems that in the practical application, the accuracy is low, the response speed is low and the sensor is easy to damage in the use process of the temperature sensor are solved.

- **기술적 유사성 점수**: 65
- **핵심 공통 기술 요소**:
  - **딥러닝**: 두 특허 모두 딥러닝 알고리즘을 활용하여 데이터를 분석하고 최적화를 수행합니다. 원본 특허는 조명 시스템의 밝기와 색온도를 조절하는 데 사용하며, 인용 특허는 고휘도 광원의 온도를 예측하는 데 사용합니다.
  - **스펙트럼 분석**: 두 특허 모두 스펙트럼 데이터를 수집하고 분석하는 기능을 포함하고 있습니다. 원본 특허는 조명 최적화를 위해 스펙트럼 분석을 수행하고, 인용 특허는 온도 모니터링을 위해 스펙트럼 데이터를 수집합니다.
  - **실시간 데이터 처리**: 두 특허 모두 실시간으로 데이터를 수집하고 처리하여 최적의 결과를 도출하는 시스템을 구현하고 있습니다.

###

[침해 리스크]
- 리스크 수준: high
- 위험 요소: **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성**: 중간 수준의 침해 리스크가 존재합니다. 원본 특허의 딥러닝 기반 조명 조절 시스템이 인용 특허의 온도 모니터링 시스템과 기술적으로 유사하지만, 두 시스템의 목적과 적용 분야가 다르기 때문에 직접적인 침해 가능성은 낮습니다., **위험 요소 식별**:, **기술적 유사성**: 두 특허의 딥러닝 및 스펙트럼 분석 기술이 유사하여, 특정 구현 방식에 따라 침해 리스크가 발생할 수 있습니다.
- **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성**: 중간 수준의 침해 리스크가 존재합니다. 원본 특허의 딥러닝 기반 조명 조절 시스템이 인용 특허의 온도 모니터링 시스템과 기술적으로 유사하지만, 두 시스템의 목적과 적용 분야가 다르기 때문에 직접적인 침해 가능성은 낮습니다.
- **위험 요소 식별**:
  - **기술적 유사성**: 두 특허의 딥러닝 및 스펙트럼 분석 기술이 유사하여, 특정 구현 방식에 따라 침해 리스크가 발생할 수 있습니다.
  - **시장 경쟁**: 두 기술이 동일한 시장(스마트 조명 및 조명 제어 시스템)에서 경쟁할 경우, 특허 침해 소송의 가능성이 높아질 수 있습니다.

###

[회피 전략]
- 설계 변경: **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:, **딥러닝 모델 변경**: 원본 특허의 딥러닝 모델을 변경하거나, 다른 알고리즘(예: 전통적인 머신러닝 기법)을 사용하여 조명 최적화를 수행할 수 있습니다., **스펙트럼 분석 방식 변경**: 스펙트럼 분석을 위한 다른 센서나 방법론을 도입하여, 인용 특허와의 기술적 유사성을 줄일 수 있습니다.
- 대안적 접근: **대안적 기술 접근법**:
- **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:
  - **딥러닝 모델 변경**: 원본 특허의 딥러닝 모델을 변경하거나, 다른 알고리즘(예: 전통적인 머신러닝 기법)을 사용하여 조명 최적화를 수행할 수 있습니다.
  - **스펙트럼 분석 방식 변경**: 스펙트럼 분석을 위한 다른 센서나 방법론을 도입하여, 인용 특허와의 기술적 유사성을 줄일 수 있습니다.
  
- **대안적 기술 접근법**:
  - **비딥러닝 기반 접근**: 딥러닝 대신 규칙 기반 시스템이나 전통적인 제어 알고리즘을 사용하여 조명 조절을 구현할 수 있습니다.
  - **다른 데이터 소스 활용**: 환경 변화나 사용자 행동을 분석하기 위해 다른 데이터 소스(예: IoT 센서 데이터)를 활용하여, 기존 특허와의 기술적 유사성을 피할 수 있습니다.

이러한 분석을 통해 두 특허 간의 기술적 유사성과 침해 리스크를 평가하고, 회피 전략을 수립하여 안전한 기술 개발을 진행할 수 있습니다.

query:
특허 CN-119364583-A의 청구항과 선행특허 CN-119325166-A의 
청구항을 비교 분석하세요. 유사도, 침해 리스크, 회피 전략을 포함해서 답변해주세요.
anchor_claim: The invention discloses an intelligent artificial lighting method based on multi-sensing information, which comprises the following steps of collecting environmental data and human physiological data, processing the environmental data and the human physiological data to obtain the preprocessed environmental data and the preprocessed human physiological data, carrying out fusion processing on the preprocessed environmental data and the preprocessed human physiological data by adopting an improved Kalman filtering algorithm, inputting the fused data into an optimized BP neural network for training to obtain a lighting control model, generating a corresponding lighting strategy according to the environmental data and the human physiological data through the lighting control model, and generating the lighting strategy into a control signal to drive an LED lamp module. According to the invention, the Kalman filtering algorithm is improved to process the data acquired by the multi-sensor module, so that the module can adaptively cope with the noise environment with complex changes, the filtering precision is obviously improved, and the accurate data input is provided for the next decision-making data fusion.
cited_claim: The application discloses a city illumination control method, a city illumination control system and a storage medium based on distributed illumination, wherein the method comprises the steps of dividing a city preset illumination area, collecting illumination and meteorological data of each illumination subarea, analyzing the illumination data and generating a city real-time illumination field, comparing whether the illumination of each illumination subarea is lower than a corresponding area illumination preset illumination threshold value to determine illumination subareas to be regulated and controlled, distinguishing adjacent or independent illumination subareas, correspondingly generating a first regulation instruction for each independent illumination subarea to complete illumination subarea illumination regulation, clustering the adjacent illumination subareas and determining a linkage area, acquiring illumination compensation values of adjacent areas in the linkage area by utilizing an illumination compensation neural network model, acquiring a linkage area illumination regulation scheme by utilizing a multi-objective optimization algorithm and generating a second regulation instruction to complete linkage area illumination regulation control. The application can realize the fine management of urban illumination.

anchor_claim: The application discloses an intelligent control system and method of a music fountain based on intelligent tourism, which captures and learns geographic distribution characteristics of tourist positions by adopting an artificial intelligence based deep learning algorithm and a computer vision technology, introduces a global context significance strengthening module to strengthen expression of the geographic distribution characteristics, clusters and fuses the strengthened tourist geographic distribution characteristics by utilizing a reverse mask mechanism so as to form comprehensive representation of the tourist geographic distribution characteristics, and finally uses a classifier to construct a performance mode determiner to intelligently determine a performance mode of the fountain according to real-time geographic position information of the tourist.
cited_claim: The invention provides a self-adaptive regulation lamp system, which relates to the technical field of lamp systems and comprises an integrated control module, a photoelectric energy acquisition module, a dynamic light management module, a multi-area light source module and a wireless communication module, wherein a self-adaptive illumination optimization algorithm based on deep learning in the integrated control module is adopted to analyze environmental light change, a user behavior mode and historical use data in real time, and automatically adjust the brightness and color temperature of the lamp, so that the lamp can be intelligently adapted to different environments and user requirements, more personalized and comfortable illumination experience is provided, the dynamic light management module comprises a high-precision spectrum analysis unit, spectral components with different wavelengths can be detected and analyzed, and the best illumination effect under a specific scene is realized by combining a fuzzy logic and a light distribution model.

cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of optical lenses and discloses an N-in-one freeform street lamp lens design method and a lens convenient for operation and maintenance, wherein the method comprises the steps of determining the lighting requirement of a target lighting scene, generating first lighting requirement data, acquiring historical lens design parameters and historical lighting effect data of a plurality of LED street lamp lighting projects, generating second historical optimization data, establishing a mapping model between the freeform parameters and the lighting effects through a machine learning algorithm based on the second historical optimization data, generating an initial freeform surface, carrying out region division and optimization, and finally obtaining an optimized lens scheme, wherein the lens comprises a central region, a transition region and an edge region, and generating a final design scheme through simulation verification and test optimization.

The application can realize the fine management of urban illumination.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of semiconductor light emitting diodes, and provides a method, a device and equipment for monitoring the temperature of a high-brightness light source in real time, wherein the method comprises the steps of collecting the spectrum of the output light of the high-brightness light source to obtain real-time spectrum data and a corresponding time mark, and predicting the temperature of the real-time spectrum data to obtain a current temperature value and prediction confidence; comparing the current temperature value with a preset threshold value to obtain a temperature deviation value, adjusting and monitoring the driving current of the high-brightness light source according to the temperature deviation value and the prediction confidence coefficient to obtain real-time working state data and a temperature change trend, and performing parameter adjustment on the deep learning model to obtain an updated deep learning model. Based on the updated deep learning model, the temperature prediction is carried out on the subsequent real-time spectrum data, so that the high-efficiency and accurate temperature monitoring is realized, and the problems that in the practical application, the accuracy is low, the response speed is low and the sensor is easy to damage in the use process of the temperature sensor are solved.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of optical lenses and discloses an N-in-one freeform street lamp lens design method and a lens convenient for operation and maintenance, wherein the method comprises the steps of determining the lighting requirement of a target lighting scene, generating first lighting requirement data, acquiring historical lens design parameters and historical lighting effect data of a plurality of LED street lamp lighting projects, generating second historical optimization data, establishing a mapping model between the freeform parameters and the lighting effects through a machine learning algorithm based on the second historical optimization data, generating an initial freeform surface, carrying out region division and optimization, and finally obtaining an optimized lens scheme, wherein the lens comprises a central region, a transition region and an edge region, and generating a final design scheme through simulation verification and test optimization.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of new pollution monitoring, in particular to a non-targeted screening and identifying compound concentration method based on machine learning. anchor_claim: The invention discloses an atomic interaction information prediction method, a storage medium and equipment based on a machine learning potential function, relates to the field of artificial intelligence and new energy, and in particular relates to the atomic interaction information prediction method, the storage medium and the equipment. The invention aims to solve the problem that the accuracy and the efficiency are difficult to be considered when the atomic interaction information is acquired by the existing method. The atomic interaction information prediction method based on the machine learning potential function comprises the specific processes of firstly obtaining an initial data set, expanding the initial data set to obtain a comprehensive data set which finally covers a bulk phase and a surface structure, secondly training the machine learning potential function MLP based on the comprehensive data set to obtain a trained machine learning potential function MLP, thirdly predicting atoms of lithium metal, silicon and lithiated silicon to be detected based on the trained machine learning potential function MLP, and outputting the atomic interaction information of the atoms of lithium metal, silicon and lithiated silicon, wherein the interaction information is energy and stress.
cited_claim: The application discloses a high-throughput screening method, a device, equipment, a storage medium and a product of molecules, which relate to the technical field of organic materials and comprise the steps of obtaining a molecular orbit descriptor of the molecules to be screened; the molecular orbit descriptors are input into a preset prediction model, the energy level difference of the molecules to be screened is predicted, the preset prediction model takes the molecular orbit descriptors of the D-A-D molecules of each sample as input, takes the energy level difference of the D-A-D molecules of each sample as output, trains a basic machine learning model to obtain, and screens target molecules meeting preset ranks from the molecules to be screened based on the ranking of the energy level differences from large to small. The hybridization part in the D-A-D molecules is simplified by acquiring the molecular orbit descriptors of the molecules to be screened, the difficulty in screening the molecules according to the hybridization part is reduced, the screening accuracy is improved by utilizing a preset prediction model, and the high-throughput screening efficiency of the molecules is improved.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a plant oil detection method based on the combination of DESI-MS and a neural network, which comprises the following steps: collecting a sample, performing DESI-MS analysis, collecting lipid fingerprints, and completing sample detection and confirming sample types based on neural network analysis and evaluation. The invention establishes a lipid fingerprint analysis method based on a DESI-MS combined SCNN machine learning model, which is specially used for analyzing glyceride and realizing high-precision classification and identification of various vegetable oils. The invention combines the SCNN model with the DESI-MS technology and optimizes the SCNN model to be specially used for detecting the edible vegetable oil, and has the advantages of convenient and quick detection and high detection precision.
cited_claim: The invention belongs to the field of bioinformatics, and relates to a molecular property prediction method based on local graph characteristics and global relations, which comprises deep learning, contrast learning, graph neural networks and other technologies. First, data processing is performed, input data is prepared, and an initial representation of a molecular diagram is constructed. And secondly, extracting local features of the molecular diagram through a local topological structure feature network, and focusing on local information of atoms and adjacent relations thereof in the molecule. And then, global feature extraction is carried out on the molecular graph by using a global attention network, and global dependency relations and long-range interactions among molecules are captured. And finally, combining the local features and the global features through feature fusion, and carrying out final prediction. The method can pay attention to the details of the local structure inside the molecule and capture the global interrelationship among the molecules through a double-branch network architecture, so that more comprehensive and accurate characteristic representation is provided for the prediction of the molecular attribute.

  - DESI-MS 분석을 다른 분석 기술(예: GC-MS, LC-MS 등)으로 대체하여 고유한 분석 방법을 개발할 수 있습니다.
  
- **대안적 기술 접근법**:

  - 데이터의 지역적 및 전역적 특성을 동시에 고려하는 새로운 모델 아키텍처를 설계하여, 기존 특허와의 유사성을 줄이는 방향으로 연구를 진행할 수 있습니다.

이 분석을 통해 두 특허 간의 기술적 유사성과 침해 리스크를 평가하고, 회피 전략을 제시하였습니다. 각 전략은 특허의 독창성을 유지하면서도 법적 리스크를 최소화하는 방향으로 설정되었습니다.

anchor_claim: The invention provides a compound-protein interaction prediction method integrating a gating mechanism and contrast learning, which comprises the following steps of firstly extracting characteristics of an amino acid sequence and compound molecules through a coding layer, segmenting the amino acid sequence by adopting an n-gram method to reserve local sequence characteristics, capturing order and long-term dependence in the sequence through a long-term memory network (LSTM), obtaining richer sequence representation, extracting atomic characteristic and molecular structure information of the compound molecules through a Graph Neural Network (GNN), fully capturing topological relation and local structure in a molecular graph, then fusing the extracted characteristics through a gating mechanism (GATE MECHANISM), effectively filtering redundant information by a model, reserving key characteristics, enhancing the accuracy of characteristic expression, introducing contrast learning (Contrastive Learning) on the basis, further improving the distinguishing capability of the model through contrast learning of similar and dissimilar samples, enabling the interaction between the compound and the protein to be more accurately identified, and finally splicing the characteristics of the compound and the protein through a decoding layer by the model, so that the interaction of the compound and the protein can be accurately predicted.
cited_claim: The invention discloses an intelligent PM2.5 and ozone combined pollution prediction method, system and medium, comprising the steps of collecting historical air quality data, environmental meteorological data and atmospheric pollution source emission data of a region to be predicted; the method comprises the steps of collecting cross characteristic data formed by combining different environmental meteorological conditions with different associated pollution sources, forming a training data set by the collected data, carrying out data matching, training a multi-task neural network model, selecting optimal input characteristic parameters according to increment contribution degrees of each input characteristic to the prediction of the multi-task neural network model after training, constructing a final combined pollution recognition model, acquiring real-time air quality data, environmental meteorological data and emission data of the atmospheric pollution sources of a region to be predicted, and inputting the data into the combined pollution recognition model to predict PM2.5 and ozone concentration data. The method has the advantages of simple implementation method, low cost, high prediction precision, high efficiency, strong robustness and the like.

anchor_claim: The application discloses a battery SOH evaluation method combining an electrochemical model and machine learning, which comprises the steps of constructing an electrochemical simulation model of a target battery, generating voltage curves and SOH data under different temperatures, charging multiplying powers and different battery aging conditions, constructing an SOH evaluation model and a voltage curve prediction model according to the voltage curves and SOH data, acquiring a constant-current charging segment of the target battery in a charging cycle in real time, acquiring the actually measured temperatures and charging multiplying powers of the target battery corresponding to the constant-current charging segment, presetting various SEI thicknesses and lithium analysis thicknesses, predicting the voltage curve by the voltage curve prediction model to obtain a plurality of voltage curves, acquiring a voltage curve segment closest to the initial SOC of the constant-current charging segment in the voltage curves, calculating the corresponding SEI thickness and lithium analysis thickness, and acquiring an SOH estimated value according to the SOH evaluation model. By the application, accurate evaluation can be realized for small data sets and novel batteries.
cited_claim: The application discloses a glass hardness prediction method based on a layered prediction neural network, which belongs to the field of data prediction systems and is used for glass research and development, and comprises the steps of data acquisition, data preprocessing, data set construction, construction of a Karl Mo Geluo V-Alord network and a layered prediction neural network formed by a feedforward neural network, training a neural network model through a gradient descent method and back propagation, and evaluating prediction errors through average absolute errors, after the prediction error of the trained neural network model meets the precision requirement, stopping training and storing corresponding network structures and parameters for predicting the glass hardness and guiding the research and development of the glass. In view of the technical scheme, the method and the device can predict the hardness of the glass through the existing data before the glass is prepared, so that the glass design is accelerated, and the development period of the glass is shortened.

anchor_claim: The invention provides a self-adaptive high-temperature damage model construction method and a self-adaptive high-temperature damage model construction system. The method comprises the steps of obtaining experimental data of materials in a high-temperature environment, preprocessing the collected data through a machine learning algorithm, extracting key damage characteristics, constructing a basic damage prediction model based on a deep learning framework, training the model through the preprocessed data, enabling the basic damage prediction model to adaptively adjust internal parameters according to prediction errors through a reinforcement learning mechanism, carrying out global search on thermodynamic parameters in the model through a genetic algorithm, searching for optimal parameter combinations, combining real-time temperature monitoring data, and dynamically adjusting model parameters. Through the integrated deep learning, reinforcement learning, genetic algorithm and molecular dynamics simulation technology, the damage evolution process of the material in a high-temperature environment can be more accurately and comprehensively predicted.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of new pollution monitoring, in particular to a non-targeted screening and identifying compound concentration method based on machine learning. The invention constructs a method for identifying compound concentration by non-targeted screening based on machine learning by adopting a neural network and a Bayesian statistical method based on high-resolution mass spectrum information, fingerprint information and chemical descriptors of the compound. The method solves the problems that the compound can not quantitatively obtain the concentration under the condition of no standard substance, and the concentration can not be quantitatively obtained in the non-targeting screening stage under the condition of the standard substance, and the liquid chromatography-triple quadrupole mass spectrometry is required to be reused for quantification, so that the complex and time-consuming procedures are caused.

anchor_claim: The application belongs to the technical field of crucible deformation resistance prediction, and relates to a quartz crucible high-temperature deformation resistance prediction method based on machine learning; the method comprises the steps of collecting key historical data, covering information such as aluminum alloy components, physical properties of a crucible, using conditions and deformation resistance, guaranteeing quality and consistency of a data set through data preprocessing, screening out characteristics with remarkable influence on the deformation resistance through statistical methods such as pearson correlation coefficient, LASSO regression and principal component analysis, carrying out characteristic engineering to construct new interactive characteristics, wherein the characteristics can reflect complex relations between smelting conditions and physical properties of the crucible, introducing a deep learning model to enable the prediction model to learn a deep mode in the data, so that the prediction accuracy is remarkably improved, and finally, accurately predicting the high-temperature deformation resistance of the quartz crucible according to real-time data by the trained model, providing scientific basis for production decision, and being beneficial to optimizing production flow and reducing cost.
cited_claim: The invention provides a skin longitudinal drawing process parameter optimization method based on a neural network and a genetic algorithm, which designs a skin forming quality prediction model based on a BP neural network aiming at quality indexes to be achieved by a skin finished product and related materials and stretching process parameters, and updates the weight and threshold value of the neural network based on the genetic algorithm. The real-time efficient optimization of the technological parameters of the stretcher can be realized by utilizing the trained and updated prediction model according to the materials selected by the skin and the expected quality of the design, and if the early correlation analysis and screening of the parameters to be optimized are matched, the accurate and comprehensive improvement of each link in the longitudinal pulling technological process can be realized, so that the large-scale and intelligent manufacturing level of the skin product can be improved by combining industrial big data.

anchor_claim: The invention provides a phase change microcapsule design system and method based on artificial intelligence, wherein the system comprises a machine learning module, a data building module, a target input module, a machine screening module and a target output module, wherein the machine learning module is used for collecting raw material composition, synthesis process and performance data of an existing phase change microcapsule, the data building module is used for collecting types of organic materials and inorganic materials and preparation processes of the materials, the target input module is used for inputting the phase change temperature, the phase change enthalpy value, the coating rate and the types of core materials of the phase change microcapsule to be designed, the machine screening module is used for screening out proper wall materials and emulsifying agents from the data building module according to machine learning results and data of the target input module, and the target output module is used for outputting the phase change microcapsule after design. The design module provided by the method adopts a machine learning mode to design the phase-change microcapsule, so that the labor cost is effectively saved, and the research and development time is shortened.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligent material research and development design, and provides a polyimide material glass transition temperature prediction method based on machine learning, which comprises the steps of collecting experimental data comprising a polyimide polymer structure and glass transition temperature; preprocessing the obtained data, dividing a training set and a testing set based on characteristic data and label data, constructing a prediction model based on gradient lifting, continuously adjusting parameters until an optimal parameter is found, evaluating the training model by using evaluation parameters such as a decision coefficient, a mean square error and the like, finally confirming the prediction model, inputting relevant parameters to the model based on the trained prediction model, and outputting the glass transition temperature of the corresponding polyimide. The gradient lifting model adopted in the invention reduces the cost of scientific research, improves the efficiency of scientific research, and opens up a new path for the development of polymers with high glass transition temperature.

anchor_claim: The invention belongs to the technical field of drug screening, and provides a multi-target drug screening and optimizing method based on machine learning, which comprises the steps of S1, utilizing a machine learning algorithm to conduct feature screening on compound molecular descriptors to determine molecular descriptors with the most obvious influence on biological activity, S2, constructing a quantitative structure-activity relation model to predict the biological activity of a compound, S3, utilizing the multi-target optimizing algorithm to conduct feature screening on the compound molecular descriptors based on the multi-target optimizing algorithm to construct a QSAR model to predict the biological activity, combining ADMET property classification prediction, comprehensively considering the biological activity, the ADMET property and the pharmacokinetic property of a drug, and efficiently and accurately screening and optimizing drug candidate compounds with potential drug effects and good pharmacokinetic properties, so that the success rate of drug research and development is improved, and the research and development cost and time are reduced.
cited_claim: The invention discloses an intelligent PM2.5 and ozone combined pollution prediction method, system and medium, comprising the steps of collecting historical air quality data, environmental meteorological data and atmospheric pollution source emission data of a region to be predicted; the method comprises the steps of collecting cross characteristic data formed by combining different environmental meteorological conditions with different associated pollution sources, forming a training data set by the collected data, carrying out data matching, training a multi-task neural network model, selecting optimal input characteristic parameters according to increment contribution degrees of each input characteristic to the prediction of the multi-task neural network model after training, constructing a final combined pollution recognition model, acquiring real-time air quality data, environmental meteorological data and emission data of the atmospheric pollution sources of a region to be predicted, and inputting the data into the combined pollution recognition model to predict PM2.5 and ozone concentration data. The method has the advantages of simple implementation method, low cost, high prediction precision, high efficiency, strong robustness and the like.

anchor_claim: The invention is suitable for the field of information processing, and provides an automated interview flow management method which comprises the steps of constructing an evaluation system, calculating idle time of interviewees and candidates, combining an existing schedule management tool, coordinating in a plurality of rounds according to a set priority rule to generate appropriate interview time when time conflicts occur, sending interview notification to the interviewees and the candidates through various communication modes of emails and short messages, sending multiple reminding in a day before interview and an hour before interview, starting an audio and video recording function and transcribing recorded important dialogue contents into text records in the interview process, analyzing recorded text data by adopting a natural language processing technology, extracting key answer information of the candidates in the interview, generating an assessment report containing language expression and professional skill assessment suggestions, and being capable of automatizing the scheduling, reminding, recording and assessment of the interview, and remarkably improving the interview management efficiency and the objectivity of the assessment.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a low-altitude small target detection method based on multi-element information fusion. The method comprises the steps of separating and denoising an audio signal through principal component analysis and rapid independent component analysis, combining a convolution cyclic neural network optimized by multi-scale convolution to efficiently identify acoustic features so as to realize accurate detection of an acoustic target, performing differential preprocessing on image data, wherein an infrared image adopts guided filtering to realize high-fidelity noise reduction, a visible light image completes image enhancement through Gamma correction, combining an infrared and visible light dual-branch improved YOLOv backbone network to realize detection of a visual target, and utilizing an improved DS evidence theory based on real-time reliability and dynamic weight to fuse acoustic and visual detection results, thereby comprehensively improving detection accuracy and robustness of a low-altitude small target in a complex environment. The method provides an innovative solution with theoretical and practical values for small target detection and defense technology in complex scenes.

- **위험 요소 식별**:

- **대안적 기술 접근법**:

anchor_claim: The application provides an audio separation method and related equipment, which are suitable for separating scenes of background music from songs. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a mixed audio signal to be processed, wherein the mixed audio signal is a unified audio signal formed by mixing a plurality of audio signals together through a mixer or a sound console. Wherein the plurality of audio signals includes a human voice signal and a background sound (e.g., a musical sound) signal. And inputting the mixed audio signal into a diffusion model, extracting a human voice signal in the mixed audio signal, and subtracting the human voice signal from the mixed audio signal to obtain a background sound signal in the mixed audio signal. According to the scheme, the generation model which is more advanced than the deep neural network is adopted to learn the distribution of the human voice signals, and compared with the traditional method, the human voice can be estimated more accurately, so that the human voice included in the mixed audio signal is extracted more accurately, and further high-quality background sound is separated from the mixed audio signal.
cited_claim: The disclosure provides an animal language conversion method, an animal language conversion device, an electronic device and a storage medium, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and particularly relates to the technical fields of machine learning, deep learning, natural language processing and the like. The method comprises the steps of obtaining multi-modal data related to animals, preprocessing the multi-modal data to obtain fused multi-modal data, identifying the current emotion of the animals according to the fused multi-modal data to obtain emotion identification results of the animals, and carrying out semantic mapping and language translation on the emotion identification results to convert animal language into human language to obtain language conversion results. The method and the device can accurately identify the current emotion state of the animal and convert the current emotion state into human language, so that deeper emotion communication and understanding between the animal and the human are realized, and accuracy and efficiency of cross-species communication are improved.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a voice interaction method, a device, equipment and a storage medium, which relate to the technical field of voice interaction, wherein the method comprises the steps of obtaining voice interaction information of a target user; and carrying out semantic recognition on the text information to obtain a text recognition result so as to execute corresponding functional operation in a target application according to the text recognition result. According to the method and the device, the sensitivity of the instruction can be improved by carrying out signal enhancement processing on the voice interaction information, and the text recognition result is obtained by extracting through voice recognition and natural language processing algorithm, so that the functional operation corresponding to the text recognition result is executed, and the quick interaction between the user and the APP is realized.
cited_claim: The invention belongs to the technical field of monitoring cameras, and particularly relates to a method for improving the intercom tone quality of a monitoring camera. Firstly, an audio data set covering pure voice and various environmental noises is widely collected, and is preprocessed and normalized by using a frequency spectrum subtraction algorithm and a Wiener filtering algorithm. And then selecting a convolutional neural network CNN architecture to preprocess data and cross-verify training optimization model parameters. And in the key wiener filtering link, the received audio is firstly processed by removing direct current and trend terms, the power spectral density is estimated independently in time intervals or frequency bands, the noise is reduced by adopting the self-adaptive filtering dynamic adjustment and smoothing technology, and the filter response is set according to the optimized ratio. Through serial processing, noise is accurately filtered, voice characteristics are preserved, voice definition, identifiability and instantaneity are greatly improved, intercom tone quality is obviously optimized, and user experience and command scheduling efficiency are effectively improved.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of deep learning, and particularly discloses a voice recognition system based on deep learning, which comprises a feature extraction module, a convolutional neural network module, an output layer and decoding module and a training and optimizing module, wherein the feature extraction module extracts spectral features of a voice signal through a Mel Frequency Cepstrum Coefficient (MFCC) and a logarithmic Mel filter energy coefficient (MFSC), the convolutional neural network module extracts local features of the voice signal through a convolutional layer and a pooling layer, a finite weight sharing (LWS) strategy is adopted for feature extraction, the output layer and the decoding module map the high-dimensional features of the convolutional neural network into probability distribution of phonemes or words through a Softmax activation function, and the training and optimizing module optimizes convolutional neural network parameters through a back propagation algorithm and random gradient descent (SGD). The invention can effectively fuse the voice characteristics and realize the voice recognition with high accuracy and low calculation amount.
cited_claim: An audio processing method and apparatus, a device and a medium. The method comprises: acquiring a plurality of audio feature representations corresponding to a plurality of audio clips in a target speech, the plurality of audio clips at least comprising a first audio clip and a second audio clip; and using a trained machine learning model to perform following operations: on the basis of a first audio feature representation corresponding to the first audio clip, determining a first text; extracting a first text feature representation of the first text; on the basis of a second audio feature representation corresponding to the second audio clip and the first text feature representation, determining a second text; and, at least on the basis of the first text and the second text, determining a target text sequence associated with the target speech, the target text sequence comprising at least one entity word appearing in the target speech and a corresponding entity type. Thus, the present application can directly generate corresponding entity results by means of speeches, so as to implement end-to-end entity recognition, thus improving the recognition accuracy.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a method for realizing voiceprint recognition, identity confirmation and dialogue applied to emotion analysis, which can well realize voiceprint recognition and identity confirmation, and can realize silence detection, recording control and recording end judgment and release. Including voiceprint recognition and identity verification, first, voiceprint recognition techniques are employed to verify whether the source of recorded audio is the voice of a particular person. Voiceprint recognition is typically authenticated by extracting audio features and comparing them to pre-stored templates. Mathematical formula assuming that the input audio is characterized by x= { X  1 ,x 2 ,...,x n  }, and the voiceprint template is t= { T  1 ,t 2 ,...,t m  }, the recognition process can be expressed as: Among them, The user label x  j -t i || 2  representing the identification represents the euclidean distance between feature vectors. The invention realizes cloning and emotion adjustment of sound through deep learning models (GANs and VAEs). The whole process generates high-quality emotional voice through training and optimizing the deep neural network, and provides more natural and personalized voice interaction experience.
cited_claim: The invention discloses an ultra-lightweight voice enhancement neural network and a method based on network architecture search. The neural network comprises an encoder, an enhancer and a decoder, wherein the encoder comprises a frequency spectrum compression module, a downsampling convolution module, a grouping depth separation convolution module, a two-way grouping cyclic neural network and a decoder, the frequency spectrum compression module is used for compressing a noise-containing voice frequency spectrum in the frequency dimension, the downsampling convolution module is used for carrying out feature extraction and downsampling in the frequency dimension on a feature map, the grouping depth separation convolution module is used for carrying out feature extraction and feature enhancement on the feature map, the enhancer comprises a two-way grouping cyclic neural network and is used for carrying out time-frequency domain modeling on the feature map, the decoder comprises a grouping depth separation convolution module is used for carrying out feature extraction and feature enhancement on the feature map, the upsampling convolution module is used for carrying out feature reconstruction and upsampling in the frequency dimension on the feature map, and the frequency dimension of the feature map is expanded. The invention can realize high-performance voice enhancement with lower calculation amount cost.
