anchor_claim: The embodiment of the application provides a processing method, a device, equipment and a storage medium for conversational audio, which relate to the technical field of artificial intelligence and are characterized in that the conversational audio is identified through a deep neural network to obtain first text information of the conversational audio; the method comprises the steps of inputting the first text information and a large model prompt word into a large model to obtain second text information with emotion labels, setting model roles and text recognition tasks by the large model prompt word, and determining whether the conversational audio accords with quality inspection requirements according to the emotion labels in the second text information. According to the embodiment of the application, the dialogue type audio is converted into the first text information through the deep neural network, the processing efficiency is improved through processing the text information, and the emotion label of the output second text information is more in line with the requirements through inputting the first text information and the large model prompt word into the large model.
cited_claim: The application relates to the field of intelligent voice recognition, and particularly discloses a voice style recognition system based on a large model, which is used for intelligently generating voice style recognition broadcasting voice according to dynamic feature aggregation representation among local coding features of upper and lower Wen Meier spectrums obtained by coding by receiving voice input signals of a target user acquired by a microphone, extracting a Mel frequency spectrum from the voice input signals, and performing block processing and multi-scale semantic coding on the Mel frequency spectrum of the extracted voice input signals by adopting a signal analysis and processing technology based on deep learning and the large model. cited_claim: Methods and systems are described for audio pipelines between a user and a machine learning (ML) model. The method involves obtaining digital audio data associated with an audio signal from a user's equipment. This data is then analyzed using a trained ML model, which includes one or more neural networks. The ML model determines an indication related to the digital audio data, which can be a prediction of the ending of one or more portions of the data, an intention behind the data, a key term within the data, an action to take based on the data, or the context associated with the data. Based on the determined indication, a response is generated and subsequently transmitted back to the user's equipment.

The invention not only improves the efficiency and accuracy of fault diagnosis, but also enhances the generalization capability of the model, and provides powerful technical support for the maintenance and fault prevention of the transformer.
cited_claim: Systems and techniques are provided for processing audio data. The process can include generating, based on the audio signal and the restoration mask, a restored speech signal, wherein the restored speech signal includes the one or more frequencies not represented in the voice vibration speech signal and does not include one or more distortions represented in the voice vibration speech signal.

The method comprises the following steps of 1, collecting vowel voice signals of a subject, including five Chinese vowels,/a/,/o/,/e/,/i/,/u/, 2, obtaining an AHI index obtained after PSG of the subject for the whole night, grading the severity of the subject, and 3, extracting four auxiliary language features, including eGemaps, emobase, comParE and MRCG, from the voice signals. anchor_claim: The invention discloses a sounding fish sound signal identification method and device based on a single-channel hydrophone, which belong to the field of sounding fish sound signal and mode identification, wherein a double-threshold active segment detection algorithm is designed to extract sounding fish sound signals of a sounding active segment, three-scale wavelet packet decomposition is carried out on the sounding active segment signals, energy characteristics and singular value characteristics of 8 wavelet packet coefficients are extracted, then a characteristic quantity composition characteristic vector with large separability is searched by using a separability judgment method of clustering separation degree, finally a machine learning mode based on a BP neural network is designed to learn sample data, and classification judgment is carried out by adopting a principle of minimum root mean square error of output vectors, so that sounding fish identification is realized, and higher identification rate is obtained.
cited_claim: The invention provides a cross-language voice translation method, device and equipment based on an AI large model, which comprises the steps of framing cross-language voice data and carrying out spectrum analysis to obtain a spectrum sequence, inputting the spectrum sequence into the AI large model which is trained in advance, carrying out vector encapsulation on spectrum features of different frequency bands in the spectrum sequence through a capsule network based on a feature capturing path to obtain encapsulation features, constructing each spectrum feature in the spectrum sequence into a graph structure through a graph neural network based on a global association path, digging out global semantic association features among each spectrum feature, carrying out weighted fusion on the encapsulation features corresponding to the spectrum features of different frequency bands to obtain fusion encapsulation features, carrying out aggregation on the fusion encapsulation features and the global semantic association features to obtain aggregation features, and translating to obtain voice data of a target language based on the aggregation features. In the invention, the accuracy of cross-language translation is improved.

anchor_claim: The application relates to the technical field of automatic driving information processing, and particularly discloses a data-driven odometer pose prediction method and a data-driven odometer pose prediction system, wherein the method comprises the steps of obtaining pose data of a vehicle according to a positioning system, correcting the pose data of the vehicle through Kalman filtering and an RTS smoothing algorithm, and generating a pose true value of the vehicle; the method comprises the steps of constructing an odometer model based on deep learning according to the wheel speed of a vehicle, the rotation angle of a steering wheel and IMU information, training the odometer model based on deep learning by using the pose truth value of the vehicle, and predicting the current moment odometer pose of the vehicle by using the trained odometer model based on deep learning. The improvement of the accuracy of the odometer inferred by the method is beneficial to the improvement of the overall performance of the system, can improve the overall robustness and comfort of the automatic driving system, and is beneficial to the large-scale application of the automatic driving system in life.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of duplex devices, and discloses an automatic temperature compensation parameter adjusting method and device for a duplex device. The method comprises the steps of sampling working temperature of a duplexer to obtain temperature sampling data, carrying out distributed feature extraction on the temperature sampling data to obtain temperature feature data, carrying out feature reconstruction on a temperature feature data input mechanism information neural network to obtain temperature compensation features, carrying out radial basis function neural network mapping on the temperature compensation features to obtain frequency drift state quantity of the duplexer, carrying out sliding window self-adaptive Kalman filtering operation on the frequency drift state quantity of the duplexer to obtain compensation parameters, inputting the compensation parameters into a feedforward compensation controller, and adjusting a voltage-controlled resonator of the duplexer through a sliding mode control structure to obtain frequency compensation signals.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a method and a system for estimating the order of an FIR filter by means of a neural network. According to the invention, by constructing the data set, the estimation from the frequency and performance requirements to the filter order is realized by using the deep neural network, so that manual adjustment and repeated testing are avoided, and the design cost and complexity are reduced. The technical scheme of the invention comprises the steps of constructing a data set, constructing a deep neural network, estimating the order of a filter, designing an FIR filter and acquiring the coefficient result of the filter. Through experimental verification, the method can effectively meet the performance requirements, has applicability and accuracy, is suitable for common FIR filter design methods, and realizes accurate estimation of the filter order.

anchor_claim: Compared with the traditional passive methods of structure matching, friction material selection, surface treatment and the like, the method is an active inhibition method, and on the basis of acquiring a stick-slip vibration boundary, the method can realize active avoidance of the stick-slip vibration of the brake by adjusting the regenerative braking moment and the friction braking moment of the hybrid braking system, has better adaptability to the change of a working environment, does not need to modify the mechanical structure of the hybrid braking system, only improves the algorithm, does not increase additional hardware cost, and can acquire a good stick-slip vibration active inhibition effect by regularly training and updating a neural network model.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a self-adaptive correction method for clamping force of an electric motor brake system based on deep learning, which belongs to the technical field of chassis control, fully considers the abrasion condition of a brake block in the using process, introduces a deep learning neural network optimization control strategy aiming at the nonlinear change problem caused by the abrasion of the brake block, models the complex nonlinear relation between the estimated clamping force of a motor rotation angle and the actual clamping force into predictable probability distribution, and carries out self-adaptive correction, thereby optimizing the control of the clamping force under the abrasion condition of the brake block, effectively carrying out dynamic change caused by the abrasion of the brake block, enhancing the real-time performance of the system control, greatly improving the prediction precision and the response speed of the system, comprehensively enhancing the stability, the reliability and the safety of the brake system, and simultaneously avoiding adopting a large number of sensors to monitor the real-time clamping force.

anchor_claim: The application provides a decision making method and device for an automatic driving vehicle and electronic equipment. In the running process of a vehicle, the method applies the acquired perception information and the vehicle state information to a target deep learning model to obtain control parameter values of an initial control strategy, and applies the perception information, the vehicle state information and the control parameter values of the initial control strategy to a hierarchical decision tree to obtain the target control strategy. The initial control strategy output by the target deep learning model is comprehensively checked and optimized through the hierarchical decision tree, so that instability caused by a direct linear weighted fusion mode is avoided, and the safety and the stability of the obtained target control strategy are ensured.
cited_claim: An information processing device has a collecting device that collects information relating to control of a vehicle for machine learning, wherein processing is carried out using hardware common to a detecting device that carries out detection processing for control of the vehicle, and a processor configured to estimate a degree of processing volume for detection processing by the detecting device, based on at least one type of information from among vehicle information representing a state of the vehicle, environment information representing surrounding environment of the vehicle and terrain information representing terrain including a current location of the vehicle, and to decide to lower detection accuracy by the detecting device when it has been estimated that processing volume for detection processing by the detecting device is low, compared to when it has been estimated that processing volume for detection processing by the detecting device is high.

anchor_claim: The embodiment of the invention provides a vehicle following method, a device, equipment and a storage medium, which relate to the technical field of machine learning and improve the running comfort and safety of a vehicle using ACC. The method comprises the steps of comparing magnitude relations of first speeds corresponding to first vehicles and second speeds corresponding to second vehicles when a monocular camera recognizes the second vehicles in a preset range of the first vehicles, enabling the first vehicles to be target following vehicles before the current time, and switching the target following vehicles before the first vehicles and the second vehicles according to the transformation of the magnitude relations of the first speeds and the second speeds.
cited_claim: The application discloses a fatigue driving monitoring and early warning method based on multidimensional feature fusion, which relates to the field of intelligent traffic and safe driving, the method utilizes a feature extraction model based on a convolutional neural network to extract features of a collected facial image of a vehicle driver to obtain facial key points, and then calculating eye closure rate, mouth opening rate, head posture data and facial muscle data to finally obtain multidimensional features, then fusing by using a multi-layer perceptron to obtain fused facial features, and detecting facial feature time sequences at a plurality of continuous sampling moments by using a fatigue state detection model based on recurrent neural network training so as to detect whether fatigue driving states occur or not and trigger alarm feedback. According to the method, the fatigue state of the driver can be accurately identified and judged by combining multidimensional data fusion with a time sequence analysis algorithm, and the monitoring and early warning accuracy and reliability are improved. The system maintains high robustness even in light variation or complex driving environments.

cited_claim: Systems/techniques are provided that facilitate strategic discharge of a vehicle battery. In various embodiments, the system may access a charging history of a battery of the vehicle. In various aspects, the system may determine whether the battery is likely to experience accelerated degradation by executing a first machine learning model on the charging history. In various examples, the system may recommend a discharge routine that may counteract the accelerated degradation in response to determining that the battery may experience such accelerated degradation and by executing a second machine learning model on the charge history and the drive history of the vehicle.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent driving, in particular to a personalized vehicle driving style optimization method and device, wherein the method comprises the steps of collecting emotion state data of drivers and driving state data of a driving vehicle, analyzing the emotion state data and the driving state data to determine emotion change rules of the drivers in each driving scene, determining optimal driving states of the drivers in each driving scene according to the emotion change rules of the drivers in each driving scene, training a pre-built machine learning model according to the emotion change rules of the drivers in each driving scene and the optimal driving states of the drivers in each driving scene to obtain a user emotion response model, predicting the optimal driving states of the drivers by using the user emotion response model, and adjusting the driving vehicle according to the optimal driving states. Therefore, the problems that the traditional driving mode cannot fully meet the requirements of drivers and passengers on personalized experience and the like are solved.
cited_claim: The present invention discloses a walking trajectory prediction method based on the interaction between pedestrians, the environment, and vehicles. The method is based on a physical model and combines the interaction between pedestrians, the environment, and other intelligent agents to more accurately predict pedestrian trajectories. The prediction method described in the present invention is not based on data-driven solutions, so it does not require a large amount of labeled data and eliminates the disadvantages of poor model interpretability and interactivity of deep learning solutions.

anchor_claim: Computer systems and methods are provided for training a machine learning model to determine a safe torque allocation for a vehicle combination and for determining a safe torque allocation. One system is configured to perform a plurality of simulations for motion of the vehicle combination based on a plurality of torque allocations and operating points, classify each simulation as safe or unsafe, and train a machine learning model using the classified simulations. One system is configured to receive torque allocations and an operating point of a vehicle combination, and output, using the trained machine learning model, one or more safe torque allocations.
cited_claim: An information processing device has a collecting device that collects information relating to control of a vehicle for machine learning, wherein processing is carried out using hardware common to a detecting device that carries out detection processing for control of the vehicle, and a processor configured to estimate a degree of processing volume for detection processing by the detecting device, based on at least one type of information from among vehicle information representing a state of the vehicle, environment information representing surrounding environment of the vehicle and terrain information representing terrain including a current location of the vehicle, and to decide to lower detection accuracy by the detecting device when it has been estimated that processing volume for detection processing by the detecting device is low, compared to when it has been estimated that processing volume for detection processing by the detecting device is high.

  - 인용 특허의 처리량 기반 결정 방식을 피하기 위해, 다른 기준(예: 차량의 동적 모델링)을 사용하여 안전성을 평가하는 방법을 도입할 수 있음.

- **대안적 기술 접근법**:
  - 머신러닝 대신 규칙 기반 시스템이나 전통적인 제어 이론을 활용하여 차량 제어 시스템을 설계할 수 있음.
  - 차량의 상태 및 환경 정보를 수집하는 방법을 변경하여, 예를 들어, 센서의 종류나 데이터 처리 방식을 다양화함으로써 두 특허의 기술적 요소와의 유사성을 줄일 수 있음. 

이러한 분석을 통해, 원본 특허와 인용 특허 간의 기술적 유사성을 이해하고, 침해 리스크를 평가하며, 효과적인 회피 전략을 수립할 수 있습니다.

cited_claim: The embodiment of the application provides an automatic driving planning method, an automatic driving planning device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of automatic driving. The method comprises the steps of obtaining perception data, inputting the perception data into a breadth LSTM layer and a depth LSTM layer of a neural network, fusing output results of the breadth LSTM layer and the depth LSTM layer at CONCAT layers, outputting a planning state result through a full connection layer and a SOFTMAX layer, and obtaining a target path according to the planning state result. The method utilizes the multilayer LSTM-CONCAT neural network to carry out path planning of the ramp and the complex lane, improves the generalized adaptability of vehicle track planning, and solves the problem that the conventional planning method cannot adapt to the complex lane.

- **기술적 유사성 점수**: 70
- **핵심 공통 기술 요소**:
  - 두 특허 모두 차량의 운전 및 제어와 관련된 기술을 다루고 있으며, 특히 인공지능(신경망)을 활용하여 차량의 운전 결정을 내리는 방법을 포함하고 있습니다.
  - 원본 특허는 주변 차량의 운전 의도를 고려하여 안전한 운전 결정을 내리는 방법을 설명하고 있으며, 인용 특허는 LSTM(장기 단기 기억) 신경망을 사용하여 경로 계획을 수행하는 방법을 설명하고 있습니다.
  - 두 특허 모두 차량의 주행을 위한 데이터 수집 및 처리, 그리고 신경망을 통한 의사결정 과정이 포함되어 있습니다.

###

[침해 리스크]
- 리스크 수준: medium
- 위험 요소: **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성**:, 원본 특허는 주변 차량의 운전 의도를 고려하여 운전 결정을 내리는 방법을 제안하고 있으며, 인용 특허는 경로 계획을 위한 신경망 구조를 사용하고 있습니다. 이 두 기술이 서로 보완적일 수 있기 때문에, 인용 특허의 기술이 원본 특허의 운전 의도 분석과 결합될 경우, 잠재적인 침해 리스크가 존재할 수 있습니다., **위험 요소 식별**:
- **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성**:
  - 원본 특허는 주변 차량의 운전 의도를 고려하여 운전 결정을 내리는 방법을 제안하고 있으며, 인용 특허는 경로 계획을 위한 신경망 구조를 사용하고 있습니다. 이 두 기술이 서로 보완적일 수 있기 때문에, 인용 특허의 기술이 원본 특허의 운전 의도 분석과 결합될 경우, 잠재적인 침해 리스크가 존재할 수 있습니다.
- **위험 요소 식별**:
  - 인용 특허의 LSTM 구조가 원본 특허의 운전 의도 분석에 통합될 경우, 원본 특허의 청구항을 침해할 가능성이 있습니다.
  - 또한, 두 특허 모두 인공지능을 활용하고 있어, 기술적 유사성으로 인해 법적 분쟁의 소지가 존재합니다.

###

[회피 전략]
- 설계 변경: **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:, 인용 특허의 경우, LSTM 대신 다른 유형의 신경망(예: CNN, Transformer 등)을 사용하여 경로 계획을 수행할 수 있습니다. 이를 통해 원본 특허와의 기술적 유사성을 줄일 수 있습니다., 원본 특허의 운전 의도 분석을 위한 데이터 수집 방법을 변경하거나, 주변 차량의 운전 의도를 고려하지 않고 독립적으로 경로 계획을 수행하는 방법으로 변경할 수 있습니다.
- 대안적 접근: **대안적 기술 접근법**:
- **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:
  - 인용 특허의 경우, LSTM 대신 다른 유형의 신경망(예: CNN, Transformer 등)을 사용하여 경로 계획을 수행할 수 있습니다. 이를 통해 원본 특허와의 기술적 유사성을 줄일 수 있습니다.
  - 원본 특허의 운전 의도 분석을 위한 데이터 수집 방법을 변경하거나, 주변 차량의 운전 의도를 고려하지 않고 독립적으로 경로 계획을 수행하는 방법으로 변경할 수 있습니다.
  
- **대안적 기술 접근법**:
  - 강화 학습 대신 전통적인 제어 이론이나 규칙 기반 시스템을 활용하여 차량의 운전 결정을 내리는 방법을 개발할 수 있습니다.
  - 주변 차량의 운전 의도를 고려하지 않고, 차량의 현재 상태와 환경 데이터를 기반으로 한 단순한 경로 계획 알고리즘을 사용할 수 있습니다.

anchor_claim: The application relates to a vehicle speed control method of a hybrid electric vehicle. The method comprises the steps of establishing a vehicle dynamics model, designing an improved disturbance observer according to the vehicle dynamics model, obtaining a disturbance estimated value, designing a speed control law, wherein the speed control law comprises feedforward control and feedback control, determining control input of the improved disturbance observer according to the disturbance estimated value and the speed control law, designing motor torque based on the control input of the improved disturbance observer, and dynamically adjusting the motor torque and the engine torque based on a PID (proportion integration differentiation) controller of a neural network so as to enable the vehicle speed to dynamically approximate to a target vehicle speed. According to the application, the torque of the vehicle is dynamically adjusted through PID control based on the neural network, so that the vehicle speed can dynamically approach the target vehicle speed.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent driving, and provides an intelligent analysis method for vehicle driver behaviors, which is characterized in that driving preference data and environment data are extracted from historical driving data of each driver, a data set is obtained after preprocessing, the behavior trend data of preset preference indexes are used as output, the data set is cut into a training set, a testing set and a verification set, and a trained neural network model is output after the training model enables the prediction precision to reach a preset value. Real-time data in the running process of the vehicle is acquired through the vehicle-mounted sensor, and a trained neural network model is input to obtain behavior trend data. The invention also discloses a self-adaptive vehicle speed control system, which can extract personalized behavior data of a driver by analyzing the behavior data of the driver, is used for generating a control instruction of vehicle auxiliary driving, and is personalized to configure a vehicle auxiliary driving system, so that the self-adaptive vehicle speed control system can adapt to a transient traffic environment and further improve the driving safety of the vehicle.

anchor_claim: The application discloses a signal transmission method, a device, equipment, a server and a storage medium, which relate to the technical field of wireless communication and are applied to a neural network in a wireless communication system, wherein the neural network comprises a preset beam forming structure obtained by deep learning, and the neural network is used for determining a beam forming matrix according to received uplink channel information; the method comprises the steps of receiving request information from electronic equipment, wherein the request information is transmitted through an uplink channel, determining downlink channel state information, reflection phase shift and transmitting power based on the uplink channel, generating feedback information based on a preset beam forming structure, the downlink channel state information and the reflection phase shift in response to the request information, and transmitting the feedback information to the electronic equipment according to the transmitting power. The complexity of the beamforming algorithm is reduced, and meanwhile, the transmission rate of wireless signals can be effectively improved.
cited_claim: Methods and systems are described herein for monitoring fault events at a fiber optical network. In particular, a system may receive, from components of an optical network, corresponding component data structures comprising optical measurements. The system may extract, from a component data structure, a set of component metrics for light transmission signals being transmitted or received via fiber optic transmission lines at a corresponding component and input the component data structure into a first machine learning model to obtain an indication of an occurrence of an event at one or more components. The system may generate a prompt for input into a second machine learning model configured to identify corrective actions for addressing any events within optical networks to obtain one or more corrective actions for addressing the occurrence of the event.

anchor_claim: The invention provides a combined channel prediction and beam forming optimization method based on a Fourier graph neural network, which comprises the steps of estimating and obtaining L continuous historical channel state information of time stamps according to signals received by a base station, inputting the L continuous historical channel state information into a target network which is obtained through training of a hybrid training method to obtain a downlink beam forming matrix, wherein the target network comprises a channel prediction module, a power learning module and a beam forming recovery module, the channel prediction module is used for predicting and obtaining channel state information of any future moment according to the L continuous historical channel state information of the time stamps, the power learning module is used for obtaining power characteristics of the future moment according to the channel state information of the future moment, the power characteristics of the future moment and the beam forming optimal solution structure, obtaining the downlink beam forming matrix, optimizing the channel over-time problem and beam forming, and realizing the maximization of system performance and speed.
cited_claim: The invention provides a channel modeling and phase designing method and system for an air intelligent reflecting surface, and belongs to the technical field of wireless communication. The method comprises the steps of establishing an unmanned aerial vehicle random rotation angle model, obtaining local coordinates of a reflecting unit on an intelligent reflecting surface along with time change based on the unmanned aerial vehicle random rotation angle, utilizing a deep learning time sequence prediction algorithm to establish an unmanned aerial vehicle deflection angle prediction model to predict the unmanned aerial vehicle rotation angle, calculating phase offset of the intelligent reflecting surface according to a prediction result of the unmanned aerial vehicle rotation angle, establishing an air intelligent reflecting surface auxiliary channel model based on the local coordinates of the reflecting unit on the intelligent reflecting surface, the position, the motion speed and the motion direction of a transmitting end, a receiving end and the unmanned aerial vehicle, system carrier frequency, obtaining channel impulse response, and obtaining statistical characteristics of a channel based on the channel impulse response. The influence of the instability of the unmanned aerial vehicle on the channel characteristics can be effectively reduced, and the system performance of the intelligent air reflecting surface is obviously improved.

anchor_claim: The invention provides a method and a system for rapidly calculating power evolution in a third-order Raman amplifier, wherein the method comprises the following steps of S1, calculating the power evolution of each frequency light in an optical fiber based on the parameters of the third-order Raman amplifier, S2, fixing link parameters, combining initial values of signal parameters, pumping parameters and power evolution into a data set, training a neural network, S3, predicting the power evolution initial value of a new link by using the trained neural network and taking the power evolution initial value as a convergence starting point of a targeting method, and S4, converging the power evolution initial value of the targeting method based on a continuity method and a gradient descent method, and obtaining a final power evolution value in the optical fiber. The invention predicts a more reasonable power evolution initial value by training the neural network and takes the power evolution initial value as the starting point of the targeting method by utilizing the known link, signal and pumping parameters, and adopts the high-precision power evolution initial value, thereby reducing the iteration times of a gradient descent method in the targeting method, accelerating the convergence speed and improving the precision of the final solution.
cited_claim: The invention provides a method and a device for eliminating sensing channel crosstalk in an optical fiber interferometer sensing network, which are used for constructing a deep learning neural network, constructing a loss function of the neural network by a physical demodulation and time domain signal autocorrelation coupling method, training and learning a coefficient relation between main interference items and parasitic interference items in the optical fiber sensing network, distilling a processing model and solidifying the processing model to a signal processing front end of the optical fiber interferometer sensing network, aiming at remarkably improving the anti-interference capability of the optical fiber interferometer network and providing support for improving the sensing performance of the optical fiber interferometer network on the premise of not increasing the hardware cost and complexity of the system.

anchor_claim: The invention provides a neural network-based underwater acoustic channel estimation method, which comprises the steps of converting a received signal and a signal response matrix into a channel response image as a two-channel image, inputting the received signal and a condition vector into a model, receiving an actual channel response matrix by a discriminator, generating channel response data and an actual channel response value by a final generator, and utilizing a normalized mean square error to realize estimation according to a difference value between the actual channel response matrix and an estimation matrix. The received signals and the signal response matrix are used as a two-channel image to be converted into a channel response image, vectors are input into the model, the actual channel response and the actual channel response value are compared, and the difference value is finally calculated, so that the technical problem that a water sound channel estimation method with high convergence speed is lacked in the prior art is solved.
cited_claim: The application relates to the field of signal processing, and provides a signal processing method and a system for a reconnaissance unmanned aerial vehicle, which are characterized in that a first intermediate frequency signal obtained by mixing signals of the unmanned aerial vehicle is subjected to signal decomposition to obtain a set of signal component natural mode functions, and waveform semantic feature extraction is carried out on each signal component natural mode function by adopting a signal analysis and processing algorithm based on deep learning, so that a filtered first intermediate frequency signal is automatically generated based on obvious dynamic aggregation representation of waveform semantic features of each signal component in the whole domain, and the change of a signal environment can be dynamically adapted, and more representative features can be extracted, so that the flexibility of signal processing is improved. Compared with the traditional fixed parameter filter, the method can better cope with interference and noise in a complex environment, so that a final signal is clearer, and the quality and the automation level of signal processing of the reconnaissance unmanned aerial vehicle are improved.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses an indoor imaging method based on an improved VAE-MoE architecture WIFI signal, which comprises path planning, data acquisition, data preprocessing, analog signal propagation, linearization physical model construction, deep learning model training and image generation. According to the invention, through arranging two groups of WIFI signal equipment and an indoor camera, RSSI information data is collected through path planning and by utilizing WIFI signals, and staged optimization is performed by combining a physical modeling and deep learning technology, so that the data imaging accuracy is remarkably improved, the indoor imaging problem in a limited data environment is solved, and the method has higher technical innovation and practical application value.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the field of information processing, in particular to a deep learning-based underwater acoustic spectrum segmentation communication method. A deep learning-based underwater acoustic spectrum segmentation communication method comprises the steps of obtaining underwater acoustic signals, generating an underwater acoustic spectrum graph through a Mel frequency cepstrum coefficient, sending the underwater acoustic spectrum graph into an underwater acoustic spectrum segmentation model to be processed to obtain an underwater acoustic spectrum label graph, mapping available spectrum areas in the underwater acoustic spectrum label graph to the frequency bands of the underwater acoustic signals, and distributing all the frequency bands of the underwater acoustic signals to different network channels to be transmitted. According to the method, the underwater acoustic signal is converted into the underwater acoustic spectrogram, the underwater acoustic spectrogram is sent to the underwater acoustic spectrum segmentation model for processing, the underwater acoustic spectrum segmentation model adopts a deep learning technology, and the available spectrum in the underwater acoustic spectrogram can be segmented and marked based on the characteristic information in the underwater acoustic spectrogram, so that the extraction and segmentation of the available frequency bands in the underwater acoustic signal are realized.

anchor_claim: A display uniformity compensation method based on machine learning, a storage medium and a terminal, wherein the method comprises the steps of providing a plurality of target gray-scale data, acquiring a plurality of acquisition pictures, acquiring compensation result gray-scale data of each acquisition picture, providing a machine learning model, completing training and testing of the machine learning model based on the target gray-scale data and the compensation result gray-scale data, solidifying model framework and model parameters of the machine learning model to display equipment to be compensated, and outputting application gray-scale data of the display equipment to be compensated based on the machine learning model. Based on the machine learning model, the application gray scale data of the display equipment to be compensated can be rapidly output, and the display uniformity compensation effect and efficiency of the display equipment to be compensated are effectively improved. In addition, the model framework of the machine learning model passing the test and the model parameters are solidified to the display equipment to be compensated, so that the storage of compensation data can be effectively reduced or even completely eliminated, and the cost of data storage and driving operation is greatly reduced.
cited_claim: The invention provides a high-precision calibration method in TFT display production, which relates to the field of TFT display calibration and comprises the steps of respectively establishing particle groups of TFT displays of various types, obtaining optimal intermediate values of brightness and contrast of the TFT displays of various types through simulating movement of particles in a search space, namely initial values, respectively establishing gene libraries of the TFT displays of various types, adjusting the brightness and contrast of the TFT displays of various types through selection, intersection and variation and iterative screening so as to obtain the brightness and contrast of the display reaching a preset standard value, adjusting the color of the TFT displays of various types through a deep learning color correction model, and adjusting the brightness and color uniformity of each area of a screen of the TFT display through a Markov airport algorithm according to calibrated color parameters. The invention aims to realize accurate personalized calibration for TFT displays of different types.

cited_claim: The invention provides a LCM module aging test method, a device, equipment and a storage medium, wherein the method comprises the following steps: the method comprises the steps of obtaining initial state data and initial environment parameter combination of an LCM module through intelligent environment simulation and initialization processing, carrying out multi-mode alternate aging test and real-time monitoring processing on the module by utilizing an intelligent environment simulation system, obtaining performance data under a dynamic environment, and carrying out surface periodic scanning and working sound recording to obtain microstructure data and acoustic data. Through intelligent fault detection and deep analysis processing, fault characteristics and reasons of the module are identified, predictive analysis is conducted on faults by combining a machine learning algorithm, and a predictive fault trend and optimized environment parameter combination is generated. And carrying out comprehensive performance evaluation on the module according to fault characteristics, cause analysis, predicted trend and optimization parameters. According to the invention, through the combination of intelligent environment simulation, real-time monitoring and deep analysis, the accurate performance evaluation and fault prediction of the LCM module are realized.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to an unmanned aerial vehicle hyperspectral inspection method, in particular to a full-automatic unmanned aerial vehicle hyperspectral inspection method for anomaly detection of a photovoltaic power station. The method comprises the following steps of 1, carrying out task scheduling on an unmanned aerial vehicle through an unmanned aerial vehicle, planning a route and a routing inspection period of the unmanned aerial vehicle, 2, enabling the unmanned aerial vehicle to fly to a target area to be detected according to the planned route and the routing inspection period, collecting spectrum data of the target area, 3, carrying out radiation correction and normalization processing on the collected spectrum data, 4, detecting dust deposit, pollutants and vegetation on the surface of a photovoltaic panel by utilizing a method of spectral feature analysis and machine learning based on the spectrum data after the radiation correction and normalization processing, and 5, evaluating the influence degree of the dust deposit, the pollutants and the vegetation on the photoelectric conversion efficiency of the photovoltaic panel based on detection results. The invention can provide scientific basis for efficient operation of the photovoltaic power station and health management of ecological environment.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a hypersonic aircraft cooperative control method based on self-adaptive dynamic programming, which comprises the steps of firstly establishing a 6-degree-of-freedom normalization model for hypersonic aircraft, defining the cooperative tracking control problem of hypersonic aircraft clusters, obtaining an optimal tracking control form under control input limitation by using a self-adaptive dynamic programming algorithm, constructing a single evaluation neural network on-line controller on the basis, solving the optimal tracking control law on line, and applying the obtained optimal tracking control law input to hypersonic aircraft clusters to realize cooperative tracking control. Aiming at the hypersonic aircraft system described by the 6-degree-of-freedom model, the method provided by the invention realizes cooperative tracking control on hypersonic aircraft clusters under the condition of flight constraint, realizes on-line control by adopting a self-adaptive dynamic programming algorithm, and is suitable for the field of cluster cooperative control of hypersonic aircraft.

anchor_claim: The application provides a control method of pressure control equipment for uniformly distributing multilayer composite copper foil, which comprises the steps of obtaining material attribute parameters of each layer of the multilayer composite copper foil, establishing a composite copper foil material attribute database, analyzing stress distribution and deformation conditions of each layer of the copper foil under different pressure conditions by combining a multilayer structure and material attribute data of the composite copper foil through a finite element analysis method, obtaining quantitative evaluation indexes of pressure distribution uniformity, analyzing mapping relations between the pressure distribution uniformity, process parameters and equipment mechanical characteristics according to the quantitative evaluation indexes of the pressure distribution uniformity, obtaining optimal process parameter combinations and equipment control strategies for realizing the pressure uniform distribution, extracting historical optimization cases similar to the current process requirements from a knowledge base when the process requirements change, and optimizing through a reinforcement learning algorithm to respond to the process requirement change.
cited_claim: The embodiment of the invention discloses a path planning method, a device, equipment and a medium, wherein the method comprises the steps of obtaining a task to be executed and a target task map, predicting the action value of each task action in a preset action space based on a deep learning Q network prediction task execution object in a state corresponding to each task execution time step, selecting the action to obtain an action selection result, determining the target task action value corresponding to each task execution time step according to the action selection result and a preset rewarding function, determining the task accumulation value of each task path corresponding to the completed task to be executed according to the target task action value of each task execution time step, and determining the target task path. The technical scheme of the embodiment of the invention can enable the path planning result to more meet the specific task scene requirement and improve the task execution efficiency.

anchor_claim: The invention provides an intelligent inspection method, device and storage medium based on an unmanned aerial vehicle. The intelligent inspection method based on the unmanned aerial vehicle comprises the steps of obtaining an optimal inspection route based on geographic information and a genetic algorithm of an inspection area where a target building is located, adjusting the optimal inspection route based on environment information of the inspection area to obtain the target inspection route, utilizing the inspection unmanned aerial vehicle to inspect according to the target inspection route, collecting image data of the target building, and determining structural defects in the image data based on a pre-established building reference image library and a convolutional neural network. According to the unmanned aerial vehicle-based intelligent inspection method, device and storage medium, the genetic algorithm and the environment informationized unmanned aerial vehicle inspection route are adopted, and the reference image library and the convolutional neural network are combined to realize efficient inspection and defect identification.
cited_claim: The invention discloses an intelligent control method and system of an underwater robot based on deep learning, which relate to the technical field of underwater obstacle avoidance of the underwater robot, the method comprises the steps one to four, a deep learning calibration model is established through a deep learning algorithm, an avoidance rate index BrsL in the process of avoiding the underwater robot is established, the current speed and direction of the area where the underwater robot is located are monitored and monitored, and the real-time vertical descent depth, the underwater temperature value and the submerging sea water pressure value of the propeller in the obstacle avoidance process are calculated to obtain an estimated ocean current influence index YL and a relative strength index Xd, and the estimated ocean current influence index YL and the relative strength index Xd are estimated, if a multistage calibration control strategy of a first calibration instruction and a second calibration instruction is triggered, the power of the propeller and the posture of the underwater robot are adjusted, and timely adjustment is carried out according to the change of the vertical descent depth so as to adapt to an ocean current environment, and the stable movement of the underwater robot in the obstacle avoidance process is ensured.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a large-scale unmanned aerial vehicle marshalling method for emergency fire rescue tasks, which utilizes an FCM algorithm to perform cluster analysis on task points of a rescue area, determines membership of a flight task and generates a task area. Based on the real-time environmental change of the fire scene, the dynamic membership update task allocation state is realized through a visual detection algorithm of the convolutional neural network fusion FCM, meanwhile, a 3D model reorganization map model is established through 3DT route planning optimization based on a laser radar technology, and the optimal path planning is provided for the unmanned aerial vehicle in real time through introducing time parameters for linear optimization. In the rescue process, data are automatically transmitted in a segmented mode through a slicing technology of a 5G network, an autonomous Mesh centerless network topological structure is implemented when signals are severe, real-time signal optimization is conducted through a repeater of the high-altitude unmanned aerial vehicle, and high efficiency and flexibility of rescue are guaranteed.
cited_claim: The invention discloses an unmanned aerial vehicle track planning method capable of avoiding obstacles in real time, which comprises the following steps of detecting the environment by using airborne multi-sensors, capturing the position, speed and direction of the obstacles in the environment in real time, processing data collected by the sensors by using a convolutional neural network and a recurrent neural network, predicting the future motion track of the dynamic obstacles, establishing an environment model, quantitatively evaluating the risk of the surrounding environment of the unmanned aerial vehicle, dynamically updating the model when a new obstacle is detected, generating a preliminary flight track under the global view angle by using deep reinforcement learning, re-planning the track according to real-time environment information provided by an obstacle detection module, avoiding the dynamic obstacles, and collectively making a collaborative decision by an unmanned aerial vehicle group according to the experience sharing and the maximum reciprocal rewarding mechanism of multiple intelligent bodies, so that the safety of the whole group is ensured.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses an AUV control method based on a neural network and a port controlled Hamiltonian system, and belongs to the technical field of automatic control. The method comprises the steps of firstly converting a four-degree-of-freedom AUV dynamics and kinematics model into a PCH system model, designing a state error PCH track tracking controller of the AUV based on a passivity method under the condition that model parameter uncertainty, time-varying ocean current interference and control input saturation are not considered, then processing the model parameter uncertainty and the time-varying ocean current interference by utilizing RBFNN, and in addition, introducing an auxiliary system for effectively saturating the control input, so that the track tracking controller suitable for a complex underwater environment is invented. The method can realize high-precision three-dimensional track tracking control in a complex underwater environment, and has stronger robustness and good stability.
cited_claim: The invention discloses an automatic cleaning path planning system which comprises a sensor acquisition unit, a processing unit, a control unit, a data storage unit, a communication unit and operation equipment, wherein the sensor acquisition unit comprises an ultrasonic sensor acquisition module and an image acquisition module, the processing unit comprises an analysis processing module and a path planning generation module, the control unit comprises a central processing module and an instruction output module, the communication unit realizes data transmission and instruction transmission among the modules, the sensor acquisition unit acquires surrounding environment information, and the processing unit effectively analyzes the path environment and plans a travel path. The dynamic path planning method based on the neural network is reasonable in design, comprehensive in data consideration, wide in adaptability to complex paths and capable of timely adjusting complex road conditions.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a hypersonic aircraft cooperative control method based on self-adaptive dynamic programming, which comprises the steps of firstly establishing a 6-degree-of-freedom normalization model for hypersonic aircraft, defining the cooperative tracking control problem of hypersonic aircraft clusters, obtaining an optimal tracking control form under control input limitation by using a self-adaptive dynamic programming algorithm, constructing a single evaluation neural network on-line controller on the basis, solving the optimal tracking control law on line, and applying the obtained optimal tracking control law input to hypersonic aircraft clusters to realize cooperative tracking control. Aiming at the hypersonic aircraft system described by the 6-degree-of-freedom model, the method provided by the invention realizes cooperative tracking control on hypersonic aircraft clusters under the condition of flight constraint, realizes on-line control by adopting a self-adaptive dynamic programming algorithm, and is suitable for the field of cluster cooperative control of hypersonic aircraft.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a deep learning-based low-altitude unmanned aerial vehicle intelligent inspection system and a deep learning-based low-altitude unmanned aerial vehicle intelligent inspection method, which relate to the technical field of unmanned aerial vehicle intelligent control and are characterized by collecting unmanned aerial vehicle information sets and task information sets in advance, constructing an anomaly detection model based on the task information sets, collecting unmanned aerial vehicle real-time flight parameter data, constructing a parameter adjustment optimization model based on the anomaly detection model, the real-time flight parameter data and the unmanned aerial vehicle information sets, solving an output flight parameter adjustment strategy, sending the flight parameter adjustment strategy to an unmanned aerial vehicle, collecting anomaly detection information collected in the unmanned aerial vehicle flight process in real time, and carrying out dynamic parameter adjustment based on the anomaly detection information and the unmanned aerial vehicle information sets; the intelligent level and the operation efficiency of unmanned aerial vehicle inspection are remarkably improved.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to an unmanned aerial vehicle autonomous flight and inspection system based on a multi-sensor fusion technology, which integrates a plurality of sensors such as a visual camera, a laser radar, an inertial measurement unit, a GPS (global positioning system) and the like, realizes layered fusion processing of multi-sensor data based on improved self-adaptive expansion Kalman filtering, and combines a synchronous positioning and mapping algorithm to generate a high-precision three-dimensional environment map and pose estimation of the unmanned aerial vehicle. And then, the path planning module generates an optimal flight path according to the inspection task area and the environment structure, and automatically invokes an obstacle avoidance algorithm to carry out dynamic path adjustment when encountering an obstacle. The visual detection module analyzes the real-time image data through a deep learning algorithm, and identifies, marks and locates abnormal conditions in the target area. The system has remarkable advantages in the aspects of inspection precision, stability and adaptability, and is suitable for various fields such as geological inspection, highway inspection, electric power inspection, traffic facility detection, disaster monitoring and the like.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a non-cooperative target robust formation capture control method of a multi-unmanned aerial vehicle system. The method comprises the steps of firstly dynamically modeling a multi-unmanned aerial vehicle system and a non-cooperative target, constructing a non-linear dynamics model of the unmanned aerial vehicle and the target, which comprises matched and non-matched uncertain items, then modeling a non-cooperative target trapping control error of the multi-unmanned aerial vehicle formation, further designing a matched/non-matched disturbance estimator based on a neural network, dynamically estimating composite uncertainty through an on-line updated self-adaptive weight, and then constructing a multi-unmanned aerial vehicle system self-adaptive robust formation trapping controller, so that the unmanned aerial vehicle can trap the target with the complex dynamics model into a convex hull of the unmanned aerial vehicle system self-adaptive robust formation trapping controller. The method combines neural network fitting and similar sign function items, improves the convergence performance of the multi-unmanned aerial vehicle system non-cooperative target robust formation capture control, and ensures that the capture action is still effectively and reasonably regulated under the non-cooperative multi-target condition.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a traffic abnormal event detection method based on video stream analysis, which comprises the following steps of obtaining a monitoring video, detecting a preset detection object in the monitoring video by adopting a deep learning target detection algorithm, outputting a target object according to a class filtering mechanism, tracking the target object by adopting a target tracking algorithm, fitting a lane area based on a running track of a vehicle to realize target area division, and detecting the traffic abnormal event of the lane area according to a monitoring state and a preset rule.
cited_claim: The invention relates to an intelligent acquisition, analysis, prediction and automatic violation correction method and system based on public transportation violation big data, belonging to the field of traffic informatization and intelligent management. The method aims at identifying complex and various traffic illegal behaviors and analyzing massive illegal data. The system comprises data acquisition, processing and storage, analysis and prediction, automatic violation correction and data security. Real-time acquisition and efficient processing of illegal actions are realized through multi-source data access, edge calculation and distributed storage, deep learning and big data technology are utilized to carry out deep analysis on traffic illegal data, and suspected illegal actions are tracked, recorded and obtained through real-time video stream analysis. The system adopts a multi-level security protection mechanism to ensure data privacy and security, and realizes flexible expansion and multi-system cooperation through a modularized design. Compared with the traditional system, the method has the remarkable advantages in the aspects of data acquisition comprehensiveness, processing efficiency, prediction accuracy, violation automation correction, data safety and the like.

anchor_claim: The invention provides a method and a device for identifying risk factors of expressway domains, and relates to the technical field of data processing, wherein the method comprises the steps of extracting key features from preprocessed data, wherein the key features are used for identifying risk factors; the method comprises the steps of training a neural network model by utilizing key features to obtain a trained neural network model, identifying risk factors through the trained neural network model, carrying out association mining on the risk factors to obtain correlations among the risk factors, distributing an importance score for each risk factor based on the correlations among the risk factors, calculating a dynamic adjustment factor, multiplying the dynamic adjustment factor by the importance score of each risk factor to obtain an adjusted importance score, and sorting the risk factors according to the adjusted importance score to obtain key factors affecting the expressway domain risk. The risk factor identification method and the risk factor identification device can identify the risk factors more accurately and efficiently.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a traffic signal lamp timing method and system, the method comprises the steps of S1, configuring a traffic signal lamp management system to obtain current passing time and congestion degree data of each intersection traffic signal lamp, S2, comparing the congestion degree data with a current congestion degree data threshold value of the intersection traffic signal lamp set by the system, judging whether the current congestion degree data threshold value of the intersection traffic signal lamp set by the system is exceeded, if yes, entering step S3, if not, returning to step S1, S3, inputting the current passing time and the congestion degree data of the intersection traffic signal lamp into a trained neural network model to obtain optimal passing time of the intersection traffic signal lamp, and S4, synthesizing according to the optimal passing time and the current passing time to gradually adjust the passing time of the intersection traffic signal lamp. The invention solves the problem that the existing traffic signal controller dynamically matches the optimal signal timing scheme lacks consideration of the traffic jam condition of the next road junction.

anchor_claim: The invention provides a method and a device for identifying risk factors of expressway domains, and relates to the technical field of data processing, wherein the method comprises the steps of extracting key features from preprocessed data, wherein the key features are used for identifying risk factors; the method comprises the steps of training a neural network model by utilizing key features to obtain a trained neural network model, identifying risk factors through the trained neural network model, carrying out association mining on the risk factors to obtain correlations among the risk factors, distributing an importance score for each risk factor based on the correlations among the risk factors, calculating a dynamic adjustment factor, multiplying the dynamic adjustment factor by the importance score of each risk factor to obtain an adjusted importance score, and sorting the risk factors according to the adjusted importance score to obtain key factors affecting the expressway domain risk. The risk factor identification method and the risk factor identification device can identify the risk factors more accurately and efficiently.
cited_claim: The invention provides a fee deduction method, a fee deduction system, fee deduction equipment and a fee deduction medium for an intelligent transportation system, and belongs to the technical field of intelligent transportation. The method comprises the steps of collecting vehicle images, vehicle running information and traffic flow information at preset positions of a traffic system, identifying and analyzing the vehicle images by adopting a deep learning algorithm, obtaining license plate information and vehicle type information, predicting running paths and running time of the vehicles based on historical running data of the vehicles, dynamically calculating deduction amount according to the running paths, the running time and the real-time traffic flow information of the vehicles, sending the deduction amount to a mobile terminal of a user, and providing payment service. According to the invention, by constructing an intelligent recognition system, vehicle information is acquired in real time, and dynamic fee deduction is carried out by combining various factors, so that accurate and reasonable traffic and parking management is realized.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a traffic signal lamp timing method and system, the method comprises the steps of S1, configuring a traffic signal lamp management system to obtain current passing time and congestion degree data of each intersection traffic signal lamp, S2, comparing the congestion degree data with a current congestion degree data threshold value of the intersection traffic signal lamp set by the system, judging whether the current congestion degree data threshold value of the intersection traffic signal lamp set by the system is exceeded, if yes, entering step S3, if not, returning to step S1, S3, inputting the current passing time and the congestion degree data of the intersection traffic signal lamp into a trained neural network model to obtain optimal passing time of the intersection traffic signal lamp, and S4, synthesizing according to the optimal passing time and the current passing time to gradually adjust the passing time of the intersection traffic signal lamp. The invention solves the problem that the existing traffic signal controller dynamically matches the optimal signal timing scheme lacks consideration of the traffic jam condition of the next road junction.
cited_claim: The invention relates to an intelligent acquisition, analysis, prediction and automatic violation correction method and system based on public transportation violation big data, belonging to the field of traffic informatization and intelligent management. The method aims at identifying complex and various traffic illegal behaviors and analyzing massive illegal data. The system comprises data acquisition, processing and storage, analysis and prediction, automatic violation correction and data security. Real-time acquisition and efficient processing of illegal actions are realized through multi-source data access, edge calculation and distributed storage, deep learning and big data technology are utilized to carry out deep analysis on traffic illegal data, and suspected illegal actions are tracked, recorded and obtained through real-time video stream analysis. The system adopts a multi-level security protection mechanism to ensure data privacy and security, and realizes flexible expansion and multi-system cooperation through a modularized design. Compared with the traditional system, the method has the remarkable advantages in the aspects of data acquisition comprehensiveness, processing efficiency, prediction accuracy, violation automation correction, data safety and the like.

cited_claim: The invention discloses a method and related equipment for predicting urban road network traffic speed, which belong to the technical field of urban road network traffic speed prediction, and an urban road network traffic speed prediction model is established based on STGAT-LSTM deep learning combination model, so that not only can the spatial correlation of static factors be extracted based on a graph attention network, but also the time correlation of dynamic factors can be captured by using a long-term and short-term memory network, thereby realizing the accurate prediction of the urban road network traffic speed. cited_claim: The invention provides a traffic signal lamp control method and a traffic signal lamp control system based on space-time flow data, which are used for embedding time sequence information into traffic flow data of each time point in collected historical data according to target space-time flow monitoring data of a target road in a past monitoring time period, and inputting the space-time flow monitoring data after the integration time sequence is embedded into an implicit representation into a target congestion prediction neural network, so that the target congestion prediction neural network of a fused bypass network component can learn time information among a plurality of continuous traffic flow data so as to increase the accuracy of congestion prediction results output by the neural network. That is, based on combining the time sequence information of each traffic flow data with the traffic flow data characteristics, the learning effect of the target congestion prediction neural network on the correlation between the traffic flow data is improved, and the accuracy of the estimated result of the traffic congestion road section is improved, so that accurate traffic signal lamp control is performed.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses an operation and maintenance system of offshore wind power equipment, which relates to the technical field of offshore wind power and comprises an equipment monitoring module, a data processing module, a fault early warning module, an intervention module and a data visualization module, wherein the equipment monitoring module is used for monitoring the operation state of the offshore wind power equipment in real time and collecting operation state parameters of the equipment, the data processing module is used for processing and storing operation state data to conduct data cleaning, the fault early warning module is used for analyzing the health condition of the equipment through a diagnosis algorithm and identifying potential faults in real time to conduct fault prediction, the intervention module is used for notifying operation and maintenance personnel to remotely control the equipment to repair or adjust when an early warning signal is received, and the data visualization module is used for conducting visual display. By combining a diagnosis algorithm based on rules and a fault early warning system based on a machine learning algorithm, efficient fault prediction and early warning are realized, potential faults are found in advance and early warning signals are sent out, so that dependence on manual inspection and field maintenance is reduced, equipment downtime and maintenance cost are reduced, and overall operation and maintenance cost is remarkably reduced.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of electric power detection and discloses a method and a system for detecting the running performance of a wind turbine generator based on a power generation working condition, wherein the method comprises the following steps of dynamically adjusting the data acquisition frequency and range according to a risk level; the method comprises the steps of obtaining real-time operation data and real-time image data of a wind turbine generator and carrying out working condition division, fusing the real-time operation data and the real-time image features to obtain real-time fusion features, adjusting weights of the operation data and the image features in the real-time fusion features based on working condition division results and combining dynamic weight distribution strategies, predicting real-time power generation performance indexes of the wind turbine generator by utilizing a pre-built multi-mode deep learning model, and analyzing the operation performance of the wind turbine generator based on the predicted real-time power generation performance indexes. The method overcomes the defects of single data, insufficient feature fusion and risk perception lag of the traditional method, and provides important technical support for efficient operation and intelligent development of the wind turbine generator.

anchor_claim: The disclosure relates to a variable pitch control method, device and system based on a BP neural network. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a first target rotating speed and an actual rotating speed of a wind driven generator, determining a first error value between the first target rotating speed and the actual rotating speed, inputting the first target rotating speed, the actual rotating speed and the first error value into a BP neural network which completes training to obtain a proportion coefficient and an integral coefficient which are output by the BP neural network, updating configuration parameters of a PI controller by using the proportion coefficient and the integral coefficient to obtain an updated PI controller, inputting the first error into the updated PI controller to obtain a first blade angle which is output by the updated PI controller, and adjusting the blade angle of the wind driven generator based on the first blade angle. The scheme can improve the accuracy of control parameters of the variable pitch controller.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of electric power detection and discloses a method and a system for detecting the running performance of a wind turbine generator based on a power generation working condition, wherein the method comprises the following steps of dynamically adjusting the data acquisition frequency and range according to a risk level; the method comprises the steps of obtaining real-time operation data and real-time image data of a wind turbine generator and carrying out working condition division, fusing the real-time operation data and the real-time image features to obtain real-time fusion features, adjusting weights of the operation data and the image features in the real-time fusion features based on working condition division results and combining dynamic weight distribution strategies, predicting real-time power generation performance indexes of the wind turbine generator by utilizing a pre-built multi-mode deep learning model, and analyzing the operation performance of the wind turbine generator based on the predicted real-time power generation performance indexes. The method overcomes the defects of single data, insufficient feature fusion and risk perception lag of the traditional method, and provides important technical support for efficient operation and intelligent development of the wind turbine generator.
cited_claim: The disclosure relates to a variable pitch control method, device and system based on a BP neural network. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a first target rotating speed and an actual rotating speed of a wind driven generator, determining a first error value between the first target rotating speed and the actual rotating speed, inputting the first target rotating speed, the actual rotating speed and the first error value into a BP neural network which completes training to obtain a proportion coefficient and an integral coefficient which are output by the BP neural network, updating configuration parameters of a PI controller by using the proportion coefficient and the integral coefficient to obtain an updated PI controller, inputting the first error into the updated PI controller to obtain a first blade angle which is output by the updated PI controller, and adjusting the blade angle of the wind driven generator based on the first blade angle. The scheme can improve the accuracy of control parameters of the variable pitch controller.

anchor_claim: The invention belongs to the field of intelligent robots, and discloses a method and a system for maintaining a fan blade robot based on Yun Bian cooperation, wherein the method comprises the steps that the intelligent robot acquires a fan blade damage image in real time and performs primary feature extraction; the method comprises the steps of carrying out a multi-task learning support vector machine on an edge node, classifying damage types by the edge node, carrying out robot positioning by fusing multi-sensor data and a SLAM algorithm, generating a preliminary maintenance strategy, carrying out maintenance tasks by a robot according to instructions of the edge node, feeding back to a cloud, retraining a classification model by the cloud through a convolutional neural network, optimizing a loss function and model parameters, pushing parameter optimization results to the edge node, replacing original model parameters by the edge node, and optimizing fan blade damage classification and maintenance strategies.
cited_claim: The invention provides a monitoring method based on blade rotation sound and equipment for assisting monitoring, which are characterized in that weak airflow disturbance sound wave signals generated when a wind driven generator blade rotates are captured through a non-contact acoustic sensor array, the captured sound wave signals are subjected to standardized pretreatment, the environmental noise of the sound wave signals is subjected to dynamic filtering treatment, acoustic sensor data from different positions are integrated to form a comprehensive sound image, deep learning is applied to model and predict the health condition of the blade, edge calculation is integrated, partial data processing tasks are completed at a place close to the acoustic sensor, interconnection and intercommunication among the equipment are realized by adopting an Internet of things platform, a cloud edge cooperative optimization mode is implemented, tasks are automatically distributed to the most suitable processing nodes, no sensor is required to be installed on the blade, physical influence on the equipment is avoided, the environmental noise is effectively filtered, the signal to noise ratio of a target sound wave signal is enhanced, and the monitoring precision is improved.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of motor testing, and provides an intelligent comprehensive performance testing platform for a magnetic suspension high-speed permanent magnet synchronous motor, which comprises an electrical performance index testing module, a dynamic characteristic index testing module, a flow control module and a data analysis and diagnosis module, wherein the electrical performance index testing module is used for detecting the electrical performance of the magnetic suspension motor, the dynamic characteristic index testing module is used for detecting the corresponding change capacity in the operation process of the magnetic suspension motor, the flow control module is used for controlling detection equipment and automatically switching testing links, and the data analysis and diagnosis module is used for analyzing and diagnosing data obtained by the electrical performance index testing and the dynamic characteristic index testing, wherein the dynamic characteristic index is analyzed and diagnosed through a nonlinear autoregressive neural network model with external input. Through the technical scheme, the problems that test items in the prior art are complicated, a plurality of test equipment needs to be replaced frequently, the process is time-consuming and labor-consuming, and the workload of testers is greatly increased are solved.
cited_claim: The application discloses a battery state of charge estimation method, a system, equipment, a medium and a product, and relates to the field of state of charge estimation; the method comprises the steps of determining the state of charge of a battery to be estimated by using a battery state of charge estimation model according to the operation data of the battery to be estimated in a set period, wherein the battery state of charge estimation model is obtained by training and optimizing a teacher model by using a training data set and combining a network structure searching algorithm and knowledge distillation, the training data set comprises the operation data of the battery to be estimated in a second set period and corresponding state of charge labels, and the teacher model is a convolutional neural network model. According to the application, through combining the advantages of knowledge distillation and network structure search, the optimal student model is found in a certain search space, and knowledge distillation is used for guiding the student model to learn, so that the battery state of charge estimation model is obtained, and the efficiency and the accuracy of battery state of charge estimation are improved.
