anchor_claim: The fault detection method comprises the steps of obtaining a plurality of sample data sets and a plurality of corresponding reference voltage data of a normal lithium ion battery, applying the sample data to train a deep learning algorithm to obtain a first mapping relation and a second mapping relation respectively, and calculating a voltage prediction error threshold based on voltage prediction values of the first mapping relation and the second mapping relation. Collecting a plurality of test data sets and a plurality of corresponding real voltage data of the lithium ion battery to be tested, calculating to obtain a first error, a second error and a voltage prediction error by using a first mapping relation and a second mapping relation, and determining a fault judgment result of the lithium ion battery to be tested through a preset logic relation.
cited_claim: The application relates to a battery health state assessment method, a device and electronic equipment, belonging to the technical field of battery health monitoring, wherein the method comprises the steps of acquiring battery operation data acquired by a sensor in real time; the method comprises the steps of obtaining battery state data estimated by a Kalman filter in real time, carrying out normalization processing on battery operation data and the battery state data to obtain time sequence data, and inputting the time sequence data serving as input features into a deep learning model with complete training to obtain estimated battery state data. According to the application, the battery state data is accurately estimated through the adaptive filter, the battery state data estimated by the filter and the battery operation data acquired by the sensor are used as the input of the deep learning model, so that the deep fusion of the physical model and the data driving model is realized, and the high-precision and real-time evaluation of the battery state of health is realized.

anchor_claim: Accurate real-time monitoring of distribution networks becomes increasingly pivotal to ensure reliable and optimal operation of grid. Existing joint parameter-state estimation techniques predominantly focus on transmission systems, making their applicability to distribution systems challenging due to variations in available input data. Furthermore, the joint estimation techniques significantly suffer from computational complexity. Present disclosure provides a method and a system for personalized multi-subject text to image generation. The system first uses lossy Distflow equations and an inverse Physics-Informed Neural Network (iPINN) architecture for learning network voltage dynamics, drift matrix and network bus voltages from real-time bus power injection data and historical voltage data. Thereafter, the system determines a plurality of line parameters from the learnt drift matrix using a least-square optimization technique. Finally, the system calculates line power flows and line currents using the lossy Distflow equations.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a method for predicting battery SOC, SOE and BST based on a hybrid deep learning network, which is characterized in that data sequences of current, voltage, battery surface temperature and charge-discharge capacity of a battery obtained under different test conditions are input into a constructed hybrid deep learning network for training, then a trained network model is utilized for estimating battery states, the battery SOC, SOE and battery surface temperature BST at the current t moment and the future moment are estimated, and the deep learning network sequentially comprises a Informer network, a GRU network and a KAN network from an input side to an output side. The method provided by the invention not only can improve the prediction precision of the model, but also can predict the battery SOC, SOE and battery surface temperature BST at the future time in a multi-scale output mode, and provides reliable reference information for controlling the battery temperature.

anchor_claim: The application discloses a lithium battery health state prediction method based on a hidden Markov model, electronic equipment and a medium. The method comprises the steps of determining factors affecting the health state of the lithium battery as charge and discharge parameters, establishing a relational expression of the health state of the lithium battery at the previous moment, the current charge and discharge parameters and the current health state, establishing a knowledge base according to the relational expression, further establishing a hidden Markov model, and predicting the health state of the lithium battery. According to the state attribute and the monitoring parameter of the corresponding lithium battery, the method and the device for predicting the health state of the lithium battery make reliable predictions on the health state of the lithium battery.
cited_claim: Disclosed are a method and device for evaluating the influence of a process on the performance of a semiconductor device and their application. The disclosed method for evaluating influence of a process on performance of a semiconductor device may include a step for obtaining an EPM data set that includes a plurality of EPMs measured from a plurality of semiconductor device samples manufactured under a plurality of different process conditions; establishing a plurality of EPM groups by grouping EPMs that exhibit correlations within the EPM data set; performing data component analysis on each of a plurality of EPM groups to derive a plurality of PCs of the EPMs within the plurality of EPM groups; training an artificial neural network to output a FOM for the semiconductor device; performing an input influence evaluation for each PC of individual semiconductor device samples.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a method for predicting battery SOC, SOE and BST based on a hybrid deep learning network, which is characterized in that data sequences of current, voltage, battery surface temperature and charge-discharge capacity of a battery obtained under different test conditions are input into a constructed hybrid deep learning network for training, then a trained network model is utilized for estimating battery states, the battery SOC, SOE and battery surface temperature BST at the current t moment and the future moment are estimated, and the deep learning network sequentially comprises a Informer network, a GRU network and a KAN network from an input side to an output side. The method provided by the invention not only can improve the prediction precision of the model, but also can predict the battery SOC, SOE and battery surface temperature BST at the future time in a multi-scale output mode, and provides reliable reference information for controlling the battery temperature.
cited_claim: The invention provides a monitoring method and a control device for fire hazards of a lithium battery energy storage system, which belong to the technical field of thermal runaway early warning, wherein the method comprises the steps of confirming thermal state parameters of a lithium battery, wherein the thermal state parameters are used for reflecting the thermal state of the lithium battery in the use process; the method comprises the steps of determining a thermal control risk characteristic value of a lithium battery according to thermal state parameters, determining a comprehensive index for reflecting the thermal control risk of the lithium battery according to the thermal control risk characteristic value and a multi-parameter fusion technology, selecting a machine learning algorithm according to the thermal control risk characteristic value, determining a thermal control risk prediction model according to the machine learning algorithm, collecting real-time thermal state parameters of the lithium battery, and determining the current thermal control state of the lithium battery according to the real-time thermal state parameters and the thermal control risk prediction model of the lithium battery. The invention can predict whether the lithium battery is about to generate thermal runaway, improve the monitoring accuracy, send out early warning signals in time and ensure the safe operation of the system.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to a battery charge-discharge curve prediction method and system based on capacity estimation, comprising the steps of obtaining discharge capacity, complete charge curves and complete discharge curves of a plurality of batteries of a type to be detected, discretizing the complete charge curves to obtain charge curve data, dividing the charge curve data into low-voltage interval data and high-voltage interval data, discretizing the complete discharge curves to obtain discharge curve data, constructing a training set by utilizing the low-voltage interval data and the discharge capacity, training to obtain a capacity prediction model, inputting the low-voltage interval data into the capacity prediction model to obtain battery capacity estimation data, constructing a charge-discharge curve prediction model by deep learning based on the low-voltage interval data, the high-voltage interval data, the battery capacity estimation data and the discharge curve data, and predicting the complete charge-discharge curve of the battery to be detected by utilizing a total model formed by the capacity prediction model and the charge-discharge curve prediction model. The invention can better capture the battery characteristics and has high accuracy of the prediction result.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a power battery management method and system based on data driving, in particular to the technical field of battery degradation monitoring, which are used for solving the problem that the hidden degradation of a battery is difficult to monitor in real time in a microcirculation state in the prior art; the method comprises the steps of analyzing a micro-circulation energy spectrum through a transient spectrum clustering algorithm, identifying risks of spectrum concentration abnormality and structural degradation, analyzing a battery internal resistance deviation trend, evaluating influence of internal resistance fluctuation on active material granulation, judging whether micro-circulation abnormality risks exist or not based on spectrum abnormality and internal resistance fluctuation conditions, analyzing stress accumulation conditions through tensor decomposition and singular value decomposition when the abnormality risks exist, and evaluating attenuation gradients of electrode polarization signals through combination of variation modal decomposition and a recurrent neural network to determine the overall degradation trend of the battery.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of new energy automobiles and discloses a method and a device for judging battery inconsistency, wherein the method comprises the following steps of S1, obtaining SOC data of a vehicle at the tail end of a charging working condition under different charging states, S2, calculating voltage differences of frames under the charging working condition for a plurality of times based on the SOC data, performing linear fitting to obtain trend characteristics describing trend of the voltage differences over time, and S3, counting results of the linear fitting and the voltage differences in the charging working condition for the plurality of times to form discrete degree characteristics describing discrete degrees of the voltage differences relative to the trend. By carrying out parameter fitting on the pressure difference value of the charging terminal, extracting characteristic quantities such as fitting slope, fitting goodness, mean value and maximum value of the pressure difference and the like, and obtaining weight parameters of all the characteristics by using machine learning training, the synchronous input of multiple characteristics is realized, misjudgment caused by single characteristics is avoided, and the accuracy of judgment is improved.
cited_claim: A computer implemented method (400) of determining a characteristic of a rechargeable battery, the rechargeable battery being associated with an adjustable battery parameter. The computer implemented method comprises determining (402) a physics-based prediction (22) of a correlation between the characteristic and a quantity of interest of the rechargeable battery, where the physics-based prediction (22) is based upon the adjustable battery parameter, and wherein the quantity of interest comprises a function of one or more cycling features, and the one or more cycling features comprise variables which are measurable during a charge-discharge cycle of the rechargeable battery. The computer implemented method (400) further comprises receiving (404) cycling data (30) comprising measured values of the one or more cycling features during one or more charge-discharge cycles of the rechargeable battery. The computer implemented method (400) further comprises coupling (406) the physics-based prediction (22) of the correlation to a trained data-driven model, wherein the data-driven model has been trained using a machine learning algorithm and is configured to determine a correction to the physics-based prediction of the correlation (26) as a function of the quantity of interest, and determining (410) the characteristic based on the physics-based prediction (22) of the correlation, the correction to the physics-based prediction of the correlation (26) and the received cycling data (30).

anchor_claim: The application relates to a battery health state assessment method, a device and electronic equipment, belonging to the technical field of battery health monitoring, wherein the method comprises the steps of acquiring battery operation data acquired by a sensor in real time; the method comprises the steps of obtaining battery state data estimated by a Kalman filter in real time, carrying out normalization processing on battery operation data and the battery state data to obtain time sequence data, and inputting the time sequence data serving as input features into a deep learning model with complete training to obtain estimated battery state data. According to the application, the battery state data is accurately estimated through the adaptive filter, the battery state data estimated by the filter and the battery operation data acquired by the sensor are used as the input of the deep learning model, so that the deep fusion of the physical model and the data driving model is realized, and the high-precision and real-time evaluation of the battery state of health is realized.
cited_claim: The invention provides a monitoring method and a control device for fire hazards of a lithium battery energy storage system, which belong to the technical field of thermal runaway early warning, wherein the method comprises the steps of confirming thermal state parameters of a lithium battery, wherein the thermal state parameters are used for reflecting the thermal state of the lithium battery in the use process; the method comprises the steps of determining a thermal control risk characteristic value of a lithium battery according to thermal state parameters, determining a comprehensive index for reflecting the thermal control risk of the lithium battery according to the thermal control risk characteristic value and a multi-parameter fusion technology, selecting a machine learning algorithm according to the thermal control risk characteristic value, determining a thermal control risk prediction model according to the machine learning algorithm, collecting real-time thermal state parameters of the lithium battery, and determining the current thermal control state of the lithium battery according to the real-time thermal state parameters and the thermal control risk prediction model of the lithium battery. The invention can predict whether the lithium battery is about to generate thermal runaway, improve the monitoring accuracy, send out early warning signals in time and ensure the safe operation of the system.

cited_claim: The invention discloses a lithium ion battery fault diagnosis method and system based on a dynamic automatic encoder, comprising the steps of acquiring normal data and abnormal data serving as input data of the encoder so as to train the encoder, mapping the input data to a low-dimensional representation based on an encoder network, enabling the low-dimensional representation to be a compressed representation or a characteristic representation of the data, restoring the low-dimensional representation to an approximation value of the input data to output the data, calculating a reconstruction error by using a loss function of a mean square error so as to reduce the difference between the input data and the output data, after the reconstruction error is calculated, using a back propagation algorithm to propagate the error from an output layer to the input layer, updating the weight and the bias of a neural network, and repeating the steps until the loss function converges or reaches a preset training round number. The invention has strong unsupervised learning ability, automatic learning failure mode, strong adaptability, robustness, feature extraction ability and local feature capturing ability.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of signal processing, and provides a bioelectric signal control method, a bioelectric signal control device, bioelectric signal control equipment and a bioelectric signal storage medium for hemorrhoid rehabilitation; the bioelectric signal control method for hemorrhoid rehabilitation comprises the steps of obtaining hemorrhoid types, inflammation degrees and pain conditions of a target user, carrying out numerical treatment on the hemorrhoid types, the inflammation degrees and the pain conditions to obtain target coding information, analyzing the target coding information based on a neural network model which is trained in advance to obtain pathological states of the target user, and dynamically adjusting parameters of bioelectric signals based on the pathological states. The bioelectric signal parameters are controlled according to the combination of the hemorrhoid type, the inflammation degree and the pain condition of the target user, so that the target user is subjected to personalized treatment aiming at the pathological state of the target user, and the experience effect of the user is improved.
cited_claim: A neural network (302) is trained (203) using a training corpus (202) having a plurality of information features, each of the information features including both a reference radiation treatment dose and at least one corresponding post-treatment patient datum. By one approach, the at least one corresponding post-treatment patient datum comprises patient imagery such as, but not limited to, one or more computed tomography images (305). That trained neural network (302) facilitates radiation treatment planning by generating resultant treatment efficacy probability information and resultant treatment complications probability information.

  - 두 특허 모두 신경망(neural network)을 활용하여 특정 데이터를 분석하고, 이를 기반으로 사용자 맞춤형 치료를 제공하는 점에서 유사성을 보임.
  - 원본 특허는 생체 전기 신호를 제어하여 치질 재활을 목표로 하고 있으며, 인용 특허는 방사선 치료 계획을 위한 신경망 모델을 사용하여 치료 효과와 합병증 확률 정보를 생성함.

  - 원본 특허는 생체 전기 신호 제어에 중점을 두고 있으며, 인용 특허는 방사선 치료에 초점을 맞추고 있어 직접적인 침해 가능성은 낮지만, 신경망을 활용한 데이터 분석 및 치료 계획 수립이라는 공통 요소로 인해 간접적인 침해 리스크가 존재할 수 있음.
- **위험 요소 식별**:
  - 인용 특허의 신경망 모델이 원본 특허의 생체 신호 제어 방법과 유사한 방식으로 작동할 경우, 기술적 유사성으로 인해 침해 리스크가 증가할 수 있음.
  - 사용자 맞춤형 치료를 위한 데이터 처리 및 분석 방법에서의 유사성이 법적 분쟁을 초래할 수 있음.

- **대안적 기술 접근법**:
  - 생체 신호 제어 대신 다른 치료 방법(예: 약물 치료, 물리 치료 등)을 병행하여 신경망을 사용하지 않고도 사용자 맞춤형 치료를 제공하는 방안을 모색할 수 있음.

cited_claim: The application relates to the technical field of brain science, and discloses a multi-region adjusting method and system based on transcranial time domain coherent stimulation. The method specifically discloses determining a stimulation sequence and a time interval of a plurality of target brain regions, respectively stimulating the plurality of target brain regions through a tTIS system under the corresponding stimulation sequence and time interval, wherein the tTIS system comprises a plurality of pairs of electrodes, each two pairs of electrodes act on the same target brain region, acquiring behavior data and brain nerve activity data of an individual in a behavior task in the stimulation process, and analyzing the behavior change trend of the individual according to the behavior data and the brain nerve activity data. The application can realize the activation or inhibition of the cortical brain region and the deep brain region, and can realize the information transmission and functional connection between the target brain regions and the promotion of complex cognitive tasks by accurately regulating and controlling the stimulation sequence and time interval of a plurality of target brain regions, thereby optimizing the neural network function of the brain.

anchor_claim: A system and method for automated neurostimulation programming uses machine learning to determine target stimulation or discard suboptimal parameters based on actual or anticipated clinical effects. The system includes processors to generate a database of previously acquired lead and/or brain images, tested stimulation settings and associated clinical effects. A region of interest surrounding at least one stimulation lead is identified. Stimulation settings linked to specific clinical effects, including beneficial or detrimental effects, are determined for the region of interest. A trained machine learning model identifies desirable, undesirable, target, or other stimulation parameter values for a new patient by classifying or regressing raw imaging data from the region of interest. The model is trained to recommend settings that produce desired clinical effects. An output provides the target stimulation parameter values predicted to maximize therapeutic benefit and minimize side effects. This enables automated programming of neurostimulation devices through data-driven machine learning based on clinical outcomes.

###

  1. **데이터 처리 방식**: 원본 특허가 특정 뇌 자극 설정을 다루는 반면, 인용 특허는 방사선 치료를 다루고 있어, 특정 데이터 처리 방식이 유사할 수 있습니다.
  2. **모델 훈련 방법**: 두 특허의 모델 훈련 방법이 유사할 경우, 침해 리스크가 증가할 수 있습니다.

  1. **데이터 유형 변경**: 원본 특허에서 사용하는 뇌 이미지 대신 다른 유형의 이미징 데이터(예: MRI 대신 PET 스캔)를 사용할 수 있습니다.
  2. **모델 구조 변경**: 기계 학습 모델의 구조를 변경하여, 인용 특허의 신경망 구조와의 유사성을 줄일 수 있습니다.
- **대안적 기술 접근법**:
  1. **비지도 학습 기법 활용**: 지도 학습 대신 비지도 학습 기법을 사용하여 데이터에서 패턴을 발견하고 최적의 파라미터를 결정하는 방법을 고려할 수 있습니다.
  2. **다양한 데이터 소스 통합**: 다양한 데이터 소스를 통합하여, 단일 데이터 세트에 의존하지 않고 보다 포괄적인 분석을 수행할 수 있습니다.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to a robot operation action real-time control method and system with cooperation of a large model and a small model. The method comprises the steps of firstly collecting and preprocessing multi-mode data, carrying out data encoding on the multi-mode data to obtain feature vectors, simultaneously utilizing a cross-mode token alignment technology to align the multi-mode data to obtain feature representations, training a neural network model by utilizing the feature vectors and the feature representations to obtain a trained large model, carrying out pruning, distillation and quantization operation on the trained large model to generate a small model, deploying the small model to edge computing equipment, acquiring current instruction text data in real time by the edge computing equipment and reasoning the current instruction text data to generate an action plan of the robot, and finally utilizing the action plan of the robot and feedback signals of all sensors to control operation actions of the robot in real time. Compared with the prior art, the invention has the advantages of low delay, high efficiency, improved tactile sensation, self-adaptive grabbing, real-time action planning capability and the like.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a garbage sorting robot based on deep learning, which comprises a frame main body, a travelling mechanism, a mechanical arm mechanism, a garbage storage mechanism and a control host. The invention can capture and analyze complex image data in the garbage heap in real time, and the images can be quickly converted into accurate classification information by means of the strong force of deep learning, and can be accurately distinguished whether recyclable paper, plastic, metal, harmful batteries, chemicals or other types of garbage. The process not only greatly improves the classification accuracy, but also obviously accelerates the processing speed, and thoroughly changes the inefficiency and error-prone situation of the traditional manual sorting.

cited_claim: A method for detecting contamination on an end effector of a robotic manipulator arranged to manipulate items The method involves obtaining image data representative of an image of the end effector captured by a camera after a pick-and-place operation by the robotic manipulator. In response to a determination that the end effector is contaminated, a signal indicative of the end effector being in a contaminated state is generated.

anchor_claim: The invention provides a collaborative robot grabbing detection method based on a lightweight network, relates to the technical field of industrial intelligent grabbing, solves the problems existing in the traditional two-dimensional plane grabbing, and optimizes the existing deep learning grabbing algorithm. By introducing an attention mechanism module and reconstructing the grabbing graph, a novel network framework ORANGE (ORientation ATTENTIVE GRASP SYNTHESIS) is proposed, and the grabbing problem is changed into a regression and classification problem. In addition, a directional attention mechanism is proposed to improve the conventional grabbing strategy by enhanced grabbing maps (Augmented Grasp Map, AGM). According to the method, the grabbing problem is divided into a plurality of discrete intervals, and each interval represents a direction angle in a certain range, so that the overlapping problem of the same grabbing point in different directions is reduced. According to the method, the accuracy and the stability of the prediction of the grabbing point are improved by pixel-level processing of the depth image and combining the characteristic extraction capability of the convolutional neural network.
cited_claim: The invention provides a large-deformation flexible rod robot kinematic modeling method based on a neural network. Firstly, aiming at the motion characteristics of the robot, carrying out sensitivity analysis on parameters of a system to identify key parameters with obvious influence, establishing forward and backward kinematics of the large-deformation flexible rod robot based on a neural network algorithm according to the conclusion of the sensitivity analysis, namely, carrying out preliminary training on a network through a simulation data set to accurately predict the robot kinematics, optimizing the network parameters by adopting a migration learning technology in view of the difference between a simulation model and actual application, acquiring the terminal pose data of the actual robot by utilizing a multi-camera system, and fine-adjusting the network parameters by utilizing the data to improve the accuracy of the model, and finally, accurately determining a target operating point by combining a visual servo control technology to guide the robot to accurately reach a preset position to execute tasks. The invention is accurate and efficient, greatly improves the analysis efficiency, and has remarkable generalization capability of the model.

cited_claim: The invention discloses a cross-species optimization-based mechanical arm sparse motion planning method and system, which belong to the technical field of mechanical arm control, and comprise the steps of S1, constructing a constrained sparse motion planning model of a mechanical arm by taking joint angular velocity space energy of the mechanical arm as an objective function, converting the constrained sparse motion planning model into an unconstrained sparse motion planning model based on a Lagrange multiplier method, S2, constructing an error momentum neural network for solving the unconstrained sparse motion planning model in a current iteration, wherein the error momentum neural network comprises a hidden layer and an output layer, S3, solving the output layer variables of the error momentum neural network model at different initial points, taking the output layer variables as particles, searching for an optimal output layer variable by utilizing a particle swarm algorithm, S4, switching to S2 if the maximum iteration times is not reached, and otherwise, realizing the mechanical arm sparse motion planning according to the optimal output layer variables in each iteration. The method can quickly search the global optimal solution and improve the solution quality of the mechanical arm sparse motion planning.

anchor_claim: The invention provides a robot control method, a device and equipment based on multi-agent reinforcement learning, wherein the method comprises the steps of carrying out self-adaptive reset on strategy parameters of an initial neural network of each robot in a robot group cooperation system according to preset rules, inputting sample observation data of each robot at the current moment and sample actions of the last moment into the initial neural network of each robot to obtain local prediction return values of each robot, calculating the global prediction return values according to the local prediction return values of each robot, fusing parameters of the initial neural network of each robot, updating an experience pool of each robot, collecting sample data from the experience pool of each robot, periodically repeating training process of each robot until preset convergence conditions are achieved, and controlling each robot to complete cooperation tasks based on the trained neural network of each robot. anchor_claim: The invention provides a collaborative robot grabbing detection method based on a lightweight network, relates to the technical field of industrial intelligent grabbing, solves the problems existing in the traditional two-dimensional plane grabbing, and optimizes the existing deep learning grabbing algorithm. By introducing an attention mechanism module and reconstructing the grabbing graph, a novel network framework ORANGE (ORientation ATTENTIVE GRASP SYNTHESIS) is proposed, and the grabbing problem is changed into a regression and classification problem. In addition, a directional attention mechanism is proposed to improve the conventional grabbing strategy by enhanced grabbing maps (Augmented Grasp Map, AGM). According to the method, the grabbing problem is divided into a plurality of discrete intervals, and each interval represents a direction angle in a certain range, so that the overlapping problem of the same grabbing point in different directions is reduced. According to the method, the accuracy and the stability of the prediction of the grabbing point are improved by pixel-level processing of the depth image and combining the characteristic extraction capability of the convolutional neural network.
cited_claim: The invention relates to a robot operation action real-time control method and system with cooperation of a large model and a small model. The method comprises the steps of firstly collecting and preprocessing multi-mode data, carrying out data encoding on the multi-mode data to obtain feature vectors, simultaneously utilizing a cross-mode token alignment technology to align the multi-mode data to obtain feature representations, training a neural network model by utilizing the feature vectors and the feature representations to obtain a trained large model, carrying out pruning, distillation and quantization operation on the trained large model to generate a small model, deploying the small model to edge computing equipment, acquiring current instruction text data in real time by the edge computing equipment and reasoning the current instruction text data to generate an action plan of the robot, and finally utilizing the action plan of the robot and feedback signals of all sensors to control operation actions of the robot in real time. Compared with the prior art, the invention has the advantages of low delay, high efficiency, improved tactile sensation, self-adaptive grabbing, real-time action planning capability and the like.

anchor_claim: The invention provides a robot control method, a device and equipment based on multi-agent reinforcement learning, wherein the method comprises the steps of carrying out self-adaptive reset on strategy parameters of an initial neural network of each robot in a robot group cooperation system according to preset rules, inputting sample observation data of each robot at the current moment and sample actions of the last moment into the initial neural network of each robot to obtain local prediction return values of each robot, calculating the global prediction return values according to the local prediction return values of each robot, fusing parameters of the initial neural network of each robot, updating an experience pool of each robot, collecting sample data from the experience pool of each robot, periodically repeating training process of each robot until preset convergence conditions are achieved, and controlling each robot to complete cooperation tasks based on the trained neural network of each robot. The invention can improve the diversity and the breadth of the exploration behaviors and improve the exploration efficiency.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a model-free shape control method, a model-free shape control system, a model-free shape control device and a model-free shape control medium for a continuum robot, wherein the model-free shape control method comprises the steps of applying a zero neural network model to a shape characteristic parameter error function, obtaining an update formula of an actuator according to a first design formula, and calculating the variation of the actuator according to an estimated value of a jacobian matrix; the method comprises the steps of applying a zero neural network model to a parameter speed error function, obtaining an update formula of a jacobian matrix according to a second design formula, calculating an estimated variation of the jacobian matrix according to an acceleration value of an actual shape characteristic parameter fed back by a sensor and an estimated actuator acceleration, learning according to the variation of an actuator and the estimated variation of the jacobian matrix to obtain an actuator control input of the continuum robot and an estimated value of the jacobian matrix at the next moment, and controlling the shape of the continuum robot at the next moment. The invention improves the efficiency and accuracy of model-free shape control of the continuum robot, and can be applied to the technical field of robot control.

anchor_claim: The application discloses an intelligent control method and system based on consistency of energy storage batteries, and relates to the technical field of the energy storage batteries, comprising the following steps of acquiring battery monomer charge state difference data of an energy storage battery pack with different battery monomer numbers under different constant temperatures and total capacity change data of the energy storage battery pack caused by the influence of the charge state difference, and constructing a first historical data set; the method comprises the steps of constructing a total capacity variation prediction model of the energy storage battery pack based on machine learning, obtaining real-time temperature, number of battery cells and real-time charge state of each battery cell of the energy storage battery pack, predicting total capacity variation data of the energy storage battery pack according to the total capacity variation prediction model of the energy storage battery pack, evaluating the predicted total capacity variation data of the energy storage battery pack to obtain total capacity influence data of the energy storage battery pack, judging total capacity influence level of the energy storage battery pack according to the total capacity influence data of the energy storage battery pack, and processing the battery cells. The method and the device are used for solving the judgment problem of influence caused by the inconsistency of the SOC of the energy storage battery packs.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a thermal safety coordination management method for battery energy storage, which comprises the following steps of obtaining real-time operation data and historical operation data of a battery, constructing a battery performance attenuation prediction model based on a machine learning algorithm, combining the historical operation data and the real-time operation data to obtain a predicted battery performance attenuation value, monitoring the battery by adopting an acoustic emission and optical fiber sensor to obtain a battery health index, combining the predicted battery performance attenuation value, sending an early warning instruction according to a preset multi-level thermal management strategy, monitoring the battery by adopting a gas sensor to obtain real-time gas data, analyzing the real-time gas data, and sending an out-of-control early warning instruction according to the preset multi-level thermal out-of-control management strategy to complete thermal safety coordination management of the battery energy storage. The invention also provides a system for realizing the thermal safety coordination management method for the battery energy storage. The method ensures that the battery can be maintained in the optimal working temperature range under different environmental temperatures, and can early warn thermal runaway in advance, thereby improving the safety and reliability of the battery.

anchor_claim: The application discloses a method and a device for timely power-off of discharge of a direct-current battery, which comprise the steps of monitoring key parameters of the battery in real time, collecting key parameter data, evaluating the discharge state of the battery according to the key parameter data, judging whether an evaluation result reaches a preset discharge threshold, performing power-off operation on the battery if the evaluation result reaches the preset discharge threshold, collecting historical discharge data of the battery, training by using a model, predicting an optimal power-off threshold by the real-time monitoring data through the trained model, and dynamically adjusting the power-off threshold to be executed according to the optimal power-off threshold. anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of batteries, in particular to a battery pack balancing method for improving performance and prolonging service life. The method comprises the following steps of predicting the real capacity of an electric core by adopting a neural network algorithm, fitting SOC and OCV function mapping according to open-circuit voltage method data on the basis of the real capacity of an output electric core, mapping the SOC of each electric core, dynamically adjusting and balancing in a full life cycle, firstly estimating the current capacity of a battery based on a method for predicting the SOC value based on the real capacity without detailed understanding of the internal state of the battery compared with the method for directly predicting the SOC value in the prior art, then calculating the SOC according to the capacity, improving the accuracy of SOC value measurement, correcting accumulated errors more accurately, dynamically adjusting capacity estimation, reducing accumulated errors, and being capable of being better suitable for the aging of the battery by dynamically estimating the current capacity of the battery.
cited_claim: The application belongs to the technical field of BMS (battery management system), and discloses a wireless battery management method and system based on computational effort coordination, wherein the method comprises the steps that a main control battery system receives abnormal battery parameters of an abnormal subsystem, supervised battery parameters and computational effort coordination requests; the method comprises the steps of determining each normal subsystem by a main control battery system according to an abnormal subsystem, obtaining residual calculation power of each normal subsystem, determining a first subsystem and a second subsystem according to the residual calculation power, training initial neural networks corresponding to calculation power cooperation requests by the main control battery system, the first subsystem and the second subsystem based on abnormal battery parameters and supervision battery parameters to obtain target neural networks, sending the target neural networks to the abnormal subsystem by the main control battery system, and inputting the abnormal battery parameters into the target neural networks by the abnormal subsystem to obtain a request result. The application can avoid the problem that the training time is long and the abnormal situation can not be processed in time due to the insufficient calculation power of the abnormal subsystem, and improves the response speed of the abnormal subsystem.

청구항을 비교 분석하세요. 유사도, 침해 리스크, 회피 전략을 포함해서 답변해주세요.
anchor_claim: The application relates to the technical field of battery temperature management, and discloses an energy storage battery temperature management system and method based on a liquid cooling technology. The method comprises the steps of initializing a battery liquid cooling system design parameter population to generate a plurality of first liquid cooling system design parameter combinations, respectively carrying out heat dissipation simulation in a discharging process and three-dimensional temperature distribution construction on a target energy storage battery based on the plurality of first liquid cooling system design parameter combinations to obtain three-dimensional temperature distribution data, constructing a first relation vector between the number of channels and the temperature and a second relation vector between the flow rate and the temperature of cooling liquid, inputting the first relation vector and the second relation vector into a multi-task deep learning model to carry out optimal combination parameter prediction to obtain the second liquid cooling system design parameter combinations, and further improving the liquid cooling heat dissipation efficiency of the energy storage battery and the thermal management precision in the discharging process of the battery.
cited_claim: The application discloses a method and a device for timely power-off of discharge of a direct-current battery, which comprise the steps of monitoring key parameters of the battery in real time, collecting key parameter data, evaluating the discharge state of the battery according to the key parameter data, judging whether an evaluation result reaches a preset discharge threshold, performing power-off operation on the battery if the evaluation result reaches the preset discharge threshold, collecting historical discharge data of the battery, training by using a model, predicting an optimal power-off threshold by the real-time monitoring data through the trained model, and dynamically adjusting the power-off threshold to be executed according to the optimal power-off threshold. The application intelligently evaluates the discharging state of the battery by monitoring key parameters such as voltage, current, temperature and the like of the battery in real time, and automatically executes power-off operation when the discharging state reaches a preset threshold value. The application also adopts a machine learning algorithm to continuously optimize the power-off threshold value, and improves the intelligent and self-adaptive control capability of the system, thereby effectively preventing the over-discharge of the battery and prolonging the service life of the battery.

anchor_claim: The invention provides a pole piece deviation rectifying control method of an automatic cutting lithium battery winding machine, which comprises the steps of installing a width sensor on the winding machine, acquiring width data of a current winding pole piece in real time, transmitting the acquired width data into a deviation rectifying control system to serve as input parameters of a control decision, analyzing historical production data through a machine learning algorithm while adjusting a control strategy to obtain optimal control parameter combinations under different pole piece widths to form a self-learning parameter optimization model for guiding deviation rectifying control decisions of subsequent batches of products, continuously monitoring offset and motion states of the pole piece in the winding process, filtering the acquired data through a Kalman filtering algorithm, eliminating interference noise, improving accuracy of offset detection, and providing a reliable feedback signal for a deviation rectifying executing mechanism.
cited_claim: The application relates to the technical field of battery temperature management, and discloses an energy storage battery temperature management system and method based on a liquid cooling technology. anchor_claim: The invention provides a pole piece deviation rectifying control method of an automatic cutting lithium battery winding machine, which comprises the steps of installing a width sensor on the winding machine, acquiring width data of a current winding pole piece in real time, transmitting the acquired width data into a deviation rectifying control system to serve as input parameters of a control decision, analyzing historical production data through a machine learning algorithm while adjusting a control strategy to obtain optimal control parameter combinations under different pole piece widths to form a self-learning parameter optimization model for guiding deviation rectifying control decisions of subsequent batches of products, continuously monitoring offset and motion states of the pole piece in the winding process, filtering the acquired data through a Kalman filtering algorithm, eliminating interference noise, improving accuracy of offset detection, and providing a reliable feedback signal for a deviation rectifying executing mechanism.
cited_claim: The present disclosure relates to systems and methods for manufacturing battery electrode plates. The system includes a computing device configured to receive a target process factor of a plurality of process factors associated with manufacturing a battery electrode plate from a client device, predict a change in a characteristic of the battery electrode plate based on a change in a design value of the target process factor via a machine learning model, generate information for selecting the target process factor based on the predicted change in the characteristic of the battery electrode plate, and send the information to the client device for manufacturing the battery electrode plate.

anchor_claim: The invention particularly discloses a fuel cell oxygen supply system control method based on BP neural network and active disturbance rejection control, which comprises the steps of constructing an oxygen supply system model, constructing an active disturbance rejection control model, connecting the active disturbance rejection control model with the oxygen supply system model, controlling the rotating speed of air in the oxygen supply system model and the opening of a back pressure valve through the active disturbance rejection control model to regulate the flow and the pressure of air entering a fuel cell stack, constructing BP neural network, connecting the BP neural network with the active disturbance rejection control model and the oxygen supply system model, and optimizing parameters in the active disturbance rejection control model through the BP neural network, wherein the parameters comprise an estimated value and the bandwidth of a linear expansion observer. The invention can accurately control the air flow and the pressure, reduce the fluctuation of the flow and the pressure in the control process, enhance the robustness of the oxygen supply system, reduce the response time of parts, and have smaller overshoot and stronger anti-interference capability.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a fault diagnosis and processing method of a fuel cell power generation device, which comprises the following steps of training a built neural network algorithm model based on historical operation data of the fuel cell power generation device in a healthy state to obtain a trained neural network algorithm model, inputting real-time operation parameters of a power generation device control system into the trained neural network algorithm model to obtain a predicted single-power-voltage standard deviation, a total voltage of a galvanic pile, a minimum power-voltage change rate and a minimum power-voltage change amplitude parameter value, calculating to obtain deviation values of the total voltage and the single-power-voltage standard deviation, the total voltage of the galvanic pile, the minimum power-voltage change rate and the minimum power-voltage change amplitude, classifying and judging the deviation values of the total voltage and the single-power-voltage standard deviation, the total voltage of the galvanic pile, the minimum power-voltage change rate and the minimum power-voltage change amplitude, and respectively adopting different processing measures based on classification conditions to adjust battery operation conditions.

cited_claim: The invention discloses a fault diagnosis and processing method of a fuel cell power generation device, which comprises the following steps of training a built neural network algorithm model based on historical operation data of the fuel cell power generation device in a healthy state to obtain a trained neural network algorithm model, inputting real-time operation parameters of a power generation device control system into the trained neural network algorithm model to obtain a predicted single-power-voltage standard deviation, a total voltage of a galvanic pile, a minimum power-voltage change rate and a minimum power-voltage change amplitude parameter value, calculating to obtain deviation values of the total voltage and the single-power-voltage standard deviation, the total voltage of the galvanic pile, the minimum power-voltage change rate and the minimum power-voltage change amplitude, classifying and judging the deviation values of the total voltage and the single-power-voltage standard deviation, the total voltage of the galvanic pile, the minimum power-voltage change rate and the minimum power-voltage change amplitude, and respectively adopting different processing measures based on classification conditions to adjust battery operation conditions.

anchor_claim: The invention provides a motor stator vibration suppression method and a motor stator vibration suppression system based on an electromagnetic pad and deep learning, which relate to the technical field of electricity and comprise the steps of collecting a vibration signal of a motor stator and preprocessing the vibration signal; the method comprises the steps of inputting a preprocessed signal into a deep learning model, training and optimizing the deep learning model, fusing characteristics through a full connecting layer to obtain a comprehensive characteristic vector, predicting the future vibration state of a motor stator by utilizing the comprehensive characteristic vector, building an electromagnetic force model, designing a self-adaptive control law based on the predicted future vibration state and the electromagnetic force model, calculating electromagnetic force required for suppressing vibration by utilizing the self-adaptive control law, converting the electromagnetic force into a control signal to adjust an electromagnetic pad, and adjusting the self-adaptive control law by utilizing a multi-objective optimization algorithm while considering vibration suppression effect and energy consumption to form a closed loop feedback control continuous optimization vibration suppression effect.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent frequency converters, in particular to an intelligent frequency converter of a mechanical equipment driving system based on vector model identification, which comprises a wear state monitoring module, a vector model identification module, an intelligent frequency conversion control module and a self-adaptive learning module, wherein the wear state monitoring module collects operation parameters of a motor and the frequency converter, the vector model identification module establishes a vector model of the motor according to the collected data, and analyzes real-time operation states of the motor, including the wear state. The intelligent frequency conversion control module receives the analysis result of the vector model identification module and real-time data of the abrasion state monitoring module, and intelligently adjusts the output frequency and voltage of the frequency converter. The self-adaptive learning module utilizes a machine learning algorithm, combines historical data and real-time feedback, and continuously optimizes a vector model and a variable frequency control strategy. By combining the vector model and the self-adaptive learning module, the fault caused by inaccurate abrasion parameter identification is avoided.

According to the invention, the parameter value in the PID algorithm is corrected in real time through the neural network algorithm, so that the DC brushless motor rotating speed control system has excellent speed control performance, and has good adaptability and robustness to different control objects.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a model-free predictive current control method of a synchronous reluctance motor based on a neural network interference observer, which aims to solve the problems of slow speed response and poor control effect of the synchronous reluctance motor under complex working conditions so as to realize accurate control of the synchronous reluctance motor. The neural network interference observer has the biggest characteristics that the thought of pure integration, compensation and transfer function types is adopted, and a super local model is introduced to construct a motor mathematical model, so that the system robustness is improved.

anchor_claim: The application discloses a stable operation method and a system of a weak magnetic area of a compressor based on angle compensation, and relates to the technical field of control of the weak magnetic area of the compressor; and processing the operation parameters of the target compressor, the estimated angle of the rotor and the electromagnetic data generated by finite element analysis by using a machine learning model to generate a prediction angle, and adjusting the operation parameters of the compressor based on the prediction angle. The machine learning model compensates for the influence of a plurality of frequency components on angle prediction by combining the spatial harmonic component, the high frequency component of the back emf signal, and the noise signal. In addition, the electromagnetic data generated by finite element analysis further enhances the adaptability of the machine learning model to complex electromagnetic environments. The application can dynamically adjust the operation parameters of the compressor under complex working conditions, and improves the operation stability and energy efficiency.
cited_claim: The invention relates to a motor dynamic driving control method, device and system based on deep learning prediction. The method comprises the steps of S1, obtaining current motor operation data, S2, predicting future motor operation data according to the current motor operation data through a prediction model, S3, judging future motor working conditions according to the future motor operation data, S4, selecting a control algorithm according to the future motor working conditions, and S5, taking the current motor operation data as an input condition, and generating a control signal through the control algorithm. The invention can timely master the future change of the motor working condition through the prediction model, thereby actively switching the proper control algorithm aiming at the future change, having stronger dynamic response capability and also obtaining higher motor efficiency and better stability under the special working condition.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to a parameter control method of an ultrasonic motor, which is characterized in that key operation parameters including driving frequency, driving voltage, output power, operation temperature and the like, internal strain parameters and load change data are acquired in real time through a sensor. The collected data is input into a pre-trained fault prediction neural network model to generate a fault risk assessment and a prediction result of a potential abnormality type. And combining the predicted result and the current operation parameters, dynamically generating an adjustment strategy, wherein the adjustment strategy comprises adjusting the driving frequency to reduce internal strain accumulation, adjusting the driving voltage to reduce the operation stress and controlling the strain within a safe range. Executing the adjustment strategy in real time to optimize the operation parameters of the motor, storing the operation parameters, the prediction result and the control strategy into a database, and visually displaying the real-time state, the history record and the fatigue trend of the motor through a man-machine interaction interface. The invention provides a dynamic parameter optimization method based on predictive analysis, which can effectively prolong the service life of a motor and improve the operation reliability and safety.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent frequency converters, in particular to an intelligent frequency converter of a mechanical equipment driving system based on vector model identification, which comprises a wear state monitoring module, a vector model identification module, an intelligent frequency conversion control module and a self-adaptive learning module, wherein the wear state monitoring module collects operation parameters of a motor and the frequency converter, the vector model identification module establishes a vector model of the motor according to the collected data, and analyzes real-time operation states of the motor, including the wear state. The intelligent frequency conversion control module receives the analysis result of the vector model identification module and real-time data of the abrasion state monitoring module, and intelligently adjusts the output frequency and voltage of the frequency converter. The self-adaptive learning module utilizes a machine learning algorithm, combines historical data and real-time feedback, and continuously optimizes a vector model and a variable frequency control strategy. By combining the vector model and the self-adaptive learning module, the fault caused by inaccurate abrasion parameter identification is avoided.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to a motor dynamic driving control method, device and system based on deep learning prediction. The method comprises the steps of S1, obtaining current motor operation data, S2, predicting future motor operation data according to the current motor operation data through a prediction model, S3, judging future motor working conditions according to the future motor operation data, S4, selecting a control algorithm according to the future motor working conditions, and S5, taking the current motor operation data as an input condition, and generating a control signal through the control algorithm. The invention can timely master the future change of the motor working condition through the prediction model, thereby actively switching the proper control algorithm aiming at the future change, having stronger dynamic response capability and also obtaining higher motor efficiency and better stability under the special working condition.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a hopper smoke taking control device and method for a cigarette moisture density distribution measuring instrument, and belongs to the technical field of tobacco detection equipment. The invention uses general electric elements to replace special motor driver, reduces cost, improves flexibility and adaptability, collects motor current in real time, obtains different working state labels (normal running, overload and locked-rotor) of the motor through a conventional state detection algorithm or a machine learning classification model (support vector machine (SVM), random Forest, neural network (Neural Network) and the like), improves the detection efficiency and accuracy of cigarettes, reduces the damage risk of cigarettes in the cigarette taking process, and has simple whole device design and convenient maintenance and upgrade.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the field of agricultural machinery and automatic control, in particular to a device for classifying corn ears and a control system thereof. The device comprises a belt conveyor feed inlet, an identification camera, a belt conveyor discharge outlet, a guide plate, a normal corn belt conveyor and a miscellaneous corn belt conveyor, wherein the belt conveyor feed inlet is sequentially connected with the belt conveyor and the belt conveyor discharge outlet, the guide plate is arranged on the belt conveyor, the identification camera is arranged right above the belt conveyor, and the tail end of the belt conveyor discharge outlet is provided with the normal corn belt conveyor and the miscellaneous corn belt conveyor. The corn cluster classifying device adopts an advanced YOLOv model, can realize high-precision corn cluster classification, reduces manual intervention, improves classifying efficiency, combines mechanical screening and visual detection based on deep learning, can classify corn clusters more comprehensively and accurately, utilizes a deep learning model YOLOv5 to classify and identify, has higher accuracy, and greatly improves seed quality stability compared with traditional manual sorting.
cited_claim: The invention discloses an XRT and hyperspectral based automatic fine ore sorting method and system, which are used for realizing comprehensive fusion of ore surface and internal information by combining an X-ray tomography and hyperspectral imaging technology so as to improve recognition precision and sorting efficiency. XRT is used to extract internal structural and density features of the ore, hyperspectral imaging is used to identify mineral constituent features of the ore surface, information is complementary. The system adopts a multi-mode convolutional neural network to extract the independent characteristics of XRT and hyperspectral data respectively, and fuses the extracted characteristics through a depth residual error network. The fused characteristics are processed by a cross-modal attention mechanism, so that the key characteristics of different modes are fully integrated and optimized, and finally, high-precision ore classification and sorting are realized. The invention overcomes the limitation of a single data source in feature extraction, greatly improves the precision of ore identification and separation, and promotes the refinement and intelligent development of ore separation.

The corn cluster classifying device adopts an advanced YOLOv model, can realize high-precision corn cluster classification, reduces manual intervention, improves classifying efficiency, combines mechanical screening and visual detection based on deep learning, can classify corn clusters more comprehensively and accurately, utilizes a deep learning model YOLOv5 to classify and identify, has higher accuracy, and greatly improves seed quality stability compared with traditional manual sorting.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a calibration method and device of a six-dimensional force sensor, which comprises the following steps of firstly, carrying out demand analysis and target setting on the six-dimensional force sensor, secondly, calibrating the six-dimensional force sensor by adopting a simple calibration device, thirdly, constructing a mapping relation model between sensor input and sensor output by utilizing a machine learning algorithm or a statistical method, generating a composite loading data set containing a plurality of directional forces and moments by utilizing simulation software or experimental data, using the generated composite loading data set for training the model, constructing the mapping relation between the sensor input and the sensor output more accurately by combining a new calibration method of a modern computer technology and a data processing method, improving calibration precision, designing a detailed calibration experimental scheme, ensuring the accuracy and consistency of the experimental data, and providing powerful support for verifying and optimizing the new calibration method.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of instrument calibration, and particularly discloses a pressure sensor error calibration method and system based on machine learning, wherein the method comprises the steps of obtaining a training set; the method comprises the steps of obtaining a training set, normalizing the training set to obtain a normalized training set, establishing an error calibration model for error calibration of a pressure sensor, training the error calibration model according to the normalized training set to obtain a trained error calibration model, and inputting a current working temperature value and a current measured pressure value into the trained error calibration model to perform error calibration so as to output a current calibration pressure value corresponding to the current measured pressure value. The pressure sensor error calibration method based on machine learning provided by the invention can be used for calibrating the measurement error of the pressure sensor rapidly and with high precision, and the overall performance of the pressure sensor is improved.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of instrument calibration, and particularly discloses a pressure sensor error calibration method and system based on machine learning, wherein the method comprises the steps of obtaining a training set; the method comprises the steps of obtaining a training set, normalizing the training set to obtain a normalized training set, establishing an error calibration model for error calibration of a pressure sensor, training the error calibration model according to the normalized training set to obtain a trained error calibration model, and inputting a current working temperature value and a current measured pressure value into the trained error calibration model to perform error calibration so as to output a current calibration pressure value corresponding to the current measured pressure value. cited_claim: The invention belongs to the technical field of mechanical fasteners and intelligent manufacturing, and discloses an intelligent bolt system based on embedded torque monitoring and Artificial Intelligence (AI) analysis and an application method thereof. The intelligent bolt is provided with an inner cavity inside the screw rod, a strain gauge is fixed in the inner cavity, and a strain signal is led out to a signal output interface in the screw head through a signal transmission line. And the external data terminal acquires real-time strain data from the interface and converts the real-time strain data into tightening torque by using a calibration relation. The torque data are further input into an artificial intelligent analysis platform, fatigue life, loosening risk and use state of the bolts are analyzed and predicted through a large language model, deep learning and expert system algorithm, and maintenance strategy suggestions are given. According to the invention, real-time state monitoring and intelligent decision support can be realized under the normal service state of the bolt without an external additional sensor, so that the connection quality, the maintenance efficiency and the safety are greatly improved, and the method is suitable for various fields of aerospace, gas turbines, steam turbines, vehicles, bridges, energy equipment, precision machinery and the like.

anchor_claim: A fault alarm device for solar power generation belongs to the field of solar fault monitoring, and the system comprises an edge monitoring module, a multi-mode data fusion module, a fault classification module, a trend prediction module, a dynamic adjustment module and an alarm response module. According to the invention, the deep learning fusion model is utilized to integrate multidimensional characteristics of photovoltaic panel current, voltage, power, ambient temperature, illumination intensity and the like, so that the accuracy of fault identification is improved. By introducing an attention mechanism and dynamically adjusting an alarm threshold, the environment fluctuation and the actual fault are effectively distinguished, the false alarm rate and the missing alarm rate are reduced, and the system can adapt to complex and changeable photovoltaic system operation environments without manual intervention.
cited_claim: The invention relates to a coastal ecological system environment data monitoring device and a coastal ecological system environment data monitoring method powered by comprehensive energy. The comprehensive energy collection system consists of a wind energy collection device, a solar energy collection device and a tidal energy collection device, different energy inputs are comprehensively regulated and controlled through an energy management board, dynamic regulation and storage of energy are realized, so that the running stability of the whole device is ensured, the environment data collection device mainly comprises sensing units such as a carbon dioxide sensor, a temperature and humidity sensor and an illumination sensor and is responsible for collecting the related data of the environment where the device is located, and a deep learning algorithm and a machine learning algorithm are used for calibrating and predicting the sensor detection data in the time dimension and the space dimension. And finally, uploading the data to the cloud by using the Internet of things module, so that the data can be analyzed in time, and measures are taken to solve the abnormality.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a solar photovoltaic power generation monitoring and scheduling method which comprises the following steps of S1, collecting real-time operation data of a solar photovoltaic power generation system, S2, modeling all components of the system by utilizing a hybrid diagram optimization algorithm to generate an optimal resource allocation scheme, S3, dynamically adjusting a scheduling strategy based on real-time data through a self-adaptive neural network, a long-short-term memory network and a diagram rolling network, S4, optimizing the power generation and energy storage strategy by adopting a time-varying self-adaptive optimization algorithm, S5, conducting health state monitoring and fault prediction by utilizing an improved variable decibels prediction algorithm, S6, optimizing an energy storage management scheme based on fault early warning information, S7, finely optimizing system scheduling by utilizing a simulated annealing algorithm to adjust all operation parameters, and S8, real-time evaluating and optimizing the scheduling scheme by utilizing an intelligent scheduling system and a multi-element self-adaptive control algorithm. The invention can improve the dispatching efficiency and the operation stability of the photovoltaic power generation system, and optimize the resource allocation and the fault early warning.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a deep learning-based photovoltaic panel dust collection identification and cleaning auxiliary system and a deep learning-based photovoltaic panel dust collection identification method, which belong to the technical field of photovoltaic panel dust collection identification, and specifically comprise the steps of collecting surface images of a photovoltaic panel, preprocessing the collected surface images of the photovoltaic panel, including denoising, image enhancement and image segmentation operation, constructing a photovoltaic panel dust collection identification model, training the photovoltaic panel dust collection identification model, identifying dust collection of the photovoltaic panel, quantitatively classifying dust collection levels, dividing dust collection areas after the dust collection level of the photovoltaic panel is obtained, extracting the dust collection areas in the photovoltaic panel, dynamically planning a cleaning path according to the distribution of the dust collection areas, and cleaning the photovoltaic panel; through the identification processing and the deep repair of the shielding object, the accumulated ash under the shielding object can be effectively identified, complex environmental factors can be better processed, and the accuracy and the reliability of accumulated ash analysis are improved.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses an abnormal triggering key data identification and priority transmission method supporting QoS, which is suitable for analyzing voltage waveform data output by a photovoltaic system and comprises the steps of 1, obtaining a voltage waveform data set output by the photovoltaic system, defining a real type label of each data point, distinguishing normal waveform data and abnormal waveform data, 2, data decomposition, extracting each frequency component of data layer by layer through a three-band filter, calculating energy of each component, predicting abnormal probability of the data through LSTM, and 3, constructing a data back-off mechanism, and carrying out priority transmission on the abnormal data. According to the invention, by combining a signal processing technology and a machine learning model, the high-efficiency analysis and anomaly detection of the voltage waveform data of the photovoltaic system are realized, and the rapid transmission of key data is ensured, so that the performance and stability of the photovoltaic system are improved.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to a pipe network sediment state monitoring method which comprises the following steps of S1 determining a pipe network water inlet point, a pipe network water outlet point and a pipe network monitoring point, wherein the monitoring point at least comprises one monitoring point, S2 additionally installing an image collector and an illumination intensity detector at the water inlet point, the water outlet point and the monitoring point respectively, S3 establishing an image database comprising a water flow speed image, a water surface width image and a water flow differential image, S4 inputting the image database into a convolutional neural network for training to obtain a sediment model, and S5 collecting corresponding image information in real time and outputting sediment state parameters. The invention has the advantages of strong timeliness and early warning in time.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a method for predicting the aging degree of an anti-corona layer of a stator bar, which relates to the field of the prediction of the aging degree of the anti-corona layer of the stator bar, and comprises the following steps of S1, data sampling; the method comprises the steps of obtaining image data and real-time temperature information, carrying out data processing, preprocessing the obtained image data to obtain a data set, carrying out evaluation weight division and state division on the data set, constructing a model, constructing the model by utilizing a convolutional neural network, training the model, testing the model, carrying out practical application, and carrying out aging degree prediction on an anti-corona layer of the stator bar by utilizing an anti-corona layer life prediction model, wherein the S2 is used for carrying out data processing, the S3 is used for constructing the model, the S4 is used for training the model, and the S5 is used for carrying out practical application. According to the invention, a machine learning algorithm based on learning is adopted, infrared thermal images, ultraviolet sub-images and temperature data in the stator bar anti-corona layer aging process are collected, and the aging state of the stator bar is classified by applying multi-mode feature fusion, so that the method has a good guiding effect on evaluating the stator bar anti-corona layer aging degree.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses an optical fiber sensing system and a method for scaffold accident pre-warning and rescue, belonging to the field of structural health monitoring, wherein the optical fiber sensing system comprises a distributed optical fiber vibration, strain and temperature sensing module; according to the method for early warning and rescuing, the degradation information of the scaffold is collected through the distributed optical fiber vibration, strain and temperature sensing modules, a typical disease database of the scaffold is built, the performance degradation characteristics of the scaffold are extracted through a deep learning method, then the safety state of the scaffold is evaluated, and an evacuation signal is sent to constructors on the scaffold, so that early warning and rescuing of accidents of the scaffold are finally achieved. The invention has the advantage of real-time and accurate early warning of scaffold accidents.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of service life assessment of a circuit breaker, in particular to an intelligent assessment system for residual service life of a high-voltage circuit breaker, which comprises an operation data acquisition module, a control module and a control module, wherein the operation data acquisition module is used for acquiring operation data of the high-voltage circuit breaker; the invention relates to a method for detecting the potential faults of a circuit breaker, comprising a degradation degree feature extraction module for extracting degradation degree features from processed operation data, a residual life calculation module for constructing a residual life prediction model by utilizing the degradation degree features and adopting a generalized regression neural network algorithm to calculate the residual life, an early warning and maintenance strategy module for formulating a predictive maintenance strategy of the high-voltage circuit breaker based on the residual life calculation result and combining a residual life probability density function and an expected loss rate of the circuit breaker, and balancing economy and reliability.
