anchor_claim: A supersonic probe calibration method based on a multi-fidelity transfer learning algorithm of an experience curve belongs to the technical field of pneumatic performance test. The method is based on a low-fidelity data set constructed by abundant numerical simulation and expert experience and a small amount of high-fidelity data obtained by pneumatic test, and data which is obtained by numerical simulation and accords with a physical rule is migrated to a probe of real data of multi-degree-of-freedom probe calibration in a standard wind tunnel by utilizing a migration learning theory, so that a multi-fidelity neural network with generalization is established and is used for predicting calibration parameters of a supersonic probe. According to the invention, by combining low-fidelity simulation data and high-fidelity test data and utilizing a multi-fidelity transfer learning algorithm, a large amount of experimental data and time required by a traditional calibration method are obviously reduced, so that the efficiency of supersonic probe data calibration is improved. Through the transfer learning technology, the standard model not only has good performance under specific conditions, but also can adapt to different flow field conditions, and the generalization capability of the model is enhanced.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of sensor detection, in particular to a method and a system for detecting a crank shaft position sensor, wherein the method comprises the steps of cooperatively collecting multi-element associated data around the crank shaft position sensor, collecting the environmental temperature and humidity of the crank shaft position sensor through a temperature and humidity sensor, and collecting the vibration frequency of an engine where the crank shaft position sensor is positioned through an acceleration sensor according to a set sampling frequency; the method comprises the steps of carrying out data preprocessing after data acquisition, filtering power line interference and high-frequency noise by adopting a filtering algorithm, removing abnormal values, carrying out normalization, constructing and training a crank position sensor fault detection model based on an improved neural network after the data preprocessing is completed, inputting the data after the data preprocessing acquired in real time into the model after the training is completed, and outputting detection results. According to the invention, by combining an improved neural network algorithm, the running state of the crankshaft position sensor is accurately detected, the risk of fault burst is reduced, and the stable running of the engine and related equipment is ensured.
cited_claim: The invention relates to a motor fault detection device and system combining edge calculation and cloud calculation. The device comprises an edge calculation module and a cloud calculation module, wherein the edge calculation module comprises a data acquisition unit used for acquiring motor operation data and forwarding the motor operation data to the cloud calculation module, a preliminary detection unit used for carrying out preliminary fault detection according to the motor operation data to obtain a preliminary detection result, and the cloud calculation module comprises a machine learning model used for verifying the reliability of the preliminary detection result and identifying risk level according to current motor operation data and historical motor operation data to obtain a final fault detection result. The method and the device respectively exert the advantages of edge calculation and cloud calculation, not only can rapidly acquire the primary detection result, but also can confirm and correct the primary detection result to acquire the accurate fault detection result, and consider the instantaneity, the sensitivity and the accuracy of fault detection.

특허 CN-119663518-A의 청구항과 선행특허 CN-119392431-A의

anchor_claim: The invention relates to a control system for a water-jet loom, wherein a data acquisition module acquires and transmits weft yarn tension, humidity and temperature data in real time. And the parameter calculation module calculates optimal parameters of water spraying time, water pressure and nozzle opening degree by using a fuzzy control algorithm according to the data change, and transmits the optimal parameters to the water spraying execution mechanism. The tension adjusting module adjusts the opening degree of the nozzle and the water spraying time according to the comparison result of the weft tension and the preset threshold value. The nozzle optimization module optimizes the nozzle design by means of computational fluid dynamics. The pressure regulating module monitors pipeline pressure through the pressure sensor, and alarms and regulates the rotation speed of the water pump and the opening of the electromagnetic valve when the pressure exceeds a threshold value. The state detection module monitors the knitting needle and the shuttle by using a machine vision technology, and adjusts the water spraying parameters when the state is abnormal. The data processing module uploads data to the cloud platform, and utilizes big data and machine learning optimization control strategies to achieve the purposes of monitoring and accurately controlling all parameters of the water jet loom in real time and guaranteeing weaving quality and efficiency.
cited_claim: The invention provides a glass fiber cloth warp tension control system which comprises a dual-sensor measuring unit, a signal processing unit, a control unit and an execution unit which are electrically connected, wherein the dual-sensor measuring unit comprises a front-end strain type tension sensor and a rear-end strain type tension sensor, the front-end strain type tension sensor is arranged between a warp let-off roller and a warp stop sheet of a loom and is used for collecting tension data of an upstream position of warp, the rear-end strain type tension sensor is arranged between a reed and a cloth roller of the loom and is used for collecting tension data of an integral fabric, the signal processing unit comprises a first signal conditioning module, a second signal conditioning module and a data fusion module, the control unit comprises a basic PID module, a tension prediction module, a compensation calculation module and a control fusion module, wherein the tension prediction module is used for running a tension prediction algorithm based on an LSTM (least square-wave) neural network, and the execution unit comprises a warp let-off motor. The invention improves the control precision of warp tension control of a loom.

청구항을 비교 분석하세요. 유사도, 침해 리스크, 회피 전략을 포함해서 답변해주세요.
anchor_claim: The embodiment of the invention provides a method and a device for controlling uncovering processing of a plurality of PP soft and hard combined plates, wherein topology combined data are generated according to historical soft plate filling characteristic parameters and historical pressing processing parameters, the topology combined data are converted into relation vectors, the relation vectors are input into a neural network model for training to obtain a trained neural network model, new soft plate filling characteristic parameters are input into the trained neural network model to obtain output pressing processing parameters, control equipment performs pre-punching operation on PP sheets to obtain pre-punched PP sheets, pressing operation is performed on the pre-punched PP sheets and half-layer plates according to the pressing processing parameters to obtain a pressed soft and hard combined plate, UV laser burning-through is used in advance at the position of the PP uncovering before pressing by the control equipment, PP curing and edge sealing reduce glue overflow, the uncovering difficulty is reduced, the model training efficiency is improved, and the pressing process parameters which are accurately predicted are obtained.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a compressor switching control method and system based on big data deep learning, which are applied to the technical field of air conditioner energy consumption control. The method includes periodically acquiring compressed working data sets of each air handling unit. For any air processing unit, data in compression working data sets of the air processing unit are grouped according to the starting quantity of compressors, and first data sets corresponding to different starting quantities are obtained respectively. And obtaining a frequency switching point when the starting number of the compressors is increased from i to i+1 according to the total power and the refrigerating capacity of the corresponding first data set under different compression frequencies when the starting number is i and the total power and the refrigerating capacity of the corresponding first data set under different compression frequencies when the starting number is i+1, and switching the starting state of each compressor based on the frequency switching point. The calculation efficiency of the compressor switching point is improved, the compressor switching point can be continuously optimized, and the influence on a system is avoided.

anchor_claim: The application discloses a temperature measuring method, a device, equipment and a medium of reflow soldering equipment, which relate to the technical field of reflow soldering and comprise the steps of obtaining a thermal electromotive force signal obtained by thermocouple temperature measurement; and taking the thermal electromotive force signal and the cold end temperature signal as input of a preset neural network compensation model, and carrying out nonlinear correction on the thermal electromotive force signal through the preset neural network compensation model to obtain a temperature measurement result. According to the temperature measurement method, the neural network model is adopted to carry out nonlinear correction on the thermoelectromotive force signals obtained by the thermocouple temperature measurement, nonlinear errors existing in the thermocouple temperature measurement can be effectively corrected through the neural network model, the precision and reliability of the temperature measurement result can be improved, and the measurement requirement of wide range and high precision can be met.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a manufacturing method of a packaging substrate of an LED electronic display screen, which relates to the technical field of circuit board processing for LEDs, and the invention utilizes an intelligent typesetting algorithm based on a genetic algorithm to maximally utilize substrate materials and reduce waste through integrating a material requirement planning MRP system and CNC cutting equipment, and adopts an intelligent drilling adjustment system constructed by a deep Q learning algorithm in an intelligent drilling stage to realize real-time adjustment and optimization of drilling parameters and ensure hole position precision and hole shape consistency; in the intelligent plating process, the plating parameters are monitored and adjusted in real time by utilizing a neural network model based on deep learning, the uniformity and the adhesive force of the plating layer are improved, and finally, in the stage of lamination browning and resin grinding, an automatic plate grinding machine is adopted for resin grinding, so that the flatness of the surface of the substrate is ensured.

- **기술적 유사성 점수**: 30/100
- **핵심 공통 기술 요소**:
  - 두 특허 모두 인공지능(AI) 및 머신러닝 기술을 활용하고 있습니다. 원본 특허는 신경망 보상 모델을 통해 온도 측정을 보정하는 반면, 인용 특허는 심층 학습 기반의 신경망 모델을 사용하여 도금 과정의 매개변수를 실시간으로 조정합니다.
  - 두 특허 모두 비선형 보정 또는 최적화를 통해 정확성을 높이는 방법을 사용하고 있습니다.

###

[침해 리스크]
- 리스크 수준: low
- 위험 요소: **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성**: , 원본 특허의 기술이 온도 측정에 중점을 두고 있는 반면, 인용 특허는 LED 전자 디스플레이의 패키징 기판 제조에 중점을 두고 있습니다. 따라서 직접적인 침해 가능성은 낮지만, 두 기술 모두 신경망 모델을 사용하므로 유사한 기술적 접근 방식이 있을 수 있습니다., **위험 요소 식별**:
- **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성**: 
  - 원본 특허의 기술이 온도 측정에 중점을 두고 있는 반면, 인용 특허는 LED 전자 디스플레이의 패키징 기판 제조에 중점을 두고 있습니다. 따라서 직접적인 침해 가능성은 낮지만, 두 기술 모두 신경망 모델을 사용하므로 유사한 기술적 접근 방식이 있을 수 있습니다.
  
- **위험 요소 식별**:
  - 인용 특허에서 사용되는 신경망 모델이 원본 특허의 신경망 보상 모델과 유사한 방식으로 작동할 경우, 기술적 유사성에 따라 침해 리스크가 발생할 수 있습니다. 특히, 두 특허 모두 비선형 보정 및 최적화를 다루고 있어, 특정한 구현 방식에 따라 법적 분쟁이 발생할 가능성이 있습니다.

###

[회피 전략]
- 설계 변경: **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:, 인용 특허의 경우, 신경망 모델 대신 다른 머신러닝 알고리즘(예: 서포트 벡터 머신, 결정 트리 등)을 사용하여 도금 매개변수를 조정하는 방법을 고려할 수 있습니다. 이를 통해 원본 특허의 신경망 모델과의 유사성을 줄일 수 있습니다., 또한, 온도 측정 방법을 변경하거나, 다른 센서 기술(예: 적외선 센서)로 대체하여 원본 특허의 기술적 요소를 회피할 수 있습니다.
- 대안적 접근: **대안적 기술 접근법**:
- **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:
  - 인용 특허의 경우, 신경망 모델 대신 다른 머신러닝 알고리즘(예: 서포트 벡터 머신, 결정 트리 등)을 사용하여 도금 매개변수를 조정하는 방법을 고려할 수 있습니다. 이를 통해 원본 특허의 신경망 모델과의 유사성을 줄일 수 있습니다.
  - 또한, 온도 측정 방법을 변경하거나, 다른 센서 기술(예: 적외선 센서)로 대체하여 원본 특허의 기술적 요소를 회피할 수 있습니다.

- **대안적 기술 접근법**:
  - 원본 특허에서 제안하는 비선형 보정 대신, 선형 보정 방법이나 다른 보정 알고리즘을 사용하여 온도 측정을 수행할 수 있습니다.
  - 인용 특허의 경우, 신경망 모델을 사용하지 않고 전통적인 공학적 방법(예: 피드백 제어 시스템)을 통해 도금 과정을 최적화하는 방법도 고려할 수 있습니다. 

이러한 분석을 통해 두 특허 간의 기술적 유사성과 침해 리스크를 평가하고, 회피 전략을 수립할 수 있습니다.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a manufacturing method of a packaging substrate of an LED electronic display screen, which relates to the technical field of circuit board processing for LEDs, and the invention utilizes an intelligent typesetting algorithm based on a genetic algorithm to maximally utilize substrate materials and reduce waste through integrating a material requirement planning MRP system and CNC cutting equipment, and adopts an intelligent drilling adjustment system constructed by a deep Q learning algorithm in an intelligent drilling stage to realize real-time adjustment and optimization of drilling parameters and ensure hole position precision and hole shape consistency; in the intelligent plating process, the plating parameters are monitored and adjusted in real time by utilizing a neural network model based on deep learning, the uniformity and the adhesive force of the plating layer are improved, and finally, in the stage of lamination browning and resin grinding, an automatic plate grinding machine is adopted for resin grinding, so that the flatness of the surface of the substrate is ensured.

[유사도 평가]
- 기술적 유사성 점수: 95/100
- 핵심 공통 요소: **기술적 유사성 점수**: 95, **핵심 공통 기술 요소**:, 두 특허 모두 LED 전자 디스플레이 스크린의 포장 기판 제조 방법에 관한 것입니다.
- **기술적 유사성 점수**: 95
- **핵심 공통 기술 요소**:
  - 두 특허 모두 LED 전자 디스플레이 스크린의 포장 기판 제조 방법에 관한 것입니다.
  - 유전자 알고리즘 기반의 지능형 타입세팅 알고리즘을 사용하여 기판 자재를 최대한 활용하고 폐기물을 줄이는 방식이 동일합니다.
  - CNC 절단 장비와 MRP 시스템의 통합을 통해 자재 관리가 이루어집니다.
  - 딥 Q 학습 알고리즘을 활용한 지능형 드릴링 조정 시스템이 포함되어 있어, 드릴링 매개변수의 실시간 조정 및 최적화를 통해 구멍 위치 정밀도와 형태 일관성을 보장합니다.
  - 딥 러닝 기반의 신경망 모델을 통해 도금 과정에서의 매개변수 모니터링 및 조정이 이루어집니다.
  - 최종적으로, 자동화된 판 연삭 기계가 사용되어 기판의 평탄성을 보장합니다.

###

[침해 리스크]
- 리스크 수준: high
- 위험 요소: **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성**: , 두 특허의 청구항이 거의 동일하므로, 인용 특허(CN-119697878-B)를 사용하는 제품이나 기술이 원본 특허(CN-119697878-A)의 청구항을 그대로 포함하고 있다면, 침해 가능성이 매우 높습니다., **위험 요소 식별**:
- **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성**: 
  - 두 특허의 청구항이 거의 동일하므로, 인용 특허(CN-119697878-B)를 사용하는 제품이나 기술이 원본 특허(CN-119697878-A)의 청구항을 그대로 포함하고 있다면, 침해 가능성이 매우 높습니다.
  
- **위험 요소 식별**:
  - 인용 특허의 청구항이 원본 특허와 동일하므로, 해당 기술을 사용하는 경우 법적 분쟁의 소지가 큽니다.
  - 특히, 지능형 드릴링 조정 시스템이나 딥 러닝 기반의 도금 과정과 같은 핵심 기술 요소가 포함된 경우, 침해 리스크가 더욱 증가합니다.

###

[회피 전략]
- 설계 변경: **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:, 지능형 타입세팅 알고리즘이나 드릴링 조정 시스템을 다른 알고리즘(예: 머신 러닝 대신 전통적인 알고리즘)으로 변경하여 기술적 차별성을 확보할 수 있습니다., 도금 과정에서 사용하는 신경망 모델을 다른 형태의 기계 학습 모델로 변경하거나, 도금 매개변수를 수동으로 조정하는 방식으로 변경할 수 있습니다.
- 대안적 접근: **대안적 기술 접근법**:
- **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:
  - 지능형 타입세팅 알고리즘이나 드릴링 조정 시스템을 다른 알고리즘(예: 머신 러닝 대신 전통적인 알고리즘)으로 변경하여 기술적 차별성을 확보할 수 있습니다.
  - 도금 과정에서 사용하는 신경망 모델을 다른 형태의 기계 학습 모델로 변경하거나, 도금 매개변수를 수동으로 조정하는 방식으로 변경할 수 있습니다.

The surface mounting method based on the deep learning is applied to a surface mounting processing system and comprises the steps of acquiring an image of a current processing stage, acquiring a processing image, analyzing the processing image through a deep learning model, and acquiring processing parameter information of a next processing stage of the current processing stage and/or processing quality information of the current processing stage. The invention can improve the production efficiency and accuracy, ensure the product quality and reduce the errors and losses in production.

청구항을 비교 분석하세요. 유사도, 침해 리스크, 회피 전략을 포함해서 답변해주세요.
anchor_claim: The application provides a control method of tension adjusting equipment on a continuous composite copper foil production line, which comprises the steps of obtaining a tension set value and a tension actual value of adjacent stations on the continuous composite copper foil production line, calculating a difference value between the tension set value and the tension actual value to obtain tension deviation data, judging whether the copper foil is flexible or not in the process of adjusting the tension between the adjacent stations, feeding back copper foil flexible offset data to a feedforward compensation function and a feedback controller to cooperatively adjust tension if the copper foil is flexible, collecting operation parameters of each station of the continuous composite copper foil production line in real time on the basis of tension balance between the adjacent stations, establishing a mathematical description function of operation of the production line, and optimizing the control parameters of operation of the production line by combining preset rules in a preset knowledge base.
cited_claim: A method and a system for controlling the winding tension of optical fiber based on PLC, firstly, according to a set and real-time winding length decreasing model, the winding unit is switched to a final ready state and triggers a motor to reduce speed when the residual length of the optical fiber is smaller than a threshold value, after the final speed is reached, the position information of a winding mechanism is obtained by means of photoelectric sensing, and a motor speed correction coefficient is obtained through a position loop speed correction algorithm according to the difference between the position information and a target angle to generate a control instruction. And if the angle reaches or exceeds the target angle, starting the neural network prediction model to obtain the stop advance, and outputting a stop signal with a preset path model PLC according to the stop advance to stop the motor with low vibration. The invention integrates various sensing and intelligent algorithms by utilizing the PLC, realizes high-precision tension control in the full-winding process, effectively solves the problems of unstable tension control, easy ending and the like in the traditional technology, improves the quality and efficiency of optical fiber winding, and adapts to the requirements of various optical fibers and processes.

The method can play and do the cards according to the habit and thinking mode of human beings, has better humanization, and meanwhile, the calculation process of the decision method is simple and efficient, and has better performance in a high-strength concurrency environment.
cited_claim: The application provides a game data processing method, a device, equipment, a storage medium and a program product, wherein the method comprises the steps of obtaining first graphic data of a plurality of first image blocks currently displayed in a man-machine interaction interface of a game and first state information of each first image block, calling a deep learning model to conduct operation prediction processing according to the first graphic data and the first state information to obtain an operation prediction result, generating prompt information according to the operation prediction result and game configuration information, and displaying the prompt information in a preset area in the man-machine interaction interface, wherein the prompt information is used for representing positions of a preset number of second image blocks, the second image blocks are identical first image blocks used for executing a to-be-selected state of a selecting operation, and hiding the preset number of second image blocks when the preset number of second image blocks are selected. According to the application, the information for prompting operation can be generated in real time and high efficiency.

The method and the device improve the starting speed and the user experience of the WeChat mini game and reduce the cost of resource loading and updating.

anchor_claim: The application relates to the field of intelligent remote control, in particular to a drilling machine intelligent remote control method and system based on digitalization. The method monitors and collects drilling parameter data in real time through a sensor network, transmits the drilling parameter data to a remote control server through a wireless communication network, performs time sequence analysis and collaborative correlation feature characterization on the drilling parameter data in the remote control server by utilizing a data processing and analysis algorithm based on artificial intelligence and deep learning, captures context semantics among time sequence features of each drilling parameter, uses drilling pressure time sequence semantics as query features to query and match an optimal drilling pressure recommended decoding value from time sequence collaborative correlation features of the other drilling parameters, compares the drilling pressure recommended decoding value with the drilling pressure value of the current time point to generate a drilling pressure remote control instruction, and is beneficial to quickly adapting to change of geological conditions in the drilling process, so that remote intelligent control of the drilling machine is realized.
cited_claim: A method can include receiving data for a well in a field and parameter values for hydraulic fracturing of the well in the field; predicting production data responsive to the hydraulic fracturing of the well using at least a portion of the data and at least a portion of the parameter values as input to a machine learning model, where the machine learning model is trained using historical data for the field; and outputting the predicted production data.

anchor_claim: The invention belongs to the field of petroleum engineering, and particularly relates to a super-high-temperature high-pressure blowout preventer stack integrating a deep learning model and an expert knowledge model, and a control system fault diagnosis method and system. The fault diagnosis method for the ultra-high temperature and high pressure blowout preventer stack and the control system comprises the following three steps of sensor signal data acquisition, sensor signal data fault feature extraction and fault diagnosis reasoning model establishment. The intelligent fault diagnosis system for the ultra-temperature high-pressure blowout preventer stack and the control system comprises six parts, namely an ultra-temperature high-pressure supply system, an ultra-temperature high-pressure pilot gas source system, an ultra-temperature high-pressure blowout preventer stack, an ultra-temperature high-pressure power control system, an ultra-temperature high-pressure sensor signal data acquisition system and a state monitoring and fault alarm system.
cited_claim: The invention relates to an oil-based mud while-drilling electric imaging logging device and a method, wherein the central position of an electric imaging probe device which is a main component of the logging device is a button electrode, a shielding electrode and a return electrode are arranged outwards in sequence, the instrument constant of the oil-based mud while-drilling resistivity imaging logging can be determined by adopting a numerical simulation method and a physical experiment model method, the conversion between measured impedance amplitude and phase information and formation resistivity and formation dielectric constant is realized, a fusion splicing strategy of formation resistivity is formulated, fusion splicing calculation of the formation resistivity in a full range is realized by using measured data under a multi-frequency condition, a minimum objective function is established by adopting a neural network fitting mode, calculation of the formation resistivity, the formation dielectric constant and a polar plate gap is realized by adopting an inversion or optimization algorithm, and the forward response function is fitted by utilizing a neural network algorithm, so that the formation resistivity, the gap and the formation dielectric constant are obtained by utilizing an inversion or optimization algorithm, thereby better serving the interpretation evaluation of oil and gas formation.

- **기술적 유사성 점수**: 40
- **핵심 공통 기술 요소**:
  - 두 특허 모두 머신러닝 또는 딥러닝 모델을 활용하여 데이터를 처리하고 예측하는 방법론을 포함하고 있습니다.
  - 데이터 수집 및 처리 과정이 포함되어 있으며, 이를 통해 특정 문제(생산 예측 또는 결함 진단)를 해결하려고 합니다.

###

[침해 리스크]
- 리스크 수준: low
- 위험 요소: **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성**:, 원본 특허는 유정의 생산 예측에 중점을 두고 있으며, 인용 특허는 블로우아웃 방지 시스템의 결함 진단에 중점을 두고 있습니다. 두 특허의 적용 분야가 다르기 때문에 직접적인 침해 가능성은 낮습니다., 그러나, 두 특허 모두 데이터 수집 및 머신러닝 모델을 활용하므로, 특정 기술적 구현이 유사할 경우 침해 리스크가 존재할 수 있습니다.
- **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성**:
  - 원본 특허는 유정의 생산 예측에 중점을 두고 있으며, 인용 특허는 블로우아웃 방지 시스템의 결함 진단에 중점을 두고 있습니다. 두 특허의 적용 분야가 다르기 때문에 직접적인 침해 가능성은 낮습니다.
  - 그러나, 두 특허 모두 데이터 수집 및 머신러닝 모델을 활용하므로, 특정 기술적 구현이 유사할 경우 침해 리스크가 존재할 수 있습니다.
  
- **위험 요소 식별**:
  - 머신러닝 모델의 적용 방식이나 데이터 처리 방법에서 유사성이 발견될 경우, 침해 리스크가 증가할 수 있습니다.
  - 특히, 인용 특허의 기술이 원본 특허의 데이터 처리 방식에 영향을 미칠 경우, 법적 분쟁의 소지가 있습니다.

###

[회피 전략]
- 설계 변경: **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:, 원본 특허의 경우, 머신러닝 모델의 구조나 학습 방식(예: 전통적인 통계 모델로 변경) 또는 데이터 입력 방식(예: 실시간 데이터 대신 배치 데이터 사용)을 변경하여 침해 가능성을 줄일 수 있습니다., 인용 특허의 경우, 결함 진단의 접근 방식을 변경하여 특정한 센서 신호 데이터 처리 방법을 다르게 구현할 수 있습니다.
- 대안적 접근: **대안적 기술 접근법**:
- **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:
  - 원본 특허의 경우, 머신러닝 모델의 구조나 학습 방식(예: 전통적인 통계 모델로 변경) 또는 데이터 입력 방식(예: 실시간 데이터 대신 배치 데이터 사용)을 변경하여 침해 가능성을 줄일 수 있습니다.
  - 인용 특허의 경우, 결함 진단의 접근 방식을 변경하여 특정한 센서 신호 데이터 처리 방법을 다르게 구현할 수 있습니다.

- **대안적 기술 접근법**:
  - 원본 특허는 생산 예측에 중점을 두고 있으므로, 예측 모델 대신 최적화 모델을 사용할 수 있습니다. 예를 들어, 생산 최적화를 위한 알고리즘을 개발하여 머신러닝 대신 수학적 최적화 기법을 사용할 수 있습니다.
  - 인용 특허의 경우, 결함 진단을 위한 전통적인 규칙 기반 시스템이나 전문가 시스템을 활용하여 머신러닝 모델의 사용을 최소화할 수 있습니다.

이와 같은 분석을 통해 두 특허 간의 기술적 유사성, 침해 리스크, 그리고 회피 전략을 명확히 이해할 수 있습니다.

anchor_claim: The application belongs to the technical field of signal processing, and particularly discloses a deep learning driven power amplifier predistortion method, which comprises the steps of constructing a signal matrix of a target signal sequence, preprocessing the target signal sequence through an original time signal sequence acquired from a signal source, sequentially inputting the signal matrix into a PDTRANS predistortion model and a power amplifier to acquire an output signal sequence of the power amplifier, determining a loss function value based on the output signal sequence and the target signal sequence, adjusting the super-parameters of a PDTRANS predistortion model based on the loss function value, repeatedly acquiring the output signal sequence of the power amplifier and adjusting the super-parameters of a PDTRANS predistortion model until the loss function is minimized to obtain a trained PDTRANS predistortion model matched with the power amplifier, and performing predistortion compensation on the power amplifier based on the trained PDTRANS predistortion model. The application realizes accurate predistortion modeling of the power amplifier.
cited_claim: Apparatus for causing a power amplifier (PA) to act as an idealized power amplifier (iPA). The apparatus comprises: a fixed digital predistortion (DPD) circuit; a PA coupled to the DPD circuit; at least one sensor adapted to determine at least one condition related to of the power amplifier; and a neural network adapted control a level of amplification provided by the power amplifier based on a measurement of the at least one condition as measured by the at least one sensor.

anchor_claim: The application relates to the field of industrial detection and discloses a seamless steel tube surface defect detection device which comprises a support frame, an electric guide rail, a clamping mechanism and an annular guide rail, wherein the support frame is used as an equipment foundation chassis and used for supporting overall equipment to stably run, the electric guide rail is arranged at the top of the support frame and used for driving a steel tube to run through a stepping motor, the clamping mechanism is arranged at the top of the electric guide rail and used for being driven by the stepping motor of the electric guide rail to drive the steel tube to move, and the annular guide rail is arranged at the top of the support frame and used for assisting a high-definition camera to flexibly change a photographing angle. Through the multi-angle and multi-directional full-coverage acquisition modes of the high-definition camera, the annular guide rail and the adjustable LED light source module, the application realizes the dead angle-free detection of the surface of the steel pipe, and simultaneously combines the image preprocessing technologies such as Gaussian filtering, histogram equalization and the like and the deep learning algorithm to accurately identify the defects such as cracks, pits, scratches and the like, thereby greatly improving the detection precision and effectively avoiding the occurrence of missed detection and false detection.
cited_claim: The application relates to the technical field of ultrasonic detection, in particular to a method for detecting weld joints of a heating chamber of a large-scale evaporator after heat treatment, which comprises the steps of acquiring echo signals of probes with different angles at two sides of the weld joints; the method comprises the steps of re-sequencing echo signals of probes with the same angle, performing curve fitting after projection on the echo signals of all the angle probes based on the width of a weld joint to obtain projection curves of all the probes on two sides of the weld joint, performing filling on data points of all the probes based on the projection curves, integrating distribution characteristics and numerical differences between the aligned echo signals and the aligned inverted echo signals, combining data distribution characteristics between corresponding projection curves to obtain comprehensive false defect evaluation, reconstructing the projection curves of all the probes without false defect waves, and combining a neural network to obtain a detection result after heat treatment of the weld joint. The application aims to eliminate pseudo defect waves, improve the echo signal quality and improve the inspection accuracy.

cited_claim: The invention belongs to the technical field of structural health monitoring and the field of machine learning, and discloses a bolt stretching damage real-time monitoring method based on an acoustic emission technology. The real-time monitoring method for the bolt stretching damage ensures the real-time performance of a monitoring signal by using an acoustic emission technology, can check the damage condition of the bolt even when large equipment is in a working state, performs multiple stretching experiments on the materials of the same type of bolts, extracts experimental parameters in different stretching stages, calculates the average value, standard deviation, skewness and kurtosis of the secondary grouping by grouping, normalizes the experimental parameters and calculates the average value, standard deviation, skewness and kurtosis of the secondary grouping, so as to obtain the trend of the monitoring signal changing along with time in a period of time, predicts whether the bolt has the risk of breaking and falling off according to the trend, and has engineering practical value.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a method for automatically detecting a wall thickness protection layer of an electric pole, which comprises the steps of adjusting ultrasonic sound velocity and detection parameters according to environmental data, dynamically adjusting ultrasonic frequency and duty ratio according to electric pole materials, synchronously working a multichannel ultrasonic probe, collecting electric pole wall thickness and surface defect data in real time, converting analog signals into TTL digital signals through an FPGA, detecting signal abnormality in real time through a dynamic threshold method, carrying out intelligent evaluation on the wall thickness data by utilizing a deep learning model, identifying defect types according to ultrasonic echo characteristics, presenting electric pole wall thickness and defect risk evaluation results in real time through a display screen, triggering alarm signals when abnormality is found, recording task states, generating a wall thickness change trend graph based on historical data, generating historical trend of electric pole wall thickness change by utilizing the detection data, and evaluating future potential risk points through a prediction algorithm. The invention has the characteristics of high precision, high efficiency and intellectualization, and can be widely applied to the field of electric power facility detection.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of ultrasonic detection and noise reduction, and provides an ultrasonic detection method for defects of an output hose based on reciprocity difference and a mixed neural network, which comprises the steps of filtering an initial signal to obtain a first signal; decomposing a first signal into an approximate coefficient and a first detail coefficient, carrying out soft threshold processing on the first detail coefficient to obtain a second detail coefficient, carrying out reconstruction on the second detail coefficient and the first approximate coefficient to obtain a second signal, carrying out normalization processing on the second signal to obtain a third signal, inputting the third signal into a convolutional neural network model to obtain a space feature vector, inputting the space feature vector into a cyclic neural network model to extract a time feature vector, fusing the space feature vector and the time feature vector to obtain a noise reduction signal, training the convolutional neural network model and the cyclic neural network model, integrating the noise reduction signal with an ultrasonic detection system, outputting a defect feature signal, and improving the accuracy and the detection efficiency of online detection of an external hose.

anchor_claim: Method for improving the resolution of diffraction measurements using neural networks. A method for obtaining diffractograms with a smaller contribution of aberration, using neural networks, where the diffractogram with a smaller contribution of aberration is determined from the diffractogram with a greater contribution of aberration using neural networks previously trained on a set of pairs consisting of a diffractogram with a greater contribution of aberration and corresponding target diffractogram with a smaller contribution of aberration, where, for each individual crystal structure, diffractograms with a greater contribution of aberration are computed from known crystal structures, and precalculated target diffractogram with a smaller contribution of aberration are used for the diffractogram with a smaller contribution of aberration, with prior adjustment of the model by optimizing the loss function.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of powder grinding detection and discloses a powder grinding intensity detection and analysis system which comprises a central processing unit, a sensor unit, a data acquisition unit, a data processing unit, a communication unit, a control unit and a user interface unit, wherein the sensor unit, the data acquisition unit, the data processing unit, the communication unit, the control unit and the user interface unit are connected with the central processing unit. By integrating multiple sensor modules, the system can monitor multiple key parameters in the grinding process in real time, thereby providing more comprehensive grinding state information. By utilizing advanced data processing and machine learning algorithms, the system can perform intelligent analysis and optimization on the grinding process, and the grinding efficiency and the product quality are improved. The system design has good universality and adaptability, can adapt to the detection requirements of different types of powder, and reduces the complexity of parameter adjustment. The system also has a friendly user interface, so that operators can easily manage and control the grinding process, and meanwhile, a detailed detection report is generated, thereby facilitating subsequent quality tracking and analysis.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of analytical chemistry. The multi-component identification method based on the catalytic luminescence and the artificial neural network comprises the steps of carrying out catalytic luminescence reaction on a single sensing unit and a plurality of training samples, collecting corresponding catalytic luminescence response signals to obtain an initial data set, preprocessing the initial data set to obtain a preprocessed data set, constructing a component identification initial model based on the neural network, training the component identification initial model through the preprocessed data set to obtain a component identification model, collecting catalytic luminescence response signals of a sample to be detected, carrying out preprocessing, and inputting the preprocessed catalytic luminescence response signals of the sample to be detected into the component identification model to obtain a component identification result of the sample to be detected. The method solves the problems that the existing catalytic luminescence technology is mostly limited to single component detection, and a plurality of sensing units are needed to detect a multi-component system respectively, so that the efficiency is low and multi-component simultaneous identification is difficult to realize.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a double-station online visual detection method and a double-station online visual detection system, which are based on a multithreading technology and a machine visual detection technology integrated with a deep learning algorithm. According to the invention, two sets of detection processes of the software control system are reasonably distributed into two thread pools, and the problem that two production lines interfere with each other in the detection process is avoided by using a multithreading technology. The machine vision detection technology integrated with the deep learning algorithm effectively improves the detection and identification accuracy, improves the detection and identification efficiency by matching with the multithreading technology, and reduces the production cost.

cited_claim: A three-zone heat-flow risk monitoring, early warning, pressure equalizing, prevention and control system and method for coal mine mining are provided, a safety monitoring unit, a safety situation early warning unit and a pressure equalizing, prevention and control and intelligent scheduling unit are arranged, the safety monitoring unit collects underground coal mine environmental index gas concentration and ventilation parameters in real time, the ground atmospheric pressure is monitored through an air pressure sensor and integrated with mining working face advancing speed, coal seam thickness and layer spacing mining parameters, the collected parameters are transmitted to the safety situation early warning unit through a bus, the safety situation early warning unit establishes a three-zone heat flow risk system database, the sensor monitoring parameters are integrated, data are stored in an on-well server according to coding standards, a deep learning algorithm is combined with a heat flow risk early warning assessment index system and a model to realize dynamic assessment and alarm of risk grades, and the pressure equalizing, prevention and intelligent scheduling unit generates a control strategy according to the early warning grade, and remotely controls ventilation equipment in a linkage mode. The intelligent advanced control method for the heat flow risk of the three areas is realized, and the safety level of the coal mine is improved.

청구항을 비교 분석하세요. 유사도, 침해 리스크, 회피 전략을 포함해서 답변해주세요.
anchor_claim: Provided is an analog-based machine learning apparatus and method that enables low-power sensing and smarter determinations on a vehicle. As an example, the method may include storing a machine learning model and configuration data for an analog processor in a storage device of a digital processor in a vehicle, receiving, via the analog processor, sensor data from one or more hardware sensors that are communicably coupled to the analog processor, extracting features from the sensor data, determining an event that occurred based on the configuration data and execution of a machine learning model on the extracted features of the sensor data, and storing an identifier of the event in the storage device.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a switch control method and a switch control system for an intelligent vehicle with a self-defined function, which aim to improve driving experience of a vehicle owner through an intelligent means, and a user interacts with the system through a touch screen, voice control, gesture recognition, physical buttons and other modes to realize accurate control of equipment such as vehicle windows, seat heating, air conditioners and the like. Through sensor data such as temperature, humidity, vehicle speed and the like, and by combining an automatic control rule and a machine learning algorithm, the automatic adjustment and optimization of equipment are realized, and the optimal control strategy is ensured to be provided under different driving modes and environmental conditions. Safety measures such as multiple verification mechanisms, data encryption, identity verification and the like are designed, and misoperation and data leakage are avoided. The invention provides an intelligent, personalized and reliable vehicle-mounted equipment control experience for vehicle owners through efficient hardware integration, intelligent control logic and safety guarantee measures.

- **기술적 유사성 점수**: 65
- **핵심 공통 기술 요소**:
  - **기계 학습**: 두 특허 모두 기계 학습 알고리즘을 사용하여 차량의 기능을 최적화하고 있습니다.
  - **센서 데이터 활용**: 두 특허 모두 센서 데이터를 수집하고 이를 기반으로 결정을 내리는 방식이 유사합니다.
  - **자동 제어**: 원본 특허는 이벤트를 감지하고 이를 기록하는 반면, 인용 특허는 차량 장비의 자동 조정을 위한 제어 방법을 제시합니다.

- **위험 요소 식별**:
  - **기계 학습 모델의 적용**: 두 특허 모두 기계 학습을 사용하므로, 동일한 기술을 사용하는 경우 침해 리스크가 증가합니다.
  - **센서 데이터의 처리 방식**: 센서 데이터를 수집하고 처리하는 방식에서 유사성이 있어, 이 부분에서의 침해 가능성이 높습니다.

  - **센서 데이터의 처리 방식 변경**: 센서 데이터를 처리하는 방식이나 기능을 변경하여 인용 특허와의 유사성을 줄이는 방법이 있습니다.

  - **비유사한 기술 사용**: 기계 학습 대신 다른 데이터 처리 기술(예: 규칙 기반 시스템)을 활용하여 차량의 제어 및 최적화를 구현할 수 있습니다.

이러한 분석을 통해, 두 특허 간의 유사성을 평가하고, 침해 리스크를 최소화하기 위한 전략을 마련할 수 있습니다.

query:
특허 WO-2025145151-A1의 청구항과 선행특허 CN-119649492-A의 
청구항을 비교 분석하세요. 유사도, 침해 리스크, 회피 전략을 포함해서 답변해주세요.
anchor_claim: According to some embodiments, a sound sensor is located in an automotive vehicle cabin. A processor coupled to the sound sensor is configured to receive an acoustic signal sensed by the sound sensor and automatically determine a vehicle event that occurred based on an analysis of the acoustic signal. The determined vehicle event may be, for example, associated with an impact to the vehicle and/or vandalism monitoring while the vehicle is parked. In some embodiments, the processor automatically triggers a vehicle action responsive to the determined vehicle event. The acoustic signal may be analyzed through linear signal processing techniques and/or machine learning performed via analog processing.
cited_claim: The invention relates to a collision detection method and device based on multi-sensor data fusion, wherein the method comprises the steps of collecting dynamic information of a vehicle in real time through a plurality of sensors arranged on the vehicle; the method comprises the steps of preprocessing dynamic information collected by a plurality of sensors, storing preprocessed data, automatically adjusting a collision detection strategy and a threshold value of a deep learning model according to the real-time running environment and the vehicle state of a vehicle, comprehensively analyzing and detecting the collision, and automatically storing video records, sensor data and related parameters before and after the collision once the collision is detected. By fusing various sensor data, the limitation of relying on a single data source is reduced, and the accuracy of collision prediction is improved.

query:
특허 CN-119641985-A의 청구항과 선행특허 CN-119641985-B의 
청구항을 비교 분석하세요. 유사도, 침해 리스크, 회피 전략을 포함해서 답변해주세요.
anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of valve control, in particular to a self-adaptive valve control method and a self-adaptive valve control system suitable for complex working conditions, which comprise the steps of installing a sensor group on an installation pipeline of a valve body, and collecting opening characteristic data of the valve body in real time through the sensor group; and inputting the collected opening characteristic data into a pre-constructed first machine learning model, outputting valve opening data, and generating a valve opening instruction to control the opening of the valve based on the valve opening data. According to the self-adaptive valve control method suitable for the complex working conditions, through introducing pipeline vibration data and medium fluctuation data and combining the cross influence between the pipeline vibration data and the medium fluctuation data, a valve opening compensation instruction is generated, errors caused by vibration or medium fluctuation can be effectively compensated, the response of a valve is ensured to be more accurate, the complex working condition requirements are met, and the self-learning capacity of a first machine learning model is combined, so that a system can continuously optimize a compensation algorithm, and the wider working condition changes are met.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of valve control, in particular to a self-adaptive valve control method and a self-adaptive valve control system suitable for complex working conditions, which comprise the steps of installing a sensor group on an installation pipeline of a valve body, and collecting opening characteristic data of the valve body in real time through the sensor group; and inputting the collected opening characteristic data into a pre-constructed first machine learning model, outputting valve opening data, and generating a valve opening instruction to control the opening of the valve based on the valve opening data. According to the self-adaptive valve control method suitable for the complex working conditions, through introducing pipeline vibration data and medium fluctuation data and combining the cross influence between the pipeline vibration data and the medium fluctuation data, a valve opening compensation instruction is generated, errors caused by vibration or medium fluctuation can be effectively compensated, the response of a valve is ensured to be more accurate, the complex working condition requirements are met, and the self-learning capacity of a first machine learning model is combined, so that a system can continuously optimize a compensation algorithm, and the wider working condition changes are met.

anchor_claim: The invention belongs to the technical field of power electronics, and particularly relates to a constant current control device for electrodeposition and a control method thereof. The constant current control device for electrodeposition comprises a voltage reduction circuit, an electrodeposition device, an electrolyte parameter sensor, an electrical parameter sensor, a singlechip, an upper computer and a computer, wherein the accurate constant current output is realized by utilizing a neural network, the electrical parameter sensor is responsible for collecting input voltage, load resistance and output current in the control circuit, the electrolyte parameter sensor is responsible for collecting parameters required by the electrodeposition device, the singlechip transmits collected data to the upper computer through a serial port, and the upper computer is then forwarded to the computer end for training and optimizing a neural network model, and outputs an optimal duty ratio through the neural network for accurately controlling the output current of the voltage reduction circuit and ensuring constant current.
cited_claim: The invention relates to an MPPT control method based on dynamic optimization of a lightweight convolutional neural network, which belongs to the field of artificial intelligent control power tracking, and comprises the following steps of S0, constructing a convolutional-fuzzy neural network model which at least comprises an input layer, a convolutional layer, a fuzzy control layer, a deep reinforcement learning layer and an output layer, S1, collecting key parameters of photovoltaic equipment in real time as input data of the input layer, S2, carrying out convolutional operation on the input data by using the convolutional layer, extracting feature vectors, and transmitting the feature vectors to the fuzzy control layer, S3, combining the fuzzy control layer with the deep reinforcement learning layer, and dynamically adjusting the optimization process of fuzzy rules by rewarding signals, S4, generating control signals by the fuzzy control layer, and transmitting the control signals to a DC/DC converter of a photovoltaic system by the output layer. The control method is suitable for the dynamic environment of the photovoltaic power generation system, can be expanded to a grid-connected system, and provides a new thought and technical support for the efficient operation of photovoltaic power generation.

anchor_claim: The application provides a production method of degradable plastics, which comprises the steps of obtaining an optimal raw material proportioning scheme, controlling an intelligent proportioning system to automatically dose, obtaining temperature and humidity parameters of raw material storage and conveying links, dynamically adjusting raw material pretreatment process parameters in combination with time sequence data analysis, detecting quality of pretreated raw materials, identifying raw material defects and impurities by adopting a machine vision and deep learning algorithm, removing unqualified raw materials, accurately weighing various raw materials by an industrial robot, mixing according to an optimal formula proportion, adopting a thermal infrared imager to monitor temperature field distribution of a plastic extrusion molding die in real time, adopting finite element simulation analysis to optimize die structural design and a heating and refrigerating system, adopting a chemometric model to analyze material component change in an online monitoring extrusion molding process, and adjusting extrusion process parameters or replacing a die if degradation products exceed standards.
cited_claim: The invention relates to a continuous extrusion temperature control method of high-fluidity PC plastic particles in the field of PC plastic particle production temperature control, which comprises the steps of establishing a nonlinear mathematical model of plastic particle temperature, screw rotation speed, back pressure and other multi-process parameters through a response surface method, adopting a particle swarm optimization algorithm to solve the optimal parameter combination of the model to obtain the optimal temperature control strategy under different working conditions, realizing parameter self-adaptive optimal control of the extrusion production process, establishing a correlation model of plastic particle quality, temperature and rheological property, adopting a support vector machine algorithm to classify and identify quality defects of extruded products, and forming a corresponding knowledge base of quality defects and technological parameter deviation by reversely pushing reasons of temperature and rheological property abnormality of defect types, thereby guiding the optimization and improvement of the temperature control strategy.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a self-diagnosis intelligent assembly process method for a composite material component. The method comprises the steps of embedding optical fibers and wireless space position sensors in a matrix of a composite material component, monitoring the defect position, the damage range and the damage degree of the composite material component in real time by analyzing light and electric signals emitted by a neural network formed by the optical fibers, sensing the molded surface of the composite material component in real time based on the wireless space position sensors, calculating the deviation between the actual molded surface and the theoretical molded surface, and formulating a motion strategy of an orthopedic execution unit in an orthopedic tool based on the deviation to finish the orthopedic work meeting the precision requirement of the molded surface. According to the invention, the correction strategy or the assembly interface compensation strategy can be determined independently according to the deviation of the actual molded surface and the theoretical molded surface, so that the intellectualization of the assembly process is realized.

cited_claim: The invention discloses an educational chat robot system based on a large language model and a teaching recommendation method. The educational chat robot system designs different functional modules based on a large language model, and makes great contribution to the application of artificial intelligence in education. Meanwhile, a teaching recommendation method is designed. The method of the invention converts the original questionnaire data into the cognitive template data, constructs an original interactive graph structure through the user ID and the knowledge point ID output by the educational chat robot system, updates node characteristics by a graph neural network to form a dynamic interactive graph structure, finds a knowledge point node with the farthest path length with the user node for one user node as a knowledge point needing teaching recommendation, inquires corresponding teaching resources in a teaching resource recommendation library, and finally pushes the teaching resources to the user. The method can inspire student thinking innovation, culture the independent learning and exploring ability of students, and provide accurate teaching recommendation and intervention strategies for the students.

anchor_claim: The application provides a multi-role training system and a multi-role training method based on a multi-mode big model, wherein the multi-role training system based on the multi-mode big model comprises a training knowledge base generating module, a training knowledge base generating module and a training knowledge base generating module, wherein the training knowledge base generating module is used for generating a training knowledge base; the system comprises a character setting module, an interaction module and an evaluation module, wherein the character setting module is used for setting characters according to personal information of students, the interaction module is used for carrying out questioning and real-time evaluation according to the selected characters and a training knowledge base, and the evaluation module is used for generating final evaluation. cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of aircraft communication, in particular to an artificial intelligence-based dialogue generation system for a flight model machine and a tower, which comprises a multi-modal data acquisition, a simulation system and a control system, wherein the multi-modal data acquisition is used for collecting various sensor data from the flight model machine and weather conditions and airspace state external information provided by the tower, the sensor data comprises a positioning sensor, a flight speed sensor and a flight altitude sensor, the multi-modal data acquisition, a deep learning model, a situation awareness and other technologies are integrated into the system, the efficient, accurate and natural language communication between the aircraft and a ground control center is realized, the authenticity and the interactivity of flight training are improved, the risk of human errors is obviously reduced through automatic and intelligent dialogue generation, the safety and the reliability of flight are improved, and the system is suitable for various flight simulation training occasions and actual flight operations, and provides a training environment which is closer to actual combat for pilots.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses an educational chat robot system based on a large language model and a teaching recommendation method. The educational chat robot system designs different functional modules based on a large language model, and makes great contribution to the application of artificial intelligence in education. Meanwhile, a teaching recommendation method is designed. The method of the invention converts the original questionnaire data into the cognitive template data, constructs an original interactive graph structure through the user ID and the knowledge point ID output by the educational chat robot system, updates node characteristics by a graph neural network to form a dynamic interactive graph structure, finds a knowledge point node with the farthest path length with the user node for one user node as a knowledge point needing teaching recommendation, inquires corresponding teaching resources in a teaching resource recommendation library, and finally pushes the teaching resources to the user. The method can inspire student thinking innovation, culture the independent learning and exploring ability of students, and provide accurate teaching recommendation and intervention strategies for the students.
cited_claim: The invention provides an intelligent air flow accurate regulation humanoid respiratory platform which comprises a shell, a support frame, a continuous air extraction assembly, a humanoid respiratory assembly, an air filter element, a controller and a control panel. The controller adopts a mixed control algorithm of proportional-integral-derivative (PID) control and neural network optimization, is connected with the continuous air extraction component, the humanoid respiratory component and the control panel, and can flexibly set constant air flow, maximum inspiration flow, maximum expiration flow, respiratory frequency and respiratory ratio through the control panel. The air filter element comprises a moisture absorption layer, an air filtering layer and a gas adsorption layer, and is used for preventing particulate matters, moisture, toxic and harmful gases and the like from entering the system, so that the service life of the instrument is prolonged. The platform can accurately simulate the breathing process, has the advantages of high precision, strong stability, intelligent control and convenient use, and can be widely applied to the fields of performance test of respiratory protection equipment, gas filtration performance evaluation, human respiratory mechanism demonstration, respiratory disease research and emergency rescue.

anchor_claim: Based on the test of the inventor on the physical machine, the invention provides a special architecture for a method using two parallel running models as an integrated model. The integrated model approach provides for a physical system running two models simultaneously, both of which are trained as candidate models. These two models are used separately during the inference phase to optimize the loss function (e.g., using the mean absolute error performance, MAE performance), and during the inference phase, the model with the better MAE performance is used to control the generation of ATM refill control signals. The two models are used together, including a first model, a fully connected neural network data architecture, and a second model, a decision tree-based learning algorithm, as a gradient lifting framework (e.g., a lightweight gradient lifting framework, also referred to as LightGBM). From a practical point of view, the integrated model may configure a prediction buffer for specific parameter adjustments.
cited_claim: An online gaming platform uses a random number generator implementing a machine learning algorithm with dynamic content and real-time personalization. The online gaming platform comprises a display device, a touch screen input, and a processor coupled to the display device and the touch screen input. The display device displays the dynamic content associated with wagers related to live sporting events. A graphical user interface (GUI) on the display device includes first and second wager inputs. The first wager input includes a selection of a wager team, a wager line, and a wager odds from the wager data. The second wager input includes a wagering amount. The GUI on the display device displays a first spinning wheel indicating a plurality of line adjustments and a second spinning wheel comprising a plurality of odds adjustments to the first water inputs and/or the second wager inputs generated by the random number generator.

anchor_claim: A locker assignment system can include a plurality of lockers at a location having corresponding locker devices. In some embodiments, data collected by the locker devices can be used to train a machine learning model or adjust software configurations. In some embodiments, the system receives a request from a user to reserve a locker for a particular period of time, selects a particular locker from the plurality of lockers, obtains usage information from the locker device for the user for the location for the particular period of time, retrains the machine learning model and/or adjusts software configurations using the usage information. In some embodiments, the locker is selected using user preferences and/or the system's prediction on when the user will enter/leave the facility and whether lockers adjacent to the selected locker will be in use at the time.
cited_claim: An online gaming platform uses a random number generator implementing a machine learning algorithm with dynamic content and real-time personalization. The online gaming platform comprises a display device, a touch screen input, and a processor coupled to the display device and the touch screen input. The display device displays the dynamic content associated with wagers related to live sporting events. A graphical user interface (GUI) on the display device includes first and second wager inputs. The first wager input includes a selection of a wager team, a wager line, and a wager odds from the wager data. The second wager input includes a wagering amount. The GUI on the display device displays a first spinning wheel indicating a plurality of line adjustments and a second spinning wheel comprising a plurality of odds adjustments to the first water inputs and/or the second wager inputs generated by the random number generator.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of control management systems, in particular to a self-service vending machine commodity identification method based on deep learning, which comprises the steps of dividing a self-service vending machine commodity shelf into a plurality of independent placement areas, comparing and analyzing to determine a plurality of undetermined commodities based on the weight difference before and after commodity replenishment and combining a warehouse commodity database, comparing the image of a change area before and after commodity replenishment with the image data of the undetermined commodities to obtain a plurality of undetermined similarity, analyzing the undetermined similarity to obtain undetermined confidence values, determining replenishment commodities based on the undetermined confidence values, replenishing the replenishment commodities to an original commodity set, and obtaining a plurality of independent full-bin sets. The invention can determine the commodity inventory in the self-service vending machine after the replenishment is completed by constructing the full-bin commodity set, thereby taking the commodity inventory as the original inventory and checking the commodity order purchased by the user according to the inventory change purchased by the user each time.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the field of charging pile parking space management, in particular to a charging pile parking space management method and system, which are used for finally constructing a neural network model for predicting the occupation amount of a charging pile parking space at any moment based on basic data, an exit amount and a causal model of weather of a plurality of roads affecting the charging pile parking space in a certain range around a parking lot, and then respectively calculating the current vehicle income when the current fuel vehicle user is allowed to enter and the charging vehicle income when the current fuel vehicle user is not allowed to enter according to the request parking information of the fuel vehicle user to enter the parking lot, which is obtained in real time, if the situation that the charging pile parking space is full is predicted in the exit time, and judging whether the current fuel vehicle is allowed to enter the parking lot in a mode that the income is highest, thereby solving the problems that whether the fuel vehicle needs to be opened for using the charging pile parking space is difficult to ensure in the prior art.

anchor_claim: According to one aspect of the present disclosure, an apparatus having a chip tray with image sensors that have opposing viewpoints. The image sensors can capture, from the opposing viewpoints, image data of a chip stack of gaming chips positioned in a slot of the chip tray. The apparatus can determine, via analysis of the image data from the opposing viewpoints and in response analysis of chip-edge features of each gaming chip in the chip stack via a machine learning model, a value of each gaming chip in the chip stack. In one example, the analysis of the image data from the opposing viewpoints includes inverse transformation of the image data from the opposing viewpoints. The apparatus can further electronically present information associated with detection of the value of each gaming chip in the chip stack.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of control management systems, in particular to a self-service vending machine commodity identification method based on deep learning, which comprises the steps of dividing a self-service vending machine commodity shelf into a plurality of independent placement areas, comparing and analyzing to determine a plurality of undetermined commodities based on the weight difference before and after commodity replenishment and combining a warehouse commodity database, comparing the image of a change area before and after commodity replenishment with the image data of the undetermined commodities to obtain a plurality of undetermined similarity, analyzing the undetermined similarity to obtain undetermined confidence values, determining replenishment commodities based on the undetermined confidence values, replenishing the replenishment commodities to an original commodity set, and obtaining a plurality of independent full-bin sets. The invention can determine the commodity inventory in the self-service vending machine after the replenishment is completed by constructing the full-bin commodity set, thereby taking the commodity inventory as the original inventory and checking the commodity order purchased by the user according to the inventory change purchased by the user each time.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent equipment of the Internet of things, in particular to a wireless charging and ETC (electronic toll collection) non-inductive payment device of a new energy vehicle. The system comprises an information identification module, a power grid monitoring module, a control charging module and a bill generation module. The invention completes the identification and authentication of the new energy vehicle through the information identification module, carries out wireless charging on the new energy vehicle by utilizing an electromagnetic resonance technology, generates a bill by the bill generation module after the charging is finished, checks the vehicle-mounted OBU again through ETC, matches with the bill and completes payment deduction, realizes the non-inductance of the charging and payment of the new energy vehicle, establishes a neural network model for judging the power supply capacity of the power grid by utilizing the power grid monitoring module, dynamically adjusts the output power of the power grid according to the proportion adjustment strategy between the load rate and the output power of the power grid, considers the charging requirement of a user, formulates the optimization strategy of the wireless charging power of the new energy vehicle, and improves the wireless charging efficiency of the new energy vehicle.
cited_claim: Based on the test of the inventor on the physical machine, the invention provides a special architecture for a method using two parallel running models as an integrated model. The integrated model approach provides for a physical system running two models simultaneously, both of which are trained as candidate models. These two models are used separately during the inference phase to optimize the loss function (e.g., using the mean absolute error performance, MAE performance), and during the inference phase, the model with the better MAE performance is used to control the generation of ATM refill control signals. The two models are used together, including a first model, a fully connected neural network data architecture, and a second model, a decision tree-based learning algorithm, as a gradient lifting framework (e.g., a lightweight gradient lifting framework, also referred to as LightGBM). From a practical point of view, the integrated model may configure a prediction buffer for specific parameter adjustments.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of user analysis, and particularly discloses a user portrait construction method, a system and a medium applied to automatic vending machines, wherein the method comprises the steps of obtaining transaction attribute information of a user and historical interaction records of the user and all automatic vending machines within an analysis range; the method comprises the steps of matching influence transaction attribute information of a user with influence transaction attribute feature labels-a knowledge base, determining all influence transaction attribute feature labels of the user, analyzing all personalized transaction orientation feature labels of the user based on historical interaction records of the user and all vending machines in an analysis range, generating consumption behavior feature map images of the user aiming at all vending machines in the analysis range based on all influence transaction attribute feature labels and all personalized transaction orientation feature labels of the user, and providing powerful support for accurate marketing and service optimization.
cited_claim: An online gaming platform uses a random number generator implementing a machine learning algorithm with dynamic content and real-time personalization. The online gaming platform comprises a display device, a touch screen input, and a processor coupled to the display device and the touch screen input. The display device displays the dynamic content associated with wagers related to live sporting events. A graphical user interface (GUI) on the display device includes first and second wager inputs. The first wager input includes a selection of a wager team, a wager line, and a wager odds from the wager data. The second wager input includes a wagering amount. The GUI on the display device displays a first spinning wheel indicating a plurality of line adjustments and a second spinning wheel comprising a plurality of odds adjustments to the first water inputs and/or the second wager inputs generated by the random number generator.

anchor_claim: An online gaming platform uses a random number generator implementing a machine learning algorithm with dynamic content and real-time personalization. The online gaming platform comprises a display device, a touch screen input, and a processor coupled to the display device and the touch screen input. The display device displays the dynamic content associated with wagers related to live sporting events. A graphical user interface (GUI) on the display device includes first and second wager inputs. The first wager input includes a selection of a wager team, a wager line, and a wager odds from the wager data. The second wager input includes a wagering amount. The GUI on the display device displays a first spinning wheel indicating a plurality of line adjustments and a second spinning wheel comprising a plurality of odds adjustments to the first water inputs and/or the second wager inputs generated by the random number generator.
cited_claim: According to one aspect of the present disclosure, an apparatus having a chip tray with image sensors that have opposing viewpoints. The image sensors can capture, from the opposing viewpoints, image data of a chip stack of gaming chips positioned in a slot of the chip tray. The apparatus can determine, via analysis of the image data from the opposing viewpoints and in response analysis of chip-edge features of each gaming chip in the chip stack via a machine learning model, a value of each gaming chip in the chip stack. In one example, the analysis of the image data from the opposing viewpoints includes inverse transformation of the image data from the opposing viewpoints. The apparatus can further electronically present information associated with detection of the value of each gaming chip in the chip stack.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of data analysis, in particular to a solar central heating intelligent regulation system based on big data in alpine regions, which comprises an acquisition processing unit, an analysis control unit and a decision execution unit, wherein the invention acquires multi-source data through the acquisition processing unit, a data storage module in the analysis control unit adopts a distributed architecture to store the data, and a hybrid algorithm integrating the deep learning neural network and the physical model is used for predicting heating requirements and solar heat collection trend, a control instruction is generated and transmitted to a heat source adjusting module, the heat source adjusting module adjusts solar heating by adopting an incremental conductance method and stores surplus heat into a heat storage device, and a valve driving module adjusts the opening of a valve based on a PID algorithm, so that the regulation precision and the energy utilization efficiency of a heating system are improved.
cited_claim: The application discloses a method and a device for adjusting heat supply flow, a storage medium and an electronic device, wherein the method comprises the steps of determining the estimated heat supply load of each single heat supply machine through a pre-trained load prediction model, and determining the total estimated heat supply load of a heat supply unit based on the estimated heat supply load; the pre-trained load prediction model is a model which is trained by machine learning or big data analysis technology and used for predicting the output load of the heat supply machine by using the historical load data of each single heat supply machine, under the condition that the total demand load of a plurality of target users is determined, a plurality of pieces of operation parameter information of heat sources corresponding to the target users are collected, and the flow between the heat supply unit and the target users is adjusted based on the total estimated heat supply load, the total demand load and the operation parameter information. The problem that the traditional heating system can not be rapidly adapted to load change in heat distribution and parameter adjustment is solved.

anchor_claim: The present invention relates to a system (1) which estimates battery (2) health by means of machine learning algorithms under variable conditions that occur during vehicle use by using the resistance values that occur depending on time and usage in the cells of the battery (2) used in electric vehicles.
cited_claim: Systems/techniques that facilitate intelligent vehicular microgrids are provided. In various embodiments, a system can comprise a set of vehicular charging stations coupled to an intermediate battery. In various aspects, the system can accumulate, within the intermediate battery, surplus electricity collectively supplied by one or more vehicles that dock at the set of vehicular charging stations. In various instances, the system can discharge, at a time at which a main electric grid warrants supplementation, the surplus electricity from the intermediate battery to the main electric grid. In various cases, the system can determine the time at which the main electric grid warrants supplementation, via execution of a machine learning model.

anchor_claim: An information processing system (10) comprises: an acquisition unit (14) that acquires a time waveform of the power consumption of a dwelling unit (101); an estimation unit (15) that estimates charging power consumption information indicating a time waveform of the power consumption of a charging system (20) of an electric vehicle (23) installed in the dwelling unit (101) on the basis of the acquired time waveform of the power consumption of the dwelling unit (101); and a first prediction unit (16) that selects a machine learning model on the basis of the estimated charging power consumption information and predicts the future power consumption of the charging system (20) using the selected machine learning model.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of new energy automobile charging management, in particular to a method and a system for optimizing intelligent charging and discharging of a battery of a new energy automobile charging station, wherein the method comprises the steps of constructing a charging demand prediction model by utilizing a long-short-period neural network LSTM model, and predicting the charging demand of a future time period; the method comprises the steps of establishing a multi-type optimization charge-discharge strategy, establishing a battery charge efficiency evaluation model, monitoring charge efficiency in real time and early warning abnormality in time, establishing a battery charge scheduling model of a charging station based on the evaluated battery charge efficiency, and solving a globally optimal charge power distribution scheme when a plurality of batteries are charged simultaneously.
