청구항을 비교 분석하세요. 유사도, 침해 리스크, 회피 전략을 포함해서 답변해주세요.
anchor_claim: The invention provides a method and a device for positioning a charging port of a new energy vehicle based on structured light positioning, and relates to the technical field of automatic charging of new energy sources. According to the invention, the charging port is positioned by combining the charging port position information acquired by the 3D structured light camera and the position information output by the deep learning recognition model, so that the positioning accuracy and reliability can be realized, the accuracy of the charging port recognition can be ensured under the condition of severe environment, the positions of different charging ports can be recognized, the shape and size information can be recognized, the reference is provided for selecting a matched charging gun, the recognition speed is high, and the accuracy is high, thereby ensuring that the subsequent charging gun and the charging port are accurately butted automatically. Meanwhile, the secondary positioning of the charging port is further performed after the charging gun is inserted in a butt joint mode, so that whether the charging gun is inserted in place or not is detected, and the reliability and safety of automatic charging are guaranteed.
cited_claim: Systems/techniques that facilitate intelligent vehicular microgrids are provided. In various embodiments, a system can comprise a set of vehicular charging stations coupled to an intermediate battery. In various aspects, the system can accumulate, within the intermediate battery, surplus electricity collectively supplied by one or more vehicles that dock at the set of vehicular charging stations. In various instances, the system can discharge, at a time at which a main electric grid warrants supplementation, the surplus electricity from the intermediate battery to the main electric grid. In various cases, the system can determine the time at which the main electric grid warrants supplementation, via execution of a machine learning model.

[유사도 평가]

- **기술적 유사성 점수**: 40
- **핵심 공통 기술 요소**:
  - 두 특허 모두 전기차 관련 기술을 다루고 있으며, 인공지능(딥러닝 및 머신러닝) 모델을 활용하여 특정 작업을 수행하는 점에서 유사성이 존재합니다.
  - 원본 특허는 전기차의 충전 포트 위치를 인식하는 기술에 중점을 두고 있으며, 인용 특허는 전기차 충전소와 관련된 전력 관리 시스템을 다루고 있습니다. 
  - 두 기술 모두 전기차의 효율적인 충전 및 에너지 관리와 관련이 있지만, 각각의 초점과 구현 방식이 다릅니다.

###

[침해 리스크]
- 리스크 수준: low
- 위험 요소: **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성**: 낮음, 원본 특허는 충전 포트의 위치 인식 및 자동 충전 과정에 중점을 두고 있는 반면, 인용 특허는 전기차 충전소와 관련된 에너지 관리 시스템을 다루고 있습니다. 두 기술의 적용 분야가 다르기 때문에 직접적인 침해 가능성은 낮습니다., **위험 요소 식별**:
- **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성**: 낮음
  - 원본 특허는 충전 포트의 위치 인식 및 자동 충전 과정에 중점을 두고 있는 반면, 인용 특허는 전기차 충전소와 관련된 에너지 관리 시스템을 다루고 있습니다. 두 기술의 적용 분야가 다르기 때문에 직접적인 침해 가능성은 낮습니다.
- **위험 요소 식별**:
  - 만약 원본 특허의 기술이 인용 특허의 시스템에 통합되어 사용된다면, 두 기술의 경계가 모호해질 수 있으며, 이 경우 침해 리스크가 증가할 수 있습니다.
  - 또한, 두 기술 모두 AI 및 머신러닝을 활용하므로, 이러한 기술의 사용 방식에 따라 잠재적인 법적 분쟁이 발생할 수 있습니다.

###

[회피 전략]
- 설계 변경: **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:, 원본 특허의 충전 포트 인식 기술을 다른 형태의 센서(예: 초음파 센서, 레이저 스캐너 등)로 대체하여 인식 방식을 변경할 수 있습니다., 충전 포트의 위치 인식 알고리즘을 수정하여 인용 특허의 기술과의 유사성을 줄이는 방향으로 설계 변경을 고려할 수 있습니다.
- 대안적 접근: **대안적 기술 접근법**:
- **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:
  - 원본 특허의 충전 포트 인식 기술을 다른 형태의 센서(예: 초음파 센서, 레이저 스캐너 등)로 대체하여 인식 방식을 변경할 수 있습니다.
  - 충전 포트의 위치 인식 알고리즘을 수정하여 인용 특허의 기술과의 유사성을 줄이는 방향으로 설계 변경을 고려할 수 있습니다.
  
- **대안적 기술 접근법**:
  - 전통적인 충전 포트 인식 기술 대신, RFID 또는 NFC 기술을 활용하여 충전 포트의 인식을 수행하는 방법을 고려할 수 있습니다.
  - 차량과 충전소 간의 통신을 통해 실시간으로 충전 포트의 위치를 확인하고, 이를 기반으로 충전 과정을 자동화하는 시스템을 개발할 수 있습니다.

이러한 분석을 통해 원본 특허와 인용 특허 간의 기술적 유사성, 침해 리스크, 회피 전략을 명확히 파악할 수 있습니다.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to an electric automobile charging interface recognition and positioning system for a charging robot, which comprises a data acquisition module, a preprocessing module, a charging interface recognition module, a positioning module, a gesture estimation module, a control module, an environment adaptation module and an automatic learning module. The system collects images of vehicles and three-dimensional point cloud data through a camera and a laser radar, automatically identifies the two-dimensional position of a charging interface through preprocessing and a deep learning model, and precisely locates the spatial position and the gesture of the interface by combining a least square method with three-dimensional coordinates. The control module drives the mechanical arm docking plug through PID feedback control and A-path planning, and automatic charging is achieved. The environment adaptation module combines data enhancement and self-adaptive correction, and improves the recognition stability of the system in complex environments such as illumination, background change and the like. The invention improves the recognition precision and the real-time performance of the charging robot in different environments, and is suitable for unattended automatic charging scenes.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of new energy automobile charging management, in particular to a method and a system for optimizing intelligent charging and discharging of a battery of a new energy automobile charging station, wherein the method comprises the steps of constructing a charging demand prediction model by utilizing a long-short-period neural network LSTM model, and predicting the charging demand of a future time period; the method comprises the steps of establishing a multi-type optimization charge-discharge strategy, establishing a battery charge efficiency evaluation model, monitoring charge efficiency in real time and early warning abnormality in time, establishing a battery charge scheduling model of a charging station based on the evaluated battery charge efficiency, and solving a globally optimal charge power distribution scheme when a plurality of batteries are charged simultaneously.

anchor_claim: The application relates to the technical field of flexible piezoelectric sensors, and discloses a flexible film piezoelectric sensor with wide working conditions and multidimensional force representation and a signal analysis method. Therefore, the multi-dimensional force characterization can be realized on one film sensor, and meanwhile, the paper-cut design enhances the tension and conformal capacity of the sensor so as to meet the attachment requirement of a complex surface. And combines a multi-layer composite structure, comprising a flexible polymer protective layer and a flexible connecting layer, and realizes high sensitivity, excellent tensile property and mechanical durability through hot pressing and local ultrasonic welding. The defect of poor tensile property of the traditional PVDF piezoelectric sensor is overcome while the sensing capability is enhanced. The preparation method has simple flow and low cost, and is suitable for large-scale industrial production. In addition, we provide a deep learning analysis method for multichannel signals, enabling classification as well as nonlinear fitting.
cited_claim: The invention discloses an amorphous tungsten oxide film analog type resistance change memristor, a preparation method and application thereof, and belongs to the technical field of nonvolatile memories and neural network calculation. The method comprises the steps of firstly depositing a first conductive film on an insulating substrate to serve as a bottom electrode of the analog type resistance variable memristor, then adopting a physical vapor deposition method to grow an amorphous tungsten oxide film with gradient change of oxygen defect content to serve as a resistance medium storage layer of the analog type resistance variable memristor, and finally depositing a second conductive film to serve as an upper electrode to obtain the amorphous tungsten oxide film analog type resistance variable memristor. The technology is simple, the cost is low, the controllability is high, the large-scale production is easy, the stability is high, the gradient distribution of oxygen vacancies in the storage layer of the resistance change medium can form or break conductive channels through regulating and controlling the voltage, the simulation gradual change of the resistance change performance is realized, and the reliability is high. Has wide market application prospect in the field of neural network calculation.

anchor_claim: The invention belongs to the related field of micro-nano electronic devices, and discloses a multifunctional memristor based on TaO  x , which comprises a substrate, a first electrode layer, a functional layer, a blocking layer and a second electrode layer which are sequentially stacked from bottom to top, wherein the first electrode layer and the second electrode layer are respectively made of inert metal materials and active metal materials, the functional layer is made of TaO  x  materials and x is smaller than 2.5, trap energy levels are formed by oxygen vacancies, and the blocking layer is made of inert metal materials and is used for blocking metal atoms of the second electrode layer from entering the functional layer. When different electrical operations are applied to the second electrode layer, the entire device exhibits different electrical characteristics. The invention also discloses a corresponding manufacturing method. The invention can simulate the functions of dendrite, cell and synapse in the biological neural network, provides a multifunctional memristor capable of bearing a plurality of functions for the existing artificial neural network, reduces the process complexity in the hardware realization process and improves the integration level.
cited_claim: The invention discloses an amorphous tungsten oxide film analog type resistance change memristor, a preparation method and application thereof, and belongs to the technical field of nonvolatile memories and neural network calculation. The method comprises the steps of firstly depositing a first conductive film on an insulating substrate to serve as a bottom electrode of the analog type resistance variable memristor, then adopting a physical vapor deposition method to grow an amorphous tungsten oxide film with gradient change of oxygen defect content to serve as a resistance medium storage layer of the analog type resistance variable memristor, and finally depositing a second conductive film to serve as an upper electrode to obtain the amorphous tungsten oxide film analog type resistance variable memristor. The technology is simple, the cost is low, the controllability is high, the large-scale production is easy, the stability is high, the gradient distribution of oxygen vacancies in the storage layer of the resistance change medium can form or break conductive channels through regulating and controlling the voltage, the simulation gradual change of the resistance change performance is realized, and the reliability is high. Has wide market application prospect in the field of neural network calculation.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a rectifying memristor with a synapse simulation function and application thereof, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence. The memristor device disclosed by the invention adopts a sandwich structure and sequentially comprises an upper Ag electrode, an AgI and PbI  2  functional layer and a lower ITO electrode. The memristor has rectifying characteristics, effectively solves the problem of sneak current in crossbar integration, and ensures accurate reading of device data in an array. Meanwhile, the invention realizes good nerve synapse function under the cyclic electric pulse, including double pulse inhibition, double pulse facilitation, long and short range memory response and synapse weight plasticity, and can imitate human brain nerve synapse processing, learning work behaviors and the like. The invention successfully applies the PbI  2  material to realize the integration of rectification, storage and nerve morphology simulation, and opens up new possibility for the application in the fields of nerve morphology simulation and artificial neural network.
cited_claim: The application relates to the technical field of flexible piezoelectric sensors, and discloses a flexible film piezoelectric sensor with wide working conditions and multidimensional force representation and a signal analysis method. Therefore, the multi-dimensional force characterization can be realized on one film sensor, and meanwhile, the paper-cut design enhances the tension and conformal capacity of the sensor so as to meet the attachment requirement of a complex surface. And combines a multi-layer composite structure, comprising a flexible polymer protective layer and a flexible connecting layer, and realizes high sensitivity, excellent tensile property and mechanical durability through hot pressing and local ultrasonic welding. The defect of poor tensile property of the traditional PVDF piezoelectric sensor is overcome while the sensing capability is enhanced. The preparation method has simple flow and low cost, and is suitable for large-scale industrial production. In addition, we provide a deep learning analysis method for multichannel signals, enabling classification as well as nonlinear fitting.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses an intelligent control method and system for a 3D printing process based on real-time feedback, which relate to the technical field of 3D printing, wherein a data acquisition module is used for collecting surface images and printing data of a printing layer in real time, an image data set and a printing data set are constructed, cleaning and standardizing processing are carried out on the data in a preprocessing module, a convolutional neural network is utilized by an image analysis module to analyze the surface defects of the printing layer, a defect score D is generated and is compared with a preset defect score threshold Dl, the state of the printing layer is evaluated and early warning is triggered, a comprehensive evaluation module is combined with the printing data and the defect score, crack generation probability Z is calculated, the intelligent control module is used for evaluating the printing state by comparing the crack generation probability Z with a preset crack generation probability threshold Zl, and printing parameters are fed back and controlled according to the result, so that cracks and structural defects in the printing process are effectively prevented and the quality of a finished product is improved.
cited_claim: The application relates to the technical field of metal additive manufacturing, in particular to an SLM printing method and device for detecting defects in real time, wherein the method comprises the following steps of S1, cladding metal powder according to a laser printing strategy of an nth layer; S2, performing defect detection on an nth layer of the part to be printed, and outputting a defect detection result, and S3, determining a laser repairing strategy of the nth layer according to the defect detection result. In step S2, the present application predicts defect detection results by a pre-trained mechanical detection model Voxel elements exceeding a preset threshold are marked as structural defects. If the nth layer is not present And if the defect exists, continuing to print the n+1th layer. According to the application, the neural network model is used for detecting the defects of the SLM printing in real time, so that whether each layer has pores affecting the mechanical property of the printing part can be rapidly judged, the non-structural defects are not processed, and the printing speed of the SLM can be increased.

- **핵심 공통 기술 요소**:

- **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성**: 
  - 원본 특허는 인용 특허의 기술적 요소를 상당 부분 포함하고 있으므로, 인용 특허의 청구항을 기반으로 한 기술이 원본 특허의 방법 및 시스템을 침해할 가능성이 있습니다. 특히, 실시간 결함 감지 및 신경망을 통한 평가 방법이 유사하게 적용될 수 있습니다.

- **위험 요소 식별**:
  1. **신경망 모델의 유사성**: 두 특허 모두 신경망을 사용하여 결함을 감지하는데, 이 부분에서 침해 리스크가 존재합니다.
  2. **프린팅 파라미터 조정**: 결함 감지 결과에 따라 프린팅 파라미터를 조정하는 방식이 유사하여, 이로 인해 침해 가능성이 높아질 수 있습니다.

###

[회피 전략]
- 설계 변경: **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:
- 대안적 접근: **대안적 기술 접근법**:
- **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:
  1. **데이터 처리 방식 변경**: 원본 특허에서 사용하는 데이터 수집 및 처리 방식을 변경하여, 예를 들어, 다른 형태의 데이터 전처리 기술이나 다른 알고리즘을 사용할 수 있습니다.
  2. **결함 감지 모델 변경**: 신경망 대신 다른 기계 학습 모델이나 전통적인 결함 감지 알고리즘을 사용할 수 있습니다.

- **대안적 기술 접근법**:
  1. **비신경망 기반 접근법**: 신경망을 사용하지 않고, 예를 들어, 규칙 기반 시스템이나 통계적 방법을 통해 결함을 감지하는 방법을 고려할 수 있습니다.
  2. **다른 프린팅 기술 적용**: SLM 외의 다른 3D 프린팅 기술(예: FDM, SLA 등)을 사용하여, 인용 특허의 적용 범위를 회피할 수 있습니다.

이러한 분석을 통해, 두 특허 간의 기술적 유사성과 침해 리스크를 평가하고, 효과적인 회피 전략을 수립할 수 있습니다.

cited_claim: The invention belongs to the field of curved surface multi-degree-of-freedom additive manufacturing, and particularly relates to a three-dimensional model data processing method for space motion planning in curved surface multi-degree-of-freedom inkjet forming. The method comprises the steps of extracting target space curved surface point cloud of an STL model, fitting a target space curved surface, generating a target space curved surface two-dimensional path and generating a target space curved surface inkjet forming space path. According to the method, space point cloud is calculated through a space point cloud convex hull or a space point cloud concave hull, a space function is obtained by fitting the space point cloud to a curved surface based on deep learning, and the extracted space point cloud of the target curved surface is projected to a two-dimensional plane generating path and mapped to a three-dimensional space curved surface to obtain a curved surface inkjet forming path. The method can solve the problems that the path planning difficulty is high in the field of the existing curved surface additive manufacturing, the single-point solving speed is increased along with the increase of the number of model tops and the number of solving points when the STL model data is accessed, the curved surface forming path planning method is single and is difficult to realize the curved surface forming complex path planning methods such as curved surface fractal, curved surface contour deviation and the like, a high-efficiency and convenient data access mode is provided for the curved surface multi-degree-of-freedom inkjet forming complex path planning method, the single-point solving speed is not increased along with the increase of the number of model tops and the number of solving points, and the method has important significance for realizing the high-efficiency inkjet forming of the curved surface multi-degree of freedom.

청구항을 비교 분석하세요. 유사도, 침해 리스크, 회피 전략을 포함해서 답변해주세요.
anchor_claim: The invention belongs to the field of curved surface multi-degree-of-freedom additive manufacturing, and particularly relates to a three-dimensional model data processing method for space motion planning in curved surface multi-degree-of-freedom inkjet forming. The method comprises the steps of extracting target space curved surface point cloud of an STL model, fitting a target space curved surface, generating a target space curved surface two-dimensional path and generating a target space curved surface inkjet forming space path. According to the method, space point cloud is calculated through a space point cloud convex hull or a space point cloud concave hull, a space function is obtained by fitting the space point cloud to a curved surface based on deep learning, and the extracted space point cloud of the target curved surface is projected to a two-dimensional plane generating path and mapped to a three-dimensional space curved surface to obtain a curved surface inkjet forming path. The method can solve the problems that the path planning difficulty is high in the field of the existing curved surface additive manufacturing, the single-point solving speed is increased along with the increase of the number of model tops and the number of solving points when the STL model data is accessed, the curved surface forming path planning method is single and is difficult to realize the curved surface forming complex path planning methods such as curved surface fractal, curved surface contour deviation and the like, a high-efficiency and convenient data access mode is provided for the curved surface multi-degree-of-freedom inkjet forming complex path planning method, the single-point solving speed is not increased along with the increase of the number of model tops and the number of solving points, and the method has important significance for realizing the high-efficiency inkjet forming of the curved surface multi-degree of freedom.

cited_claim: The application relates to the technical field of metal additive manufacturing, in particular to an SLM printing method and device for detecting defects in real time, wherein the method comprises the following steps of S1, cladding metal powder according to a laser printing strategy of an nth layer; S2, performing defect detection on an nth layer of the part to be printed, and outputting a defect detection result, and S3, determining a laser repairing strategy of the nth layer according to the defect detection result. In step S2, the present application predicts defect detection results by a pre-trained mechanical detection model Voxel elements exceeding a preset threshold are marked as structural defects. If the nth layer is not present And if the defect exists, continuing to print the n+1th layer. According to the application, the neural network model is used for detecting the defects of the SLM printing in real time, so that whether each layer has pores affecting the mechanical property of the printing part can be rapidly judged, the non-structural defects are not processed, and the printing speed of the SLM can be increased.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a regulating and controlling method and a regulating and controlling system for melt forming precision of a polymer laser powder bed and a method for improving forming precision, and belongs to the technical field of additive manufacturing. The method comprises the steps of obtaining temperature distribution data in the process of the polymer LPBF, constructing a database based on the temperature distribution data and process parameters adopted by printing a current layer, establishing an accurate regulation model of the process of the polymer LPBF based on machine learning, training the accurate regulation model of the process of the polymer LPBF by utilizing the database, establishing a mapping relation of the process parameters, the printing layer thickness and the layer-by-layer temperature field distribution, obtaining a negative feedback mechanism of the process parameters and the printing layer real-time temperature field, and finishing accurate regulation of the melt forming precision of the polymer laser powder bed. The invention utilizes the superiority of reinforcement learning algorithm in big data processing, improves the heat accumulation phenomenon in the forming process, eliminates the defects of warping, caking and the like, and has guiding significance for improving the precision and performance of the polymer material LPBF process forming part.

  - 인용 특허는 **다양한 경로 계획 알고리즘**(예: 유전자 알고리즘, 시뮬레이티드 어닐링 등)을 도입하여 기존의 경로 계획 방법과 차별화된 접근법을 사용할 수 있음.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a neural network composite gel material for spinal cord injury repair and a preparation method thereof. The preparation method comprises the steps of 1) preparing a shell layer mixed microsphere solution, a core layer matrix solution and a core layer network solution, 2) taking the core layer matrix solution as a matrix printing material, taking the core layer network solution as a printing material distributed in an internal network structure in the matrix, performing 3D printing according to a required drawing and performing in-situ UV curing to obtain composite gel distributed in the matrix and provided with a neural differentiation pre-network structure, taking the composite gel as the core layer structure, printing the shell layer mixed microsphere solution on the surface of the composite gel and curing to form a shell layer structure, and 3) performing nerve culture on the obtained material of 2) at 37 ℃ to obtain the neural network composite gel material for repairing spinal cord injury, wherein in the culture, gelatin in the core layer structure is subjected to thermal sacrifice to form a pore channel network. The gel is internally provided with a neural network structure, can inhibit nerve inflammation and provides a brand new strategy for nerve injury repair.
cited_claim: The application relates to the technical field of metal additive manufacturing, in particular to an SLM printing method and device for detecting defects in real time, wherein the method comprises the following steps of S1, cladding metal powder according to a laser printing strategy of an nth layer; S2, performing defect detection on an nth layer of the part to be printed, and outputting a defect detection result, and S3, determining a laser repairing strategy of the nth layer according to the defect detection result. In step S2, the present application predicts defect detection results by a pre-trained mechanical detection model Voxel elements exceeding a preset threshold are marked as structural defects. If the nth layer is not present And if the defect exists, continuing to print the n+1th layer. According to the application, the neural network model is used for detecting the defects of the SLM printing in real time, so that whether each layer has pores affecting the mechanical property of the printing part can be rapidly judged, the non-structural defects are not processed, and the printing speed of the SLM can be increased.

anchor_claim: The invention provides a method and a system for synthesizing spatial audio based on a Schrodinger bridge, wherein the method comprises the steps of obtaining a mono sound source signal, constructing a priori signal and a noisy representation based on the mono sound source signal, inputting the priori signal and the noisy representation into a pre-trained spatial audio synthesis model, and generating final binaural spatial audio based on a random differential equation iterative sampling path through the spatial audio synthesis model, wherein the spatial audio synthesis model is obtained by training a preset neural network model through a pre-defined binaural Schrodinger bridge parameterized target and boundary auxiliary supervision. The invention solves the problems of low synthesis speed and poor quality of the existing spatial audio.
cited_claim: Disclosed implementations use generative machine learning methods to create sound environments that are consistent with microphone observations or with a recording representation in an existing format, such as ambisonics. Implementations provide a physically plausible sound field rather than an accurate sound field by sampling from the probability distribution of ground truth sound fields.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the temperature control system and method for the cooling system created with the machine learning method and fuzzy logic of the cooling systems of the refrigerator cabinets, which offer a highly effective use for businesses that need product display or storage, such as supermarkets, buffets, patisseries, cafes. The elements used in the invention are; refrigerated display cabinet (10), blowing temperature sensor (S4), average product temperature value (EPT) suction temperature sensor (S3), door sensor (Dn), humidity sensor (1), temperature sensor (2), camera (3), fuzzy cooling class coefficient (4), number of customers (5), database (6), artificial intelligence model (7), density class (8), new temperature value (9).
cited_claim: The invention discloses a method and a system for homogenizing temperature of a refrigerator based on dynamic air speed control, and relates to the technical field of homogenizing temperature of the refrigerator, comprising the following steps of obtaining temperature uniformity data of the refrigerator by monitoring standard temperatures of all areas of the refrigerator in an optimal running state; the method comprises the steps of obtaining load temperature influence data and fan processing influence data which influence the temperature uniformity of a refrigerator, obtaining a temperature change suitable model through machine learning the load temperature influence data and the fan processing influence data, and controlling the output wind speed and the output stop of a fan according to the output of the temperature change suitable model and the temperature uniformity data. According to the invention, the wind speed is accurately controlled, so that the problem that the temperature nonuniformity is influenced by too high or too low wind speed regulation is solved.

anchor_claim: The invention belongs to the technical field of temperature control, and discloses a temperature control method and device for energy conservation of a data center. The method comprises the steps of determining at least one combination grid temperature parameter of a plurality of distributed automation devices in an SMT production line for meeting the refrigerating capacity requirement in normal operation, determining a plurality of groups of temperature setting parameters of an air conditioning system and a cooling water circulation system in the plurality of distributed automation devices according to the at least one combination grid temperature parameter and the matching relation between the setting parameters of the air conditioning system and the cooling water circulation system and the corresponding temperature parameter groups, periodically monitoring temperature parameter data of a data center in real time by a monitoring end, calculating the sum of the plurality of groups of temperature setting parameters of the air conditioning system and the cooling water circulation system according to a neural network algorithm, screening to obtain an optimal value, and carrying out real-time regulation and control on the air conditioning system and the cooling water circulation system according to the optimal value. The invention minimizes the sum of energy savings in the operation of the distributed devices.

###

[침해 리스크]

- **위험 요소 식별**:
  - 머신러닝 모델의 사용이라는 공통점으로 인해, 특정 구현 방식이나 알고리즘이 유사할 경우 침해 리스크가 발생할 수 있습니다.
  - 특히, 환경 데이터를 수집하고 처리하는 방식에서 유사성이 발견될 경우, 원본 특허의 청구항을 침해할 가능성이 존재합니다.

###

[회피 전략]
- 설계 변경: **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:, 인용 특허의 경우, 냄새 감지에 중점을 두고 있으므로, 냉장고의 온도 제어와 관련된 기능을 제거하고, 대신 다른 환경 변수(예: 습도, 압력 등)를 감지하는 방식으로 변경할 수 있습니다., 머신러닝 모델의 구조나 알고리즘을 변경하여, 원본 특허의 특정 구현 방식과의 유사성을 줄이는 것도 효과적입니다.
- 대안적 접근: **대안적 기술 접근법**:
- **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:
  - 인용 특허의 경우, 냄새 감지에 중점을 두고 있으므로, 냉장고의 온도 제어와 관련된 기능을 제거하고, 대신 다른 환경 변수(예: 습도, 압력 등)를 감지하는 방식으로 변경할 수 있습니다.
  - 머신러닝 모델의 구조나 알고리즘을 변경하여, 원본 특허의 특정 구현 방식과의 유사성을 줄이는 것도 효과적입니다.

- **대안적 기술 접근법**:
  - 냉장고의 온도 균일성을 제어하기 위해 머신러닝 대신 전통적인 제어 알고리즘(예: PID 제어)을 사용할 수 있습니다.
  - 또한, 온도 균일성을 유지하기 위한 다른 센서 기술(예: 적외선 센서, 온도 센서 등)을 도입하여, 기존의 머신러닝 기반 접근법을 대체할 수 있습니다.

이와 같은 분석을 통해, 두 특허 간의 기술적 유사성과 침해 리스크를 평가하고, 회피 전략을 제시할 수 있습니다.

anchor_claim: A household appliance, and an odor detection method and system for a household appliance are provided. The odor detection method for a household appliance includes: obtaining environmental data in a chamber of the household appliance, where the environmental data includes gas data; and inputting the environmental data into a preset machine learning model and obtaining a classification result, where the preset machine learning model is used to predict a current odor attribute in the chamber based on the environmental data, the preset machine learning model is iteratively updated based on feedback data, and the feedback data is obtained from a user associated with the household appliance and is used to at least represent a predicted satisfaction for the classification result. Through the solution of the present invention, an odor detection logic of the household appliance can be personalized and customized based on a user preference, which is beneficial to improving an intelligence degree of the household appliance.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the temperature control system and method for the cooling system created with the machine learning method and fuzzy logic of the cooling systems of the refrigerator cabinets, which offer a highly effective use for businesses that need product display or storage, such as supermarkets, buffets, patisseries, cafes. The elements used in the invention are; refrigerated display cabinet (10), blowing temperature sensor (S4), average product temperature value (EPT) suction temperature sensor (S3), door sensor (Dn), humidity sensor (1), temperature sensor (2), camera (3), fuzzy cooling class coefficient (4), number of customers (5), database (6), artificial intelligence model (7), density class (8), new temperature value (9).

  2. **머신러닝 모델**: 두 특허 모두 머신러닝 모델을 사용하여 데이터를 처리하고 결과를 도출합니다.

anchor_claim: The application provides a fault prediction method and device of a patrol system based on image data fusion. The fault prediction method comprises the steps of obtaining multi-dimensional data of a first equipment node, determining the variable quantity and the variable trend corresponding to each dimensional data in the multi-dimensional data according to the multi-dimensional data, inputting the multi-dimensional data, the variable quantity and the variable trend corresponding to each dimensional data into a first neural network model for fusion processing to obtain a prediction result, wherein the prediction result is used for representing the occurrence probability of a first fault, and responding to the fact that the occurrence probability of the first fault is larger than a preset probability threshold value, and sending an early warning notification of the first fault. The embodiment of the application is beneficial to improving the precision of fault prediction and reducing the labor intensity of staff.
cited_claim: The invention discloses a thin film lithium niobate modulator control system and an operation method based on intelligent learning, the system comprises a laser, a thin film lithium niobate modulator, an optical coupler, an optical fiber, a photoelectric detector, a gain control module, an analog-to-digital converter, a digital-to-analog converter, a signal processing module, a temperature acquisition module, a power acquisition module, a filter and an amplifier. The method comprises the steps of acquiring the temperature, output power and laser input power of a thin film lithium niobate modulator in real time, detecting whether the temperature, the output power and the laser input power exceed the range of a knowledge base, if the temperature, the output power and the laser input power exceed the range of the knowledge base, carrying out operation analysis, if the temperature, the output power and the laser input power exceed the range of the knowledge base, carrying out intelligent learning, comparing decision results generated by operation with output results, reaching a new flow when the target enters a DC bias control strategy, forming a feedback signal through control words and digital-to-analog conversion, adjusting V  bias , comparing the feedback signal with the output results, reaching the new flow when the target does not reach the target, and carrying out the DC bias control strategy again until the modulator reaches an optimal working state.

anchor_claim: To provide a remote monitoring system which can perform optimal remote monitoring of a state of an object to be monitored.SOLUTION: A remote monitoring system 1 comprises an imaging apparatus 9 for generating image data, and an image analysis system 10 for analyzing an abnormal state of treated water 3 on the basis of the image data. The image analysis system 10 comprises an edge server 15 and a cloud server 17. The cloud server 17 comprises a Web application 19 and is configured to cause the Web application 19 to display an analysis result of the abnormal state and the image data. The image analysis system 10 stores an inference model constructed by machine learning using training data including at least the image data, and is configured to input the image data to the inference model and infer the abnormal state of the treated water 3 in accordance with the inference model.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 2
cited_claim: The invention discloses a new energy boosting variation frequent early warning system and a method, wherein the boosting variation frequent early warning system comprises the following steps: the data acquisition module acquires the data of the new energy boost converter by adopting a sensor technology and a data acquisition card, and the sensor comprises a temperature sensor, a voltage sensor, a current sensor, a vibration sensor and an oil level sensor. The characteristic vector is selected by adopting a wavelet transformation algorithm, the abnormal position is determined by adopting an improved artificial neural network to establish a boosting transformer abnormal positioning model, the parameter of an abnormal detection model is determined by adopting a genetic algorithm, the abnormal type is judged, the accuracy of new energy boosting transformer abnormal identification is improved by adopting an established MFE-TS model optimization objective function, the abnormal position and the abnormal type can be displayed on a user interface by adopting a man-machine interaction module, and the boosting variation normal early warning capability of the new energy is improved.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a high-safety water supply method and a water supply system, wherein the method comprises the following steps of respectively monitoring water quality, water pressure and flow in the water supply system, and determining the safety risk condition in the water supply system according to detection data; the method comprises the steps of adopting a timely alarm technology, a rapid rush repair technology and a simulation emergency technology to timely respond and early warn and avoid safety risk conditions, carrying out fireproof arrangement on a water supply system, processing unexpected fire conditions in the water supply system based on the fireproof arrangement, carrying out multi-level filtration on a water source of the water supply system, establishing a neural network prediction model for water supply safety analysis, and carrying out periodic assessment on the water supply safety of the water supply system based on the neural network prediction model.
cited_claim: An atmospheric water generation system absorbs water from an atmospheric air stream into a desiccant flowing along a flow path of a closed desiccant circulation loop. An amount of water output by the atmospheric water generation system depends on an energy expenditure and environmental conditions at the location of the system. To optimize the performance of the atmospheric water generation system, the system includes controllers and a control system that are configured initiate one or more atmospheric water generation operations based on time-based energy predictions for the system. The time-based energy predictions are generated using machine learning models that learn correlations between optimization inputs aggregated from a plurality of different sources and the performance of the atmospheric water generation system.

anchor_claim: A method of determining an event in which an athlete is engaged includes receiving, at a computing device, a plurality of motion determinations generated by a monitor from motion data captured from the athlete's motion during a monitoring window. The athletic determination includes actions performed by the athlete, performance metrics of the athlete, or both. The method further includes classifying which of a plurality of predetermined events the athlete is engaged in during the monitoring window based at least in part on the plurality of motion determinations using a machine learning model stored on the computing device.
cited_claim: The invention belongs to the technical field of motion monitoring, and provides an intelligent motion monitoring system and method for water craft motion, the multi-mode sensor system is integrated by installing a combined displacement sensor, an inertial sensor and a pressure sensing electronic fabric sensor on a ship body, installing a pressure sensor on a blade, and combining an unmanned aerial vehicle monitoring system and a heart rate belt. Under the support of a deep learning algorithm, the invention realizes a multi-mode intelligent motion monitoring system. The system can comprehensively and accurately acquire the kinematics, dynamics and physiological parameters of the athlete in the water craft sports in real time, and does not interfere with the normal sports of the athlete. Through multidimensional data operation and coupling analysis, the invention constructs the most realistic athlete data model, and effectively guides the daily training of the athlete.

anchor_claim: A semiconductor process system etches gate metals on semiconductor wafers. The semiconductor process system includes a machine learning based analysis model. The analysis model dynamically selects process conditions for an etching process. The process system then uses the selected process conditions data for the next etching process.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of semiconductor chips, in particular to a bionic polarized vision chip device, a preparation method thereof and a convolutional neural network. The device comprises a multilayer two-dimensional van der Waals vertical ferroelectric heterostructure prepared by adopting a two-dimensional material, wherein the structure comprises a bottom electrode layer, a ferroelectric layer, an intermediate metal layer, an insulating layer and a channel layer which are sequentially laminated, the channel layer has anisotropy, the ferroelectric layer is switched by a polarization switch under the induction of polarized light, and the conductivity of the channel layer is controlled for polarization image identification. In the invention, a two-dimensional material is adopted to prepare the bionic polarized visual chip device, atomic layers of the two-dimensional material are combined through weak van der Waals force, van der Waals heterostructures can be formed by mutually stacking, the problem of lattice mismatch is not needed to be considered, the polarization sensitivity is given to the channel layer by the anisotropy, and the conductivity in the channel layer can be changed by the polarization effect of the ferroelectric layer, so that the identification of polarized images can be realized.

cited_claim: The invention belongs to the field of integrated circuits and microelectronic devices, and particularly relates to a double-sided gate transistor single tube integrating sensing and memory and a use method thereof. The invention provides a back-illuminated structure, combines SOI and floating gate transistor technologies, effectively realizes direct sensing and conversion of optical signals by utilizing the unique attribute of the top monocrystalline silicon layer in the SOI, further integrates multiple functions while keeping electrical isolation, and realizes the integration of sensing and storing of a single transistor. The optical signal is directly incident to the channel region from the back substrate of the device, so that the circuit shielding in the optical path is avoided, the high optical signal utilization efficiency is realized, and the carrier concentration and the electric conduction of the channel region are accurately controlled by adjusting parameters of the back illumination structure, such as the light intensity and the thickness of the silicon layer, so that the high sensitivity response to the optical signal is realized. The single transistor sensing and calculating integration realized by the invention provides a basis for further various scene use, such as embedding an artificial neural network as a unit, and being applied to audio signal processing and the like.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of semiconductor chips, in particular to a bionic polarized vision chip device, a preparation method thereof and a convolutional neural network. The device comprises a multilayer two-dimensional van der Waals vertical ferroelectric heterostructure prepared by adopting a two-dimensional material, wherein the structure comprises a bottom electrode layer, a ferroelectric layer, an intermediate metal layer, an insulating layer and a channel layer which are sequentially laminated, the channel layer has anisotropy, the ferroelectric layer is switched by a polarization switch under the induction of polarized light, and the conductivity of the channel layer is controlled for polarization image identification. In the invention, a two-dimensional material is adopted to prepare the bionic polarized visual chip device, atomic layers of the two-dimensional material are combined through weak van der Waals force, van der Waals heterostructures can be formed by mutually stacking, the problem of lattice mismatch is not needed to be considered, the polarization sensitivity is given to the channel layer by the anisotropy, and the conductivity in the channel layer can be changed by the polarization effect of the ferroelectric layer, so that the identification of polarized images can be realized.

anchor_claim: The application relates to a path generation method, electronic equipment and a storage medium for a two-wheeled electric vehicle, which comprise the steps of acquiring data of a user terminal to obtain actual running data and destination information of the user, analyzing the actual running data through a pre-trained track generation model to obtain a plurality of candidate points, determining a priority destination from the destination information according to a travel control strategy of the current user, analyzing the distance between the candidate points and the priority destination position information, selecting the candidate point closest to the priority destination as the next movement point of the user, and carrying out information completion on the next movement point through a point generation control quantity to obtain predicted track data and sending the predicted track data to the user. According to the application, the optimal road navigation information is provided for the user through the deep learning model, and meanwhile, the user destination is combined for optimization, so that the closest point is finally obtained as the optimal next point driving position of the user to the destination.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of aircraft route planning, in particular to an aircraft route planning system and method based on big data analysis, comprising a data acquisition preprocessing module, an environment modeling module, a route planning module, a dynamic obstacle avoidance module, a performance evaluation module, a collaborative planning module, an interaction module and a privacy module; the data acquisition preprocessing module is used for integrating data acquisition and data cleaning, and the environment modeling module is used for environment modeling and meteorological prediction. Compared with the traditional route planning method, the method can quickly generate a plurality of feasible initial routes through automatic data acquisition, integration and processing and a high-efficiency algorithm model, and optimally select the initial routes, so that the efficiency of route planning is greatly improved, and meteorological conditions can be more accurately predicted and the performance of an aircraft can be estimated by utilizing big data analysis and machine learning technology, so that a safer and more economical flight path is planned.

cited_claim: The present invention relates to an automated travel planning data processing system and method that leverages advanced artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) algorithms to generate personalized travel itineraries in real-time. The system comprises a central server with one or more processors, memory, and a machine learning module, as well as a travel database that stores aggregated data from multiple sources. Users interact with the system through a natural language processing-based user interface, which receives inputs comprising travel dates, destinations, and preferences. An AI-powered itinerary generation engine processes user inputs and aggregated data to create personalized travel plans, utilizing a multithreading module for simultaneous data retrieval and processing. The machine learning module continuously optimizes the itinerary generation process by analyzing user preferences and travel data patterns. The invention also provides a method for automated travel itinerary planning using the data processing system.

anchor_claim: A high-precision inclinometer temperature compensation method is provided, including: acquiring original data of an inclinometer; and constructing a BP neural network model, optimizing the BP neural network model by adopting L-BFGS iterative optimization algorithm, and inputting the original data into an optimized BP neural network model to obtain a temperature compensation result of the inclinometer.
cited_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of aircraft route planning, in particular to an aircraft route planning system and method based on big data analysis, comprising a data acquisition preprocessing module, an environment modeling module, a route planning module, a dynamic obstacle avoidance module, a performance evaluation module, a collaborative planning module, an interaction module and a privacy module; the data acquisition preprocessing module is used for integrating data acquisition and data cleaning, and the environment modeling module is used for environment modeling and meteorological prediction. Compared with the traditional route planning method, the method can quickly generate a plurality of feasible initial routes through automatic data acquisition, integration and processing and a high-efficiency algorithm model, and optimally select the initial routes, so that the efficiency of route planning is greatly improved, and meteorological conditions can be more accurately predicted and the performance of an aircraft can be estimated by utilizing big data analysis and machine learning technology, so that a safer and more economical flight path is planned.
ground_truth_critique:
[유사도 평가]
- 기술적 유사성 점수: 30/100
- 핵심 공통 요소: **기술적 유사성 점수**: 30, **핵심 공통 기술 요소**:, 두 특허 모두 데이터 수집 및 처리와 관련된 기술을 포함하고 있습니다.
- **기술적 유사성 점수**: 30
- **핵심 공통 기술 요소**:
  - 두 특허 모두 데이터 수집 및 처리와 관련된 기술을 포함하고 있습니다.
  - 머신러닝 알고리즘(특허 1의 BP 신경망, 특허 2의 고효율 알고리즘 모델)을 활용하여 결과를 최적화하는 점에서 유사성이 존재합니다.
  - 데이터 기반의 예측 및 최적화 기능이 강조되고 있습니다.

###

[침해 리스크]
- 리스크 수준: low
- 위험 요소: **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성**: 낮음, 두 특허는 서로 다른 분야(인클리노미터 온도 보상 vs 항공기 경로 계획)에 적용되고 있으며, 기술적 구현 방식과 목적이 다릅니다., **위험 요소 식별**:
- **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성**: 낮음
  - 두 특허는 서로 다른 분야(인클리노미터 온도 보상 vs 항공기 경로 계획)에 적용되고 있으며, 기술적 구현 방식과 목적이 다릅니다.
- **위험 요소 식별**:
  - 특허 1은 특정한 온도 보상 방법에 집중하고 있으며, 특허 2는 항공기 경로 계획에 중점을 두고 있어, 직접적인 기술적 겹침은 적습니다.
  - 그러나 머신러닝 및 데이터 처리 기술의 일반적인 사용은 특허 침해 리스크를 증가시킬 수 있으므로, 특정 구현 방식에 대한 주의가 필요합니다.

###

[회피 전략]
- 설계 변경: **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:, 특허 1의 BP 신경망 모델 대신 다른 머신러닝 알고리즘(예: 랜덤 포레스트, 서포트 벡터 머신 등)을 사용하여 온도 보상 방법을 구현할 수 있습니다., 데이터 수집 및 처리 방법을 변경하여, 기존의 데이터 전처리 방식을 회피하고 새로운 알고리즘을 도입하는 것도 고려할 수 있습니다.
- 대안적 접근: **대안적 기술 접근법**:
- **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:
  - 특허 1의 BP 신경망 모델 대신 다른 머신러닝 알고리즘(예: 랜덤 포레스트, 서포트 벡터 머신 등)을 사용하여 온도 보상 방법을 구현할 수 있습니다.
  - 데이터 수집 및 처리 방법을 변경하여, 기존의 데이터 전처리 방식을 회피하고 새로운 알고리즘을 도입하는 것도 고려할 수 있습니다.
  
- **대안적 기술 접근법**:
  - 인클리노미터의 온도 보상 외에도 다른 센서 데이터(예: 압력, 습도 등)를 활용하여 복합적인 보상 방법을 개발할 수 있습니다.
  - 비슷한 목적을 가진 다른 기술(예: 물리적 보상 장치 또는 하드웨어 기반의 보상 시스템)을 탐색하여, 소프트웨어 기반의 접근법에서 벗어날 수 있습니다.

이 분석을 통해 두 특허 간의 기술적 유사성, 침해 리스크, 회피 전략을 명확히 이해할 수 있으며, 향후 개발 및 연구 방향에 대한 인사이트를 제공할 수 있습니다.

anchor_claim: The invention provides a submerged arc furnace control method, a submerged arc furnace control system, a storage medium and electronic equipment, belonging to the technical field of automatic control, wherein the method comprises the following steps of S1, acquiring the diameter of an electrode in the submerged arc furnace, the center distance multiple of the electrode, the specific resistance of furnace burden and the heat energy distribution coefficient of a furnace burden layer; S2, constructing a submerged arc furnace control model, wherein S3, the i-phase operation resistance of the electrode is substituted into the submerged arc furnace control model to determine the i-phase insertion depth of the electrode, the i-phase insertion depth of the electrode is optimized through the BP neural network model, the optimal i-phase insertion depth is obtained, and the submerged arc furnace is controlled and regulated through the optimal i-phase insertion depth. The invention takes the operating resistance as the regulated quantity, the operating resistance is in inverse proportion to the insertion depth of the electrode, and when the operating resistance of one phase on the electrode is changed to be automatically regulated, the other two phases of the electrode cannot participate in the automatic regulation, thereby ensuring reasonable heat distribution and regulation stability of a furnace charge area and a molten pool area.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of side slope detection, and discloses a side slope radar system and a side slope radar method based on a digital declining technology, the system integrates radar transmitting and receiving, digital declining processing, data storage, data analysis and a user interface module, and realizes high-precision measurement by transmitting broadband or ultra-broadband linear frequency modulation signals and receiving reflected echoes. The data analysis module adopts a machine learning algorithm to preprocess collected historical slope displacement and deformation mode data, extract characteristics and construct a model, so as to form a slope stability prediction model. The one-dimensional distance image data obtained in real time is analyzed by a model, the slope stability state is predicted, and compared with a preset threshold value, an alarm mechanism is triggered in time. The intelligent slope monitoring system improves the intelligent level of slope monitoring, realizes the deep excavation and accurate prediction of the slope deformation mode, and provides powerful guarantee for geological disaster prevention and public safety.
cited_claim: The invention provides a comprehensive monitoring system, an early warning analysis method and an implementation method of a full section of a tunnel based on a distributed optical fiber sensing technology, which relate to the field of tunnel engineering and comprise a terminal processing system and a cloud AI processing system, wherein the terminal processing system and the cloud AI processing system are mutually connected in a signal manner to jointly construct a two-stage interactive system architecture, the terminal processing system is used for quantizing risk factors of the full section of the tunnel into numerical characteristic vectors, calculating state differences of the monitoring section of the same tunnel under different time points according to the numerical characteristic vectors through a specific algorithm to obtain target deformation data, and the method is used for calculating the state differences of the monitoring section of the same tunnel under different time points according to the execution degree And determining the current early warning state of the tunnel section. The intelligent verification system has the advantages that the distributed optical fiber sensing technology is utilized to monitor multi-section data in the tunnel in real time, and the feedback mechanism is introduced, so that a set of intelligent verification system for continuous learning and optimization is built by mutually fusing the professional experience of constructors and the advanced deep learning technology.

cited_claim: The invention discloses a method for monitoring the spatial positions of a drum and a side protection plate of a coal mining machine, which is used for accurately identifying the spatial positions of the drum and the side protection plate of a hydraulic support of the coal mining machine, and monitoring and early warning in real time, and comprises the following steps: the method comprises the steps of acquiring images of a hydraulic support side protection plate by using an industrial camera, extracting a real-time inclination angle theta of the hydraulic support side protection plate based on a deep learning algorithm, acquiring the relative position of a coal cutter and the hydraulic support by adopting a wireless radio frequency identification technology, acquiring the included angle between a large rocker arm of the coal cutter and a fully-mechanized coal face bottom plate, measuring the pushing stroke of a telescopic front beam, carrying out space position calculation on a coal cutter roller and the hydraulic support side protection plate by using acquired data information, obtaining the real-time space position of the coal cutter roller and the hydraulic support side protection plate, planning a cutting warning plane, carrying out grading early warning according to the space position relation of the coal cutter roller and the hydraulic support side protection plate, and sending corresponding signals, so that the coal cutter roller is prevented from cutting the hydraulic support side protection plate, and the fully-mechanized coal face is ensured to be produced safely and efficiently.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a large-space three-dimensional characteristic point autonomous photoelectric measurement system and method, electronic equipment and storage medium, wherein the method comprises the following steps of firstly, building the large-space three-dimensional characteristic point autonomous photoelectric measurement system; step two, initializing a system, starting data acquisition, step three, acquiring and processing a space key point image and extracting a central point, and step four, guiding a laser tracker to measure the space key point. According to the invention, a high-resolution camera is built through a turntable and is used for searching and collecting component key point images, a controller is used for carrying out feature extraction and key point identification on image data by using a deep learning technology, the center of a circular light spot is accurately extracted by a Hessian matrix method, a PID algorithm is used for guiding a laser tracker to adjust the pitching and yaw angles of the laser tracker, the coincidence of the feature point center of visual identification and the center of the light spot projected by the laser tracker is realized, and the automatic, intelligent and high-precision measurement of the key point on the surface of a large-sized component can be realized.
cited_claim: The invention provides a comprehensive monitoring system, an early warning analysis method and an implementation method of a full section of a tunnel based on a distributed optical fiber sensing technology, which relate to the field of tunnel engineering and comprise a terminal processing system and a cloud AI processing system, wherein the terminal processing system and the cloud AI processing system are mutually connected in a signal manner to jointly construct a two-stage interactive system architecture, the terminal processing system is used for quantizing risk factors of the full section of the tunnel into numerical characteristic vectors, calculating state differences of the monitoring section of the same tunnel under different time points according to the numerical characteristic vectors through a specific algorithm to obtain target deformation data, and the method is used for calculating the state differences of the monitoring section of the same tunnel under different time points according to the execution degree And determining the current early warning state of the tunnel section. The intelligent verification system has the advantages that the distributed optical fiber sensing technology is utilized to monitor multi-section data in the tunnel in real time, and the feedback mechanism is introduced, so that a set of intelligent verification system for continuous learning and optimization is built by mutually fusing the professional experience of constructors and the advanced deep learning technology.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses a method for monitoring the spatial positions of a drum and a side protection plate of a coal mining machine, which is used for accurately identifying the spatial positions of the drum and the side protection plate of a hydraulic support of the coal mining machine, and monitoring and early warning in real time, and comprises the following steps: the method comprises the steps of acquiring images of a hydraulic support side protection plate by using an industrial camera, extracting a real-time inclination angle theta of the hydraulic support side protection plate based on a deep learning algorithm, acquiring the relative position of a coal cutter and the hydraulic support by adopting a wireless radio frequency identification technology, acquiring the included angle between a large rocker arm of the coal cutter and a fully-mechanized coal face bottom plate, measuring the pushing stroke of a telescopic front beam, carrying out space position calculation on a coal cutter roller and the hydraulic support side protection plate by using acquired data information, obtaining the real-time space position of the coal cutter roller and the hydraulic support side protection plate, planning a cutting warning plane, carrying out grading early warning according to the space position relation of the coal cutter roller and the hydraulic support side protection plate, and sending corresponding signals, so that the coal cutter roller is prevented from cutting the hydraulic support side protection plate, and the fully-mechanized coal face is ensured to be produced safely and efficiently.
cited_claim: The invention provides a comprehensive monitoring system, an early warning analysis method and an implementation method of a full section of a tunnel based on a distributed optical fiber sensing technology, which relate to the field of tunnel engineering and comprise a terminal processing system and a cloud AI processing system, wherein the terminal processing system and the cloud AI processing system are mutually connected in a signal manner to jointly construct a two-stage interactive system architecture, the terminal processing system is used for quantizing risk factors of the full section of the tunnel into numerical characteristic vectors, calculating state differences of the monitoring section of the same tunnel under different time points according to the numerical characteristic vectors through a specific algorithm to obtain target deformation data, and the method is used for calculating the state differences of the monitoring section of the same tunnel under different time points according to the execution degree And determining the current early warning state of the tunnel section. The intelligent verification system has the advantages that the distributed optical fiber sensing technology is utilized to monitor multi-section data in the tunnel in real time, and the feedback mechanism is introduced, so that a set of intelligent verification system for continuous learning and optimization is built by mutually fusing the professional experience of constructors and the advanced deep learning technology.

cited_claim: The invention relates to a method and equipment for detecting longitudinal displacement of a seamless rail, and belongs to the technical field of rail detection. The longitudinal displacement detection device comprises a hand-push type support which is used for being distributed on a steel rail and providing support for other modules, a camera module which is used for capturing image information of a displacement observation pile and an observation scale on the steel rail, and a centralized control module which is used for realizing data collection, processing and transmission. The second industrial personal computer configured by the centralized control module is configured to perform illumination adjustment on image data acquired by the camera module in real time in the process of moving along with the hand-push type bracket by using a deep learning algorithm, ensure clear images, calculate centroid coordinates of the observation piles and the observation scales by using an edge detection and contour extraction algorithm, compare the images acquired in real time with images in a basic database, calculate longitudinal displacement of the steel rail, and update the database.

anchor_claim: The invention provides a roll-to-roll plasma treatment method for surface treatment, which comprises the steps of installing a programmable pulse plasma cavity in each functional area of a treatment line, arranging a low-energy density plasma source and an auxiliary cleaning device in a pretreatment area, applying a high-low frequency pulse modulation and multipath gas switching device in a functional modification area, integrating a movable nozzle and a focusing pulse plasma source in a local functionalization area, arranging a passivation plasma source and infrared in a post-treatment area, arranging detection instruments at the tail ends of each partition and the treatment line, running a pre-trained machine learning model in a control system, recording treatment parameters and detection results of each batch in a database, and updating the machine learning model periodically. The multi-partition treatment can cooperatively complete cleaning, modification and functionalization in the same process, the whole turnover period of the material is obviously shortened, the treatment precision between batches is easier to keep consistent, the production efficiency is improved, and the occupied time and energy consumption of equipment are reduced.
cited_claim: The disclosure relates to producing and using a machine-learned or trained algorithm, such as resulting from (supervised) training a multi-layered or convolutional neural network using mass-curated training spectra, for mass recalibration of mass spectrometry data, in particular applied to mass spectrometry data which are based on matrix-assisted laser desorption/ionization (MALDI) as ionization mechanism, further in particular applied to mass spectrometry imaging (MSI) data, and further in particular including subjecting the mass spectrometry data to mass defect analysis, such as Kendrick mass defect analysis. In so doing, the quality of mass spectrometry data can be improved in a timely manner.

  - 두 특허 모두 데이터 기반의 접근 방식을 채택하고 있으며, 결과를 향상시키기 위해 기계 학습을 활용합니다.

###

[침해 리스크]
- 리스크 수준: low
- 위험 요소: **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성**:, 원본 특허는 이미지 처리 및 예측에 중점을 두고 있으며, 인용 특허는 표면 처리 및 기능화에 중점을 두고 있습니다. 따라서 직접적인 침해 가능성은 낮습니다., 그러나, 두 특허 모두 머신 러닝을 사용하므로, 만약 인용 특허가 원본 특허의 특정 머신 러닝 기술을 사용한다면, 침해 리스크가 발생할 수 있습니다.
- **잠재적 특허 침해 가능성**:
  - 원본 특허는 이미지 처리 및 예측에 중점을 두고 있으며, 인용 특허는 표면 처리 및 기능화에 중점을 두고 있습니다. 따라서 직접적인 침해 가능성은 낮습니다.
  - 그러나, 두 특허 모두 머신 러닝을 사용하므로, 만약 인용 특허가 원본 특허의 특정 머신 러닝 기술을 사용한다면, 침해 리스크가 발생할 수 있습니다.
  
- **위험 요소 식별**:
  - 인용 특허에서 머신 러닝 모델의 사용이 원본 특허의 기술적 요소와 유사하게 적용될 경우, 침해 리스크가 증가할 수 있습니다.
  - 특히, 두 특허 모두 데이터 수집 및 처리 방법에 대한 기술적 세부사항이 다르기 때문에, 특정 구현 방식에서의 유사성이 문제될 수 있습니다.

###

[회피 전략]

- 대안적 접근: **대안적 기술 접근법**:
- **설계 변경을 통한 회피 방안**:

  - 원본 특허의 경우, 이미지 예측 및 표시 방법을 변경하여 특정한 머신 러닝 모델 대신 다른 예측 모델을 사용할 수 있습니다.

- **대안적 기술 접근법**:
  - 인용 특허는 전통적인 공정 제어 방법과 결합하여 머신 러닝을 보조적으로 사용할 수 있습니다. 예를 들어, 머신 러닝 없이도 공정 최적화를 위한 알고리즘을 개발할 수 있습니다.

anchor_claim: The disclosure relates to producing and using a machine-learned or trained algorithm, such as resulting from (supervised) training a multi-layered or convolutional neural network using mass-curated training spectra, for mass recalibration of mass spectrometry data, in particular applied to mass spectrometry data which are based on matrix-assisted laser desorption/ionization (MALDI) as ionization mechanism, further in particular applied to mass spectrometry imaging (MSI) data, and further in particular including subjecting the mass spectrometry data to mass defect analysis, such as Kendrick mass defect analysis. In so doing, the quality of mass spectrometry data can be improved in a timely manner.
cited_claim: The invention provides a roll-to-roll plasma treatment method for surface treatment, which comprises the steps of installing a programmable pulse plasma cavity in each functional area of a treatment line, arranging a low-energy density plasma source and an auxiliary cleaning device in a pretreatment area, applying a high-low frequency pulse modulation and multipath gas switching device in a functional modification area, integrating a movable nozzle and a focusing pulse plasma source in a local functionalization area, arranging a passivation plasma source and infrared in a post-treatment area, arranging detection instruments at the tail ends of each partition and the treatment line, running a pre-trained machine learning model in a control system, recording treatment parameters and detection results of each batch in a database, and updating the machine learning model periodically. The multi-partition treatment can cooperatively complete cleaning, modification and functionalization in the same process, the whole turnover period of the material is obviously shortened, the treatment precision between batches is easier to keep consistent, the production efficiency is improved, and the occupied time and energy consumption of equipment are reduced.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses an artificial intelligent automatic answering conference assistant, in particular to the technical field of intelligent video conferences, which comprises a user interface for displaying conference information, function options and execution results, a large language model for natural language processing and understanding, and a language recognition module for converting voice input into characters to realize real-time conference recording and voice instruction recognition. The invention can intuitively display meeting information, function options and execution results through friendly user interface design, so that a user can easily operate and control the whole meeting flow, the voice recognition module adopts the high-quality recording module to accurately transfer voice content in the meeting into characters in real time, the integrity and the accuracy of meeting records are ensured, the large language model further carries out semantic understanding and processing on the transferred text to generate an intelligent meeting abstract and response, the user can quickly acquire key information, and the post-processing module automatically sends the abstract to a user mailbox or is automatically integrated into an online office system of the user, so that a great deal of time and energy are saved.
cited_claim: Provided is a method for generating a storyboard, the method comprising retrieving user-specific information from a user, wherein the user-specific information is correlated to a prospective video; collecting, based on the user-specific information, via a data pipeline in informatic communication with a platform application programming interface, content from a platform; preprocessing the content from the platform to manifest preprocessed content; feeding the preprocessed content into a storyboard generation module; generating, via a machine learning model, the storyboard based on the preprocessed content, wherein the machine learning model was trained on a training dataset selected from the group consisting of preexisting videos and preexisting storyboards; and displaying the storyboard, via a storyboard interface, the storyboard interface comprising one or more user-editable options for the storyboard.

cited_claim: The present disclosure describes techniques for searching editing components based on text using a machine learning model. A plurality of visual embeddings indicative of a plurality of visual editing components is acquired by the machine learning model. The plurality of visual embeddings indicative of the plurality of visual editing components is projected into a common space by a first sub-model of the machine learning model. A text query input is received by a user. A text embedding indicative of the text query is generated. The text embedding is projected into the common space by a second sub-model of the machine learning model. At least one visual editing component among the plurality of visual editing components is determined based on the projected text embedding and the plurality of projected visual embeddings in the common space. Information indicative of the at least one visual editing component is displayed via a user interface.

anchor_claim: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent control and discloses an intelligent energy-saving electric wheelchair balance system which comprises a driving layer, a control layer, a data layer and a display layer, wherein a balance judging module in the data layer is arranged to be beneficial to acquiring a balance stable value of an electric wheelchair based on a constructed balance prediction model and carrying out balance stability judgment so as to carry out intelligent control on the electric wheelchair, a trained neural network model is integrated into intelligent control calculation, nonlinear and multi-mode data modeling capacity of the neural network can be fully exerted, a complex data relationship is effectively captured, according to a parallel calculation processing mechanism, the calculation efficiency is improved, intelligent control results are obtained through a deep learning technology, the pertinence and the effectiveness of intelligent balance control on the electric wheelchair are improved, the complex data relationship is fully captured by fully utilizing data and through the deep learning technology, and the effectiveness and the accuracy of intelligent balance control on the electric wheelchair are effectively improved.
cited_claim: The application relates to a noise reduction control method and system for an infant incubator and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of noise reduction. The noise-reducing method comprises the steps of dividing a noise bandwidth filter for filtering noise into a plurality of narrow band sub-filters in advance, collecting noise input of an incubator, analyzing the noise input through a pretrained convolutional neural network to obtain a narrow band sub-filter weight vector adapting to the noise input, wherein the narrow band sub-filter weight vector comprises filter weights corresponding to all the narrow band sub-filters, weighting and summing the narrow band sub-filters and the corresponding filter weights to obtain a total filter, processing the input noise through the total filter, and superposing a processing result after a secondary path response and a primary path corresponding result of the noise input to realize noise reduction. The total filter is suitable for noise input dynamic adjustment, can adapt to different noises, meets the noise reduction requirement of the infant incubator, provides a quiet environment for infants, and avoids the influence of the infants which are intensively cared on each other.

anchor_claim: The invention discloses an AD key self-adaptive compensation correction method, an AD key self-adaptive compensation correction device, computer equipment and a storage medium, which relate to the technical field of intelligent control and signal processing and comprise the steps of collecting key signals in real time, converting the key signals into digital signals and preprocessing the digital signals, using a PID control loop to preliminarily and dynamically adjust target threshold values, optimizing parameters of a PID controller through PSO particle swarm and improved ITAE, using a long-short-term memory network output error correction value to finally correct the target threshold values, using SOGI-FLL to carry out signal decoupling on the digital signals and constructing a key state model to obtain real-time key states. The PID parameters are optimized by utilizing the PID control loop and the PSO particle swarm, the target threshold can be dynamically adjusted, the stability and the accuracy of the system under various environments are ensured, the target threshold is corrected by utilizing the LSTM neural network, the defects of the traditional method are effectively overcome, the SOGI-FLL decoupling digital signal is adopted, the higher harmonic component is accurately analyzed, and the reliability and the response accuracy of key identification are remarkably improved.
cited_claim: A system and method for adaptive data processing combining compression and encryption. The system analyzes input data characteristics, compares probability distributions, and creates a transformation matrix to convert data into a dyadic distribution. It generates a main data stream of transformed data and a secondary stream of transformation information. The system dynamically selects and applies processing techniques, including transformation, encoding, compression, and encryption algorithms, based on analyzed characteristics and real-time performance metrics. It compresses the main data stream using Huffman coding and implements security measures to protect the output. A feedback loop monitors technique effectiveness, updates a knowledge base, and influences future selections. The system can operate in lossless, lossy, or modified lossless modes, adapting to different application requirements. This approach offers an efficient solution for scenarios where both data reduction and security are critical concerns.

anchor_claim: Vector-scaled hierarchical codebook quantization reduces precision (bitwidth) vectors of parameters and may enable energy-efficient acceleration of deep neural networks. A vector (block array) comprises one or more parameters within a single dimension of a multi-dimensional tensor (or kernel). For example, block array comprises 4 sub-vectors (blocks) and each sub-vector comprises 8 parameters. The parameters may be represented in integer, floating-point, or any other suitable format. A vector cluster quantization technique is used to quantize blocks of parameters in real-time. Hardware circuitry within a datapath identifies an optimal codebook of a plurality of codebooks for quantizing each block of parameters and the block is encoded using the identified codebook. During processing, the identified codebook is used to obtain the quantized parameter and perform computations at the reduced precision.
cited_claim: Certain aspects of the present disclosure provide techniques for performing machine learning computations in a compute in memory (CIM) array comprising a plurality of bit cells, including: determining that a sparsity of input data to a machine learning model exceeds an input data sparsity threshold; disabling one or more bit cells in the CIM array based on the sparsity of the input data prior to processing the input data; processing the input data with bit cells not disabled in the CIM array to generate an output value; applying a compensation to the output value based on the sparsity to generate a compensated output value; and outputting the compensated output value.

anchor_claim: The application relates to the field of data processing and discloses a hardware-oriented high-precision gradient compression method which comprises the steps of loading gradient data according to blocks, separating sign bits, exponent bits and mantissa bits of each floating point number, cutting off the mantissa bits, reserving high-order parts of the mantissa bits, predicting the exponent bits by adopting fixed value or block average value, calculating residual errors, carrying out inversion processing on the negative residual errors, eliminating zero columns in a residual error matrix through zero mapping coding, generating a compact non-zero matrix, and finally packaging the sign bits, the cut mantissa bits, zero mapping and the non-zero matrix to form a compressed output stream. The method remarkably reduces the storage and transmission requirements of gradient data through the steps of separation, prediction, residual calculation, zero coding and the like, simultaneously keeps the accuracy of model training, is suitable for hardware implementation of FPGA or GPU and the like, and has the advantages of low resource consumption, high compression rate and adaptation to various deep learning models.
cited_claim: A system and method for adaptive data processing combining compression and encryption. The system analyzes input data characteristics, compares probability distributions, and creates a transformation matrix to convert data into a dyadic distribution. It generates a main data stream of transformed data and a secondary stream of transformation information. The system dynamically selects and applies processing techniques, including transformation, encoding, compression, and encryption algorithms, based on analyzed characteristics and real-time performance metrics. It compresses the main data stream using Huffman coding and implements security measures to protect the output. A feedback loop monitors technique effectiveness, updates a knowledge base, and influences future selections. The system can operate in lossless, lossy, or modified lossless modes, adapting to different application requirements. This approach offers an efficient solution for scenarios where both data reduction and security are critical concerns.
